pītarūpādikam | naivaṃ jalādau | jalegnisaṃyogenoṣṇasparśabhānepi na tatratyasya
śītasparśasya parāvṛttiḥ | uṣṇatā tvaupādhikī jale praviṣṭānāmagnikaṇānāmeva |
uṣṇatāpratītikālepi jalaṃ vastutaḥ śītameva | tadānīṃ śītasparśo na bhāsata
ityanyat | jalatvādāvativyāptivāraṇāya pākajarūpasamānādhikaraṇetyuktiḥ |
atredaṃ bodhyam — yasyā jāterlakṣaṇaṃ vidheyaṃ tadbhinnāḥ sarvā jātayo lakṣaṇaghaṭakaiḥ
padairvyāvartanīyāḥ | tāśca dvividhāḥ | lakṣyabhūtajātyā samānādhikaraṇāstadvyadhi-
karaṇāśca | ādyā api dvividhāḥ | lakṣyabhūtajātervyāpyāstadvyāpikāśca | tatra
pākajarūpasamānādhikaraṇetyanena pṛthivītvavyadhikaraṇānāṃ jalatvādīnāṃ vyāvṛttiḥ |
vyāpyānāṃ vyāpikānāṃ ca dvividhānāmapi samānādhikaraṇajātīnāṃ dravyatvasākṣā-
dvyāpyeti padena vyāvṛttiḥ | pṛthivītvavyāpakajāterdravyatvasya sattāyāśca dravyatvavyā-
pyatvābhāvāt | pṛthivītvavyāpyānāṃ ghaṭatvādijātīnāṃ dravyatvavyāpyatvepi
sākṣādvyāpyatvaṃ nāstīti | aptvamiti | aptvavyadhikaraṇānāṃ pṛthivītvā-
dīnāṃ jātīnāṃ saritsāgarasamavetatve satītyanena nirāsaḥ | tathāptvavyāpyānāṃ
sarittvasāgaratvasarastvādīnāṃ ca tenaiva nirāsaḥ | sarittvasya sāgarasamavetatvābhā-
vāt | sāgaratvasya ca saritsamavetatvābhāvāt | sarastvādīnāṃ tvanyatarasminnapi
na samavetatvam | aptvavyāpakasya dravyatvasya sattāyāśca jvalanāsamavetapadena
nirāsaḥ | tejastvamiti | cāmīkaraṃ suvarṇam | tacca tejoviśeṣa eva | pada-
kṛtyaṃ pūrvavadbodhyam | tvagindriyeti | tvagindriyasya vāyavīyatvāttatsamavetā
dravyatvasya sākṣādvyāpyā jātirvāyutvamityarthaḥ | ākāśeti | ākāśatvakāla-
tvadiktvāni na dravyatvāparajātayaḥ | teṣāmekaikavyaktivṛttitvena jātitvasyaivā-
bhāvāt | saṃyogājanyeti | saṃyogājanyo janyaśca yo viśeṣaguṇastatsamānā-
dhikaraṇasya viśeṣasya yadadhikaraṇaṃ tadevākāśam | viśeṣāṇāṃ nityadravyavṛttitvādā-
kāśe kaścana viśeṣostyeva | sa ca viśeṣaguṇena śabdena saha samānādhikaraṇaḥ |
śabdasyākāśavṛttitvāt | śabdaścānityatvājjanyaḥ | saṃyogājanyopi bhavati |
vibhāgajasya śabdajasya ca śabdasya sattvāt | atra viśeṣādhikaraṇamityuktyā
dvyaṇukatryaṇukādīnāmanityadravyāṇāṃ guṇakarmādīnāṃ ca nirāsaḥ | viśeṣāṇāṃ
nityadravyamātravṛttitvāt | pṛthivīparamāṇugatā rūpādayo viśeṣaguṇā janyā api
na saṃyogājanyāḥ | teṣāṃ pākajatvāt | pākastejaḥsaṃyogaḥ | jalatejovāyupara-
māṇugatā viśeṣaguṇāstu na janyāḥ | dikkālayormanasi ca na viśeṣaguṇaḥ kaścit |
paramātmaniṣṭhā buddhyādayo viśeṣaguṇā na janyāḥ | jīvātmaniṣṭhāstu buddhyādayo
janyā api na saṃyogājanyāḥ | teṣāṃ manaḥsaṃyogajanyatvāt | tadevamākāśamevai-
kamīdṛśaṃ pariśiṣyate | śabdaguṇakamākāśamityuktyaiva nirvāhe saṃyogājanyetyādyu-
ktirvaicitryaviśeṣasphoraṇārthā | viśeṣādhikaraṇatvena keṣāṃ mithaḥ sādharmyaṃ viśeṣaguṇa-
samānādhikaraṇaviśeṣādhikaraṇatvena ca keṣāṃ sādharmyamityādijñānaṃ hyanumāne
vyāptyudāharaṇapradarśanāyopayujyata iti | vibhutve satīti | digasamavetaṃ yatpa-
ratvasyāsamavāyikāraṇaṃ tadādhārabhūto yo vibhuḥ padārthaḥ sa kāla ityarthaḥ | paratvaṃ
dvividham — samīpavastvapekṣayā dūravastuni vidyamānaṃ kaniṣṭhāpekṣayā jyeṣṭhe vidya-
mānaṃ ca | ādyasyāsamavāyikāraṇaṃ digvastunoḥ saṃyogaḥ | ayaṃ diksamavetaḥ |
saṃyogasya dviṣṭhatvāt | dvitīyasyāsamavāyikāraṇaṃ kālavastunoḥ saṃyogaḥ | ayaṃ
digasamavetaḥ kālasamavetaḥ | jyeṣṭhetivyāptivāraṇāya vibhutve satīti | saṃyogasya
dviṣṭhatvena kāle jyeṣṭhe ca sattvāt | ākāśātmanorativyāptivāraṇāya paratveti |
diśyativyāptivāraṇāya digasamaveteti | taccāsamavāyikāraṇasya viśeṣaṇam |
akālatva iti | kālabhinnā viśeṣaguṇarahitā mahatī ca yā saiva digityarthaḥ |
kāletivyāptivāraṇāyākālatve satīti | ākāśātmanorativyāptivāraṇāyāvi-
śeṣaguṇeti | manasyativyāptivāraṇāya mahatīti | ātmatvamanastve iti |
lakṣaṇamityanukṛṣyate | tacca vacanavipariṇāmenātra dvivacanāntaṃ satsaṃbadhyate |
ātmatvaṃ nāmeti | mūrtadravyeṣvasamavetā dravyatvavyāpyā yā jātistadevātma-
tvamityarthaḥ | pṛthivyaptejovāyumanāṃsi pañca mūrtadravyāṇi | teṣu pṛthivītvādirjā-
tirvartate | paraṃ tu sā mūrtasamaveteti tannirāsaḥ | ākāśakāladiśāṃ caikaikavyakti-
katvātteṣu jātireva nāsti | tathā cedṛśyātmatvajātireva | manastvaṃ nāmeti |
dravyasamavāyikāraṇatvena rahitā yeṇavasteṣu samavetā dravyatvavyāpyā yā jāti-
stadeva manastvatityarthaḥ | pṛthivyaptejovāyūnāṃ paramāṇavastattaddvyaṇukasamavāyikāra-
ṇabhūtā iti te dravyasamavāyikāraṇatvena rahitā na bhavanti | ātmānastu
vibhava eva nāṇavaḥ | manāṃsi tvaṇūnyeva |

kaṇṭhoktā iti | rūparasagandhasparśāḥ saṃkhyāḥ parimāṇāni pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyoga-
vibhāgau paratvāparatve buddhayaḥ sukhaduḥkhe icchādveṣau prayatnāśca guṇāḥ (ka. sū.
1 | 1 | 6) iti sūtre kaṇādenoktāḥ | tatraiva sūtrenuktasamuccayārthakena cakāreṇa
gṛhītā gurutvādayaḥ saptetyevaṃ caturviṃśatirguṇāḥ | adṛṣṭaśabdena dharmādharmayordvayorgraha-
ṇam | rūpatvamiti | nīle rūpaviśeṣe samavetā guṇatvasya sākṣādvyāpyā yā
jātistadeva rūpatvamityarthaḥ | rasatvādijātayastu na nīlasamavetāḥ | sattā tu na
guṇatvavyāpyā | nīlatvajātistu na guṇatvasya sākṣādvyāpyeti bhāvaḥ |
bhramaṇeti | taduktaṃ bhāṣāparicchede —

bhramaṇaṃ recanaṃ syandanordhvajvalanameva ca |
tiryaggamanamapyatra gamanādeva labhyate || (bhāṣāpa. 7) iti |
utkṣepaṇādīnāmapi gamanentarbhāva iti tu na śaṅkyam | svatantrecchasya sūtrakārasya
paryanuyogānarhatvāt | tatrotkṣepaṇatvamiti | ūrdhvadeśasaṃyogasyāsamavāyi-
kāraṇaṃ yatkarmaviśeṣarūpaṃ tatsamavetā karmatvavyāpyā yā jātistadevotkṣepaṇatva-
mityarthaḥ | evamiti | adhodeśasaṃyogaheturapakṣepaṇam | vakratāsaṃpādakamākuñca-
nam | ṛjutāsaṃpādakaṃ prasāraṇam | anyatsarvaṃ gamanam |

dravyaguṇeti | dravyasamavetetyuktau dravyatvetivyāptiḥ | ato guṇapadam |
tāvanmātroktau guṇatvetivyāptiḥ | ato dravyapadam | sattā tu dravyavṛttirguṇa-
vṛttiśca bhavati | karmavṛttirapītyanyadetat | na tu lakṣaṇe karmapadasyopayogaḥ |

dvitve ceti | dvitvasaṃkhyāviṣaye pākajotpattiviṣaye vibhāgajavibhāgaviṣaye
ca yasya buddhirna cyavate taṃ vaiśeṣikaṃ viduḥ | uktasthalatraye vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ viśeṣo-
bhiniveśa ityarthaḥ | ābhāṇakaḥ | hmaṇa iti bhāṣāyāṃ prasiddha uktiviśeṣaḥ |
mīmāṃsakāstvitthamāhuḥ — yadā ghaṭādidvayamekatra mithaḥ saṃnihitaṃ bhavati tadānī-
meva tatra dvitvasaṃkhyotpadyate | paścādindriyasaṃnikarṣānantaramayamekoyameka itya-
pekṣābuddhyā dvitvaṃ jñāyate | tathā cāpekṣābuddhirdvitvasya vyañjikā na tūtpādikā |
yadā tu ghaṭādidvayaṃ mitho viyuktaṃ bhavati tadā dvitvasya nāśaḥ | evameva tritvā-
diviṣayepi bodhyamiti | vaiśeṣikāstvajñātāyā dvitvādisaṃkhyāyā abhyupagamo
nirarthaka iti manvānā apekṣābuddhireva dvitvāderutpādiketi vadanti | tanmata
indriyārthasaṃnikarṣamārabhya saṃskāraparyantānāmaṣṭasu kṣaṇeṣu kramaśa utpattiṃ pradarśa-
yati — tatra prathamamiti | prathame kṣaṇa indriyasya ghaṭadvayena saha saṃbandhaḥ |
dvitīya ekatvajātijñānam | tṛtīyeyamekoyameka ityapekṣābuddhiḥ | caturthe dvitva-
saṃkhyotpattiḥ | pañcame dvitvatvajātijñānam | ṣaṣṭhe dvitvasaṃkhyājñānam | saptama
imau dvau ghaṭāvityādidvitvasaṃkhyāviśiṣṭadravyajñānam | aṣṭame tādṛśajñānajanya
ātmani saṃskāra utpadyate | atra pūrvapūrvotpannasyottarottaraṃ prati kāraṇatvādīdṛśa-
kramasyāvaśyakatvamiti |

apekṣābuddhiriti | anuvidhīyamānamapekṣyamāṇam | vyaṅgyortho vyañja-
kamapekṣate | tathotpādyortha utpādakamapekṣate | prakṛte dvitvādisaṃkhyayāpekṣābuddhirape-
kṣyate | apekṣābuddheśca na dvitvādivyañjakatvam | apekṣābuddheḥ pūrvaṃ dvitvādisattve
pramāṇābhāvāt | meyasiddhermānādhīnatvāt | tathā ca yatra vyañjakatvābhāvasaha-
kṛtamapekṣyamāṇatvaṃ tatrotpādakatvaṃ yathā śabdenāpekṣyamāṇe kaṇṭhādisthāneṣu vāyu-
saṃyoge śabdotpādakatvamiti vyāptyā apekṣābuddherdvitvādyutpādakatvaṃ sidhyati |
dvitvādikamiti | ekatvadvayaviṣayāyamekoyameka ityākārikā anityā ca
yāpekṣābuddhistadvyaṅgyaṃ dvitvādikaṃ na bhavati | dvitvasyānekāśritaguṇatvāt |
dvitvasaṃkhyā hi dvayoḥ paryāptā | evaṃ tritvasaṃkhyā triṣvityādi | yathā caitramaitrau
devadattātpṛthagbhūtāvityatrānekavṛttipṛthaktvaṃ devadattāccaitraḥ pṛthagdevadattānmaitraḥ pṛtha-
gityākārakanānaikapṛthaktvaviṣayakāpekṣābuddhivyaṅgyaṃ na bhavati tadvat | tathā ca
vyaṅgyatvāsiddhyā arthājjanyatvameva sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ |

apekṣābuddhita iti | indriyārthasaṃnikarṣotpattimārabhya saṃskārotpattiparyantaṃ
yeṣṭau kṣaṇāḥ prākpradarśitāsteṣu tṛtīyakṣaṇabhavā apekṣābuddhiścaturthe svottarakṣaṇe
dvitvasaṃkhyāmutpādayati dvitīyakṣaṇa utpannamekatvajātijñānaṃ vināśayati ca | evaṃ
pañcamakṣaṇabhavaṃ dvitvatvajātijñānaṃ ṣaṣṭhe svottarakṣaṇe dvitvasaṃkhyājñānamutpādayati
tṛtīyakṣaṇa utpannāmapekṣābuddhiṃ vināśayati ca | tathā saptame dvau ghaṭāvityākāra-
kadravyajñānakṣaṇe caturthakṣaṇa utpannāyā dvitvasaṃkhyāyā nāśaḥ | dvitvasaṃkhyākāra-
ṇībhūtāyā apekṣābuddhestatpūrvakṣaṇe vināśāt | tathā saptamakṣaṇabhavaṃ dvau ghaṭāviti
dravyajñānamaṣṭame svottarakṣaṇe jñātaryātmani saṃskāramutpādayati ṣaṣṭhakṣaṇa utpannaṃ
dvitvasaṃkhyājñānaṃ vināśayati ca | aṣṭamakṣaṇabhavaḥ saṃskāro navame svottarakṣaṇe
dvau ghaṭāviti dravyajñānaṃ vināśayatīti bhāvaḥ | dvitvodayasamamiti | caturthe
dvitvasaṃkhyotpattikṣaṇa ityarthaḥ | idaṃ pūrvānvayi | sā ca | apekṣābuddhiśca | naśyedi-
tyanukṛṣyate | tajjātibuddhitaḥ | dvitvatvajātijñānāt | dvitvākhyaguṇadhī-
kāle | ṣaṣṭhe dvitvasaṃkhyājñānakṣaṇe | idamapi pūrvānvayi | dravyadhījanma-
kālataḥ | sārvavibhaktikastasiḥ | saptame dvau ghaṭāviti dravyajñānakṣaṇa
ityarthaḥ | guṇabuddhiriti | saptamakṣaṇotpannena dvau ghaṭāviti dravyajñānenāṣṭame
saṃskārotpattikṣaṇe guṇasya dvitvasaṃkhyāyā buddhirnaśyedityarthaḥ |

kṣaṇiketi | kṣaṇiko yo vibhudravyasya viśeṣaguṇastasya bhāvastattvaṃ tasmāt |
yathā vibhorākāśasya kṣaṇiko viśeṣaguṇaḥ śabdaḥ | sa ca svadvitīyakṣaṇe svasa-
dṛśaṃ śabdāntaramutpādya tṛtīyakṣaṇe vinaśyati | tena prathamakṣaṇikaśabdena dvitī-
yakṣaṇa utpāditastatkāryabhūtaḥ śabda eva tasya vināśakaḥ | vibhudravyasya jīvā-
tmanaḥ kṣaṇikā jñānādayo viśeṣaguṇā apyevam | tathā ca jñānena svadvitīyakṣaṇa
utpāditaṃ jñānāntaraṃ saṃskāraśca svotpādakaṃ jñānaṃ vināśayatīti siddham |
apekṣābuddhināśāddvitvanāśa ityuktam | tatra viśeṣamāha — kvaciditi | pratidvandvī
vināśakaḥ | ghaṭārambhako yo ghaṭāvayavānāṃ saṃyogastadvināśakasya vibhāgasya
kāraṇībhūtaṃ yatkarma tena karmaṇā caturthe kṣaṇe ghaṭanāśo bhavati | prathame tatkarma |
tena karmaṇā dvitīyevayavavibhāgaḥ | tena vibhāgena tṛtīyevayavasaṃyoganāśaḥ |
tena saṃyoganāśena caturthe ghaṭanāśa iti kramaḥ | pūrvaṃ dvitvotpattivicāre kṣaṇā-
ṣṭakamadhye dvitīyakṣaṇe yadekatvajātijñānamapekṣābuddhyutpādakamuktaṃ tadyadi kadāci-
ddhaṭavināśakālikoktakṣaṇacatuṣṭayamadhye prathame vibhāgajanakakarmakṣaṇe bhavettadā
dvitīye vibhāgakṣaṇepekṣābuddhyutpattiḥ | tṛtīye saṃyoganāśakṣaṇe dvitvotpattiḥ |
caturthe ghaṭanāśakṣaṇe dvitvatvajātijñānam | asminkṣaṇe ghaṭarūpāśrayanāśādeva
taduttarakṣaṇe ghaṭadvayagatadvitvanāśaḥ | ghaṭanāśottaraṃ tadguṇabhūtadvitvasyāvasthānāsaṃ-
bhavāt | na tvapekṣābuddhināśādatra dvitvanāśaḥ | dvitvanāśātpūrvamapekṣābuddhinā- 10|111 — sāmānyajñāna for sāmānya. D.
śābhāvāt | ekatvasāmānyacintaikatvajātijñānam | yadi tu kadācidekatvajā-
tijñānaṃ pūrvamabhūt taduttarakṣaṇe ca vibhāgajanakaṃ karma tadā tādṛśe prathame
vibhāgajanakakarmakṣaṇepekṣābuddhyutpattiḥ | dvitīye vibhāgakṣaṇe dvitvotpattiḥ |
tṛtīye saṃyoganāśakṣaṇe dvitvatvajātijñānam | caturthe ghaṭanāśakṣaṇepekṣābuddhi-
nāśaḥ | asminkṣaṇe ghaṭarūpāśrayanāśopekṣābuddhināśaścetyubhābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ
taduttarakṣaṇe dvitvanāśo bhavati |

vināśakavināśeti | apekṣābuddhernāśo hi dvitvasaṃkhyāyā vināśakaḥ |
tādṛśavināśapratiyogitvamapekṣābuddheriti lakṣaṇasaṃgatiḥ | atra vināśaketi
padānuktau sarvatra jīvabuddhāvativyāptiḥ | ayaṃ ghaṭa iti buddherapi tṛtīyakṣaṇe vi-
nāśena vināśapratiyogitvāt | vināśaketyuktau tu na doṣaḥ | tena ghaṭajñānanāśe-
nānyasya kasyacidvināśasyājananena tasya ghaṭajñānanāśasya vināśakatvābhāvāt |
etāvatā granthasaṃdarbheṇa dvitvamapekṣābuddhijanyamiti vaiśeṣikamataṃ pradarśitam |
yadyapi prāyo naiyāyikā apyetadanusaranti tathāpi na teṣāṃ viśeṣatastatrābhi-
niveśaḥ | vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ tu dvitvamapekṣābuddhivyaṅgyaṃ na tajjanyam — iti kenāpyukte
sadyastatkhaṇḍanārthaṃ svapnādapyutthānaṃ syāditi | vibhāgajavibhāgaviṣayepyevameva |

evaṃ dvitvaviṣaye vaiśeṣikamataṃ pradarśya pākajotpattiviṣaye tatpradarśayati —
atheti | dravyeṣu tejaḥsaṃyogena kvacidrūparasādīnāṃ parāvṛttirdṛśyate | yathā
śyāmo ghaṭastejaḥsaṃyogena rakto bhavati | haridvarṇamāmrakadalyādiphalaṃ tejaḥsaṃyo-
gena pītaṃ bhavati | evaṃ pakvaṃ phalaṃ kvacinmadhuraṃ gandhāntareṇa yuktaṃ mṛdu ca bhavati |
tatra tejaḥsaṃyogena ghaṭādyavayavānāṃ kapālānāṃ viyogena vināśena vā ghaṭanāśaḥ |
kapālānāmapi tadavayavaviyogena vināśena vā nāśaḥ | evaṃ tryaṇukaparyantaṃ
nāśaḥ | dvyaṇukasya tu nāvayavanāśena nāśaḥ | tadavayavānāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ nitya-
tvāt | kiṃ tu paramāṇvormitho viyogena | tato viśakaliteṣu paramāṇuṣu pūrvarūpa-
rasādināśenyarūparasādyutpattau ca satyāṃ punasteṣāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ dvyaṇukatryaṇukādi-
krameṇa navo ghaṭādirjāyate | eṣā pīlupākaprakriyā vaiśeṣikāṇām | pīluḥ para-
māṇuḥ | tatraiva taiḥ pākajanyaguṇaparāvṛtteraṅgīkārāt | vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ hyayamāśayo
muktāvalyāmuktaḥ | avayavināvaṣṭabdheṣvavayaveṣu pāko na saṃbhavati | paraṃ tu vahni-
saṃyogenāvayaviṣu vinaṣṭeṣu svatantreṣu paramāṇuṣu pākaḥ | punaśca pakvaparamāṇusaṃyo-
gāddvyaṇukādikrameṇa mahāvayaviparyantamutpattiḥ | tejasāmatiśayitavegavaśātpūrva-
vyūhanāśo jhaṭiti vyūhāntarotpattiśceti | sūkṣmatarakālasyānākalanācca pūrvagha-
ṭanāśādikaṃ nālakṣyata iti tadabhiprāyaḥ | piṭharapākaprakriyā tu naiyāyikānām |
piṭharaḥ piṇḍo ghaṭādiravayavī | tasya tejaḥsaṃyogepi na vināśaḥ | kiṃ tvavayavaiḥ
sahāvayavini viśiṣṭe ghaṭādāvekadaiva pūrvarūpādīnāṃ nāśo rūpāntarādyutpattiśca
bhavatīti tadāśayaḥ | tatra vaiśeṣikamatānusāreṇa kṣaṇaprakriyeyamucyate | noda-
nādīti | nodanaṃ saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ | sa cātra tejaḥsaṃyogaḥ | tatastena dravyārambha-
kasaṃyogapratidvandvibhūtavibhāgajanakaṃ karmotpadyate | tena karmaṇā paramāṇudvayavi-
bhāgo jāyate | tato dvyaṇukārambhakasaṃyoganāśaḥ | tato dvyaṇukanāśaḥ | tādṛśa-
dvyaṇukanāśakṣaṇamārabhya navame kṣaṇenyaddvyaṇukaṃ rūpāntareṇa yuktaṃ saṃpadyate | naṣṭe
dvyaṇuka iti | dvyaṇukanāśātpūrvaṃ tu paramāṇvordvyaṇukenāvaṣṭabdhatvānna kārtsnyena
śyāmādīnāṃ nivṛttiḥ saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ | nivṛtteṣviti | pūrvarūpadhvaṃsasya
rūpāntare hetutvena śyāmādināśottarameva raktādyutpattirna tu tataḥ prāk | rūpavi-
nāśakasyāgnisaṃyogasya rūpotpādakatvāsaṃbhavādanyasmādityuktam | utpanne-
ṣviti | raktādyutpatteḥ pūrvaṃ tu na dravyārambhānuguṇā kriyā | nirguṇe dravye tasyā
asaṃbhavāt | adṛṣṭaṃ dharmādharmau | tadāśrayo ya ātmā tatsaṃyogātparamāṇuṣu dvyaṇuka-
dravyārambhakaṃ karmotpadyate | padārthamātraṃ pratyadṛṣṭasya sādhāraṇakāraṇatvāt | adṛ-
ṣṭāśrayāṇāṃ jīvānāṃ vibhutvena sarvatra kāryadeśe adṛṣṭasya saṃnihitatvāditi bhāvaḥ |
kāraṇaguṇādibhya iti | yathā tanturūpātpaṭarūpotpattistadvat | daśakṣaṇā-
dīti | idaṃ prakārāntaraṃ vibhāgajavibhāgāṅgīkāreṇa | taccānupadameva vakṣyate |

kāryavyāpta iti | dvyaṇukāvaṣṭabdhe paramāṇāvutpannaṃ yatkarma dvyaṇukārambhaka-
saṃyogapratidvandvibhūtaṃ paramāṇvantarādvibhāgaṃ janayati tatkarma dvyaṇukānārambhakā-
kāśapradeśasaṃyogapratidvandvibhūtaṃ vibhāgaṃ na janayet | ekasminkarmaṇyārambhakasaṃ-
yogapratidvandvivibhāgajanakatvasyānārambhakasaṃyogapratidvandvivibhāgajanakatvasya ca
virodhāt | anyathā vikasatkamalakuṅmalabhaṅgaprasaṅgaḥ | tatra hi vikāsakāle
kamalānārambhakākāśapradeśasaṃyogapratidvandvivibhāgajanakaṃ karmotpadyate | tadyadi
kamalārambhakasaṃyogapratidvandvivibhāgaṃ janayettadā kamalavināśaḥ syāt | tathā ca
yathā yatra dhūmastatrāgnirastyeveti dhūmasya dhūmadhvajenāgninā na kvāpi vyabhicāro
dṛśyate tathā yatra karmaṇyanārambhakākāśapradeśasaṃyogavirodhyākāśapradeśavibhā-
gājanakatvaṃ tatra karmaṇi dravyārambhakāvayavāntarasaṃyogavirodhivibhāgajanakatva-
mastyeva na kvāpi vyabhicāraḥ | samaniyatatvaṃ cānayoḥ | yatra karmaṇi dravyāra-
mbhakāvayavāntarasaṃyogavirodhivibhāgajanakatvaṃ tatra karmaṇyanārambhakākāśapra-
deśasaṃyogavirodhyākāśapradeśavibhāgājanakatvamityapi niyamasaṃbhavāt | tasmā-
tparamāṇugataṃ karma nānārambhakasaṃyogavirodhyākāśapradeśavibhāgaṃ janayati | kiṃ
tu tādṛśakarmajanyo yo vibhāgaḥ sa karmavatyeva tatrākāśapradeśavibhāgaṃ janayati |
ayaṃ ca vibhāgajanako vibhāgo na svāvyavahitottarakṣaṇa ākāśapradeśavibhāgaṃ
janayati | sahāyābhāvāt | asahāyasyaiva tasya vibhāgajanakatvaṃ tu na svīkri-
yate | karmalakṣaṇasya vibhāgetivyāptyāpatteḥ | kaṇādasūtre (1 | 1 | 17) hi
saṃyogavibhāgayoryadasahāyaṃ kāraṇaṃ tatkarmeti karmalakṣaṇamuktam | asahāyatvaṃ ca
tatra svottarotpannabhāvāntarānapekṣatvam | nanu tarhi kimatra vibhāgasya vibhāgo-
tpādane sahāyamiti cet — ucyate | prathame kṣaṇegnisaṃyogātparamāṇau karma | 10|129 — kartṛtvasya for akartṛtvasya C. 10|131 — avayavi for avayava C.
dvitīye paramāṇvantareṇa vibhāgaḥ | tṛtīya ārambhakasaṃyoganāśaḥ | caturthe dvyaṇu-
kanāśa iti dvyaṇukanāśaparyantaṃ kramaḥ | tatra yadi dvitīyakṣaṇotpanno vibhāgastṛ-
tīyasyārambhakasaṃyoganāśakṣaṇasya sahāyenākāśapradeśavibhāgaṃ janayettadā sa
vibhāgajo vibhāgaścaturthe dvyaṇukanāśakṣaṇa utpadyeta | yadi caturthasya dvyaṇukanā-
śakṣaṇasya sahāyena janayettadā dvyaṇukanāśottarakṣaṇe dvyaṇukaśyāmarūpanāśasamaya
utpadyeteti pakṣadvayam | atrārambhakasaṃyoganāśaviśiṣṭo dvyaṇukanāśaviśiṣṭo vā
kṣaṇastena tena viśiṣṭenaiva rūpeṇa vibhāgasya sāhāyyaṃ karotītyeke | apare tu
viśiṣṭopyayaṃ kṣaṇaḥ svīyena svatantreṇa kevalenaiva rūpeṇa sāhāyyaṃ karotītyāhuḥ |
evaṃ viśiṣṭaḥ kevalo vārambhakasaṃyoganāśakṣaṇaḥ sahāya ityādye pakṣe pūrvaṃ ye
dvyaṇukanāśamārabhya rūpāntarayuktadvyaṇukotpattiparyantaṃ nava kṣaṇāḥ pradarśitāste
daśa kṣaṇāḥ svīkāryā bhavanti | tṛtīyacaturthakṣaṇayormadhyedhikasyaikasya kṣaṇasyā-
vaśyaṃ svīkāryatvāt | evaṃ viśiṣṭaḥ kevalo vā dvyaṇukanāśakṣaṇaḥ sahāya iti
dvitīye pakṣe caikādaśa kṣaṇāḥ svīkāryā bhavanti | tayoreva kṣaṇayormadhyedhikasya
kṣaṇadvayasyāvaśyaṃ svīkāryatvāt | tathā hi-prāguktānāṃ navakṣaṇānāṃ madhye caturthakṣaṇe
punardravyārambhakaṃ karmotpadyata ityuktam | tadutpattiśca vibhāgajanakakarmanāśāna-
ntarameva vaktuṃ śakyate | vibhāgajanakakarmasattve tadvirodhenārambhakakarmotpattyasaṃ-
bhavāt | ādye pakṣe vibhāgajavibhāgaḥ prathame dvyaṇukanāśakṣaṇe jātaḥ | tataḥ
pūrvasaṃyoganāśo dvitīye śyāmarūpanāśakṣaṇe jātaḥ | uttarasaṃyogotpattistṛtīye
raktotpattikṣaṇe jātā | uttaradeśasaṃyogotpattiparyantaṃ ca vibhāgajanakaṃ karmāvaśya-
mabhyupeyam | karmarahite vastunyuttaradeśasaṃyogajananāsaṃbhavāt | tataśca vibhāga-
janakakarmanāśaścaturthe kṣaṇa ārambhakaṃ karma tu pañcame kṣaṇa ityāstheyam | dvitīye
pakṣe tu vibhāgajavibhāga eva dvitīye śyāmarūpanāśakṣaṇe jātaḥ | tatastṛtīye
raktotpattikṣaṇe pūrvasaṃyoganāśaḥ | caturtha uttarasaṃyogotpattiḥ | pañcame vibhāga-
janakakarmanāśaḥ | tataḥ ṣaṣṭhe kṣaṇa ārambhakakarmotpattirāstheyā bhavati | evaṃ
vibhāgajavibhāgasvīkāre kāryakāraṇabhūtayostayorvibhāgayorvidyamānamapi paurvā-
paryaṃ sūkṣmakālasyānākalanāllokairnālakṣyata iti bodhyam | avayavamape-
kṣyeti | svottaravartinaṃ kālasyāvayavakṣaṇaviśeṣamapekṣyetyarthaḥ | anupadamevopa-
pāditametat | dvitīyastviti | kāraṇākāraṇavibhāgajo vibhāga ityarthaḥ |
pūrvastu dvayorapi paramāṇvordvyaṇukakāraṇatvātkāraṇamātravibhāgājjāta iti bhāvaḥ |
ākāśādīti | ādipadena hastasaṃyuktā ghaṭapaṭatarvādayo gṛhyante | hasto
hi śarīrasyāvayavatvāccharīraṃ prati kāraṇam | ākāśādikaṃ ca na śarīraṃ prati
kāraṇam | tayośca kāraṇākāraṇayorye vibhāgāste śarīrasyākāśādikādvibhāgāñja-
nayanti | te ca karmānurūpā eva jāyante | hasto hyuttarataścalitaśceddakṣiṇākāśapradeśā-
deva hastākāśavibhāgo jāyate | tasmācca jāyamānaḥ śarīrasyākāśapradeśādvi-
bhāgopi tathaiva | na cāsāviti | asau śarīrākāśavibhāgo hastākāśavi-
bhāgajanya eva na tu śarīragatakarmajanyaḥ | hastamātrasya calane tasyaiva sakriya-
tvam | śarīraṃ tu tadā niṣkriyameva | avayavikriyāyāḥ sakalāvayavakriyāniya-
tatvāt | nāpīti | hastacalanakriyayā yathā hastākāśavibhāgo jāyate tathā
tayaiva śarīrākāśavibhāgopi jāyata ityapi na vaktuṃ śakyam | kriyā hi svāśraya
eva svakāryaṃ janayennānyatra | anyathātiprasaṅgāt | tathā ca karma hastaniṣṭhaṃ vibhā-
gaśca śarīraniṣṭha iti vyadhikaraṇatvāddhastaniṣṭhakarmaṇaḥ śarīrākāśavibhāgakartṛtvaṃ
nopapadyate |

yadavādīti | pūrvaṃ ṣaḍeveti niyamavyavacchedyakathanaprasaṅge (da. 10 paṃ. 45)
iti bhāvaḥ | dravyaṃ tama iti | svābhāvikanīlarūpaviśiṣṭaṃ dravyaṃ tamaḥ kajjalā-
divadityarthaḥ | āropitamiti | vastuto dravyameva tamaḥ | tatra nīlarūpaṃ tu na
vāstavikaṃ kiṃ tu jala ivāropitamityarthaḥ | pṛthivyādyanyatamamanyadveti |
pṛthivyādinavadravyāntargatamatha vā daśamamiti vikalpaḥ | yatreti | pṛthivyāmandha-
kārasyāntarbhāve pṛthivyā iva tasya rūpādicaturdaśaguṇakatvaṃ svīkāryaṃ syāt | iṣṭā-
pattistvanupalabdhiparāhatā | na hi pṛthivyāmivāndhakāre śuklādīni nānāvidhāni
rūpāṇi rasagandhādayo guṇāśca kvāpyupalabhyante | evaṃ jalāntarbhāve śītasparśara-
sadravatvādyupalambhaḥ syāt | tejasyantarbhāva uṣṇasparśādyupalambhaḥ syādityādyūhyam |
pṛthivyādīnāṃ navānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ guṇāśca bhāṣāparicchede pradarśitāḥ | yathā —

lg.l: saṃkhyādipañcakaṃ kāladiśoḥ śabdaśca te ca khe ||

div.p:
saṃkhyādayaḥ pañca buddhiricchā yatnopi ceśvare |
parāparatve saṃkhyādyāḥ pañca vegaśca mānase || (bhā. pa. 30 — 34) iti |
sparśādayoṣṭau sparśaḥ saṃkhyā parimāṇaṃ pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogo vibhāgaḥ paratvamaparatvaṃ
ceti | buddhyādiṣaṭkaṃ buddhiḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhamicchā dveṣaḥ prayatnaśceti | saṃkhyādipañcakaṃ
sparśādyaṣṭakāntargatam | ātmano jīvātmanaḥ | te saṃkhyādayaḥ pañca | na dvitīya
iti | pṛthivyādinavadravyabahirbhūtaṃ daśamaṃ dravyaṃ tama iti na yuktamityarthaḥ |
nirguṇasyeti | guṇavaddravyamiti hi dravyalakṣaṇam | tathā ca yatra rūpādyanyata-
masya kasyāpi guṇasyābhāvena sāmānyato dravyatvameva nāsti tatra daśamadravyatvaṃ
sutarāṃ na saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ | gandhādivyāptasyeti | yatra nīlarūpaṃ tatra gandha-
rasādayo guṇā yathā priyaṅgukalikādāviti hi vyāptiḥ | tathā ca vyāpakasyā-
bhāve vyāpyasyābhāva iti niyamādandhakāre gandharasādīnāmanupalabdhyā nīlarū-
pābhāvo niścīyata iti bhāvaḥ | vṛddhavīvadhayeti | vṛddhānāṃ bhāṭṭādīnāṃ
vīvadhā doṣaparyālocanā | ata eveti | andhakārasya dravyatvābhāvādeva
āropitanīlarūpayuktaṃ dravyaṃ tamaḥ — iti śrīdharācāryamatamapi na saṃbhavatīti
bhāvaḥ | adhiṣṭhāneti | śaṅkhe dṛṣṭa eva tatra pittādidoṣajanyaḥ pītatvāropo
bhavati nānyathā | bāhyeti | sahakāriṇā bāhyālokena yuktameva cakṣū rūpārope
samarthaṃ bhavati | na cāyamiti | na hīdaṃ tama iti jñānaṃ cakṣurindriyājanyaṃ
bhavati | yena tadgatarūpāropepi cakṣurindriyasya kāraṇatvābhāvena sahakārirāhi-
tyavicāro nirarthakaḥ syāt | kiṃ tvandhakārajñānaṃ cakṣurindriyajanyameva | andha-
kārajñāne dṛśyamānāyāścakṣurindriyāpekṣāyā anyathopapattyabhāvāt | ata
eveti | andhakārasya cākṣuṣapratyayavedyatvādeva ālokajñānābhāva evāndha-
kāra — iti prābhākaraikadeśimataṃ na saṃbhavati | ālokajñānābhāvasya mānasapra-
tyayavedyatvena cākṣuṣapratyayavedyatvābhāvāt | yasyābhāvaḥ sa padārthastasyā-
bhāvasya pratiyogī | sa yenendriyeṇa gṛhyate tenaivendriyeṇa tadabhāvo gṛhyata iti
niyamāt | na ca vidhīti | andhakāro hi nābhāva iva nañā bodhyate | tathā
cāstīti vidhipratyayavedya eva sa iti tasya nābhāvasvarūpatvaṃ yuktam | tathā ca
prayogaḥ — vimatondhakāro bhāvo bhavitumarhati nañānullikhitadhīviṣayatvāddhaṭā-
divadityāśayaḥ | pralayeti | pralayaḥ sṛṣṭyabhāvaḥ | vināśo dhvaṃsaḥ | avasānaṃ
samāptirvarṇādyabhāvaḥ | abhāvarūpā apyete pralayostītyevaṃ vidhipratyayavedyā
dṛśyante | tathā ca nañānullikhitadhīviṣayatvaṃ na bhāvatvavyāptaṃ bhavatītyuktamanu-
mānaṃ duruktameva bhavati | na cābhāva iti | bhāvasya nīlapuṣpāderyo dharmo
nīlarūpaṃ tasyālokābhāvarūpendhakāra āropo na vaktuṃ śakyata iti śaṅkakāśayaḥ |
duḥkhābhāva iti | bhārapīḍitasya bhārāpagame sukhī saṃvṛttoham — iti pratyayo
bhavati | saṃyogābhāva iti | saṃyogābhāva eva vibhāga iti keṣāṃcinmatam |
tadanusāreṇedam | kaṇādena tvetanmataṃ nādriyata ityanyat | na cālokābhāva-
syeti | yathā rūpavato ghaṭasyābhāva ālokasahakṛtena cakṣuṣā jñāyate tathā
rūpavata ālokasyābhāvopyālokasahakṛtenaiva cakṣuṣā jñāyeta | na tu tathāndha-
kāro jñāyate | ato nāyamālokābhāvarūpa ityāśayaḥ | aparatheti | nivṛttaḥ
kolāhala ityevaṃ śabdanāśasya yatpratyakṣaṃ bhavati tanna syāt | tadāśrayasyākāśasya
pratyakṣaviṣayatvābhāvāt | tathā cāndhakārasyālokābhāvarūpatve siddhe dravyaṃ tama
ityādyuktirbhāṭṭādīnāmaprāmāṇikīti siddham | dravyaguṇeti | niṣpattirutpattiḥ |
vaidharmyaṃ vailakṣaṇyam | tamasa utpattivināśāvupalabhyete | atastasyānityatvānna
sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyeṣvantarbhāvaḥ | teṣāṃ nityatvāt | nāpyutpattimatsu dravya-
guṇakarmasvantarbhāvaḥ | yatastamasa utpattirdravyādyutpattyapekṣayā vilakṣaṇā dṛśyate |
janyadravyaṃ hyavayavārabdhaṃ bhavati | tamastu na tathā | ālokāpasaraṇe sahasaivānu-
bhūyamānatvāt | guṇakarmaṇostu dravyāśrayeṇotpattirdṛśyate | na tathā tamasa iti
sūtratātparyam |

sa ceti | samavāyasaṃbandharahitatve sati samavāyabhinno yaḥ padārthaḥ so-
'bhāva ityarthaḥ | satyantena dravyaguṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣāṇāṃ vyāvṛttiḥ | teṣāṃ
samavāyasaṃbandhavattvāt | tatra dravyāṇāṃ tattadāśritairguṇādibhiḥ saha samavāyaḥ saṃba-
ndhaḥ | anityadravyāṇāṃ cāśrayabhūtairavayavaiḥ sahāpi samavāyaḥ | guṇakarmaṇostvāśraya-
bhūtena dravyeṇāśritena sāmānyena ca saha samavāyaḥ | sāmānyasya tvāśrayabhūtairdra-
vyaguṇakarmabhiḥ saha samavāyaḥ | viśeṣāṇāṃ cāśrayabhūtairnityadravyaiḥ saheti |
samavāyasya samavāyastvanavasthābhiyā nādriyata iti samavāyasya samavāyasaṃ-
bandharahitatvena tatrābhāvalakṣaṇasyātivyāptiḥ syāttannirāsāya samavāyabhinna
ityuktam | saṃsargābhāveti | saṃsargaḥ saṃbandhaḥ | tatpratiyogiko niṣedhaḥ
saṃsargābhāvaḥ | yathā ghaṭotpatteḥ pūrvamiha ghaṭo nāstīti prāgabhāvo vyapadiśyate |
tatra mṛtpiṇḍe ghaṭasaṃbandho niṣidhyate | tathā ghaṭanāśottaramiha ghaṭo nāstīti
pradhvaṃsābhāvo vyapadiśyate | tatra śakaleṣu ghaṭasaṃbandho niṣidhyate | tathā bhūtale
ghaṭo nāstītyatyantābhāvepi bhūtale ghaṭasaṃbandho niṣidhyate | saṃsargābhāveṣu prāga-
bhāvaḥ pradhvaṃsābhāvaścānityaḥ | prāgabhāvasyotpattirāhityepi vināśasattvāt |
pradhvaṃsābhāvasya vināśarāhityepyutpattisattvāt | atyantābhāvastu nityaḥ | tathā-
nyonyābhāvopi nitya eva | anāditama iti | atiśayenānādiranāditamaḥ |
kvacijjīrṇadevālayādau sāditvepyutpattikālājñānamātreṇānāditvaṃ vyapadiśyate |
na tathāsya | prāgabhāvotpattikālasya brahmaṇāpyajñānāt | atrānityonāditamo'-
bhāvaḥ prāgabhāvaḥ — ityevamabhāvapadaṃ noktam | anāderbhāvasyānityatvābhāvena
bhāveṣvativyāptyabhāvāt | evaṃ pradhvaṃsalakṣaṇepyutpattimānavināśyabhāva itya-
bhāvapadaṃ noktam | avināśino bhāvasyotpattyabhāvena bhāveṣvativyāptyabhāvāt |
pratiyogyāśraya iti | prāgabhāvapradhvaṃsayorāśrayaśca na kadāpi pratiyogī
bhavati | pratiyoginā saha tayoryaugapadyābhāvāt | ghaṭotpatteḥ pūrvaṃ ghaṭanāśottaraṃ
ca ghaṭasyāsattvāt | anyonyābhāvasyāpyāśrayaḥ pratiyogī na bhavati | ghaṭe
ghaṭabhedasyāsattvāt | atyantābhāvasya tu pratiyogyapyāśrayo bhavati | bhūtala iva
ghaṭepi ghaṭābhāvasya vaktuṃ śakyatvāt | svasminsvasyābhāvāt | ayaṃ cātyantābhā-
vānyonyābhāvayoraparo viśeṣaḥ | atyantābhāvo hi pratiyogisāmānādhikaraṇyena
na kadāpi pratīyate | bhūtale ghaṭasattve tadānīṃ tatra vidyamānasyāpi ghaṭātyantā-
bhāvasyāpratīteḥ | anyonyābhāvastu pratiyogisāmānādhikaraṇyenāpi pratīyate |
ghaṭavatyapi bhūtale ghaṭabhedapratīterdarśanāt | atra pratiyogyāśraya ityetāvanmātroktau
ākāśavattadāśrayaḥ sūryaprakāśo vyāpakaḥ — ityatra sādṛśyānuyoginaḥ prakāśasya
sādṛśyapratiyogibhūtākāśāśritatvena tatrātivyāptiḥ syāt | ato'bhāvapada-
mupāttam | anavadhiḥ | kālakṛtāvadhirahitaḥ | nitya iti yāvat | nityeṣu
paramāṇvākāśādiṣu bhāveṣvativyāptivāraṇāyābhāvapadamupāttam | tādā-
tmyeti | tādātmyaṃ tatsvarūpatvam | na cāsyeti | dravyādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ padā-
rthānāṃ tattvajñānānmokṣa iti teṣāṃ vivecanaṃ puruṣārthopayuktaṃ bhavati | na tu tathā-
syābhāvasyeti śaṅkakāśayaḥ | abhāvajñānaṃ puruṣārthopayogi na bhavatīti manyase
cedastu nāma | na kācitkṣatiḥ | yatoyamabhāvaḥ svayameva paramapuruṣārthasvarūpa
ityāśayena samādhatte — duḥkhātyantocchedeti | duḥkhātyantoccheda eva mokṣa
iti siddhāntāditi bhāvaḥ ||

athākṣapādeti | asmindarśane gautamena pañcādhyāyātmakaṃ sūtraṃ praṇītam |
gautamo hi svamatadūṣakasya vyāsasya mukhadarśanaṃ cakṣuṣā na kartavyamiti pratijñāya
paścādvyāsena prasāditaḥ pāde netraṃ prakāśya taṃ dṛṣṭavān | tataḥprabhṛtyasyākṣapā-
danāmnā prasiddhirabhūt | tatastatpraṇītamidaṃ nyāyaśāstramakṣapādadarśanamityucyate |

tattvajñānāditi | vaiśeṣikadarśanena samānaṃ tantraṃ nyāyaśāstram | tatrāpi
tattvajñānānmokṣo bhavatīti pratipāditamityarthaḥ | pramāṇeti | pramāṇaprameyasaṃ-
śayaprayojanadṛṣṭāntasiddhāntāvayavatarkanirṇayavādajalpavitaṇḍāhetvābhāsacchalajā-
tinigrahasthānānāṃ tattvajñānānniḥśreyasādhigamaḥ (gau. sū. 1 | 1 | 1) iti
prathamaṃ sūtram | tatra ca ṣoḍaśapadārthā nirdiṣṭāḥ | saṃśayaparīkṣaṇamiti |
saṃśayasya kiṃ kāraṇaṃ kiṃ ca tasya svarūpamityevaṃ vicāra ityarthaḥ | tṛtīyasyeti |
adhyāyadvaye pramāṇasaṃbandhena vicāraṃ kṛtvā tṛtīye prameyavicāra ārabhyate |
prameyaṃ ca dvādaśavidham | tathā ca sūtram — ātmaśarīrendriyārthabuddhimanaḥpravṛtti-
doṣapretyabhāvaphaladuḥkhāpavargāstu prameyam (gau. sū. 1 | 1 | 9) iti | krameṇa
caitatprameyajātaṃ tṛtīyasyāhnikadvayena caturthasya prathamāhnikena cetyevamāhnikatrayeṇa
parīkṣitam | avayavyādīti | paṭādiravayavī svāvayavebhyastantubhyaḥ sakāśā-
dbhinna ityevaṃ nirūpaṇam | ādipadena paramāṇūnāṃ niravayavatvasādhanaṃ gṛhyate |

sādhanāśrayeti | yathārthānubhavaḥ pramā | tasyāḥ sādhanaṃ karaṇam | āśraya
ātmā | tadubhayāpekṣayā bhinnaṃ yanna bhavati tathābhūtaṃ sadyatpramayā nityasaṃbaddhaṃ
tatpramāṇamityarthaḥ | tatra pramāyāḥ karaṇaṃ pramayā nityasaṃbaddhameva | karaṇasya phala-
vattvaniyamāt | tacca pramāṇamiti sarvasaṃmatam | āśrayastu parameśvaraḥ pramayā
nityasaṃbaddhaḥ | jīvastu na sarvastathāvidhaḥ | asmādṛśānāṃ bhramasaṃbhavāt |
tadvyāvṛttaye pramāvyāptamiti | evaṃ cāptatamaḥ parameśvaraḥ pramāṇamityuktaṃ
bhavati | tadāha — evaṃ ceti | ekamātrābhyupagamaḥ pratitantrasiddhāntaḥ | yathā
naiyāyikairabhyupagataṃ śabdānityatvaṃ parameśvaraprāmāṇyamityādi | etacca mīmāṃsakai-
rnābhyupagamyate | sūtrakāraistu samānatantrasiddhaḥ paratantrāsiddhaḥ pratitantrasiddhāntaḥ
(gau. sū. 1 | 1 | 29) ityuktam | parameśvaraprāmāṇyaṃ ca samāne vaiśeṣikatantre
siddhaṃ paratantre mīmāṃsādāvasiddhamiti pratitantrasiddhāntasiddhaṃ bhavati | mantrā-
yuriti | tatpadenāptopadeśaḥ parāmṛśyate | āpto hi sākṣātkṛtadharmā bhūteṣu
dayāluryathābhūtārthavaktā cetyataḥ pramāṇaṃ bhavati | tatprāmāṇyāttadupadeśasya
prāmāṇyam | yathā mantrāṇāmāyurvedasya ca prāmāṇyamāptaprāmāṇyādeva tadvadi-
tyarthaḥ | āyurvedo hi ṛgvedasyopavedaḥ | tathā cāptatamasya parameśvarasya prāmāṇyaṃ
sūtrakārasaṃmatamiti bhāvaḥ | nyāyeti | nyāyaśāstrarūpo yaḥ pārāvāraḥ samudra-
stasya pāraṃ dṛṣṭavānityarthaḥ | mitiriti | samyakparicchittiryathārthajñānaṃ mitiḥ
pramā | tadvānpramātā | tasyā miterayogasya saṃbandhābhāvasya yo vyavacchedo
vyāvṛttirāvaśyakaḥ saṃbandhastadeva gautamadarśane prāmāṇyamityarthaḥ | sākṣātkā-
riṇīti | śivasya yo bhūtārthānubhavo bhūtānāṃ pūrvasiddhānāṃ trailokyagatapadā-
rthānāmanubhavaḥ sa ca sākṣātkārī pratyakṣaḥ | kiṃ ca nityayogī | nāsmākamiba
kṣaṇikaḥ | tathā nāsmākamivendriyādyapekṣayā vidyamānaḥ | kiṃ tu parasya kasyaci-
danapekṣayaiva yasya sthitirbhavati tādṛśaḥ | bhūtānāmapyarthānāṃ pratyakṣajñānaṃ yogināṃ
yogabalena bhavati kimu vaktavyamacintyaśaktikasya maheśvarasya | sṛṣṭyārambhe hi
pūrvakalpasiddhānarthānkalpanāmātreṇa parameśvarovalokayitumārabhate | tadanusāreṇa
ca te tathaivotpadyante | tathā ca śrutiḥ — dhātā yathāpūrvamakalpayat (ma. nā.
5 | 7) iti | tathā caitādṛśe svīye pratyakṣānubhave nikhilānāṃ sāṃpratikavastū-
nāmutpattyādikramo niviṣṭo yena tādṛśaḥ śivaḥ | ata eva leśato yatpadārthā-
nāmadarśanaṃ tanmūlakānāṃ doṣāṇāmapagamena prabhraṣṭaṃ śaṅkārūpaṃ tuṣaṃ yasya tādṛśaḥ |
asmādṛśānāṃ tu vastutaḥ parokṣajñāne satyanekāḥ śaṅkāḥ samutpadyanta iti tvāstām |
pratyakṣānubhavepi vastutaḥ kārtsnyena jñānābhāvādaṃśena yadadarśanaṃ tena dvārībhūtena
doṣāṇāṃ prādurbhāvādanekavidhā viparītabhāvanāḥ saṃbhavanti | parameśvarasya tu na
kathamapi tathā saṃbhavaḥ | tathā ca śaṅkonmeṣeṇa kalaṅkitaiḥ pramāṇāntaraiḥ kiṃ saṃpā-
ditaṃ bhavet | ato niṣkalaṅkaḥ śiva eva me pramāṇamityarthaḥ | pratyakṣeti |
indriyajanyaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣam | yathā purovartighaṭāderayaṃ ghaṭa ityādi | liṅgaparā-
marśonumānam | vyāptibalenārthagamakaṃ liṅgam | yathā dhūmogneḥ | yatra dhūmastatrā-
gniriti sāhacaryaniyamo vyāptiḥ | tasya vyāptiviśiṣṭasya liṅgasya pakṣe parvatādau
yajjñānaṃ sa liṅgaparāmarśaḥ | sa evānumānamityucyate | tena hyagniranumīyate |
atideśavākyasmaraṇasahakṛtaṃ sadṛśavastujñānamupamānam | yathā gosadṛśo gavaya
ityatideśavākyaṃ śrutvā kadācidvanaṃ gatasya tādṛśātideśavākyasmaraṇasahakṛtaṃ
gosadṛśapaśujñānam | tasmāccāyaṃ gavaya ityupamitirbhavati | āptavākyaṃ śabdaḥ |
tasmācca pratyakṣādyayogyamapi vastu jñāyate |

ātmeti | jñānavānātmā | sa ca dvividhaḥ | īśvaro jīvaśca | īśvaraḥ sarvajña
eka eva | jīvastu pratiśarīraṃ bhinnaḥ | dvividhopi vibhurnityaśca | sukhaduḥkhā-
dibhogasādhanaṃ śarīram | śarīrasaṃyuktaṃ jñānakaraṇamatīndriyamindriyam | arthā
dravyaguṇakarmādayaḥ | te ca vaiśeṣikadarśane nirūpitāḥ (da. 10 paṃ. 47) | jñānaṃ
buddhiḥ | sukhādyupalabdhisādhanamindriyaṃ manaḥ | tacca nānāvidhaṃ pratijīvaniyata-
maṇurūpaṃ nityaṃ ca | pravṛttiḥ kāyikī vācikī mānasikī ca kriyā | trividhāpi
śubhāśubhabhedena dvividheti ṣaḍvidhā bhavati | pravṛttijanakā doṣāḥ | te ca rāga-
dveṣamohāḥ | pretyabhāvo mṛtvā punarjanma | phalaṃ sukhādisākṣātkāraḥ | duḥkhaṃ
pīḍā | tacca trividham — ādhyātmikamādhibhautikamādhidaivikaṃ ca | vātapi-
ttakaphadoṣavaiṣamyamūlakaṃ śārīraṃ kāmakrodhādijaṃ mānasaṃ cādhyātmikam | etaccā-
ntaropāyanivāryam | ādhibhautikaṃ sarpavyāghrādijam | ādhidaivikaṃ yakṣarākṣasa-
grahādyāveśamūlakam | ādhidaivikamādhibhautikaṃ ceti duḥkhadvayaṃ bāhyopāyani-
vāryam | anyatra duḥkhasyaikaviṃśatibhedā uktāḥ | te ca śarīraṃ ṣaḍindriyāṇi
ṣaḍviṣayāḥ ṣaḍbuddhayaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ceti | sukhamapi duḥkhasaṃbandhādduḥkhameva |
śarīrādīni tu duḥkhasādhanatvādduḥkhamityucyante | bāhyaṃ duḥkhasādhanaṃ ca ṣoḍa-
śavidhamanyatroktam — pāratantryamādhirvyādhirmānacyutiḥ śatrurdāridryaṃ bhāryādvayaṃ
kanyābāhulyaṃ kubhāryā kubhṛtyaḥ kugrāmavāsaḥ kusvāmisevā vṛddhatvaṃ paragṛhavāso
varṣākāle pravāso durhalena kṛṣiśceti | apavargo mokṣaḥ |

anavadhāraṇeti | aniścayātmakaṃ jñānamityarthaḥ | sādhāraṇeti | lakṣa-
ṇaśabdo nimittavācī | lakṣaṇakāraṇabhedāditi kvacitpāṭhaḥ | tadā lakṣaṇaśabdaḥ
svarūpavācī | sādhāraṇadharmādinimittabhedena saṃśayastrividho bhavati | ādyo
yathā — sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti | atronnatatvarūpasādhāraṇadharmaṃ jñātavataḥ sthāṇutvani-
ścāyakaṃ vakrakoṭarādikaṃ puruṣatvaniścāyakaṃ hastapādādikaṃ cāpaśyataḥ saṃśayo
bhavati | dvitīyo yathā — pṛthivī nityotānityeti | anyatra nityeṣvanityeṣu
ca kvāpyadṛṣṭaṃ pṛthivyā asādhāraṇadharmaṃ gandhaṃ jñātvā bhavatyevaṃvidhaḥ saṃśayaḥ |
tṛtīyo yathā — śabdo nitya utānitya iti | eko brūte śabdo nitya iti |
anyastvanitya iti | tayorvipratipattyā madhyasthasya bhavatyetādṛśaḥ saṃśayaḥ |
dṛṣṭādṛṣṭeti | dṛṣṭamavaghātasya tuṣanivṛttiḥ | adṛṣṭaṃ yāgasya svargādikam |

vyāptīti | vyāptijñāpanasthalaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ | dṛṣṭonto niścayo yena sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ |
yatra dhūmastatrāgniriti vyāptijñāpanāya yanmahānasamudāharaṇatvena pradarśyate sa
sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ | tatraiva hrado vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ |

sarvatantreti | sarvatantrasiddhānto yathā — pañca jñānendriyāṇītyādiḥ | etacca
sarvairaṅgīkṛtam | pratitantrasiddhānto yathā — anityaḥ śabda iti | etacca naiyā-
yikairaṅgīkṛtaṃ na tu mīmāṃsakādibhiḥ | adhikaraṇasiddhānto yathā — kṣityādikartṛsiddhau
kartuḥ sarvajñatvam | asaṃmatamapi yadabhyupagamyānyaducyate sobhyupagamasiddhāntaḥ |
yathāstu dravyaṃ śabdastathāpyanitya eveti |

pratijñeti | sādhyabhūtadharmaviśiṣṭadharmipratipādakaṃ vacanaṃ pratijñā | yathā
parvatognimāniti | liṅgapratipādakaṃ vacanaṃ hetuḥ | yathā dhūmavattvāditi | savyā-
ptikaṃ dṛṣṭāntavacanamudāharaṇam | yathā yatra dhūmastatrāgniryathā mahānasamiti |
liṅgopasaṃhāravacanamupanayaḥ | yathā dhūmavāṃścāyaṃ parvata iti | pakṣe sādhyopasaṃ-
hāro nigamanam | yathā tasmādagnimānparvata iti |

vyāpyāropeṇeti | yathā yadyatrāgnyabhāvaḥ syāttarhi dhūmābhāvaḥ syāditi |
atrāgnyabhāvasya vyāpyasyāropeṇa vyāpakasya dhūmābhāvasyāropaḥ kriyate | parvate
dhūmaṃ paśyata uktatarkasahāyenānumānapramāṇena tatrāgnerniścayo bhavati | atoyaṃ
pramāṇānugrāhaka ityucyate | vyāghāteti | asaṃbaddhārthakaṃ vacanaṃ vyāghātaḥ |
yathā mūkoham amūrte rūpamityādyuktiḥ | svasya svāpekṣāpādakaḥ prasaṅga ātmā-
śrayaḥ | yathā rūpaviśiṣṭe rūpamiti | svasya svāpekṣitāpekṣitatvamitaretarāśrayaḥ |
yathā caitrottiṣṭheti vākyaśravaṇaṃ jāgṛtiṃ prati kāraṇam | śravaṇe ca jāgṛtiḥ kāraṇa-
miti | tathā caikavyavadhānena taddvārā svasya svāpekṣāyāmitaretarāśraya iti
siddham | anekavyavadhānena svasya svāpekṣāyāṃ tu cakrakāśrayaḥ | yathā pūrvokta-
sthala eva śravaṇa indriyārthasaṃnikarṣaḥ kāraṇam | indriyārthasaṃnikarṣe jāgṛtiḥ
kāraṇam | jāgṛtau ca śravaṇaṃ kāraṇamityevamuktau | yatra kvāpyavasthitirna bhavati
tatrānavasthā | yathā jātau jātikalpanāyāṃ tatrāpi punarjātirityādiḥ | pratiba-
ndhikalpanā kalpanālāghavaṃ kalpanāgauravaṃ ca prasiddhameva | utsargaḥ sāmānya-
niyamaḥ | apavādo viśeṣaniyamaḥ | vaijātyaṃ vailakṣaṇyam | pramāṇasādhyārthaviru-
ddhasaṃbhāvanānivartakatvenaiṣāṃ tarkāṇāṃ pramāṇānugrāhakatvaṃ sudhībhirunneyam |
sākṣātkṛtīti | sākṣātkṛtiḥ pratyakṣam |

ubhayeti | vādetivyāptivāraṇāya vijigīṣupadam | vitaṇḍāyāmativyāpti-
vāraṇāyobhayasādhanavatīti padam |

savyabhicāreti | vyabhicāreṇa sahitaḥ savyabhicāraḥ | vyabhicāraśca hetoḥ
sādhyābhāvavadvṛttitvam | yathā parvatognimānprameyatvāditi | atrāgnyabhāvavati
hrade prameyatvaṃ vartate | sādhyābhāvavyāpto heturviruddhaḥ | yathā śabdo nityaḥ kṛtaka-
tvāditi | kṛtakatvamutpannatvam | ayaṃ hetuḥ sādhyasya nityatvasyābhāvenānitya-
tvena vyāptaḥ | yatrotpannatvaṃ tatrānityatvamiti vyāptisattvāt | yasya pratipakṣa-
bhūtaṃ hetvantaramasti sa prakaraṇasamaḥ | ayameva satpratipakṣa ityucyate | sanprati-
pakṣaḥ pratiheturyasya sa satpratipakṣaḥ | prakaraṇaṃ prakriyā vicāraḥ | tasminprastute
vādinā prativādinā vā kiṃcidarthasādhanārthaṃ hetau pradarśite hetornirṇāyakatvena
sadya eva prakaraṇaṃ samāpyate | satpratipakṣo hetustvanirṇāyakatvānna prakaraṇasamā
panakṣamo bhavati | kiṃ tu pūrvavatprakaraṇaṃ pravartayatyeva | ataḥ prakaraṇena samo
nirviśeṣaḥ prakaraṇasama ityucyate | yathā śabdo'nityaḥ nityadharmānupalabdheḥ |
śabdo nityaḥ anityadharmānupalabdheriti | asiddho hetuḥ sādhyasamaḥ | siddho
hi heturasiddhaṃ sādhyaṃ sādhayati | asiddhaścetsādhyena sama iti sādhyaṃ sādhayituṃ
na prabhavati | yathā śabdo guṇaścākṣuṣatvāditi | sopādhiko heturasiddhaviśeṣa
eva | upādhisvarūpaṃ prāk pradarśitam (da. 1 pa. 93) | yasya sādhyābhāvaḥ
pramāṇāntareṇa niścitaḥ sotītakālaḥ | ayameva bādhita ityucyate | yathāgniranuṣṇaḥ
prabhāśrayatvāditi | atrānuṣṇatvasya sādhyasyābhāvaḥ pratyakṣeṇaiva niścito bhavati |
tathā ca hetuvākyaśravaṇātprāgeva sādhyābhāvasya niścaya ityasyāmavasthāyāṃ
prayoktrā hetuvākyaṃ vastuto naivoccāraṇīyam | tasya kālo hi yāvatsādhyasya na
niścayaḥ | īdṛśo heturatītaḥ kālo yasyetyatītakāla iti vyapadiśyate |

abhidhāneti | abhidhānavṛttiḥ śaktiḥ | tadvyatyayena chalaṃ yathā — navakamba-
loyaṃ māṇavaka ityevaṃ nūtanārthābhiprāyeṇa kenacinnavaśabde prayukte chalavādī nava-
śabdasya navasaṃkhyārthe vyatyayena śaktiṃ matvā kutosya daridrasya nava kambalā yasyai-
kopi durlabha iti pūrvavādyuktaṃ pratiṣedhati | tātparyavṛttivyatyayena chalaṃ yathā —
brāhmaṇe vidyāyāḥ saṃbhava iti tātparyeṇa kenacidbrāhmaṇe vidyeti prayukte chalavādī
niyame taduktestātparyaṃ matvā taduktiṃ pratiṣedhati — kathaṃ brāhmaṇe vidyetyucyate
mūrkhā api dṛśyante brāhmaṇā iti | upacāro lakṣaṇā | tadvṛttivyatyayena chalaṃ
yathā — mañcāḥ krośantīti lakṣaṇayā mañcasthapuruṣarūpārthābhiprāyeṇa kenacitprayukte
tādṛśalakṣaṇāvṛttivyatyayaṃ kṛtvā śakyārthaṃ gṛhṇānaśchalavādī kathaṃ kāṣṭhamayā ace-
tanā mañcāḥ krośantīti taduktiṃ pratiṣedhati |

sādharmyeti | sādharmyeṇa pratyavasthānaṃ sādharmyasamā (1) jātiḥ | yathā
śabdo'nityaḥ kṛtakatvādghaṭavadityukte amūrtatvena nityākāśasādharmyānnityaḥ
śabdaḥ kuto na syādityuttaram | vaidharmyasamā (2) yathā — tatraivāmūrtatvenāni-
tyaghaṭavaidharmyānnityaḥ śabdaḥ kuto na syāt | utkarṣasamā (3) yathā — tatraiva
yadi kṛtakatvena ghaṭasādharmyādanityaḥ śabdaḥ syāttarhi ghaṭavadeva mūrtopi bhavet |
na cenmūrtastarhi ghaṭavadanityopi mābhūt | atra dharmāntarotkarṣāpādanam |
apakarṣasamā (4) — tatraiva ghaṭavadeva śabdo'śrāvaṇaḥ syāt | atra
śrāvaṇatvadharmasyāpakarṣaḥ | varṇyasamā (5) — varṇyo varṇanīyaḥ pradarśanīyo
heturūpo dharmaḥ | tatraiva yathā śabde kṛtakatvaṃ tālvoṣṭhādivyāpārajaṃ
na tādṛśaṃ ghaṭe | tatra tu kumbhakārādivyāpārajam | avarṇyasamā (6) avarṇyaḥ
siddhaḥ dṛṣṭāntadharmaḥ | tatraiva vaiparītyena yathā ghaṭe kṛtakatvaṃ na tādṛśaṃ śabde |
vikalpasamā (7) — tatraiva yathā kṛtakaṃ kiṃcinmṛdu rāṅkavādi kiṃcittu kaṭhoraṃ
kuṭhārādi iti dvividhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathaiva kṛtakaṃ kiṃciddhaṭādi anityaṃ kiṃcittu śabdādi
nityamapi syāt | sādhyasamā (8) — tatraiva yadi ghaṭavadanityaḥ śabdastarhi
śabdavaddhaṭopi śrāvaṇaḥ syāt | prāptisamā (9) — prāptiḥ saṃbandhaḥ | hetuḥ
sādhyena saṃbaddhaḥ sādhyasādhakaścetsādhyahetvordvayormithaḥ saṃbaddhatvāviśeṣātkiṃ
sādhanaṃ kiṃ sādhyamityaniścayaḥ | aprāptisamā (10) — hetuḥ sādhyenāsaṃbaddhaḥ
sansādhyasādhakaḥ kathaṃ bhavet | prasaṅgasamā (11) — śabde kṛtakatve kiṃ sādhanaṃ
tatrāpi kiṃ sādhanamityanavasthā | yathā dṛṣṭānte ghaṭe'nityatve kiṃ sādhanaṃ tatrāpi
kiṃ sādhanamiti | pratidṛṣṭāntasamā (12) — śabdo'nityaḥ prayatnena vibhā-
vyamānatvādghaṭavadityukte śabdo nityaḥ prayatnena vibhāvyamānatvādākāśavadi-
tyuktiḥ | kūpakhananaprayatnena tatratyākāśaṃ vibhāvitaṃ bhavati | anutpattisamā
(13) — śabde'nityatvasādhanaṃ kṛtakatvādikaṃ śabdotpatteḥ prāṅnāstyeva |
asati dharmiṇi dharmāsaṃbhavāt | tathā ca tadānīṃ tādṛśadharmasādhyamanityatvamapi
nāstītyarthādeva nityatvamāgatam | nityasya cotpattireva nāstīti kathaṃ tatrāni-
tyatvaṃ sādhyate | atha vā anityahetukānumāne utpatteḥ prākpakṣe heturnāstītya-
siddhyāpādanam | saṃśayasamā (14) — yathā kṛtakatvasādharmyeṇa ghaṭavacchabdo'-
nityastathā aindriyakatvasādharmyeṇa ghaṭatvavacchabdo nityaḥ syāditi saṃśayaḥ | prakara-
ṇasamā (15) — saṃśayasamāyāṃ yathā dvayoḥ sāmyaṃ na tathā prakaraṇasamāyām |
atra tu viparītānumānasya pūrvānumānabādhakatvenodbhāvanam | hetusamā (16)
hetuḥ kiṃ sādhyātpūrvakālika utottarakālika uta samakālikaḥ | ādye hetukāle
sādhyasyābhāvātkasya sādhanam | dvitīye pūrvaṃ sādhyasya siddhatvātkiṃ sādhanena | 11|57 — saṃbhedāt for samabhedāt E.
tṛtīye savyetaragoviṣāṇayoriva sādhyasādhanabhāvāsaṃbhavaḥ | kārakajñāpaka-
hetoraikyābhimānenedam | arthāpattisamā (17) — arthāpattiśabdenātrārthā-
pattyābhāso gṛhyate | śabdo'nitya ityukterthādeva śabdavyatiriktaṃ sarvaṃ nityamiti
gamyate | tathā ca kathaṃ ghaṭādidṛṣṭāntaḥ | aviśeṣasamā (18) — kṛtakatva-
rūpasamānadharmeṇa śabdaghaṭayoraviśeṣaścetprameyatvādisamānadharmeṇa sarveṣāmaviśeṣaḥ
syāditi sarvaṃ nityamanityaṃ vā syāt | upapattisamā (19) — yadi kṛta-
katvopapattyā śabdasyānityatvaṃ tarhi niravayavatvopapattyā śabdasya nityatvamapi
kuto na bhavati | upalabdhisamā (20) — vahnimāndhūmādityukte dhūmaṃ vināpi
kāraṇāntareṇālokādināpi vahnerupalabdhirbhavatītyuktiḥ | ekasya kāryasyaikameva
kāraṇamityabhimānaḥ | anupalabdhisamā (21) śabdo na kṛtakaḥ | kiṃ tūccāra-
ṇātprāgapyastyeva | āvaraṇasadbhāvānnopalabhyate | āvaraṇaṃ nopalabhyata iti
cet — āvaraṇānupalabdhirapi nopalabhyata ityāvaraṇopalabdhireva sidhyatītyataḥ
śabdo nānitya ityuktiḥ | nityasamā (22) śabde anityatvarūpo dharmo nityo'-
nityo vā | nityatve dharmiṇaṃ vinā dharmasya sthityasaṃbhavena dharmiṇaḥ śabdasyāpi
nityatvamāyāti | anityatve anityatvamevānityaṃ cedarthādeva śabdanityatvamāyāti |
anityasamā (23) kṛtakatvena ghaṭasādharmyādanityaḥ śabdaścetprameyatvādinā
sarveṣāṃ ghaṭasādharmyātsarvepi padārthā anityāḥ syuḥ | no cecchabdopi nānityaḥ
syāt | kāryasamā (24) śabdo'nityaḥ kāryatvādityukte kāryatvasya janyatvajñā-
pyatvasādhāraṇyānna tadanityatvasādhanamiti | āsu jātiṣu madhye sādharmya —
saṃśaya — prakaraṇa — arthāpatti — anitya — kāryasamādīnāṃ kāsāṃcijjātīnāṃ paryavasāne
dūṣaṇaikyepi dūṣaṇodbhāvanaprakāro bhinna iti pṛthaṅnirdeśaḥ |

pratijñāhānīti | pratijñāhāniḥ (1) — anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvāditi
pratijñāya tatra sāmānyamaindriyakamapi nityaṃ dṛśyate iti pareṇokte astu tarhi
nityaḥ śabda ityuktiḥ | pratijñāntaram (2) — pūrvavatpratijñāya dūṣaṇe ca
pareṇokte sāmānyaṃ sarvagatam asarvagataḥ śabdo'nityaḥ — ityanyā pratijñā |
pratijñāvirodhaḥ (3) — pratijñāvākyahetuvākyayorvirodhaḥ | yathā guṇavyatiriktaṃ
dravyaṃ guṇādvyatiriktasyānupalabdherityuktiḥ | pratijñāsaṃnyāsaḥ (4) — pareṇa
dūṣaṇe ukte ka evamāha śabdo'nitya ityuktiḥ | pūrvakṛtapratijñāyā apalāpaḥ |
hetvantaram (5) — śabdo'nityaḥ bāhyendriyapratyakṣatvādityatra sāmānye vyabhicāra
ityukte sāmānyavattve sati iti hetuviśeṣaṇoktiḥ | arthāntaram (6) — kasmiṃ-
ściddhetau prayukte hinotestunpratyaya ityādirhetuśabdanirvacanoktiḥ | nirarthakam
(7) — kacaṭatapaḥśabdo nityaḥ khaphachaṭhathatvāt jabagaḍadavat iti | avijñā-
tārtham (8) — yadvākyaṃ trivāramabhihitamapi śliṣṭa-asamartha-apratīta-bhinnabhāṣā-
sthaśabdoccāraṇena śaidhryoccāraṇena vā na madhyasthenānyena ca jñāyate tādṛśyuktiḥ |
apārthakam (9) ākāṅkṣāyogyatādirahitā pūrvāparāsaṃbaddhoktiḥ | daśa dāḍimāni
ṣaḍapūpāḥ vahninā siñcatītyādiḥ | aprāptakālam (10) — pratijñāhetvādīnāmava-
yavānāṃ viparyāsenoktiḥ | nyūnam (11) — pratijñādyavayaveṣu kenacidavayavena
hīnā uktiḥ | adhikam (12) — ekenaiva hetunodāharaṇena ca sādhyasiddhau
dvitīyasya hetorudāharaṇasya vā uktiḥ | punaruktam (13) — punaḥ punastaireva
śabdaiḥ paryāyairvā uktiḥ | anuvāde tu na doṣaḥ | ananubhāṣaṇam (14) — madhya-
sthaistrivāraṃ brūhītyuktepyanuktiḥ | ajñānam (15) — vādinokterthe madhyasthairjñātepi
prativādinā ajñānam | evaṃ prativādinoktasya madhyasthairjñātasya vādinā ajñā-
nam | apratibhā (16) — parokte jñāte anūditepi tatrottarāsphūrtiḥ | vikṣepaḥ
(17) — ayogyasya kāryāntaravyāsaṅgasyodbhāvanaṃ śaucārthaṃ gacchāmītyādi | gṛha-
dāhādiyogyakāraṇe tu na doṣaḥ | matānujñā (18) coro bhavānityukte svacoratva-
manuddhṛtya bhavānapi cora ityuktiḥ | atra svasmiṃścoratvamapratiṣiddhamanumataṃ
bhavati | paryanuyojyopekṣaṇam (19) — nigrahasthāne vastuto jātepi tasyānyena
nigṛhītosi ityevamanuddhāṭanam | niranuyojyānuyogaḥ (20) — vastuto'vi-
dyamānepi nigrahasthāne idaṃ nigrahasthānam — ityevamuddhāṭanam | apasiddhāntaḥ
(21) — kaṃcitsiddhāntamabhyupetya bruvataḥ kathāprasaṅgāttatsiddhāntapracyavaḥ |
hetvābhāsāḥ (22) — savyabhicāraviruddhasatpratipakṣāsiddhabādhitāḥ pañca |

yadyapi pramāṇādiṣoḍaśapadārtheṣu prameyavyatiriktānāṃ pañcadaśānāṃ prameyeṣu ca
dvādaśavidheṣvarthavyatiriktānāmekādaśānāmartha evāntarbhāvo bhavati saṃmataśca
sūtrakārasya tathāpi mokṣakāraṇībhūtatattvajñānopayogitayā pārthakyena te sūtra-
kāreṇa pradarśitāḥ | tathā hi — mokṣo^12^ hyātyantikī duḥkhanivṛttiḥ | duḥkhaṃ^11^ ca
mukhyaṃ maraṇagarbhavāsarūpapretya^9^bhāvājjāyate | pretyabhāvaśca sukhaduḥkhopabhogarūpa-
pha^10^lajanakapravṛ^7^ttijanyaḥ | pravṛttiśca manoga^6^tarāgadveṣamoharūpadoṣa^8^mūlikā | doṣa-
hāniśca śa^2^rīrendri^3^yā^4^rthebhyo vyatiriktasyātma^1^tattvasya jñā^5^nādbhavati | prameya-
(2) bhūtānāṃ tattvānāṃ jñānaṃ ca pramāṇā(1)nāṃ prayojanam (4) | pramāṇe-
ṣu ca sūkṣmaviṣayenumānameva pañcāvayavo (7) petaṃ dṛṣṭānta (5) jīvitamanu-
grāhakatarka (8) sāhāyyena saṃśayaṃ (3) nirākṛtya siddhāntā (6) nusā-
reṇa nirṇayaṃ (9) janayituṃ prabhavati | nirṇayaśca pakṣapratipakṣaparigraharūpakathāyāṃ
vādena (10) dṛḍhībhavati | kathāyāṃ ca jalpa (11) vitaṇḍā (12)
hetvābhāsa (13) cchala (14) jāti (15) nigrahasthānā (16) nāṃ
heyatvāya tajjñānamāvaśyakam | evaṃ sūtrakāranirdiṣṭānāṃ sakalapadārthānāṃ jñānaṃ
mokṣopayuktaṃ bhavati |

atredaṃ bodhyam — jalpādayaśca svayaṃ na prayoktavyāḥ | pareṇa prayuktāścette doṣa-
tvena madhyasthānāṃ nidarśanīyāḥ | paro'jñānī mūrkhobhiniviṣṭabuddhirvā syācce-
ttūṣṇīṃbhāva eva varam | chalādinā vā jetavyo yadi madhyasthonumanyate |
anyathā tūṣṇīṃbhāvena ayaṃ parājita iti matvā paroktameva siddhāntaṃ śraddhayā
svīkṛtyājñānino lokā vañcitā bhaveyuḥ | taduktam —

gatānugatiko lokaḥ kumārgaṃ tatpratāritaḥ |
mā gāditi cchalādīni prāha kāruṇiko muniḥ || iti |

asādhāraṇyeneti | pañcāvayavavākyātmakaṃ parārthānumānaṃ nyāyapadavā-
cyam | nīyate prāpyate vivakṣitārthasiddhiraneneti vyutpatteḥ | taccāsādhāraṇameta-
cchāstrapratipādyam | tathā ca tasyātra prādhānyādasya śāstrasya nyāyaśāstramiti
vyapadeśa iti bhāvaḥ | paramo nyāya iti | nirṇāyakaṃ mukhyaṃ pramāṇamityarthaḥ |
pakṣilasvāmineti | gautamamunipraṇītanyāyasūtrāṇāṃ bhāṣyakāro vātsyāyanaḥ
pakṣilasvāmī | pakṣayati tattvajñānaṃ parigṛhṇātīti pakṣilaḥ | pakṣaparigraha iti
dhātorbāhulakātkartarīlacpratyayaḥ | ānvīkṣikīti | pratyakṣāgamābhyāmīkṣita-
syānvīkṣaṇamanvīkṣā pratyakṣāgamāśritamanumānam | tayā pravartata ityānvī-
kṣikī nyāyavidyā |

anantarameva | avyavahitameva | tadanantarāpāyāditi | duḥkhādiṣu pañcasu
pūrvapūrvaṃ pratyuttarottarasya kāraṇatvena kāraṇābhāve ca kāryābhāvasyāvaśyakatvenotta-
rottarāpāye tadanantarasya tatpūrvasyāpāyo bhavati | tatrāntimaṃ mithyājñānamārabhya
pūrvapūrvaṃ prati kāraṇatvaṃ darśayati — tatretyādinā | dehādāviti | ādipadena
strīputradhanagṛhādisaṃgrahaḥ | tadanukūleṣviti | tacchabdena dehādikaṃ parāmṛśyate |
ātmana iti | śarīrendriyamanobuddhiprāṇavyatiriktasya śarīrāntargatasyātmano
na kiṃcitpratikūlamanukūlaṃ vā saṃbhavati | kiṃ cātmanyekadoṣānuṣaṅgeṇaivāparadoṣo-
dbhāvanaṃ dṛśyata iti na ta ātmavastusvarūpānuṣaṅgiṇaḥ | tathā ca mithyājñānamū-
lakā eva doṣā iti siddhaṃ bhavatīti mithyājñānāpāye doṣāpāyaḥ siddho
bhavati | steyādīnīti | ādipadena paradārābhimarśādisaṃgrahaḥ | anṛtā-
dīnīti | ādipadena paramarmoddhāṭanādikaṃ gṛhyate | paradrohādīnīti | ādi-
padena paradravyecchānāstikyādigrahaṇam | pravṛttiradharma iti | atra pravṛtti-
sādhanau dharmādharmau pravṛttiśabdenoktau | yathānnaṃ vai prāṇinaḥ prāṇā iti bhāṣya-
kārairuktam | paraparitrāṇādīnīti | etadādyādipadatrayeṇa krameṇa paricaraṇa-
svādhyāyadayādisaṃgrahaḥ | na hyapravṛttasyeti | pravṛttyabhāve punarāvṛttyabhāvena duḥ-
khasaṃbhavābhāvāttatra duḥkhaṃ na kopi pratyetītyarthaḥ | tannirvartakamiti | tadutpādaka-
mityarthaḥ | avidyādīti | avidyā mithyājñānam | ādipadena doṣapravṛttyādi-
saṃgrahaḥ | catasṛbhiriti | uddeśo lakṣaṇaṃ parīkṣā vibhāgaśceti catasro vidhāḥ
prameyasya bhavanti | vidhāḥ prakārāḥ | atha vā duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaheturmokṣo mokṣopāya-
śceti prakāracatuṣṭayaṃ prameyasyātra grāhyam | duḥkhaṃ prasiddham | duḥkhahetuśca mithyājñā-
nādikokhilaḥ saṃsāraḥ | mokṣo duḥkhātyantocchedaḥ | mokṣopāyastattvajñānamiti |
nivartyasajātīyasyeti | nivartyaṃ duḥkham | tatsajātīyaṃ duḥkhāntaraṃ punarutpa-
tsyata ityevaṃ saṃbhāvanāpi yatra nāsti tādṛśī duḥkhanivṛttirapavarga iti bhāvaḥ |

kaphoṇiguḍāyitamiti | kaphoṇiḥ kūrparo bhujamadhyabhāgaḥ | tasya guḍabhrā-
ntyā yadāsvādanaṃ kriyate etatkaphoṇiguḍanyāyasvarūpam | tatra yathā guḍasyāsiddhatvā-
ttadāsvādanaṃ niṣphalaṃ tathoktasya mokṣasvarūpasyāsiddhatvāttadupāyavicāro niṣphala
iti śaṅkakāśayaḥ | sarvatantrasiddhānteti | etallakṣaṇaṃ prāguktam (da. 11 paṃ. 38) |
ghaṇṭāpatho ghaṇṭopalakṣitānāṃ gajādīnāṃ mārgaḥ | rājamārga ityarthaḥ | rājamārge hi
na kasyāpi pratibandho bhavati | tathā ca duḥkhanivṛttirūpaṃ mokṣasvarūpamabhyupetya yena
kenāpi pravartitavyam | na kaścittasya pratibandhaṃ kartuṃ prabhavati | mādhyamiketi |
mādhyāmikā bauddhaviśeṣāḥ prāgdarśitāḥ (da. 2 pa. 156) | duḥkhahetutvādu-
cchedya iti | ata eva mādhyamikairātmocchedo mokṣa iti mokṣasvarūpamuktam | tā-
dṛśaṃ nyāyanaye svīkāryaṃ syāditi śaṅkakāśayaḥ | kimātmeti | saṃtānaḥ pravāhaḥ |
mādhyamikairyanmokṣasvarūpamātmoccheda ityuktaṃ tatrātmaśabdena jñānapravāho gṛhyata
uta tādṛśajñānapravāhāpekṣayātiriktastadāśrayo gṛhyata iti vikalpaḥ | prathama
iti | ātmaśabdena jñānaṃ gṛhyata iti pakṣa ātmoccheda ityasya jñānoccheda
ityarthaḥ | mokṣe ca jñānanāśo naiyāyikānāmabhīṣṭa eva | pāṣāṇakalpā
hi mokṣe jīvasya sthitiriti naiyāyikasiddhāntaḥ | tathā ca naiyāyikānukūlaṃ
pratipādayati mādhyamike tatpratikūlaṃ tatkhaṇḍanādikaṃ kaḥ kuryādityarthaḥ | aśa-
kyavidhānaiveti | kartumaśakyetyarthaḥ | tathā cātmocchedāsaṃbhavaḥ | pravṛttyanu-
papattiṃ nirūpayati — na khalviti | vyavahārānupapattiṃ nirūpayati — sarvo
hīti | śuko mukto vāmadevo mukta ityevaṃ prāyaḥ sarve prāṇino vyapadi-
śanti | tatra ca mokṣarūpadharmāśrayo dharmī kaścidastīti tadabhiprāyaḥ | mo-
kṣāvasthāyāmātmana eva nāśe tvayaṃ vyavahāro na saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ | vijñāna-
vādibhirbauddhaviśeṣaiḥ pratipāditaṃ mokṣasvarūpaṃ dūṣayati — dharminivṛttāviti |
jñānaṃ hi nisargato nirmalaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ ca | āśrayasyātmanaḥ saṃbandhena ca tatra mala-
prādurbhāvaḥ | āśrayanivṛttau ca taduttaraṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ nirmalameva jñānamutpadyate | aya-
meva mahodaya iti tadbhāvaḥ | mahodayo mokṣaḥ | bhāvanācatuṣṭayamiti | sarvaṃ
duḥkhaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ śūnyamiti bhāvanācatuṣṭayaṃ prāguktam (da. 2 paṃ. 145) |
bhāvanā ca sāmānyato jāyamānā nābhijñānaṃ janayati | kiṃ tu prakṛṣṭaiva | yathā
sphuṭalakṣaṇarahite maṇyādāvayaṃ maṇirityuktyā maṇitvena bhāvanāyāṃ jātāyāmapi na
pratyabhijñā bhavati | kiṃ tu punaḥ punarnirīkṣaṇābhyāsena prakṛṣṭāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ
pratyabhijñā jāyate | laṅghanādāvapyabhyāsena prakarṣonubhūyate | laṅghanamuḍḍaya-
nam | atra tu bhāvanāyāḥ prakarṣo na saṃbhavati | bhāvanādhārasya sthirasyaikasyāsaṃ-
bhavāt | ātmanaḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnatvāt | tathā ca na sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ duḥkha-
kṣaṇikasvalakṣaṇaśūnyatvena pratyabhijñā saṃbhavatīti mokṣasāmagryabhāvaḥ siddhaḥ |
sāmānādhikaraṇyānupapattimupapādayati — sopaplavasyeti | āśrayasaṃbaddhaḥ
samalo jñānapravāhaḥ sopaplavaḥ | tadbhinno nirupaplavaḥ | jainābhimataṃ mokṣasvarūpaṃ
prāguktaṃ (da. 3 paṃ. 346) dūṣayati — āvaraṇeti | nirargalaḥ | pratibandha-
rahitaḥ | dehameveti | kāyo dehaḥ klībapuṃsoḥ (amarako. 2 | 6 | 71)
ityamarāddehaśabdasya klībatvamapi | pratibandhabaleneti | pratibandho vyāptiḥ |
kṛtapraṇāśeti | kṛtapraṇāśasyākṛtābhyāgamasya ca svarūpaṃ prāguktam
(pṛ. 53 pa. 9) | calanātmikāyā iti | yataḥ kriyā calanasvarūpātaḥ
sā mūrtatvasya vyāpyā | yatra yatra kriyā tatra tatra mūrtatvamiti | tathā ca kri-
yāyā mūrtatvavyāpyatvādvyāpakasya mūrtatvasyātmanyabhāvena vyāpyabhūtāyāḥ kriyāyā
api tatrābhāva ityūrdhvagamanaṃ na saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ | cārvākasaṃmate mokṣasvarūpepi
duḥkhocchedostyeveti darśayati — pāratantryamiti | aiśvaryaṃ cediti | yadyaiśvaryaṃ
svātantryapadārtha ityucyate tarhi tadvicāraśīlānāmabhimataṃ na bhavati | te hi mokṣaṃ
niratiśayaṃ nirupamaṃ cecchanti | jīvasyaiśvaryaṃ tu na kathamapi tathābhūtaṃ bhavati |
yadyadaiśvaryaṃ tattatsātiśayamiti vyāpteḥ | kiṃ ca loke tattadadhikārisāmantanṛpa-
sārvabhaumādīnāmīśvarāṇāmapi kvacidanaiśvaryaṃ dṛśyata eva | śarīrasya dhāraṇe tyāge
ca prāyaḥ sarve prāṇinonīśvarā eva | sāṃkhyābhimate mokṣasvarūpepi duḥkhocchedo-
styeveti darśayati — prakṛtīti | prakṛtirasyākhilasya jaḍavargasya mūlakāraṇamace-
tanaṃ triguṇātmakaṃ pradhānam | puruṣo jīvaḥ | tayoranyatvaṃ viveko bhedaḥ | tasya
khyātiḥ pratītiḥ sākṣātkāraḥ | tasminsatītyarthaḥ | etadagre sāṃkhyadarśane spaṣṭaṃ bha-
viṣyati | tatreti | puruṣāśrayaṃ jīvāśrayam | na śliṣyate | na yujyate | jīvānāṃ 11|133 — prekṣāvadvikalpāsahatayā mukterdurnirūpatvāpatteḥ for prekṣāvatāṃ nābhi-
matam D.
yanmūlasvarūpeṇa sadaikarūpatayāvasthānaṃ sāṃkhyasaṃmataṃ tadbhaṅgaprasaṅgāditi bhāvaḥ
mīmāṃsakābhimatepi mokṣasvarūpe duḥkhocchedostyeveti darśayati — nityeti |
abhimataiveti | leśatopi duḥkhasattve sukhasya niratiśayatvāsaṃbhavāditi bhāvaḥ |
paraṃ tviti | mokṣe nityasukhaṃ vidyata ityatra na kiṃcitpramāṇamastītyarthaḥ |
śrutiriti | sośnute sarvānkāmānsaha brahmaṇā vipaścitā (tai. 2 | 1) iti
śrutau mokṣe sarvakāmāvāptiruktā | tathā ca tatra sukhaṃ svīkāryamevetyāśayaḥ |
yogyeti | yatra śrutyā pratipāditopi viṣayo bādhito bhavati tatra śruternāva-
kāśaḥ | na mukhyārthapratipādakatvam | kiṃ tu tādṛśī śrutirgauṇārthakatayopapāda-
nīyā | yathā ātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ (tai. 2 | 1) ityākāśotpattiprati-
pādikā śrutirniravayavasyākāśasyotpattyasaṃbhavena bādhitaviṣayā saṃbhūta ityasyā-
bhivyakta ityarthaṃ gṛhītvā yojyate | tadvadatrāpi mokṣāvasthāyāṃ śarīrendriyasaṃbandhā-
bhāvena sukhānupalabdhyā bādhitaviṣayā satī gauṇārthatvena yojanīyā | sarvakā-
māvāptiśca sarvakāmānavāptyabhāvaḥ | mokṣe śarīrendriyarahitasya kāma eva nāsti
kutaḥ kāmānavāptiriti tadabhāvo vartata eva | kiṃ coktaśrutau sahāśnuta ityuktam |
sahetyasya yugapadityarthaḥ | sarvairindriyaiḥ sarvaviṣayabhogaścaikadā sutarāṃ na saṃbhavati |
manasoṇutvāt | tathā ca śrutergauṇārthakatvamavaśyaṃ svīkāryameva bhavati | grāveti |
plavante grāvāṇaḥ ityetādṛśaśruterapi mukhyārthenaiva prāmāṇyaṃ svīkāryaṃ syāt |

arocaketi | sauvīraṃ kāñjikam | arocakagrastasya hi bhakṣaṇe pravṛttiḥ
svabhāvato durlabhaiva | tatra ca yadi nīrasataraṃ kāñjikaṃ bhakṣyaṃ dīyate ceddurlabhataraiva
bhavati | tathā mokṣe pravṛttiḥ prāṇināṃ prathamata eva viralā | tatra ca mokṣe sukhaṃ nā-
stītyucyamāne viralataraiva syādityāśayaḥ | nāṭaketi | nāṭakādau hyuktivaicitryaṃ
śrotṛcetasi kṣaṇaṃ camatkāramātraṃ vidhatte na tu taduktārthasya pramāṇāntarāsiddhatve 11|140 — bhā for bhaṭṭa. D.
tādṛśoktimātreṇa siddhirbhavati | na hyanukūlatarkābhāve dṛṣṭāntamātreṇa kaścidarthaḥ
siddho bhavati | anukūlatarkābhāvaṃ darśayati — sukhasyeti | yadyatsukhaṃ tatta-
tsātiśayamiti vyāptiḥ | tathā ca tatra sarvatra tādṛśātiśayāprāptyā tadāśāba-
ddhasya duḥkhamavarjanīyameva | pratyakṣaṃ ca sukhānubhavakāle pariṇāmadṛṣṭyā duḥkham |
tathā bahubhiḥ sukhavirodhibhirākrāntaṃ sukhamiti duḥkhasaṃbaddhameva | tathā aprāptasya
sukhasādhanasya prārthanāyāṃ parikleśa eveti na kiṃcidapi sukhaṃ duḥkhenāsaṃbaddhaṃ
dṛśyate | tathā ca sukhoddeśena mokṣe pravṛttirna saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ | nanveka-
miti | duḥkhaṃ tyaktukāmasya sukhaṃ tyājyaṃ bhavedityato duḥkhanivṛttipakṣo na
prārthanīyo bhavatītyāśayaḥ | mokṣe sukhamiti pakṣopi na prārthanīyo bhavati
yatastatra prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttirnopapadyata ityāśayenottarayati — sukhasaṃpādana iti |
yathā tapte lohapiṇḍe suvarṇabuddhyā tadgrahītuṃ pravṛttasya na kevalaṃ suvarṇālābhaḥ
pratyuta dāhastathātra sukhabuddhyā pravṛttasya tatsukhaṃ prāpyeta na vā | duḥkhaṃ tvavarjanīya-
meva | tathā ca kathaṃ tatra | prekṣāvānpravarteta | sukhe duḥkhasyāvaśyakatvaṃ sukhāpekṣayā
duḥkhasyādhikyaṃ ca darśayati — tathā hītyādinā |

tadvyāpteti | liṅgaṃ jñāpakam | idamīśvaravyāpyam — ityevaṃrūpeṇa na kima-
pīśvarajñāpakaṃ vastu pratyakṣādipramāṇairanubhūyata ityāśayaḥ | apasiddhānteti |
āgamo hi paurvāparyaviśeṣaviśiṣṭanānāvarṇātmakaḥ | varṇāstūccāritapradhvaṃsitayā
pratyakṣamevānityā anubhūyanta ityāgamasyānityatvaṃ sidhyatīti naiyāyikasiddhāntaḥ |
parasparāśrayeti | āgamasyānityatvāttatprāmāṇyaṃ kartṛprāmāṇyāpekṣam | kartuśce-
śvarasya prāmāṇyaṃ tatkṛtāgamāpekṣamityanyonyāśraya iti bhāvaḥ | kāryatvahetorhe-
tvābhāsatvamāśaṅkya nirākaroti — na cāyamityādinā | sāvayavatveneti |
tathā ca prayogaḥ — nagasāgarādikaṃ kāryaṃ sāvayavatvāddhaṭavaditi | anenānumānena
kāryatvaṃ prasādhya tatastena hetunā punaranumānāntareṇa sakartṛkatvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ |
gaganādāviti | ghaṭādīnāṃ yevayavāstairākāśasya saṃyogo vidyate | kāryatvaṃ
tvākāśasya naiyāyikairneṣyate | tathā ca kāryatvarūpasādhyābhāvavatyākāśe sāvayava-
tvasya hetoḥ sattvena vyabhicāra ityāśayaḥ | svāvayavaiḥ saha saṃyogitvamityarthe tu
ghaṭādīnāmapi sāvayavatvaṃ na syāt | avayavāvayavinoḥ samavāyasya naiyāyikai-
ruktatvāt | svāvayavānāṃ mitho yaḥ saṃyogastadvattvamityarthepi saṃyogāśrayatvamavaya-
vānāmeva na tvavayavina iti ghaṭādeḥ sāvayavatvaṃ na syāditi doṣastadavastha
eva | tantutvādāviti | paṭāvayaveṣu tantuṣu samavāyasaṃbandhena tantutvasya vidya-
mānatvāt | samavetadravyatvamiti | ākāśaṃ hi niravayavatvānna samavetam |
tantutvaṃ tu na dravyamiti noktasthale vyabhicāraḥ | avāntareti | avāntaramahattva-
mapakṛṣṭamahattvam | tacca paramamahattvābhāvavatsu dvyaṇukādiṣu nagasāgarādiṣu
sarveṣvanityadravyeṣu vidyate | tathā ca prayogaḥ — nagasāgarādikaṃ kāryaṃ parama-
mahattvābhāvavattve sati mahattvāddhaṭādivaditi | nāpīti | sakartṛkatvasādhakaḥ 11|163 — atat for niyata. D.
kāryatvaheturviruddharūpo hetvābhāso na bhavatītyarthaḥ | nāpyanaikāntika iti |
sakartṛkatvarūpasādhyābhāvavati paramāṇvādau kāryatvasyādarśanānna kāryatva-
heturvyabhicarito bhavatīti bhāvaḥ | kālātyayāpadiṣṭaḥ | bādhito hetvābhāsa-
viśeṣaḥ | na hīti | yathā prauḍhasya siṃhasya yaḥ kaściddhariṇaśiśuḥ pratibhaṭa iti
vaktumaśakyaṃ tathāyamakartṛkatvasādhakatvena tvaduktaḥ śarīrājanyatvahetuḥ sakartṛkatva-
sādhakasya kāryatvahetoḥ pratibhaṭo na bhavati | atulyabalatvāt | tadeva darśaya-
nnāha — ajanyatvasyaiveti | yathā parvatognimānnīladhūmādityatra nīleti
viśeṣaṇasya na kiṃcitsāmarthyamasti | viśeṣyamātrasya dhūmasyāgnisādhane paryāpta-
tvāt | tathātra kevalamajanyatvamevākartṛkatvasādhane paryāptaṃ na tatra śarīrapadā-
pekṣā | tathā cedṛśaḥ prayukto hetuḥ prayokturajñānaṃ sūcayati | asiddheriti |
ajanyatvaṃ hyutpattirāhityam | tacca nagasāgarādiṣu na kenāpi pramāṇena
sādhayituṃ śakyate | nāpīti | kāryatvahetorvastuta upādhirnāstyeva | paraṃ tūpādhi-
śaṅkayāpyayaṃ kāryatvahetuḥ kalaṅkito na bhavati | yadi sakartṛkatvasya vyāpakaṃ
kiṃcidvastu kāryatvasyāvyāpakaṃ saṃbhavettarhyupādhiśaṅkā | tādṛksaṃbhavaśca kāryatvasya
vyabhicāritve satyeva | vyabhicāraścākartṛke vastuni kāryatvadarśane satyeva |
tacca darśanamanukūlatarkeṇa bādhyata iti bhāvaḥ | kāryamapi na syāditi |
kartṛjanyasyaiva kāryatvāt | iheti | kārakacakraṃ kartṛkarmakaraṇasaṃpradānāpādānā-
dhikaraṇarūpaṃ kārakaṣaṭkam | tadanapekṣayā yasya vastunaḥ svarūpaprāptirbhavettādṛśaṃ
vastu jagati kimapi nāstītyarthaḥ | tacceti | maryādāvasthitiviśeṣaḥ | ghaṭapaṭā-
dikāryotpādanasamaye kumbhakārakuvindādiḥ kartā sarvāṇi kārakāṇi kāryotpattyā-
nuguṇyenāvasthāpayati | svasyāpyavasthānaṃ tathaiva | kartṛtvaṃ ceti | na mṛddaṇḍādīni
ghaṭamutpādayituṃ kumbhakāraṃ prayojayanti | pratyuta kumbhakāra eva tāni svecchayā
prayojayati | kartā hyādau jānāti tata icchati tato yatata iti prasiddham |
evaṃ ceti | akartṛkasthale hi kartaiva nāstīti tvatsaṃmatameva | tatra cārthādeve-
tarakārakāṇi vyāpāraśūnyāni | evaṃ satyapi tatra kāryatvaṃ svīkriyate cetkāraṇaṃ
vinaiva kāryotpattiḥ svīkṛtā bhavediti tavāyaṃ mahānpramāda iti bhāvaḥ |
niraṭaṅki | nirbaddham | uktamiti yāvat | anukūleneti | hetāvanukūlatarkeṇa
yukte sati tatra nopādhiḥ saṃbhavati | upādhitvābhimate sādhyavyāpakatvasyā-
bhāvena tasyopādhilakṣaṇānākrāntatvāt | sādhyavyāpakatve sati sādhanā-
vyāpakatvamupādhilakṣaṇam | anukūlatarkeṇa hi hetuḥ sādhyavyāpya iti niścayo
bhavati | tādṛśasya svavyāpyasya yo vyāpako na bhavati kvacittādṛśavyāpyasa-
ttvepi na vidyate sa svasya (sādhyasya) vyāpakaḥ kathaṃ bhavet |
svavyāpyāvyāpakasya svavyāpakatvābhāvaniyamāditi bhāvaḥ | yadīśvara
iti | ayaṃ ca tarkaḥ prāgukta (da. 11 paṃ. 165) siddhāntisaṃmatā-
numānasya pratikūlaḥ | etattarkasahāyena jāyamānaṃ śaṅkākṛdabhimatamanumānaṃ
tvittham — īśvaro nagasāgarādikartā na bhavati śarīrarahitatvādākāśādiva-
diti | īśvarasiddhīti | yadyāgamādipramāṇeneśvarasiddhirabhyupagamyate tarhi
tenaiva pramāṇeneśvarasya jagatkartṛtvamapyāstheyaṃ bhavati | tathā ca tvaduktānumānaṃ
bādhitaṃ bhavatīti na tena kartṛtvasya niṣedho bhavati | athāgamādi na pramāṇaṃ
kiṃ tu pramāṇābhāsa itīśvarasyāsiddhirityucyate tarhi tvaduktānumāne pakṣāsi
ddhirnarīnartti | tathā cobhayathāpi tvaduktirvyāhateti bhāvaḥ | na ca viśeṣeti |
īśvaro hi nityadravyamiti tatra kaścidviśeṣo naiyāyikairāsthīyate | viśeṣaśca
svabhāvata eva svalakṣaṇa itarebhyaḥ sarvebhyo vilakṣaṇaḥ | tathā ca jagati jīvānāṃ
kartṛtvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatsālakṣaṇyena kathaṃ sarvatovilakṣaṇaviśeṣavati kadāpyadṛṣṭa
īśvare kartṛtvaṃ sādhyate | viśeṣasvabhāvaviruddhatvāditi śaṅkāśayaḥ | jñātatveti |
viśeṣo jñātaścetsa svabhāvata itarasarvavilakṣaṇa ityanyatra kvāpyadṛṣṭasya jagatka-
rtṛtvasya prayojako bhavet | na kiṃcittatra bādhakaṃ dṛśyate | ajñātaścenna tadāśra-
yeṇānumānasya virodhodbhāvanaṃ saṃbhavatītyāhuḥ |

ata eveti | avāptasakalakāmatvena tadaniṣṭasyāsaṃbhavādeva nāniṣṭapari-
hārārthā pravṛttiḥ saṃbhavati | dvitīye | parārthapravṛttyaṅgīkāre | kiṃ nāmeti |
api tu sarvameva kṛtaṃ bhavet | iṣṭāpattistu prayojanādarśanaparāhatetyāśayaḥ |

svātantryabhaṅga iti | īśvarasya jagatsṛṣṭau prāṇikṛtakarmāpekṣāyāṃ parāva-
lambitvaprasaṅgādityāśayaḥ | svāṅgamiti | yathā kvacidanvārambhaṇaprasaṅge
svahastapādādināvayavena vyavadhānaṃ na manyate lokastathātra karmāpi jagada-
ntargatamīśvarakāritamiti karmāpekṣāyāmapi neśrarasya parāvalambitvam | pratyuta
svārabdhakāryasya sādhanamapi svādhīnameveti svātantryasyotkarṣa eva | atheśvara-
sadbhāve pramāṇamāgamaṃ darśayati — eka eveti | eka eveśvarovatasthe na tatra
kaścana dvitīyosti | yadetaddvitīyaṃ dṛśyate tadakhilaṃ tenaiva nirmitamityāga-
matātparyam | parasparāśrayeti | īśvarasyāgamena sādhana īśvarāgamayoḥ
parasparāśrayarūpo yo doṣastadrūpavyādheḥ pratīkāraṃ kurvityarthaḥ | aśakyapratī-
kāroyaṃ vyādhiriti śaṅkakasya gūḍhāśayaḥ | tasya | parasparāśrayasya | parameśva-
rasya nityatveneti | tathā cotpattāvīśvaro nāgamasāpekṣaḥ | kiṃ ca nityatvā-
dīśvaraḥ svata eva pramāṇamiti neśvaraprāmāṇyamapyutpattāvāgamāpekṣamiti
bhāvaḥ | anyata iti | yathā ghaṭa utpattau kumbhakārāpekṣo na tu jñāne |
jñāne tu prakāśādyapekṣaḥ | tathotpattāvāgama īśvarāpekṣostu nāma | guruparaṃparā-
dinā sāṃprataṃ jāyamāna āgamajñāne tu neśvarāpekṣopalabhyate | evamāgamavṛttidha-
rmāṇāṃ jñānepīśvarāpekṣā nāstītyāha — nāpīti | tīvrastīkṣṇo duḥsaho bhayaṃkaraḥ
kaṭuḥ | āgamo hyarthaviśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ | tatrārthe kvacittīkṣṇatvādayo dharmā
upalabhyante | śabde ca karṇakaṭutvādayaḥ | ete ca dharmā anityatvavyāpyā
ityāgamānityatvamavagamayanti | etaduktaṃ bhavati — yathā sthale naukāyā anyatra
nayane śakaṭāpekṣā | jale ca śakaṭasyānyatra nayane naukāpekṣetyevaṃ vidyamānopi
parasparāśraya ādhārabhedena na doṣarūpatāmāvahati tathā āgamasyotpattāvīśvarā-
pekṣā na jñāne īśvarasya ca jñāna āgamāpekṣā notpattāviti viṣayabhedena parasparā-
śrayadoṣo nāsti | evamīśvaraprāmāṇyāgamaprāmāṇyayorapi bodhyamiti ||

dvādaśalakṣaṇīti | lakṣaṇaśabdodhyāyavācī | dvādaśānāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ
samāhāro dvādaśalakṣaṇī | tādṛśasya dvādaśādhyāyopetasya pūrvamīmāṃsāśāstrasya
dharmo viṣayaḥ | vidhyarthavādeti | prathamādhyāyasya prathamapāde vidheḥ prāmāṇya-
vicāraḥ | dvitīyapāderthavādamantrayoḥ | tṛtīyapāde manvādismṛtīnām | ācā-
rasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ tatraiva nirūpitam | caturthapāda udbhiccitrādināmadheyānāṃ
prāmāṇyamiti | upoddhāteti | dvitīyādhyāyasya prathame pāda ākhyātamevāpū-
rvabodhakamapūrvasadbhāva ityādikaḥ karmabhedacintopayukta upoddhāto varṇitaḥ |
dvitīye dhātubhedapunaruktyādibhiḥ karmabhedaḥ | tṛtīye karmabhedaprāmāṇyāpavādaḥ |
caturthe nityakāmyayoḥ prayogayorbhedaḥ | tṛtīye śrutiliṅgeti | atra prasaṅgā-
cchrutyādipramāṇāni teṣu pūrvapūrvaprābalyaṃ ca nirūpyate |

tatra jaimineḥ sūtram — śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇasthānasamākhyānāṃ samavāye
pāradaurbalyamarthaviprakarṣāt (jai. sū. 3 | 3 | 14) iti | asyārthaḥ — mantrasya
devatāyā havirdravyasyānyasya vā kasyacitkva viniyoga ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ tatra
nirṇāyakāni śrutyādīni ṣaṭ pramāṇāni | ekatra pramāṇadvayasaṃnipāte tu pūrvā-
pekṣayā paraṃ durbalam | yatorthasya viniyogarūpasya viprakarṣāt | pūrvapramāṇāpekṣayā
vilambena pratītijanakatvāt | tathā hi — sarvatra nirṇāyakaṃ pramāṇaṃ śrutirūpamekameva |
sā ca śrutirdvividhā | kvacitsākṣātpaṭhitā kvacidanumitā | ādyā yathā | aindryā
gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhata iti | atrendradevatāsaṃbandhinyā ṛco gārhapatyāgnyupasthāpane
viniyogaḥ sākṣācchrutyaiva pratipāditaḥ | dvitīyā yathā — syonaṃ ta iti puroḍā-
śasya sadanaṃ karoti iti | nedaṃ vākyaṃ śrutau paṭhyamānaṃ kvacidupalabhyate | kiṃ
tu syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi (tai. brā. 3 | 6) iti mantrasyārthaṃ dṛṣṭvā tena liṅgena
mantrārthānusāreṇa mantraviniyojikeyaṃ śrutiranumīyate | tayā ca viniyogaḥ | liṅgaṃ
hyarthaprakāśanasāmarthyameva | tacca śrutyanumāpakaṃ liṅgaṃ dvividham | kvacitsākṣā-
ddṛśyamānaṃ kvacidanumitam | ādyamupadarśitam | antyaṃ yathā — devasya tvā savituḥ
prasaveśvinorbāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāmagnaye juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmi (tai. saṃ. 1 | 1 | 4) |
idaṃ caikaṃ vākyam | vākyaṃ cākāṅkṣādivaśātparasparānvitārthakapadānāṃ samūhaḥ |
asmindevasya tveti vākyegnaye juṣṭamityādibhāgasya nirvāparūpārthaprakāśanasā-
marthyaṃ pratyakṣato dṛśyata eva | tadekavākyatayāvaśiṣṭasyāpi devasya tvetyādi-
bhāgasya vākyapramāṇabalena tādṛśanirvāparūpārthaprakāśanasāmarthyamanumīyate |
tena ca samuditena liṅgena devasya tveti nirvapati iti śrutiranumīyate | tayā
ca devasya tveti mantrasya nirvāpakarmaṇi viniyogaḥ | tacca liṅgānumāpakaṃ vākyaṃ
dvividham | kvacitsākṣāddṛśyamānaṃ kvacidanumitam | ādyamupadarśitam | antyaṃ
yathā — samidho yajatītyatreṣṭaviśeṣasyānirdeśātsamidyāgena kiṃ bhāvayedityeva-
mastyupakāryākāṅkṣā | darśapūrṇamāsavidhivākyepi darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargaṃ
bhāvayetkathamityevamastyupakārakākāṅkṣā | ubhayākāṅkṣaiva prakaraṇaṃ pramāṇami-
tyucyate | ubhayākāṅkṣayaiva ca tayorekavākyatānumīyate | tadbalācca darśapūrṇa-
māsaphalībhūtasvargasādhanībhūtārthaprakāśanasāmarthyaṃ samidho yajatītyāderanumīyate |
tena ca śrutiranumīyate | tayā ca samidyāgasya darśapūrṇamāsakarmaṇi viniyogaḥ |
seyaṃ prakaraṇaśabditobhayākāṅkṣā dvividhā | kvacitsākṣāddṛśyamānā kvacidanu-
mitā | ādyopadarśitā | antyā yathā — aindrāgnamekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet
(tai. saṃ. 2 | 2 | 11) vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet (tai. saṃ. 2 | 2 | 5) ityevaṃ
krameṇeṣṭayo vidhīyante | tatra cendrāgnī rocanā divaḥ (tai. saṃ. 4 | 2 | 11) ityā-
dīnāṃ yājyānuvākyāmantrāṇāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ prathamasya prathamaṃ dvitīyasya dvitīyamityevaṃ
viniyogo yathāsaṃkhyapāṭhādbhavati | pāṭhasthānaviśeṣeṇa hyubhayākāṅkṣānumīyate |
tayā caikavākyatānumīyate | tayā ca liṅgam | tena ca śrutiḥ | tayā ca vini-
yoga iti | tadidamubhayākāṅkṣānumāpakaṃ sthānaṃ pramāṇaṃ dvividham | kvacitsā-
kṣāddṛśyate kvacitsamākhyayānumīyate | ādyamupadarśitam | antyaṃ yathā — hautra-
maudgātramityādi | atra hoturidaṃ hautramityādiyogabalena hautrādisamākhyātāni
karmāṇi hotrādibhiranuṣṭheyāni | samākhyā yogabalam | anvarthateti yāvat |
samākhyā hi saṃbandhanibandhanā asaṃnihitena saṃbandhāyogāttatsiddhyarthaṃ saṃnidhipā-
ṭharūpaṃ kramaṃ kalpayati | pāṭhaviśeṣakramenumite tenobhayākāṅkṣānumānam | tayā
vākyam | tena liṅgam | tena śrutiḥ | tayā ca viniyoga iti |

tatra tṛtīyādhyāyasyāṣṭau pādāḥ | tatra prathameṅgatvabodhakoktaśrutyādipramā-
ṇaṣaṭkamadhye śrutirvicāritā | dvitīye liṅgam | tṛtīye vākyaprakaraṇasthānasamā-
khyārūpaṃ pramāṇacatuṣṭayam | caturthe nivītopavītādiṣvarthavādatvavidhitvādinirṇa-
yahetuḥ śrutyādeḥ parasparavirodhasadasadbhāvaḥ | pañcame pratipattikarmāṇi | upayukta-
dravyasya viniyogaḥ pratipattiḥ | ṣaṣṭhenārabhyādhītāni | saptame bahupradhānopakā-
rakaprayājādikarmāṇi | aṣṭame yajamānakarmāṇi | caturtha iti | caturthādhyāyasya
prathame pāde pradhānabhūtāmikṣā dadhyānayanasya prayojiketyādi pradhānaprayoktṛtvaṃ
vicāritam | dvitīye tvapradhānaṃ vatsāpākaraṇaṃ śākhācchede prayojakamityādyapradhāna-
prayoktṛtvam | tṛtīye juhūparṇamayītvāderapāpaślokaśravaṇādiphalabhāvābhāvacinta-
nam | caturthe rājasūyagatagauṇāṅgākṣadyūtādicintanam | pañcame śrutyādīti |
atra prasaṅgācchrutyādikramavicāraḥ kriyate |

śrutyarthapaṭhanasthānamukhyapravṛttyākhyāni ṣaṭ pramāṇāni kramabodhanadvārā prayoga-
vidheraṅgabhūtāni | tatra śrutiryathā — vedaṃ kṛtvā vediṃ karotīti | atra pūrvakālabo-
dhakaktvāpratyayaśrutyaivādau vedakaraṇaṃ tato vedikaraṇamiti kramovasīyate | bhuktvā
vrajatītivat | vedo darbhamuṣṭiḥ | vediḥ pariṣkṛtā bhūmiḥ | yatra prayojanavaśena
kramo nirṇīyate sorthakramaḥ | yathā — agnihotraṃ juhoti yavāgūṃ pacatīti | atra
yadyapi yavāgūṃ pacatīti vākyaṃ paścātpaṭhyate tathāpi yavāgvā homārthatvena
tatpākaḥ prayojanavaśātpūrvamanuṣṭhīyate paścāddhomaḥ | pāṭhakramānusāreṇa homānantaraṃ
yavāgvāḥ pākakaraṇe tu tasyādṛṣṭaṃ phalaṃ kalpayitavyaṃ syāt | śrautakramasyārthakramasya
cābhāve tu pāṭhakramo grāhyaḥ | sthānamupasthitiḥ | deśataḥ kālataśca yatra yadupa-
sthitaṃ tatra tatprathamataḥ kāryaṃ paścādanyat | pradhānakrameṇa yoṅgānāṃ kramaḥ sa
mukhyakramaḥ | yena krameṇādityādyāḥ pradhānadevatāḥ pūjyante tenaiva krameṇa tadadhi-
devatādyā api pūjyante | pravṛttikramastvekatra yena krameṇopacārāḥ pravartitāste-
naiva krameṇānyatreti |

tatra prathame pāde śrutyarthapaṭhanādikramo nirūpitaḥ | dvitīye kramaviśeṣaḥ | sa
cānekeṣu paśuṣvekaikadharmasamāpanamityādirūpaḥ | tṛtīye vṛdhyavṛddhī | yathāgnīṣomīya-
paśāvekādaśaprayājānyajati | tatra pañcaprayājānāṃ dvirāvṛttiṃ kṛtvā punarapi carama-
prayāje sakṛdāvartite satyekādaśasaṃkhyā saṃpādanīyetyevaṃ vṛddhiḥ | kvacittadabhāvaḥ |
caturthe śrutyādiṣu ṣaṭsu pūrvapūrvasya prābalyamuttarottaraṃ durbalamityādivicāraḥ | ṣaṣṭha
iti | ṣaṣṭhādhyāyasya prathame pāde karmādhikāraścakṣuṣmato nāndhāderityevamadhikārī
nirūpitaḥ | dvitīyedhikāridharmāḥ | tṛtīye mukhyābhāve pratinidhiḥ kva grāhyaḥ kva
vā neti | caturthe kva kasya lopa iti | pañcame kālādivaiguṇye prāyaścittam | ṣaṣṭhe
satrādhikāriṇaḥ | saptame pitrādi na deyamiti | aṣṭame laukikāgnau kva homa
iti | saptama iti | prathame samānamitaracchayenenetyādipratyakṣavacanairatideśo
nirūpitaḥ | dvitīye tādṛśātideśasya śeṣaḥ | tṛtīyegnihotranāmnātideśaḥ | caturthe
liṅgātideśaḥ | aṣṭama iti | prathame pratyakṣavacanābhāvepi spaṣṭairliṅgairatideśaḥ |
dvitīye aspaṣṭairliṅgairatideśaḥ | tṛtīye prabalena liṅgenātideśaḥ | caturthetideśā-
pavādaḥ | navama iti | prathama ūhaprārambhaḥ | ūho nāma mantreṣu sthitānāṃ
devatāliṅgasaṃkhyādivācakaśabdānāṃ prayogaviśeṣe tattaddevatāliṅgasaṃkhyādyanusāreṇa
parivartanam | dvitīye sāmohaḥ | tṛtīye mantrohaḥ | caturthe mantrohaprasaṅgāpatito
vicāraḥ | daśama iti | prathame bādhaheturdvāralopaḥ | yathā yatra vediniṣpādana-
rūpaṃ dvāraṃ nāsti tatra vediniṣpādakānāmuddhananādikarmaṇāmarthādbādho bhavati |
yathā ca yatra na dhānyasya vituṣīkaraṇaṃ tatrāvaghātasya bādhaḥ | dvitīye tasyaiva
dvāralopasya bahubhirudāharaṇairvistāraḥ | tṛtīye bādhakāraṇaṃ kāryaikatvam | yathā
prakṛtibhūte yāge gavāśvādidakṣiṇāyāḥ kāryaṃ ṛtvikparigraha uktaḥ | vikṛtibhūte
kasmiṃścidyāge tu tasmā eva kāryāya dhenudakṣiṇoktā | tayā ca prakṛtivadityati-
deśaprāptāyā gavāśvādidakṣiṇāyā bādhaḥ | caturthe yatra bādhakāraṇaṃ nāsti tatra
samuccaya uktaḥ | pañcame bādhaprasaṅgena grahādivicāraḥ | ṣaṣṭhe bādhaprasaṅgena sāmavi-
cāraḥ | saptame bādhaprasaṅgenetarasāmānyavicāraḥ | aṣṭame bādhopayukto nañarthavi-
cāraḥ | ekādaśa iti | sakṛdanuṣṭhānena siddhistantram | tanyate vistāryate bahūnāmu-
pakāro yena sakṛtpravartitena tattantram | anekoddeśena sakṛdanuṣṭhānaṃ tantram | yatsakṛ-
tkṛtaṃ bahūnupakaroti | yathā bahūnāṃ madhye sthāpito dīpaḥ | yastvāvṛttyā bahūnupakaro-
ti sa āvāpaḥ | yathā bahūnāṃ bhojanam | prasaṅgastvanyoddeśenānyadīyasyāpi sahā-
nuṣṭhānamiti bhedaḥ | tatra prathame pāde tantrasyopoddhātaḥ | dvitīye tantrāvāpau | tṛtīye
tantravistāraḥ | caturtha āvāpavistāraḥ | dvādaśa iti | ekoddeśenānuṣṭhitamapi
kiṃcidaṅgaṃ yaddeśakālakartraikye satyanuddeśyamapyupakaroti sa prasaṅga ityucyate | tatra
prathame prasaṅgavicāraḥ | dvitīye tantriṇāṃ nirṇayaḥ | tantraṃ sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ | sādhā-
raṇoṅgakalāpaḥ | sa yeṣāṃ te tantriṇaḥ | tṛtīye samuccayaḥ | caturthe vikalpaḥ |
evaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa dvādaśādhyāyapādārthāḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ |

athāta iti | śrutipratipādito yāgādirdharmaḥ | tasya jijñāsā vicāraḥ |
yatodhyayanasyārthajñānaṃ phalamato gurukulasthitipūrvakavedādhyayanānantaraṃ dharmavicāraḥ
kartavya iti sūtrārthaḥ | adhikaraṇamavāntaraprakaraṇam | viṣayeti | yamadhikṛtya
vicāraḥ pravartate sa viṣayaḥ | koṭidvayāvagāhijñānaṃ saṃśayaḥ | koṭidvayaṃ ca kva-
cidbhāvarūpam | yathāyaṃ sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti | kvacidbhāvābhāvarūpam | yathātra
manuṣyosti na veti | dvayapadamanekopalakṣakam | vādipratipāditaṃ mataṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ |
siddhānto nirṇayaḥ | saṃgatiśca śāstrasaṃgatiradhyāyasaṃgatiḥ pādasaṃgatiśceti
tridhā | sā cāyaṃ vicārosmiṃñchāstresminnadhyāyesminpāde kartuṃ yukta ityevaṃrūpā |
tathā pūrvottarādhikaraṇayoḥ parasparamavāntarasaṃgatiśceti | bhaṭṭaistu saṃgatiradhikara-
ṇāṅgatvena noktā kiṃ tūttaram | vādimatanirāsakaṃ vākyamuttaram | nirāsaścāsadutta-
reṇāpi bhavatītyato nirṇayasyottarāpekṣayā pārthakyena gaṇanam | taduktam —

viṣayo viśayaścaiva pūrvapakṣastathottaram |
nirṇayaśceti pañcāṅgaṃ śāstredhikaraṇaṃ smṛtam || iti |
viśayaḥ saṃśayaḥ |

ācāryamateti | idameva bhaṭṭamatamityucyate | adhyayanavidheriti |
svādhyāyodhyetavya ityadhyayanavidhirdṛṣṭārthaḥ | dṛṣṭorthaḥ prayojanamarthāvabodharūpaṃ
yasya tādṛśaḥ | adhyayanaṃ cācāryakṛttoccāraṇānusāreṇa tatsamānānupūrvīkamuccā-
raṇam | tatraiva kevalaṃ nādhyayanavidhestātparyam | kiṃ tu tadarthajñānarūpadṛṣṭaphalaparya-
ntamapi | arthajñānaṃ ca vicāraṃ vinā na saṃbhavatītyato vicāraśāstrametajjaimini-
proktaṃ vidhyanugrahādārambhaṇīyaṃ bhavati | yadi ca svargādirūpādṛṣṭaphalārtha eva
vidhirna tu tasyārthajñānarūpadṛṣṭaphalaparyantaṃ tātparyaṃ tarhi vicārasyānāvaśyakatvena
vicāraśāstrasya vidhyanugrahābhāvena vaidhatvābhāvādanārambhaṇīyatvaṃ bhavati | kima-
tyantamiti | svādhyāyodhyetavya iti vidhiḥ kimapūrvavidhiratha vā niya-
mavidhiriti saṃśayaḥ | yasya yadarthatvaṃ pramāṇāntarejāprāptaṃ tasya tadarthatvena yo
vidhiḥ so'pūrvavidhiḥ | yathā yajeta svargakāma ityādiḥ | yāgasya hi svargā-
rthatvaṃ na pramāṇāntareṇa prāptaṃ kiṃ tvanenaiva vidhineti bhavatyayamapūrvavidhiḥ |
pakṣe'prāptasya tu yo vidhiḥ sa niyamavidhiḥ | yathā vrīhīnavahanti ityādiḥ |
anena hi vidhināvaghātasya na vaituṣyārthatvaṃ bodhyate | avaghātena tuṣarāhi-
tyasya lokataḥ siddhatvāt | kiṃ tu niyamaḥ | sa cāprāptāṃśapūraṇam | vaituṣyasya
hi nānopāyasādhyatvādyadāvaghātaṃ parihṛtyopāyāntaraṃ grahītumārabhate tadāva-
ghātasyāprāptatvena tadvidhānātmakamaprāptāṃśapūraṇamevānena vidhinā kriyate | ato
bhavatyayaṃ niyamavidhiḥ | aprāptāṃśapūraṇameva niyamapadenocyate | nakhavidala-
nādineti | ādipadenāvaghātasaṃgrahaḥ | vidhinā niyamyata iti | yadā
gurūpadeśaṃ parityajya kevalaṃ likhitapāṭhenārthajñānāya pravartate tadādhyayanasyā-
prāptasya vidhānamiti pakṣe'prāptasyādhyayanasya niyamavidhirityarthaḥ | caturasra-
miti | caturasraśabdaḥ sādhvarthopalakṣakaḥ | caturasraṃ hi vastu sādhu dṛśyate |
naitatsādhūcyata ityarthaḥ | avaghātaniṣpannaireveti | puro dāśyate dīyata iti
puroḍāśo havirdravyaviśeṣaḥ | taṇḍulādicūrṇanirmitaroṭikāviśeṣaḥ | apūrvaṃ
puṇyam | tacca mukhyaṃ svargādihetubhūtaṃ darśapūrṇamāsādiyāgādutpadyate | tadu-
tpattau sahāyabhūtaṃ cāvāntarāpūrvam | taccāvaghātādibhirjanyate | adṛṣṭavastuna
utpattau kāryakāraṇabhāvaśca śāstrabalādeva kalpanīyaḥ | avaghātaniyamajanya-
syādṛṣṭasyākalpane kalpitasya vā tasya mukhyāpūrvotpattau sāhāyyasaṃpādanābhāve-
vaghātavidhiśāstraṃ vyarthaṃ syāt | vituṣīkaraṇāya tu na vidherāvaśyakatā | lokataḥ
siddhatvāt | tathā ca śrutyā yovaghātaniyamaḥ kṛtastatra darśapūrṇamāsajanyaṃ
mukhyamapūrvaṃ heturiti siddham | svādhyāyodhyetavya iti niyamaśca nārthajñānāya
kṛta iti vaktuṃ śakyate | adhyayanaṃ vināpi likhitapāṭhenārthajñānasya darśanāt |
arthajñāne ca sati yajñādikarmānuṣṭhātuṃ śakyata eva | tathā ca yathā vituṣīkara-
ṇārthāvadhātaniyamajanyāvāntarāpūrvasyāsvīkāre mukhyāpūrvaṃ notpadyata iti mukhyā-
pūrvamevāvāntarāpūrvasvīkāre hetustathātrārthajñānārthādhyayananiyamajanyāvāntarāpūrva-
svīkāre na kaściddheturdṛśyate | adhyayanavidhervaiyarthyaṃ tu na śaṅkyam | viśvaji-
nnyāyena svargādiphalasya kalpanīyatvāt | tathā cāyamapūrvavidhiḥ syāt | yato-
dhyayanasya svargārthatvametadvidhiṃ vinā na jñāyate | naitāvatātra vidhikaraṇertha-
jñānamuddeśa ityarthajñānasya vaidhatvābhāvenārthajñānopayoginosya mīmāṃsāśāstra-
syāpi na vaidhatvamityanārambhaṇīyatvaṃ siddhamiti pūrvapakṣāśayaḥ | svargaphalaka
iti | apūrvotpādanadvāreti bhāvaḥ | mātrapadenārthajñānanirāsaḥ | viśvajinnyāya-
mupapādayati — yatheti | sa svarga iti | sa duḥkhāsaṃbhinnaniratiśayasukhāspa-
dabhūtaḥ svargo viśvajidyāgasya phalaṃ syāt | sakāmānsarvānpratyaviśeṣāditi
sūtrārthaḥ | viśvajitā yajeteti vidhāvamukakāma ityevaṃ kartṛviśeṣaṇasyānirdeśā-
dviśvajidyāge kodhikārītyapekṣāyāṃ kiṃcitphalaṃ parikalpya tādṛśaphalakāmodhi-
kārīti vaktavyam | tacca kalpyamānaṃ yatsarvairabhilaṣyate tadeva kalpanīyamiti svargo
viśvajidyāgasya phalaṃ kalpyate | svargasukhasya sarvairabhilaṣaṇīyatvāt | ayameva
viśvajinnyāyaḥ | vināpīti | vidhiṃ vināpyarthajñānasya dṛṣṭasyādhyayanaphalasya
lokata eva lābhānna vidherdṛṣṭaphalārthatvam | kiṃ tvadhyayanavidhisāmarthyādviśvaji-
nnyāyena svargaḥ kalpanīya ityarthaḥ | evaṃ ca sati | adhyayanavidherarthajñānaparyantaṃ
tātparyābhāve siddhe sati | snāyāditi | snānaṃ cātra vedādhyayanāntaraṃ gārha-
sthyādhikāraprayojakībhūtaḥ karmaviśeṣaḥ | ayameva samāvartanasaṃskāra ucyate |

adhyayanamarthāvabodhārthamiti svamatamupapādayati — siddhānta iti | śabda-
jñānasya likhitapāṭhenāpi prāptatvādanyataḥ prāptatvādityuktam | vajrahastenā-
pīti | vajrahasta indraḥ | niyamavidhipakṣotra vajreṇāpi dūrīkartuṃ na śakyata
ityarthaḥ | apahastanamapalāpaḥ | tavyapratyaya iti | puruṣapravṛttirūpā yārthī
bhāvanā sā bhāvyā yasyāstādṛśīm | bhāvyaṃ sādhyatvenoddeśyam | abhidhābhāva-
netyatrābhidhāśabdenābhidhīyateneneti vyutpattyā śabda ucyate | tasya yā bhāvanā
sābhidhābhāvanā | bhāvanā ca vyāpāraviśeṣaḥ | tavyapratyayarūpasya śabdasya prera-
ṇārūpo yo vyāpāraḥ sobhidhābhāvanā | iyameva śābdī bhāvanetyucyate | iyaṃ
ca tavyapratyayavācyā | svādhyāyodhyetavya iti tavyapratyayarūpasya śabdasya śrava-
ṇeyaṃ śabdo māmadhyayanakarmaṇi prerayatīti pratīteḥ | yadyasmācchabdānniyamataḥ
pratīyate tattasya vācyam | iyaṃ ca preraṇā loka iva puruṣaniṣṭheti tu na bhramita-
vyam | vedasyānāditvena tatkartuḥ puruṣasyābhāvāt | tathā cābhidhābhāvanāyā
āśrayastavyapratyaya eva | sa eva ca tasyā vācakaḥ | abhidhābhāvanayā cādhya-
