prāptāpyanavasthā doṣāya na bhavati | gatyantarābhāvāt | tathaivātrānavasthā na doṣā-
yeti śaṅkāśayaḥ | pramāṇābhāvāditi | yatra pratyakṣādipramāṇena dvayormithaḥ
kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ siddho bhavati tatra tayordvayormadhye prāthamyaṃ kasyetyākāṅkṣāyāṃ
pravāhānāditvaṃ svīkṛtyānavasthā na doṣāya bhavati | etāvāneva bījāṅkuranyā-
yasya viṣayaḥ | prakṛte tu pradhānasyāmukaṃ kāraṇamityatra na kiṃcitpramāṇamityaprā-
māṇikasya kāryakāraṇabhāvasya kalpanena prāptānavasthā doṣāyaiva syāditi bhāvaḥ |

abhimānohaṃkāra iti | ahamatrādhikṛto mamātra sāmarthyaṃ madarthā ime
viṣayā ahamamukosmītyādirabhimānātmako'sādhāraṇavyāpāro yasya sohaṃkāra
ityarthaḥ | vyāpāravyāpāravatorabhedavivakṣayābhimānohaṃkāra ityuktam | tasmā-
dahaṃkārāddvividhaḥ sargaḥ pravartate | prakāśakajaḍabhedena dvividhā sṛṣṭirjāyate |
tadeva prakāradvayamāha — ekādaśeti | ekādaśakaśca gaṇa iti pāṭhe ekādaśasaṃkhyā
parimāṇamasyetyekādaśakaḥ | ekādaśaśabdāttadasya parimāṇamityarthe saṃkhyāyā ati-
śadantāyāḥ kan (pā. sū. 5 | 1 | 22) ityanena kanpratyayaḥ | pañcajñānendriyapañca-
karmendriyamanasāṃ prakāśakānāmekādaśānāṃ gaṇa ekaḥ | śabdatanmātrādīnāṃ
jaḍānāṃ pañcānāṃ gaṇoparaḥ | nanvahaṃkārādekarūpātkāraṇātkathaṃ jaḍaprakāśakayo-
rmitho vilakṣaṇayorutpattirityata āha — sāttvika iti | ekopyahaṃkāraḥ
sattvarajastamasāṃ guṇānāmudbhavābhibhavābhyāṃ bhinnastrividho bhavati | tatraikaḥ sattva- 14|24 — ekādaśakaśca for ekādaśakaraṇa A.
pradhāno vaikṛtasaṃjñakaḥ | tasmātsattvapradhāna ekādaśendriyagaṇa utpadyate |
bhūtāderahaṃkārātpañcatanmātrotpattiḥ | yataḥ sa bhūtādistāmasastamoguṇapradhānaḥ |
ayaṃ dvitīyaḥ | tanmātrāṇi santyasmingaṇa iti tanmātraḥ | arśaāditvānma-
tvarthīyocpratyayaḥ | rajaḥpradhānastaijasastṛtīyaḥ | tasya kāryaṃ tu noktābhyāmanya-
ttṛtīyaṃ kiṃcit | kiṃ tvindriyagaṇastanmātragaṇaśceti sāttvikatāmasayoḥ kāryameva
rājasasya kāryam | yataḥ sattvaguṇastamoguṇaśca samarthopi kriyārahitatvānna
tāvatkāryaṃ karoti yāvattaṃ na rajoguṇaścālayati | tathā ca rājasohaṃkāra itarayoḥ
kriyotpādanadvāreṇa sāhāyyakārīti tātparyam | buddhīndriyāṇīti | indra-
śabda ātmavācī | tasya cihnamindriyam | indriyapravṛttyā hyātmānumīyate |
indriyaśabdaśca sāttvikāhaṃkārakārye yogarūḍhaḥ | tena nāhaṃkāretivyāptiḥ
śaṅkanīyā | ubhayātmakamiti | jñānendriyāṇāṃ karmendriyāṇāṃ ca pravartakatvānmanaḥ
svayaṃ jñānendriyaṃ karmendriyaṃ cetyarthaḥ | tallakṣayati — saṃkalpakamiti | samyakkalpa-
yatīti saṃkalpakam | manaḥsaṃbaddhenendriyeṇa pūrvaṃ sāmānyarūpeṇālocitaṃ vastu
paścādidamīdṛśaṃ nedṛśamiti samyakkalpayati manaḥ | samyakkalpanaṃ ca viśeṣaṇa-
viśeṣyabhāvena vivecanam | tacca manaścakṣurādibhiḥ saha sāttvikāhaṃkārakāryatva-
rūpasādharmyeṇendriyamucyate | indriyaśabdasya tatraiva yogarūḍhyaṅgīkārādityāśayaḥ |
etatsarvaṃ sāṃkhyatattvakaumudyāṃ spaṣṭam | tadevāha — vivṛtaṃ ceti |

goghaṭādīnāmiti | vivekajñānaṃ hi mokṣasādhanam | vivekaśca bhedaḥ | sa
ca yasya yasmāttayordvayorjñāne satyeva jñātuṃ śakyate nānyathā | taddvayaṃ ca prakṛti-
puruṣarūpaṃ tattvaśabdenocyate | ata eva tattvajñānānmokṣa iti pravādaḥ | tathā
ca vivekajñāne pratiyogitvenānuyogitvena vā yasya saṃbandhastattattvamiti tattva-
sāmānyalakṣaṇam | tatra mūlaprakṛteratyantasūkṣmatvena durjñeyatayā tato bhedaḥ puruṣe
puruṣādvā tatra bhedo durjñeya iti tadarthaṃ prakṛtikāryajñānamāvaśyakam | kāryabhedena
hi kāraṇabhedānumānasaṃbhavāt | prakṛteḥ sākṣātkāryaṃ mahattattvam | taddvārāhaṃkāraḥ |
taddvārā ca pañcatanmātrāṇi | etatsaptakamapi sūkṣmamiti na viśadatayā jñātuṃ
śakyate | ataḥ prakṛteḥ paraṃparayā kāryabhūto viśadatayā jñātuṃ śakyaścendriyāṇāṃ
bhūtānāṃ ca gaṇovaśyaṃ tattvarūpeṇa varṇanīyaḥ | ayaṃ viśadatayā jñātuṃ śakyaḥ
ṣoḍaśako vikāragaṇastena tena svakāryaviśeṣarūpeṇa jñātaḥ svasmātpuruṣe bhedaṃ
grāhayansvakāraṇādapi prakṛtiparyantātpuruṣe bhedaṃ grāhayati | bhautikānāṃ goghaṭā-
dīnāṃ tvānantyātteṣāṃ bhedajñāpakaṃ viśeṣarūpeṇa jñānamaśakyam | anupayogi ca
mokṣasādhanībhūtabhedajñāne | bhūtebhyaḥ sakāśādātmano bhedena jñāne sati bhauti-
kebhyaḥ sakāśāttasya bhedena jñānamakiṃcitkaram | puruṣo hi nirviśeṣo vidhimu-
khena jñātumaśakyo nedṛśastādṛśa ityevaṃ niṣedhamukhenaiva jñāpanīyaḥ | sa ca yathā
sthūlebhya indriyagrāhyebhyaśca bhūtebhyaḥ sakāśādbhedena jñāyamānaḥ puruṣo na sthūlo
nāpīndriyagrāhya ityevaṃ jñāyate tena ca sthaulyādayastatra niṣiddhā bhavanti tathā
bhautikebhyaḥ sakāśātpuruṣasya bhedajñāne tatra kedhikā dharmā niṣiddhāḥ syurye
bhūtebhyo bhedajñānepyaniṣiddhāḥ | na kepi tādṛśā dharmāḥ puruṣe bhāsanta ityato
bhautikānāṃ mokṣasādhanībhūtavivekajñāne na pratiyogitvena nāpyanuyogitvena
saṃbandha iti na goghaṭādīnāṃ bhautikānāṃ tattvāntaratvamiti bhāvaḥ | prakṛterma-
hāniti | jāyata iti śeṣaḥ | atra ṣoḍaśako gaṇa ekādaśendriyāṇi pañca
tanmātrāṇi ca | ṣoḍaśasaṃkhyā parimāṇamasyeti ṣoḍaśakaḥ | ṣoḍaśaśabdātkan
pratyayaḥ | tasmādapi ṣoḍaśakānniṣkṛṣṭebhyaḥ pañcabhyastanmātrebhyaḥ sakāśātpañca
bhūtāni jāyante | niṣkṛṣṭebhya ityadhyāhāraḥ |

dṛṣṭamiti | dṛṣṭaṃ pratyakṣam | āptavacanamāptavākyaṃ śabdaḥ | pratyakṣamanumānaṃ
śabdaśceti trividhaṃ pramāṇabhiṣṭam | ebhistribhireva sarveṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ siddhatvāt |
upamānādīnāṃ pramāṇāntarāṇāṃ triṣvevāntarbhāvāt | prameyasya prakṛtyāditattva-
jātasya siddhiḥ pratītiḥ pramāṇādbhavati | tatra viṣayasaṃnikṛṣṭenendriyeṇa saha
manaso viṣayadeśe jāyamānā viṣayākārā vṛttiḥ pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam | sā ca
vṛttistatraivātmani pratibimbate | ātmano vibhutvāt | tādṛśavṛttipratibimbāva-
cchinnaṃ caitanyaṃ pratyakṣapramā | evaṃ vyāptijñānajanyā sādhyaviśiṣṭapakṣākārā mano-
vṛttiranumānaṃ pramāṇam | tādṛśavṛttipratibimbāvacchinnaṃ caitanyamanumitiḥ |
āptavākyajñānajanyā padārthasaṃsargākārā manovṛttiḥ śabdapramāṇam | tatpratibi-
mbāvacchinnaṃ caitanyaṃ śābdajñānam | aparokṣatvaṃ parokṣatvaṃ smṛtitvaṃ saṃśayatvaṃ
viparyayatvamityādayo vṛttidharmā eva tatpratibimbarūpopādhivaśādātmacaitanye
bhāsante | etatsarvaṃ vijñānācāryaiḥ kārikāyāmuktam —

lg.l: pramātā cetanaḥ śuddhaḥ pramāṇaṃ vṛttireva ca |

div.p:
pratibimbitavṛttīnāṃ viṣayo meya ucyate |
vṛttayaḥ sākṣibhāsyāḥ syuḥ karaṇasyānapekṣaṇāt ||
sākṣāddarśanarūpaṃ ca sākṣitvaṃ sāṃkhyasūtritam || iti |
jñānasya janyatvaṃ vināśitvamātmadharmatvaṃ pratibimbopādhikaṃ na vastutaḥ | ātma-
rūpasya jñānasya nityatvāt |

athaibhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ pañcaviṃśatitattvāni sādhanīyāni | tatra prathamasya pradhāna-
rūpatattvasya sādhakamanumānam | tacca sataḥ sajjāyata ityevaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvamu-
pajīvya pravartate iti tadarthaṃ tādṛśaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ prasthāpayankāryakāraṇabhāve
vipratipattiṃ pradarśayati — iheti | caturdheti | idaṃ sarvaṃ jagatkāryaṃ tasya mūlakā-
raṇaṃ cetyanayordvayoḥ sattvāsattvabhedena kāryakāraṇabhāve catvāraḥ kalpā bhavanti |
asataḥ kāraṇātsakāśādasatkāryaṃ jāyata ityekaḥ | asataḥ sakāśātsadityaparaḥ |
sataḥ sakāśādasaditi tṛtīyaḥ | sataḥ sakāśātsaditi caturthaḥ | tatra prathamo
na saṃbhavati | asatastucchasya kāryasya śaśaviṣāṇasyevotpattyasaṃbhavāt | asataḥ
kāraṇātsataḥ kāryasyotpattiriti pakṣo bauddhānām | te hi sarvaṃ bhāvarūpaṃ vastu
kṣaṇikamiti manyante | kṣaṇikabhāvayormadhye ca na kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ | kāryakṣaṇe
kāraṇasya kāraṇakṣaṇe ca kāryasyāsattvāt | ataḥ pūrvakṣaṇikabhāvasya vināśa
evottarakṣaṇikakāryasya kāraṇamityagatyāṅgīkartavyam | kāryasya sattvaṃ ca bauddhamate
kṣaṇamavasthitirūpameva na tu kālatrayābādhyatvādikam | sataḥ sakāśādasatkā-
ryamutpadyata iti tṛtīyaḥ kalpo māyāvādināṃ vedāntinām | tanmate ghaṭapaṭādi-
kāryaṃ vyāvahārikasattāśrayībhūtamapi pāramārthikatvābhāvādasaducyate na tu śaśa-
viṣāṇavattucchatvāt | tena na kāryasyotpattyasaṃbhavaḥ | kāryaṃ ca jagattanmate
mūlakāraṇasya brahmaṇo vivarto na tu pariṇāmaḥ | vivartatvāttasyābhāsamātramiti
na tasya pāramārthikatvam | vyāvahārikarūpeṇa sattvaṃ tu kāryasyeṣṭameva | tadabhi-
prāyeṇa tu sataḥ sakāśātsatkāryamutpadyata iti caturthaḥ pakṣopi tanmate vaktuṃ
śakyate | yadā ca kāryasya sattvaṃ paramārthikaṃ gṛhyate tadāyaṃ caturthaḥ pakṣo naiyā-
yikānāṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ ca | tatraitāvānviśeṣaḥ | naiyāyikā hi vināśinopi
kāryasya kiṃcitkālaparyantamavasthitatvāddhaṭapaṭādīnāṃ pāramārthikatvaṃ manyante |
sāṃkhyāstu kālatrayābādhyatvena pāramārthikatvaṃ manyanta iti | tadatra prāguktakalpa-
catuṣṭayamadhye prathamaḥ pakṣo na saṃbhavati | avaśiṣṭakalpatrayamadhyentimaḥ pāramā-
rthikatvadvaidhena dvidhā bhavatītyevaṃ saṃkalanayā saṃbhavantaścatvāraḥ pakṣāścaturdhetyanena
nirdiṣṭā iti bodhyam | saugatāḥ | bauddhāḥ | sugato buddhaḥ | tasyedam (pā. sū.
4 | 3 | 120) iti sūtreṇāṇpratyayaḥ | sato'saditi | utpatteḥ pūrvamasaddhaṭā-
di kāryaṃ sato mṛdādikāraṇakalāpātsakāśājjāyata iti naiyāyikādayaḥ saṃgi-
ranta ityarthaḥ | ādiśabdena vaiśeṣikasaṃgrahaḥ | vedāntina iti | advaitavedā-
ntino māyāvādinaḥ śaṃkarācāryānusāriṇa ityarthaḥ | vivarta iti | aparitya-
ktasvarūpe vastuni bhāsamānaṃ rūpāntaraṃ vivartaḥ |

bauddhābhimataṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ khaṇḍayati — tatrāsata iti | tucchātuccha-
yoriti | tucchaṃ niḥsvarūpam | pūrvakṣaṇikaghaṭasyābhāva uttarakṣaṇikaghaṭasyopādā-
nakāraṇamiti hi bauddhā vadanti | abhāvasya ca svarūparahitasyātucchenottarakṣa-
ṇikabhāvena ghaṭādinā tādātmyaṃ na saṃbhavati | tādātmyābhāve ca naivopādāno-
pādeyabhāvasaṃbhavaḥ |

naiyāyikābhimataṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ khaṇḍayati — nāpīti | pūrvamasaddhaṭādikāryaṃ
sato mṛdādikāraṇakalāpādutpadyata ityapi pakṣo na saṃbhavati | yata utpattirnāma
sattayā saha saṃbandhaḥ | saṃbandhaśca dvayoḥ satoreva saṃbhavati na sadasatoḥ | na hi
śaśaviṣāṇasyāmukena saha saṃbandho jāta iti vaktuṃ śakyate | tathā pūrvamasato
ghaṭādikāryasya sattayā saha saṃbandho na saṃbhavatīti sattāsaṃbandharūpā ghaṭādikā-
ryasyotpattirnopapadyate | na hi pūrvamasaddhaṭādikaṃ kulālādikārakavyāpāreṇāpi
sadrūpaṃ bhavet | nīlapītayoriva sadasatorvirodhāt | ghaṭasya dharmāviti | tathā
ca yathā kaṭakatvadharmaviśiṣṭaṃ suvarṇaṃ suvarṇakāravyāpāreṇa kuṇḍalatvadharmabhāgbhavati
tathātrāsattvadharmaviśiṣṭo ghaṭaḥ kulālādivyāpāreṇa sattvadharmabhāgbhavatītyāśayaḥ |
asatīti | asattvaṃ ghaṭadharmaśceddharmasya dharmiṇamantareṇa sthityabhāvādasattvadharma-
kāle dharmiṇo ghaṭasya sattvāpatterdharmiṇo nityatvaṃ prasajyata iti bhāvaḥ |

upasaṃharansāṃkhyābhimataṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ pradarśayati — tasmāditi | nanu yadi
ghaṭādi kāryaṃ prāgapi sadeva tarhi kimarthaṃ kulālādikārakavyāpāra iti cettatrāha —
sataśceti | sata eva ghaṭādikāryasya kārakavyāpārātprāganabhivyaktasya kāraka-
vyāpāreṇa kevalamabhivyaktirbhavati | tatra dṛṣṭāntamāha — yatheti | tileṣu vidya-
mānasyaiva tailasya tilapīḍanavyāpāraḥ kevalamabhivyañjakatvātkāraṇaṃ bhavati |
gavāmudare vidyamānasyaiva dugdhasya godohanavyāpāraḥ kevalamabhivyañjakatvātkāraṇaṃ
bhavati | asata iti | nidarśanaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ | avidyamānasya kāryasyedaṃ kāraṇa-
mityatra na kaściddṛṣṭāntosti | na cāsato ghaṭāderdaṇḍādikaṃ kāraṇaṃ dṛśyata iti
dṛṣṭāntostīti vācyam | ubhayavādisaṃmatasyaiva dṛṣṭāntatvāt | sāṃkhyaistu ghaṭādi
kāryaṃ prākkāraṇarūpeṇa sadeveti svīkriyate | kiṃ ceti | mṛdādikaṃ kāraṇaṃ
ghaṭādinā kāryeṇa saha saṃbaddhaṃ saddhaṭādikāryamutpādayatyutāsaṃbaddham | saṃbaddhaṃ
cettadānīṃ saṃbandhino ghaṭādeḥ sattvamavaśyaṃbhāvi | asaṃbaddhaṃ cedyathā mṛdādikaṃ
kāraṇaṃ svāsaṃbaddhamapi ghaṭamutpādayati tathā paṭādikamapyutpādayet | asattvā-
diti | sattvena sattvadharmeṇa saha saṅgaḥ saṃbandho yeṣāṃ tādṛśaiḥ sattvarūpadharmavi-
śiṣṭaiḥ | sadbhiriti yāvat | tādṛśairmṛdādikāraṇaiḥ saha kāryasyotpatteḥ pūrvaṃ saṃbandho
nāsti | naiyāyikamate utpatteḥ pūrvaṃ ghaṭādikāryasyāsattvāt | asaṃbaddhamapyutpadyata
ityucyate cenmṛdādikāraṇakalāpāddhaṭasyaivotpattirna paṭādīnāmiti vyavasthā na
syādityarthaḥ | asaṃbaddhamapīti | kāryeṇa sahāsaṃbaddhamapi tatkāraṇaṃ tadeva kāryaṃ
janayati yatkāraṇaṃ yatra kārye śaktam | mṛdrūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ hi ghaṭotpādana eva samarthaṃ
na tu paṭotpādana iti ghaṭamevotpādayati na paṭam | śaktiḥ kāryotpādanasāma-
rthyam | mṛttikāyā ghaṭotpādana eva śaktirna paṭotpādana iti tu mṛttikāto
jāyamānaṃ ghaṭādi kāryaṃ dṛṣṭvānumeyam | tathā ca mṛttikāyāṃ svābhāvikyeva ghaṭo-
tpādanaśaktiḥ paścāddhaṭādikāryadarśanena kevalamanumīyata ityāśayaḥ | tile-
ṣviti | tailotpatteḥ prāgapi vidyamānāyāstilagataśaktestailotpattiṃ dṛṣṭvā paścāda-
numānena jñānamastu nāma | paraṃ tu prāgvidyamānā yā tilagataśaktiḥ sā tadānīṃ
tailena saha saṃbaddhā na vā | ādye tailasyotpatteḥ pūrvaṃ sattvaṃ durvāram | dvitīye tviyaṃ
tailotpādanaśaktiriti nirūpayituṃ na śakyate | tathā cāsaṃbhavinorthasya nānumāne-
nāpi jñānaṃ yujyata iti bhāvaḥ | atha hetvantareṇa kāryasyotpatteḥ prāksattvaṃ sādha-
yati — kāryeti | kāryakāraṇayorabhede hyekaiva sattā na tu sattādvayam | tathā ca
kāryasyotpatteḥ prākkāraṇasattāyā vidyamānatvena tadabhinnā kāryasattāpi tadānī-
mavarjanīyeti bhāvaḥ | taddharmatvāditi | paṭasya tantvavasthāviśeṣarūpatvena
tantudharmatvaṃ bodhyam | yo yadabhinno na bhavati sa tasya dharmopi na bhavati yathā
goḥ sakāśādaśvaḥ | śaṅkate — tarhīti | tantubhyaḥ sakāśātpaṭasyārthāntaratvābhāve
satītyarthaḥ | prāvaraṇakāryamiti | prāvaraṇarūpaṃ kāryamityarthaḥ | prāvaraṇasya
śītāpanodanādikaṃ kāryamiti vā | saṃsthāneti | saṃsthānamavayavasaṃniveśavi-
śeṣaḥ | tantuṣu pūrvaṃ vidyamānopi paṭabhāvo vānenāvayavasaṃniveśaviśeṣe satyāvi-
rbhavati | paṭabhāvaḥ paṭatvam | arthaḥ padārthaḥ | paṭarūpapadārthasya yā prāvaraṇarūpā
kriyetyarthaḥ | atha vārthaḥ prayojanaṃ kāryamiti yāvat | paṭakāryabhūtā prāvaraṇarūpā
yā kriyetyarthaḥ | tādṛśakriyākāritvaṃ tantūnāṃ paṭabhāvāvirbhāvottaramupapadyata
ityarthaḥ | niḥsarantīti | niḥsaracchabdasya prathamābahuvacanam | aṅgānītyanuṣajyate |
nāsata iti | asato'vidyamānasya bhāvaḥ sattā na vidyate | tathā sato vidyamāna-
syābhāvo'vidyamānatā na vidyate nāsti | yatsattatsarvadā sadeva yaccāsattadasadeveti
tātparyam | taduktamiti | kārakavyāpārātprāgasataḥ (da. 14 paṃ. 60) ityādi-
granthena naiyāyikābhimatāsatkāryavādanirāsadvārā kāryasyotpatteḥ prāksattvaṃ yatsā-
dhitaṃ tadeveśvarakṛṣṇena sāṃkhyakārikāyāmuktamityarthaḥ | asadakaraṇāditi | kāryaṃ
kāraṇavyāpārātprāgapi sadeva | kutaḥ | asadakaraṇāt | asataḥ karaṇaṃ na kenāpi
kartuṃ śakyate | karaṇaṃ kriyā utpattiḥ | sattayā saha saṃbandha iti yāvat | tathā —
upādānagrahaṇāt | upādānāni kāraṇāni | teṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ kāryeṇa saha saṃbandhaḥ |
kāraṇaṃ hi kāryeṇa saha saṃbaddhameva kāryaṃ janayati | kāryasya prāgasattve tu tena saha
kāraṇasya saṃbandho na saṃbhavati | kāryeṇa saha saṃbaddhameva kāraṇaṃ kāryotpādaka-
mityatra kiṃ niyāmakamityāśaṅkyāha — sarvasaṃbhavābhāvāt | kāryeṇa sahāsaṃbaddha-
syāpi kāraṇasya kāryotpādakatvāṅgīkāre sarvaṃ kāryajātaṃ sarvasmādbhavet | na tu
tathā dṛśyate | loke tu mṛttikāyā eva ghaṭastantubhya eva paṭaḥ suvarṇādeva
kaṭakamityevaṃ kāraṇaviśeṣātkāryaviśeṣotpattirdṛśyate | atha kāryaviśeṣaniyamārthaḥ
kāraṇe kaścicchaktiviśeṣaḥ kalpyate | yena ca śaktiviśiṣṭatvācchaktaṃ kāraṇaṃ
svaśakyasyaiva kāryasyotpādakaṃ nānyasyeti cetkāryasya prāksattvaṃ sidhyatyevetyāha —
śaktasya śakyakaraṇāditi | mṛdi kalpyamānaḥ śaktiviśeṣo ghaṭasaṃbaddhaśced ghaṭameva
janayennānyathā | ghaṭasaṃbandhaśca ghaṭamantareṇa na saṃbhavatīti ghaṭasyotpatteḥ prāksattvaṃ
sidhyati | kāraṇabhāvācca kāryasya prāksattvaṃ sidhyati | bhāvaśabdaḥ svarūpavācī |
kāryakāraṇayorabhedena kāryasya kāraṇasvarūpatvātkāryotpatteḥ prākkāraṇasya sattve
tadānīṃ kāryasya sattvamavarjanīyameveti kārikārthaḥ |

advaitavedāntibhirmāyāvādibhiruktaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ khaṇḍayati — nāpi sata
iti | yathā śuktau rajataṃ bhāsate tathā brahmaṇi prapañco bhāsata iti vaktumaśa-
kyam | nedaṃ rajatamitivannāyaṃ prapañca iti bādhasyānupalambhāt | adhiṣṭhāneti |
adhiṣṭhānamāropasya cidrūpaṃ brahma | tasminnāropyo jaḍaḥ prapañcaḥ | cijjaḍayośca
mitho vilakṣaṇatvena prasiddhayorāropahetubhūtasārūpyābhāvena brahmaṇi prapañcasyā-
ropo na saṃbhavati | kaladhautaṃ rūpyam | tasya śukteśca śvetatvena samānaṃ rūpam |
atastatrāropaḥ saṃbhavati | kaladhautaśuktyādivaditi vaidharmye dṛṣṭāntaḥ |
kaladhautarūpyādivaditipāṭhe kaladhautaṃ kathila iti mahārāṣṭrabhāṣāyāṃ prasiddho
dhātuviśeṣaḥ | tatra rūpyasyāropo jāyate | dvayoḥ śvetatvena sārūpyam | atha vā
sādharmye eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ | kaladhautaṃ suvarṇam | suvarṇarūpyayośca pītaśvetayorāropa-
prayojakasārūpyābhāvena yathā suvarṇe rūpyasya rūpye vā suvarṇasyāropo na
saṃbhavati tathetyarthaḥ |

evaṃ bauddhairnaiyāyikairadvaitavedāntibhiśca pradarśitaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ nirasyotpatteḥ
prāk sadeva kāryaṃ sataḥ kāraṇātsakāśādāvirbhavatītyevaṃrūpaṃ sāṃkhyābhimataṃ
kāryakāraṇabhāvamavalambya pūrvokteṣu pañcaviṃśatitattveṣu prathamaṃ pradhānamanumāna-
pramāṇena sādhayati — tataśceti | vimatamiti | vimataṃ sādhyatvena saṃdigdham |
saṃdigdhasādhyavānpakṣa iti pakṣalakṣaṇānusāreṇa vimatapadaṃ tatra tatra pakṣaviśeṣaṇata-
yocyate | bhāvajātaṃ padārthasamudāyaḥ | ayaṃ pakṣanirdeśaḥ | sukhaduḥkhamohā ātmā
svarūpaṃ yasya tādṛśaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasyeti bahuvrīhigarbho bahuvrīhiḥ | ayaṃ sādhyani-
rdeśaḥ | taiḥ sukhaduḥkhamohairanvitatvādyuktatvāt | ayaṃ hetunirdeśaḥ | anvīyate saṃba-
dhyate | rucakaṃ suvarṇapātram | nanvevamastu mūlakāraṇaṃ pradhānaṃ sukhaduḥkhamohayuktam |
tāvatā kathaṃ tasya triguṇātmakatvamityāha — tatreti | hetutvena pradarśitaṃ bhāva-
jātasya sukhaduḥkhamohānvitatvamupapādayati — tathā hīti | maitradāreṣviti |
maitro nāma kaścitpuruṣaḥ | tasya dārā anekāḥ striyaḥ | tāsāṃ madhye satyavatī-
nāmnī kācitstrī | sā ca bhartuḥ priyeti tasyāṃ vidyamānaḥ sattvaguṇo bhartāraṃ prati
prādurbhavati | atastasyāḥ sakāśādbhartuḥ sukhaṃ bhavati | sapatnīsaṃbandhe satyavatīgato
rajoguṇaḥ prādurbhavati | atastāsāṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavati | satyavatīmalabhamānasya tatprā-
ptyanicchoścaitrasya moho bhavati | taṃ prati satyavatīgatasya tamoguṇasya prādurbhā-
vāt | vaicitya iti | vaicityaṃ vigatacittatvaṃ cittarāhityamiti yāvat |
cittarāhityaṃ ca cittavṛttirāhityameva | svarūpataścittarāhityasyāsaṃbhavāt | ajā-
mekāmiti | yadyapyajāśabdaḥ paśuviśeṣarūpāyāṃ chāgāyāṃ rūḍhastathāpyatra mantre
rūḍhyarthasya grahaṇaṃ na saṃbhavati | adhyātmavidyādhikārāt | tathā ca yaugikārthasyai-
vātra grahaṇam | na jāyata ityajā mūlaprakṛtiḥ | sā ca notpadyate | nityatvā-
ttasyāḥ | ekā ca sā lohitaśuklakṛṣṇā ca | yadyapi lohitaśuklakṛṣṇaśabdā
varṇaparāḥ prasiddhāstathāpyatra lakṣaṇayā guṇatrayaparāḥ | lohitaṃ kusumbhādikaṃ
paṭādīn rañjayati | padārthagato rajoguṇopi prekṣamāṇaṃ rañjayati | tathā ca rañja-
katvasādharmyāllohitaśabdena rajoguṇo lakṣyate | tathā śukla ādityādiḥ padārthaḥ
prakāśakaḥ | sattvaguṇopi prakāśakaḥ | tathā ca prakāśakatvasādharmyācchuklaśabdena
sattvaguṇo lakṣyate | tathā kṛṣṇo meghādiḥ sūryādyāvarakaḥ | tamoguṇopyāvarakaḥ |
tathā cāvarakatvasādharmyātkṛṣṇaśabdena tamoguṇo lakṣyate | evaṃ ca lohita-
śuklakṛṣṇetyasya triguṇātmiketyarthaḥ paryavasannaḥ | sā ca triguṇātmikā mūlapra-
kṛtiḥ svasamānaṃ triguṇānvitaṃ rūpaṃ yāsāṃ tādṛśīrbahvīḥ prajāḥ sṛjati | sarvasya
padārthajātasya traiguṇyānvitatvamanupadamevoktam | ekojo baddhaḥ puruṣastāṃ
prakṛtiṃ juṣamāṇaḥ sevamānonuśetenusarati | prakṛtikāryaṃ buddhimanaādikamātma-
tvenopagamya saṃsarati | anyojo muktaḥ puruṣastvenāṃ bhuktabhogāṃ jahāti | atra
mantre pūrvārdhe triguṇātmikā mūlaprakṛtirabhidhīyate | uttarārdhe cātmabhedaḥ śrūyate |
tathā caitacchrutyanuguṇametaddarśanamiti sāṃkhyābhiprāyaḥ |

athācetanasya pradhānasya kevalasya kāryotpādane svātantryeṇa pravṛttimasahamānaḥ
śaṅkate — nanviti | pradhānaṃ svayamacetanatvāccetanena kenacidapreritatvācca mahatta-
ttvādikāryotpatyanuguṇaṃ vyāpāraṃ kartuṃ na prabhavati | loke tathā kvāpyadarśanāt | na
hyasaṃyojitāśvo rathaḥ svayaṃ gantuṃ prabhavati | dṛṣṭāccādṛṣṭasiddhiḥ | tathā ca pradhāna-
prerakatveneśvaroṅgīkartavya ityāśayaḥ | vatseti | yathā ajñasyācetanasyāpi kṣīrasya
vatsavivṛddhirūpaprayojanavatī pravṛttirjāyamānā loke dṛśyate tathā puruṣavimo-
kṣaṇopayoginī pradhānasya pravṛttiḥ kalpyata ityarthaḥ | nanu pradhānasya pravṛttyā kathaṃ
puruṣasya mokṣa iti cet-ucyate | duḥkhanivṛttirmokṣaḥ | duḥkhanivṛttiśca prakṛtipuruṣa-
vivekajñānādbhavati | tatra prakṛteratyantasūkṣmatvena durjñeyatayā tato vivekaḥ
puruṣasya duradhigamaḥ | prakṛteḥ pravṛttyanantaraṃ tu bhautikaṃ sthūlakāryaṃ viśadatayā
jñāyata iti tato bhedaḥ puruṣasya jñātuṃ śakyate | tatastatkāraṇebhyo bhūtebhyo bhedo
jñāyate tatastatkāraṇādityevaṃ krameṇa sthūlārundhatīnyāyena prakṛteḥ sakāśādbhedaḥ
sugrāhyo bhavatīti |

ādya iti | duḥkhasya śarīrasāpekṣatvājjīvānāṃ śarīrasattva eva duḥkhasaṃbhavo
nānyatheti bhāvaḥ | karuṇayeti | karuṇā paraduḥkhaprahāṇecchā | tayā ca pravṛtti-
rbhavati | puruṣārthaprayuktaḥ | puruṣārthopayogī | puruṣopīti | puruṣaśca svasmi-
nvidyamāno yaḥ prakṛtestatpariṇāmabhūtāyā buddheśca sakāśādbhedastasyāgrahādajñānātsvaṃ
buddhisvarūpaṃ manyamāno buddhigataṃ sukhādikaṃ svasyaiveti jānaṃstannivāraṇāya mokṣa-
mapekṣata ityarthaḥ | kaivalyaṃ mokṣaḥ | tatprakṛtīti | tatkaivalyaṃ prakṛtipuruṣabheda-
grahamūlakamiti tādṛśabhedagrahaṃ vinā na yuktamiti mokṣasādhanībhūtabhedajñānāya
bhedapratiyogibhūtaprakṛtyapekṣā puruṣasyeti bhāvaḥ | sārtheneti | samudāyena
sahetyarthaḥ | upaplavāt | corādikṛtopadravāt | skandhādhirūḍha iti |
samīhitaṃ sthānaṃ prapnotītyanuṣajyate | puruṣasyeti | pradhānasya svakarmakadarśa-
nārthaṃ puruṣāpekṣāyāṃ puruṣasya ca kaivalyārthaṃ pradhānāpekṣāyāmubhayoḥ pradhānapu-
ruṣayoḥ saṃyogo bhavati | paṅgvandhavat | yathā gatiśaktivihīnasya paṅgora-
bhīṣṭadeśaprāptyarthaṃ gatiśaktimatopekṣāyāmandhasya ca dṛkśaktihīnasya dṛkśaktimato-
pekṣāyāṃ saṃyogo bhavati tadvat | tādṛśasaṃyogakṛteyaṃ sṛṣṭirityarthaḥ | atra puruṣaḥ
kriyārahitatvātpaṅgutulyaḥ | pradhānaṃ cācetanatvādandhatulyam | tatra ca paṅgusaṃbandhā- 14|129 — prayukta for prayuktaḥ C.
dandho mārge yathā pravartate tathā puruṣasaṃbandhātpradhānaṃ pravartate | andhasaṃbandhācca
yathā paṅgurabhīṣṭaṃ deśaṃ prāpnoti tathā pradhānasaṃbandhātpuruṣo vivekajñānadvārā
mokṣaṃ prāpnotīti tātparyam |

raṅgasyeti | raṅgaśabdena nṛtyasthānavācinā tādṛśasthānāvasthito jana upa-
lakṣyate | yathā nartakī prekṣakajanasya nṛtyaṃ darśayitvā nṛtyānnivartate tathā prakṛti-
rātmānaṃ svasvarūpaṃ mahattattvādipariṇāmadvārā śabdādiviṣayarūpeṇa puruṣasya
prakāśya tato vinivartate ityarthaḥ ||

sāṃpratamiti | jīvātirikta īśvarostītyevaṃ manyamānā ye sāṃkhyāstanmataprava-
rtakā ye patañjaliprabhṛtayo munayasteṣāṃ matamityarthaḥ | prabhṛtiśabdena hiraṇyaga-
rbhayājñavalkyagrahaṇam | yadyapi patañjaleḥ prāgeva hiraṇyagarbheṇa yājñavalkyena ca
yogaśāstraṃ praṇītaṃ tathāpi jijñāsūnāmavabodhasaulabhyāya patañjalinā samādhi-
sādhanavibhūtikaivalyabhedena tadavāntarabhedena ca viṣayānvivicyāsya śāstrasya
sāmīcīnyena pratipādanāttata eva cāsya yogaśāstrasya pātañjaladarśanaśabdena
prasiddhibāhulyāccātra patañjalernirdeśaḥ | itare prabhṛtiśabdena saṃgṛhītāḥ |

tatreti | sāṃkhyapravacanamityaparaṃ dvitīyaṃ nāma yasya | yogaśāstramityekaṃ nāma |
tasyaiva śāstrasya sāṃkhyapravacanamiti dvitīyaṃ nāma | tasminyogaśāstre patañjali-
muninā sūtraṃ praṇītam | tatra catvāraḥ pādāḥ | prathamaḥ samādhipādaḥ | dvitīyaḥ
sādhanapādaḥ | tṛtīyo vibhūtipādaḥ | caturthaḥ kaivalyapādaḥ | atheti | athaśabdaḥ
svarūpeṇa maṅgalabhūtaḥ | taduccāraṇamapi maṅgalabhūtam | mṛdaṅgādidhvanivat |
arthastu tasyādhikāraḥ | adhikāraścātrārambhaḥ | yogonuśiṣyate vivicya bodhya-
teneneti yogānuśāsanaṃ śāstram | anena hiraṇyagarbhādyupadiṣṭasyaiva yogasya vivicya
bodhanamatreti dhvanitam | yogaśāstramārabdhaṃ veditavyamiti sūtrārthaḥ | yoga
iti | cittasya vṛttīnāṃ pramāṇaviparyayādīnāṃ yo nirodho nivartanaṃ sa yoga
ityarthaḥ | vṛttinivartanaṃ ca cittanigraharūpotīndriyo yatnaviśeṣaḥ | samādhi-
miti | samyagādhānaṃ cittāvasthānaṃ samādhiḥ | taduktaṃ yogavāsiṣṭhe —

imaṃ guṇasamāhāramanātmatvena paśyataḥ |
antaḥ śītalatā yasya samādhiriti kathyate || (yo. vā. iti)
sa ca samādhirdvividhaḥ saṃprajñāto'saṃprajñātaśca | samyak saṃśayaviparyayarāhi-
tyena prajñāyate prakarṣeṇa jñāyate dhyeyasvarūpaṃ yatra sa saṃprajñātaḥ | asaṃprajñāte tu
dhyeyāddhyānasya bhedopi na bhāsate | tatra dhyeyākāravṛtterapi nirodhāt | nira-
dikṣat | nirdiṣṭavān | tapaḥsvādhyāyeti | tapaḥ śāstroktamupavāsādikaṃ
cittaprasādāvirodhi | svādhyāyaḥ praṇavādijapo mokṣaśāstrādhyayanaṃ vā | īśvara-
praṇidhānaṃ parameśvaracintanaṃ tatra sarvakarmārpaṇaṃ ca | etāni kriyārūpo yogaḥ |
yogasādhanatvādyoga ityucyate | ayaṃ ca kriyāyogo na samāhitacittasya kiṃ tu
vyutthitacittasya | kriyāyogaṃ yamādīni pañca bahiraṅgāṇi sādhanāni ca dvitīye
sādhanapāde niradikṣadityarthaḥ | yamādīni sādhanāni ca yamaniyamāsanaprāṇāyā-
mapratyāhārarūpāṇi | ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ brahmacaryamaparigrahaścetyete pañca yamāḥ |
prāṇaviyogānukūlo vyāpāro hiṃsā | tadabhāvo'hiṃsā | vāco manasaśca yathā-
rthatvaṃ satyam | paradravyasyāpaharaṇaṃ steyam | tadabhāvo'steyam | brahmacaryamupasthe-
ndriyaniyamanam | aparigraho bhogasādhanavastūnāmanaṅgīkāraḥ | śaucaṃ saṃtoṣastapaḥ
svādhyāya īśvarapraṇidhānaṃ cetyete pañca niyamāḥ | śucerbhāvaḥ śaucam |
śuddhirityarthaḥ | taddvividhaṃ śārīraṃ mānasaṃ ca | śārīraṃ dvividhaṃ bāhyamāntaraṃ
ca | mṛjjalādibhiḥ śarīrakṣālanaṃ bāhyam | pañcagavyādibhakṣaṇenāntaram | samyag
bhāvanayā manomalānāṃ rāgadveṣādīnāṃ kṣālanaṃ mānasam | saṃtoṣastṛṣṇākṣayaḥ |
tapaādīnyanupadamevoktāni | sthirasukhamāsanam | sthiraṃ niścalaṃ sukhāvahaṃ ca
yattadāsanam | āsyatenenetyāsanam | tacca padmāsanādikaṃ hastapādādyavayavāva-
sthānaviśeṣarūpam | āsanasthairyācca śītoṣṇādipīḍā na bhavati | śvāsapraśvāsa-
kāle vāyoḥ svābhāvikī yā gatistasyā nirodhaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ | nāsāpuṭena
vāyorantaḥ praveśaḥ śvāsaḥ | tato bahirnirgamaḥ praśvāsaḥ | prāṇāyāmena ca sthiraṃ
cittaṃ śabdādiviṣayairna saṃyujyate | tataśca śrotrādīnīndriyāṇyapi viṣayairna saṃyu-
jyante | tāni ca tadānīṃ kevalaṃ cittasvarūpānukārīṇi bhavanti | ayameva pratyā-
hāraḥ | aṣṭasu yogāṅgeṣvetāni yamaniyamāsanaprāṇāyāmapratyāhārarūpāṇi pañca
bahiraṅgāṇi sādhanāni | cittasthairyadvārā paraṃparayā samādhyupakārakatvāt | dhāra-
ṇādhyānasamādhirūpāṇi trīṇi samādherantaraṅgāṇi sādhanāni | samādhisvarūpani-
ṣpādanāt | samādhiryogaḥ | soyaṃ yogavṛkṣaścittakṣetre yamaniyamābhyāṃ prāptabīja
āsanaprāṇāyāmābhyāmaṅkuritaḥ pratyāhāreṇa kusumitontaraṅgasādhanairdhāraṇādibhi-
stribhiḥ phalito bhavati | tadetadantaraṅgaṃ sādhanatrayaṃ patañjalinā tṛtīye vibhūti-
pāde nirūpitam | tadāha — tṛtīya iti | deśeti | yatra hṛtpuṇḍarīkādirūpe
deśe dhyeyaṃ cintanīyaṃ tatra deśe cittasya bandha ekāgratā saiva dhāraṇetyucyata iti
sūtrārthaḥ | dhyānaṃ ca vṛttyantarāvyavahito dhyeyākāro manaso vṛttipravāhaḥ | dhyānaṃ
caitadyadā dhyeyamātrākāraṃ dhyānadhyātṛdṛṣṭiśūnyaṃ bhavati tadā tadeva samādhirityabhi-
dhīyate | dhāraṇāderantaraṅgasādhanatrayasyaikaviṣayasya saṃyama iti pāribhāṣikī
saṃjñā | taduktaṃ sūtrakāreṇa — tattrayamekatra saṃyamaḥ (pā. yo. sū. 3 | 4) iti |
saṃyamasya mukhyaṃ phalaṃ yogaḥ | avāntaraphalaṃ tu vibhūtayaḥ | vibhūtayaḥ siddhayaḥ |
tāśca bhūtabhaviṣyadarthajñānaṃ paśupakṣyādiśabdajñānaṃ janmāntarasmaraṇaṃ paramanogatārtha-
jñānamantardhānamityādyāḥ | etatsarvaṃ tṛtīye pāde sūtrakāro nirdiṣṭavānityarthaḥ |
caturthe | kaivalyapāde | janmeti | janmamātrājjātā janmajāḥ | yathā devādī-
nām | pāradādirasasevanājjātā auṣadhijāḥ siddhayaḥ | tathā mantreṇa tapasā
samādhinā ca sādhanabhūtena labdhāstisra ityevaṃ sādhanabhedena pañcavidhāḥ siddhayaḥ |
tāścāṇimādyā ajarāmaratvākāśagamanādayaśca | pūrvoktairyamaniyamādibhiraṣṭāṅgairyoga-
vṛkṣe phalite sati prakṛtipuruṣayorbhedaḥ sākṣātkṛto bhavati | tataścāsaṅgapuruṣajñānā-
dduḥkhātyantābhāvarūpo mokṣaḥ sidhyati | etatsarvaṃ caturthe pāde nirdiṣṭam | prācī-
nāni | sāṃkhyadarśane pratipāditāni (da. 14 paṃ. 5) | ṣaḍviṃśa iti | ayaṃ hi
sāṃkhyadarśanāpekṣayāsminpātañjaladarśane viśeṣo yadete pātañjalā īśvaraṃ manyante |
sāṃkhyā api kecidīśvaraṃ manyante | paraṃ tu teṣāṃ darśanamatra pṛthaṅnoktam |
viśeṣāntarābhāvāt | kleśakarmeti | avidyādayaḥ kleśāḥ | te cāgre mūla
eva vakṣyante | te hi cetasi vartamānāstriguṇātmakaṃ saṃsāraṃ draḍhayantaḥ paritāpaṃ
janayanti | ataḥ kleśā ucyante | karma vihitaṃ niṣiddhaṃ ca | karmaphalaṃ janmāyu-
rbhogarūpaṃ trividhaṃ vipākaśabdenocyate | āśerate cittabhūmāvityāśayāḥ saṃskārāḥ |
etaiḥ kleśādibhiraparāmṛṣṭaḥ kālatrayepi yo na saṃspṛśyate sa puruṣaviśeṣa īśvaraḥ |
yadyapyatra darśane sāṃkhyadarśana iva sarveṣāṃ jīvātmanāṃ vastutaḥ kleśādisparśo
nāstyeva tathāpi cittagatāḥ kleśā jīveṣu vyapadiśyante | īśvarasya tu tādṛśopi
kleśādisaṃbandho nāsti | sa ceśvaraḥ svecchāmātreṇaikaṃ yugapadanekāni vā śarīrāṇi
nirmimīte | tāni nirmāṇakāyaśabdenocyante | saṃpradāyeti | anena saṃpradāyapra-
vartanena jīveṣvanugrahakaraṇena ca liṅgeneśvaronumānapramāṇena sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ |

nanviti | tapyabhāvastapyatā | duḥkhamiti yāvat | jīvasya duḥkhameva
nāsti | nirlepatvāt | tathā ca kimarthaṃ tadanugrāhakatveneśvaraḥ svīkriyata ityā-
śayaḥ | tāpakasyeti | ayaṃ bhāvaḥ — na tāvajjīvaḥ svayaṃ tapyo nāpi tāpakaḥ |
kiṃ tu buddhigataḥ sattvāṃśastapyaḥ | mṛdutvātpādatalavat | tāpakastu rajoṃśaḥ |
kaṭhinatvātkaṇṭakavat | buddhirhi pradhānasya pariṇāmaḥ | pradhānaṃ ca triguṇātmakamiti
tadguṇatrayamapi buddhirūpeṇa pariṇamate | na ca vastuta eva jīvasya tapyatvamastviti
vācyam | apariṇāmini niṣkriye jīvātmani kriyājanyaphalāśrayatvarūpakarmatvā-
saṃbhavāt | jñānakriyākarmatvaṃ tu viṣayatārūpaṃ tasyopapadyata evetyanyat | na
caivaṃ jīvapadavācyasya puruṣasya duḥkhābhāve duḥkhanivṛtteḥ puruṣārthatvaṃ na syāt |
puruṣeṇābhyarthyamānatvābhāvāt | kiṃ ca buddherduḥkhasattvepi kā hāniḥ puruṣasya yena
tannivṛttyarthamasya yatnaḥ syāditi vācyam | buddhigate sattvāṃśe tapyamāne puruṣopi
pratibimbarupeṇa tatsamānākāro bhavannanutapyata iti mūḍhairdṛśyate | buddhyapekṣayā
svasmin bhedasya vidyamānasyāpyajñānena buddhigatadharmāṇāṃ svasminnāropāt | vidvaddṛ-
ṣṭyāpi pratibimbarūpeṇa bhoktṛtvaṃ puruṣasya vartata eva | tathā ca buddhigatasyāpi
duḥkhasya heyatvātpuruṣārthatvopapattiḥ | sattvamiti | buddhibhāvena vṛttaṃ buddhirūpeṇa
pariṇatam | tapyena buddhigatasattvāṃśena sahābhedagrāhiṇī yā tāmasyajñānamūlikā
manovṛttistasyāṃ satyāmabhedāropeṇātmā tapya ityucyata ityarthaḥ | pañcaśikhe-
neti | iyaṃ pañcaśikhācāryoktirdraṣṭā dṛśimātraḥ (pā. yo. sū. 2 | 20) iti
pātañjalayogasūtre bhāṣyakārairuddhṛtā | pratisaṃkrama uparāgaḥ | vikārahetubhūtaḥ
saṃyoga iti yāvat | tadrahitopyātmā buddhau pratibimbarūpeṇa saṃkrānta iva tadvṛttiṃ
viṣayādyākārāṃ buddhivṛttimanupatati svasaṃbandhena cetanāmiva karoti | yathā sūryaḥ
svapratibimbayuktaṃ jalaṃ tejasvitādiguṇayuktaṃ pradarśayati tadvat | tādṛśyā buddheśchā-
yayā cātmā buddhiriva svayamapi viṣayākārāṃ tadvṛttimanukaroti | jñānaṃ ca tatta-
dviṣayākāragrahaṇameva | tacca vastuto buddhestaddvārā ca tatsaṃyuktasyātmana ityātmā
jñānītyucyate | buddhisattvaṃ cātmasaṃbandhena cetanamityucyate | tathā śuddhopīti |
nirlepopyātmā bauddhaṃ buddhigataṃ viṣayākāragrahaṇarūpaṃ pratyayamanupaśyatyanukaroti |
tādṛśaśca puruṣo vastuto'tadātmāpi buddhyasarūpopi tadātmaka iva buddhisarūpa iva
pratibhāsata ityarthaḥ | itthamiti | yamaniyamādīnyaṣṭāṅgāni yasya tādṛśasya yogasya
yattapaḥśraddhādirūpeṇādareṇa yuktaṃ nirantaraṃ dīrghakālaparyantaṃ cānuṣṭhānaṃ teneśvaradhyā-
nena ca sattvapuruṣayorbuddhisattvamātmā cetyanayorbhedo jñāyate | etadbhedajñānamevā-
nyatākhyātirityucyate | pratyayāntararahite tādṛśe bhedajñāne satyavidyādayaḥ
samūlamunmūlitā bhavanti | kleśā vakṣyante | samūlakāṣamityatra nimū-
lasamūlayoḥ kaṣaḥ (pā. sū. 3 | 4 | 34) iti sūtreṇa samūlaśabda upapade
kaṣadhātorṇamulpratyayaḥ | kaṣādipu yathāvidhyanuprayogaḥ (pā. sū. 3 | 4 | 46)
iti punastasyaiva kaṣadhātoranuprayogaḥ | mūlena saha vinaṣṭā bhavantītyarthaḥ |
kleśamūlaṃ ca saṃskāraḥ | kuśaleti | āśerate sāṃsārikāḥ puruṣā asminnityā-
śayaḥ | karmaṇāmāśayaḥ karmāśayaḥ karmanidhiḥ | sa ca puṇyapāparūpo dvividhopi
kleśarūpamūlena saha hato bhavati | samūlaghātamityatra samūlākṛtajīveṣu hankṛñ-
grahaḥ (pā. sū. 3 | 4 | 36) iti sūtreṇa samūlaśabda upapade handhātorṇamulpratyayaḥ |
anuprayogaḥ pūrvavat | tataśceti | yena saṃbandhenaikasya saṃbandhino dharmā aparasaṃ-
bandhini vyapadiśyante tādṛśaḥ saṃbandhaviśeṣo lepaḥ | tadrahitasya prakṛteḥ sakāśā-
tpārthakyena yadavasthānaṃ sa mokṣa iti siddham |

prekṣāvaditi | prekṣāvatāṃ vicāraśīlānāṃ śāstrāvalokane yā pravṛttirbhavati
sānubandhacatuṣṭayajñānānantarameva | viṣayaḥ prayojanaṃ saṃbandhodhikārī cetyeṣāṃ
caturṇāmanubandha iti pāribhāṣikī saṃjñā | etaccatuṣṭayānyatamasya kasyāpyajñāne
pravṛttirnopapadyate | śāstre pratipādyortho viṣayaḥ | asmiñchāstre kiṃ pratipādyate kiṃ ca
tasya phalaṃ kaśca śāstre viṣayaphalādhikāriṇāṃ saṃbandhaḥ kasya ca tatrādhikāra etadava-
śyaṃ jñeyameva | lokepi hyalpe ghaṭādau mahati vā prāsādādau kārye saṃpādyamāne kiṃ
kāryaṃ kimarthaṃ kāryaṃ kathaṃ kāryaṃ kena kāryaṃmiti sarvaṃ vicāryaiva pravṛttirdṛśyate |

adhikārārthaḥ | ārambhārthakaḥ | śaṅkate — athaśabdasyeti | nāmaliṅgānu-
śāsanaṃ nāmāmarasiṃhaviracito'marakośaḥ | tatra nāmāni talliṅgāni cānuśiṣya-
nte | atho athetyetau śabdau maṅgalenantare ārambhe praśne kārtsnye cārthe vartete iti
kośārthaḥ | tatra maṅgalarūperthe tatsādhanatayaitau śabdau vartete na tu vācakatayā |
etacchabdayoruccāraṇadvārā maṅgalasādhanatvāt | anantarādiṣvartheṣu tu vācakatayā
vartete | na cātra kośe vācakatayaiva śabdānāmanuśāsanamiti bhramitavyam | tu hi ca
sma ha vai pādapūraṇe (amarako. 3 | 4 | 5) ityatra tuhītyādīnāṃ pādapūraṇasādhanatve-
nānuśāsanadarśanāt | pādapūraṇaṃ hi tuhītyādīnāṃ na vācyorthaḥ | rāmastu lakṣmaṇaṃ
prāhetyatra pādapūraṇasya rāme lakṣmaṇe pravacanakriyāyāṃ vānvayābhāvāt | tathā ca
maṅgalasya vācyārthatvābhāvena na tadarthakāthaśabdasya viviktaṃ kiṃcidudāharaṇam |
kiṃ tvanantarādyanyatamārthe prayukta evāthaśabdo maṅgalaṃ sādhayati | tatrānantare yathā —
snānaṃ kṛtvātha bhuñjīta | ārambhe yathā — atha śabdānuśāsanam | praśne yathā — atha
vaktuṃ samarthosi | kārtsnye yathā — atha dhātūn brūmaḥ | praśneti | kaṃcitprati praṣṭuṃ
patañjaleḥ pravṛttyabhāvena praśnārtho na saṃbhavati | nāpi kārtsnyam | kṛtsnaṃ yogānu-
śāsanamiti pratipādanasyānarthakyāt | pūrvaprakṛteti | ātmā nityothānitya
iti vipratipattivākyethaśabdasya pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣārthatvaṃ dṛśyate | atra pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣā
prayogopādhirna tvathaśabdasya vācyorthaḥ | vācyārthastu pūrvaprakṛta ātmā | athānitya
ityatrānityaḥ ka iti viśeṣyāpekṣāyāmātmā nitya iti pūrvavākye prakṛta ātmā-
thaśabdena parāmṛśyate | nityatvānityatvayormitho viruddhayordvayoḥ pratipādane satyu-
dite juhotyanudite juhotītyatreva vikalpe paryavasānamiti pākṣikatvaṃ tayoḥ
sidhyati | etadeva pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣārthatvamathaśabdasya | ārambhārthatvānupapattiri-
ti | athaśabdotrārambhārthaka eveti niścayānupapattirityarthaḥ |

pūrvavṛtteti | yogābhyāsātpūrvaṃ saṃpāditāni yāni śamādīni yogaṃ pratyasā-
dhāraṇāni kāraṇāni tannirūpitānantaryaṃ vetyarthaḥ | śamo manonigrahaḥ | ādi-
padena damoparatititikṣāśraddhāsamādhānasaṃgrahaḥ | damo bāhyendriyanigrahaḥ | uparatiḥ
saṃnyāsaḥ | titikṣā kṣamā | śraddhā guruvākyādiṣu viśvāsaḥ | samādhānaṃ cittaikā-
gratā | śamādyanantaramiti | ayaṃ bhāvaḥ — yadyapi śamādīnāṃ niyamena yogā-
pekṣayā pūrvavṛttatvamasti tathāpi nātra śamādyānantaryamathaśabdenocyate | sūtraghaṭa-
kasyāthaśabdasyārtho hi sūtrajabodhe yasya prādhānyaṃ tatraivānvetumarhati nānyatra |
atha yogānuśāsanam (pā. yo. sū. 1 | 1) iti sūtrārthe cānuśāsanasya
prādhānyaṃ na tu yogasya | yogastu tadviśeṣaṇatayopāttaḥ | anuśāsanaṃ śāstram |
tatra prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttyarthamanubandhacatuṣṭayaṃ pradarśanīyam | tatra viṣayarūponubandho
yogaśabdena pradarśitaḥ | na tvetāvatā sūtrārthe śabdato yogasya prādhānyam | ato
na tatrāthaśabdārthasyānvaya iti | lakṣaṇeti | yogaścittavṛttinirodhaḥ (pā.
yo. sū. 1 | 2) iti sūtreṇa yogalakṣaṇaṃ pratipāditam | vitarkavicāra0
(pā. yo. sū. 1 | 17) ityādisūtraiḥ saṃprajñātādibhedaḥ pratipāditaḥ | dvitīye
sādhanapāde yogasyopāyaḥ pradarśitaḥ | caturthe kaivalyapāde mokṣarūpaṃ phalamuktam |
athānuśāsanaśabdasya śāstrarūporthostu nāma | tāvatā śamādyānantaryamathaśa-
bdārthaḥ kuto netyata āha — anuśāsanasya ceti | anuśāsanāpekṣayā
yanniyamena pūrvabhāvi tadānantaryamevānuśāsanasaṃbaddhenāthaśabdenocyate | anu-
śāsanaṃ hi sūtrakṛtkartṛkam | sūtrakārasya śāstrakaraṇe pravṛttistattvajñānaprakāśa-
necchānantaram | na tu śamādisādhanasaṃpattyanantarameva | tathā ca na śamādyāna-
ntaryamatrāthaśabdārtha iti siddham | nanvevaṃ tasmācchānto dāntaḥ (bṛ. 4 | 4 | 23)
ityādiśrutau śamādyānantaryaṃ kasyāmnātamiti cettatrāha — jijñāseti | atha vā
nanvevamathāto brahmajijñāsā (bra. sū. 1 | 1 | 1) ityatrāpi śamādyānantaryamatha-
śabdārtho na syāditi cettatrāha — jijñāseti | tatsūtrārthe jijñāsāyāḥ prādhā-
nyamastu | icchāyā iṣyamāṇapradhānatvājjñānasya vā prādhānyamastu | na tvatrevānu-
śāsanasya | kiṃ ca prādhānyaṃ dūre | vākyārthapraveśa eva nāstyanuśāsanasya |
tadvācakapadasya tatrābhāvāt | tasmācchānta iti | śāntontaḥkaraṇatṛṣṇāto
nivṛttaḥ | dānto nigṛhītabāhyendriyaḥ | uparataḥ sarvaiṣaṇāvinirmuktaḥ | titikṣu-
rjīvanāvicchedena śītoṣṇādidvaṃdvasahiṣṇuḥ | samāhitaḥ samyagātmani sthāpita-
citto bhūtvātmanyeva svakāryakaraṇasaṃghāta evātmānaṃ pratyakcetayitāraṃ paśyati
sākṣātkarotītyarthaḥ | nanvevamanuśāsanāpekṣayā niyamena pūrvabhāvinī yā śāstra-
kārasya tattvajñānādiprakāśanecchā tadānantaryamatrāthaśabdārthaḥ kuto na gṛhyata
iti cettatrāha — nāpīti | śrotṛpratipattīti | pratipattirbodhaḥ | śāstra-
kāro hi yadanantaraṃ śāstraṃ viracitavāṃstajjñānaṃ śrotṝṇāṃ śāstrājjāyamāne yogaviṣaya-
ke jñāne yogaviṣayiṇyāṃ pravṛttau vā na kāraṇamiti tadānantaryakathanaṃ niṣphalatvā-
nnābhidhātuṃ yogyaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ | idaṃ ca tattvajñānaprakāśanecchāyā anuśāsa-
nāpekṣayā niyamena pūrvabhāvitvamabhyupetyoktam | vastutastadeva nāstītyāha —
tavāpīti | ānantaryamathaśabdārtha iti vādinopītyarthaḥ | ādye tadabhāve-
pīti | yogānuśāsanaṃ mokṣaheturiti niścayaścettadā tattvajñānacikhyāpayiṣāyā
abhāvepi yogānuśāsanasya kartavyatvāpattiḥ | dvitīye tadbhāvepīti | yogā-
nuśāsanaṃ mokṣaheturiti na niścayaścettadā tattvajñānacikhyāpayiṣāyāḥ sattvepi
yogānuśāsanasyākartavyatvāpattiḥ | tathā ca vyabhicārānnānuśāsanāpekṣayā niya-
mena pūrvabhāvitvaṃ tattvajñānacikhyāpayiṣāyā iti siddham | dvitīyapakṣe doṣā-
ntaramāha — pramitaṃ cāsyeti | yogaśāstrasya yogadvārā mokṣahetutvaṃ niścita-
mityarthaḥ | adhyātmeti | ātmani cittasya samādhānamadhyātmayogaḥ | nidi-
dhyāsanamiti yāvat | tasya yogasyādhigamena lābhena devamātmānaṃ matvā sākṣā-
tkṛtya dhīro jñānī harṣaśokau jahāti harṣaśokarahito mukto bhavatītyarthaḥ | samā-
dhāviti | yadā te buddhiḥ samādhāvātmani sthirā bhaviṣyati tadā yogaṃ yoga-
phalamātmasākṣātkāraṃ prāpsyasi mukto bhaviṣyasītyarthaḥ | ābhyāṃ śrutismṛtibhyāṃ
yogasya mokṣahetutvaṃ sidhyati | evaṃ ca śāstrakārāṇāṃ svakīyatattvajñānaprakāśane-
cchāyā abhāvepyanuśāsanasya kartavyatvena tattvajñānaprakāśanecchāyā na niyamenā-
nuśāsanāpekṣayā pūrvavṛttatvam |

atredaṃ bodhyam — yatra madhyethaśabdastatra tatpratipāditamānantaryaṃ pūrvaprakṛtārthani-
rūpitamevetyatra na saṃdehaḥ | tatra tadānantaryapratipādanasyopayogo bhavatu mā
vā bhūt | tathā tasya pūrvaprakṛtārthasya niyamena pūrvavṛttatvamapi tatra nāpekṣyate |
yathā devadatto gato na veti praśne snānaṃ kṛtvātha gata iti | atra praśnānurodhena
gamane snānānantaryapratipādanasyānupayogepi snānasya gamanāpekṣayā niyamena
pūrvavṛttatvābhāvepi cāthaśabdaḥ snānānantaryaṃ pratipādayati | yatra tu na pūrvaprakṛtaṃ
kiṃcit kiṃ tvanārabhyaivāthaśabdaḥ prayujyate tatrāthaśabdārtha ānantarye gṛhyamāṇe
pūrvavṛttaṃ yogyatābalādākṣepeṇaiva nirṇetavyaṃ bhavati | atastatrānantaryamavyabhicarita-
pūrvavṛttāpekṣayaiva grāhyam | tathā tadānantaryapratipādanasyopayoge satyeva grāhyam |
anyathā ākṣepāsaṃbhavāditi |

ata eveti | yatastattvajñānaprakāśanecchānantaryaṃ nirākṛtaṃ tata eva śiṣya-
praśnādyānantaryamapi nirākṛtaṃ bhavati | samādhānasya tulyatvāt | śāstrakārāṇāṃ
pravṛttirhi kadācicchiṣyapraśnānantaraṃ bhavati | yathā pāśupataśāstre | kadācitta-
paścaryānantaraṃ jñānasaṃpādanena | yathā pāṇinervyākaraṇe | kadācidrasāyanādyupayo-
gānantaram | pāradādirasasevanena hi tattvasākṣātkāre jātenuśāsane pravṛttirbhavitu-
marhati | ādiśabdena gurvājñāyā lokānukampāyāśca saṃgrahaḥ | tābhyāmapi hi
śāstrakārāṇāṃ śāstraracane pravṛttiḥ saṃbhavati | paraṃ tveṣāṃ śiṣyapraśnādīnāṃ madhye
kasyāpi niyatapūrvavṛttatvābhāvena tadānantaryapratipādanasyopayogābhāvena ca
nātra tadānantaryamathaśabdārtha iti siddham | athāta iti | adhikāra ārambhaḥ |
brahmajijñāsā ca brahmajñānecchā | athaśabdasyādhikārārthatve brahmajñānecchārabhyate
iti sūtrārthaḥ syāt | sa ca na saṃbhavati | icchāyā anārabhyatvāt | na hi
pratyadhikaraṇamicchā kriyate | kiṃ tu vicāraḥ | nanu tarhyatra jijñāsāpadasya lakṣa-
ṇayā vicāra evārthostu | dṛśyate ca sanpratyayāntajñādhātorvicārārthe prayogaḥ
sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ (chā. 8 | 7 | 1) tadvijijñāsasva (tai. 3 | 1 | 1) ityādau |
jñānecchārūporthastu tatra na grahītuṃ śakyate | icchāyā avidheyatvāt | tathā ca
vicārasya brahmasūtrakāraiḥ pratyadhikaraṇaṃ kriyamāṇatvenāthaśabdasyādhikārārthatve
gṛhyamāṇe na kiṃcidbādhakamiti cetsatyam | yadyapyevamadhikārārtho grahītuṃ śakyate
tathāpi taṃ parityajvādhikāriviśeṣalābhāyānantaryārtho bhāṣyakṛdbhirāśritaḥ |
brahmavicāra ārabhyata ityuktau yo brahmajijñāsuḥ sotrādhikārīti sāmānyata
ākṣepeṇa prekṣāvanto jānīyuḥ | ānantaryārthe gṛhyamāṇe tu kiṃnirūpitamānantarya-
mityākāṅkṣāyāṃ yogyatābalātsādhanacatuṣṭayasaṃpattyānantaryamityarthe sādhanacatuṣṭaya-
saṃpanno jijñāsuradhikārītyadhikāriviśeṣo labhyata iti | niraṭaṅki | niścitam |

maṅgalārthaḥ kiṃ neti | maṅgalaṃ cānantaryādivadathaśabdasya svatantro vācyortha
iti śaṅkākārābhiprāyaḥ | tadabhiprāyānusāreṇaiva prathamataḥ samādhatte — maṅgalasyeti |
tathā ceti | yogānuśāsanaṃ maṅgalamiti vākyārtho na saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ | vastu-
tastu maṅgalaṃ nāthaśabdasya vācyortha iti prāguktameva (pṛ. 336 pa. 22) |
tadanusāreṇāha — mṛdaṅgadhvaneriti | śravaṇamuccāraṇasyāpyupalakṣaṇam | athaśa-
bdaśravaṇasyāthaśabdoccāraṇasya maṅgalaṃ kāryam | na tvathaśabdasya sa vācyorthaḥ
saṃbhavati | nāpi lakṣyaḥ | vācyenārthena saṃbaddho hyartho lakṣyo bhavati | maṅgalā-
rthastatra sūtre ānantaryādiṣu vācyeṣvanyatamenāmukena saṃbaddhatayā sūtrakārasya prati-
pipādayiṣita iti vaktuṃ na śakyate | tathā ca maṅgalasya na vākyārthenvaya iti
siddham | adhunā maṅgalarūpārthasya vākyārthe praveśayogyatāpi nāstītyāha —
yatheti | yathā pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkta ityatrārthādgamyamānasya rātribho-
janasya na vākyārthe praveśastathātrāthaśabdakāryasya maṅgalasyāpi | ārthikārthasyeva
kāryabhūtasyārthasyāpi padārthatvābhāvāt | mudrābhaṅgaḥ | niyamahāniḥ | prāri-
psiteti | sūtrakāraiḥ prāripsito yo vogānuśāsanaprabandhastasya parisamāptau
śatrubhūto yo vighnasamūhastannāśāyetyarthaḥ | prathante | prasiddhimāyānti |
arthāntarābhidhānāyeti | vṛddhirādaic (pāṇi. sū. 1 | 1 | 1) iti pāṇini-
sūtrepi na vṛddhiśabdo maṅgalārthavācakaḥ | kiṃ tu saṃjñāsvarūpabodhaka eva | tādṛśa
eva ca sa uccāraṇadvārā śravaṇadvārā ca maṅgalaṃ sādhayatītyanyat | arthāntareti | ma-
ṅgalārthāpekṣayānyo ya ārambhādirūporthastasya yā vākyārthe buddhistatphalakasyetyarthaḥ |
anyārthamiti | gṛhakāryasādhanāya nadyādeḥ sakāśānnīyamāno jalabhṛtaḥ kumbho
yasya gṛhānnirgamanakāle dṛṣṭipathamāgacchettasya sa śubhaśakuna iti maṅgalamapi
sādhayati tadvat | smṛtivyākopa iti | tasmānmāṅgalikāvubhāviti smṛtau
māṅgalikāvityasya maṅgalaṃ vācyortho yayostādṛśāvityarthaṃ manyate śaṅkakaḥ | maṅgalaṃ
prayojanaṃyayostādṛśāviti māṅgalikāvityasyārtha ityuttarāśayaḥ | māṅgalikāvi-
tyatra maṅgalaśabdānmaṅgalaṃ prayojanamasyetyarthe prayojanam (pāṇi. sū. 5 | 1 | 109)
iti sūtreṇa ṭhañpratyayaḥ |

nāpīti | pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣāthaśabdasyodāharaṇaṃ prāgdarśitameva (pṛ. 337 paṃ. 15) |
anārabhyādhītetha yogānuśāsanam (pā. yo. sū. 1 | 1) iti prakṛtasūtre tu na
kiṃcitpūrvaprakṛtamiti tadyogyatābalācchamādi vā tattvajñānaprakāśanecchā vā
śiṣyapraśnādikaṃ vā kiṃcidgrahītavyaṃ bhavati | gṛhīte ca tasmiṃstasya yogānuśā-
sane'bhedānvayo na saṃbhavatīti paurvāparyasaṃbandhenānvayo vācyaḥ | tathā cānantaryaṃ
phalitaṃ bhavati | evaṃ cānantaryārthakatvapakṣoktāni (da. 15 pa. 46) dūṣaṇāni
pūrvaprakṛtārthakatvapakṣenusaṃdhātavyāni | vimarśavākye | vipratipattibodhaka-
vākye | tadasaṃbhavāditi | pūrvaprakṛtasya kasyāpyabhāvāt | ākṣepastu na
saṃbhavati | nityasākāṅkṣairhyānantaryādyarthaiḥ svāvadhirākṣipyate | na hyatra tādṛśaḥ
kaścidartho dṛśyate |

adhikārapadeti | adhikāraśabdasya vācyortho yaḥ prārambhastadarthakothaśabda
ityarthaḥ | saṃbhavannarthoyameka evāvaśiṣṭa iti sa evātra gṛhyata iti bhāvaḥ |
taditthamiti | tadvācaspatikṛtaṃ vyākhyānamitthamityarthaḥ | tadevārthata upapā-
dayati — amuṣyeti | yathā tattvajñānaprakāśanecchānantaryārthakethaśabde gṛhyamāṇe
tādṛśānantaryasya śrotṛpratipattau śrotṛpravṛttau vā na kaścidupayogaḥ (da. 15
paṃ. 61) tathādhikārārthakethaśabde gṛhyamāṇe na bhavati | kiṃ tu yogaviṣayakaṃ
śāstrametadārabhyate | ato yogotra sakalaśāstratātparyaviṣayībhūtortha iti sāmā-
nyato jñātvā tataḥ śāstrasahāyena viśeṣato yogaṃ sukhena pratipadyate | kiṃ ca
sāmānyajñāne sati śāstrāvalokane sukhena pravṛttirbhavati | tathā cāthaśabdasyāra-
mbhārthakatvaṃ yuktam | upavartanaṃ pratipādanam |

nanu yogaśāstraṃ hiraṇyagarbheṇaivārabdhaṃ na patañjalinā | tathā ca patañjalipraṇī-
tetra sūtrethaśabdasyārambhārthakatvaṃ na yujyata ityāśayenāha — nanviti | addheti |
satyamityarthaḥ | naiva patañjalinā yogasya śāsanametadārabhyate kiṃ tvanuśāsanam |
anyena śiṣṭasya vivicya bodhanamanuśāsanam | purāṇādāviti | yogo hi
purāṇādiṣu na mukhyataḥ pratipādya iti viśiṣya kvāpi noktaḥ | kiṃ tu prasaṅgānu-
sāreṇa kvacitkaścidaṃśa ityevaṃ teṣu viprakīrṇaḥ | viṣṇupurāṇe ṣaṣṭheṃśe saptamādhyāye
gāruḍe caturdaśa ekonapañcāśattame cādhyāye mārkaṇḍeye yogacikitsānāmaka
ekonacatvāriṃśattamedhyāye liṅgapurāṇe ca navamedhyāyeṃśato yogaḥ pratipāditaḥ |
na tu kvacidapi sākalyena saṃgṛhītaḥ | ato yogarūportho jijñāsūnāṃ durgrāhya
iti matvā kṛpayā yogasūtrāṇi viracayatā patañjalinā tatratyaṃ sāraṃ sākalyena
saṃgṛhītamiti bhāvaḥ |

evamathaśabdārthavivecanapūrvakaṃ sūtrārthaṃ niścitya tenānubandhacatuṣṭayaṃ pratipādyate
(da. 15 paṃ. 38) iti prāguktamanubandhacatuṣṭayaṃ darśayati — tatra śāstra
iti | arthasiddhamiti | adhyātmayogādhigamena (kā. 2 | 12) ityādipramāṇai-
ryogaphalaṃ mokṣa iti niścite mokṣakāmodhikārītyarthātsiddhaṃ bhavati | yadi tvatha-
śabdārthasya yogenvayaḥ sambhavettarhyānantaryamathaśabdārthaṃ gṛhītvāṃ śamādisādhanasaṃ-
pattyanantaramiti sūtrārthe jāyamāne tādṛśasādhanasaṃpannodhikārītyathaśabdāllabhyeta |
yathā athāto brahmajijñāsā (bra. sū. 1 | 1 | 1) ityatrāthaśabdena svārthānantarya-
dvārā tādṛśānantaryapratiyogibhūtasādhanacatuṣṭayasaṃpattiviśiṣṭodhikārī pratipādito
bhavati tadvat | paraṃ tvatra na tathā vaktuṃ śakyate | yogasya śāsanaṃ pratyapradhānatayā
tatrāthaśabdārthānanvayasya prāguktatvāt (da. 15 paṃ. 52) | nanu tarhyathāto
brahmajijñāsā (bra. sū. 1 | 1 | 1) ityatrāpyadhikāra evāthaśabdasyārtho gṛhyatām |
tamevaṃ vidvānamṛta iha bhavati (śve. 3 | 8) ityādiśrutibhirbrahmajñānaphalaṃ mokṣa
iti niścitetreva mokṣakāmodhikārītyarthātsiddhaṃ bhaviṣyatītyāśayenāśaṅkate — na
cāthāta iti | samādhatte — tatrāthaśabdeneti | praṇāḍikā dvāram | kasyacida-
rthasya sākṣātparaṃparayā vā śabdato niṣpattisaṃbhaverthatastatsādhanamanyāvyam | 15|121 — śravaṇādhikāriṇaḥ for evādhikāriṇaḥ A.
śrutiprāpta iti | śrutiḥ śabdaḥ | prakaraṇādīnāmityādiśabdena liṅgavākyasthāna-
samākhyānāṃ saṃgrahaḥ | śrutyādīnāṃ svarūpaṃ jaiminidarśane (pṛ. 257 paṃ. 17) prati-
pāditam | tathā cāthāto brahmajijñāsā (bra. sū. 1 | 1 | 1) ityatrāthaśabda āra-
mbhārthake gṛhyamāṇe kena brahmajijñāsā kāryetyastyadhikāryākāṅkṣā | mokṣavākyeṣu
ca keṣucitkathaṃ mokṣo jāyata ityasti sādhanākāṅkṣā | keṣucittu mokṣasādhanatvena
brahmajñānevagate tatkathaṃ saṃpādanīyamityākāṅkṣā | ubhayākāṅkṣaiva ca prakaraṇaśa-
bdenocyate | tadbalādathāto brahmajijñāsetyasya mokṣavākyasya caikavākyatvenumite
tadbalānmokṣasādhanībhūtabrahmajijñāsārūpārthaprakāśanasāmarthyaṃ brahmajijñāsāpadasyā-
numīyate | tena liṅgena ca mumukṣuṇā brahmajijñāsā kāryā — iti śabdonumīyate |
tato viniyoga iti vilambenādhikārī pratīyate | ānantaryārthakethaśabde gṛhyamāṇe
yogyatābalācchamādisādhanasaṃpattyanantaraṃ brahmajijñāsā kāryetyarthe jāyamānetha-
śabdārthabalādeva sādhanacatuṣṭayasaṃpannodhikārī śīghraṃ pratītipathamārohatīti |
śrutiliṅgeti | sūtrārthaḥ prāguktaḥ (pṛ. 257 paṃ. 17) | bādhikaiveti |
śrutyapekṣayā pūrvasya pramāṇāntarasyābhāvena na kadāpi śrutipramāṇasya bādhaḥ | tathā
samākhyātaḥ parasya pramāṇāntarasyābhāvena na kadāpi samākhyāyā bādhakatvam |
madhyamānāṃ liṅgādīnāṃ tu pūrveṇa sahaikatra saṃnipāte bādhyatvaṃ pareṇa sahaikatra
saṃnipāte tu bādhakatvamiti |

yoga eveti | tathā ca yogārambha eva patañjalinā kartuṃ yukto na śāstrā-
rambha iti śaṅkāśayaḥ | na karmeti | yoga evātra mukhyatvena pratipādyaḥ sūtra-
kṛtaḥ | kiṃ tu sūtrakṛdvyāpārasya pravacanarūpasya śāstrarūpakaraṇaviṣayakatvācchāstra-
mārabdham | abhidhānarūpaśāstravyāpāraviṣayatayā tu yoga evādhikriyata iti
bhāvaḥ |

vārtaṃ tuccham | anyatarakarmeti | saṃyogastrividhaḥ — anyatarakarmaja ubhayaka-
rmajaḥ saṃyogajaśca | ādyaḥ śyenapatanakriyayā śailaśyenayoḥ | dvitīyo meṣayorma-
llayorvā | tṛtīyastu hastapustakasaṃyogātkāyapustakasaṃyogaḥ | atra tu parameśvarasya
jīvānāṃ ca vibhutvena calanakriyāyā asaṃbhavānnānyatarakarmaja ubhayakarmajaśca saṃbha-
vati | ata eva na tṛtīyopi | jīvapradeśeṣvapi calanakriyāyā asaṃbhavāt | nanu
jīvaparamātmanoḥ saṃyogo nitya evāstu kṛtaṃ kāraṇānveṣaṇenetyata āha — aja-
saṃyogasyeti | kaṇabhakṣaḥ kaṇādarṣirvaiśeṣikasūtrakāraḥ | akṣacaraṇo gautama-
rṣirnyāyasūtrakāraḥ | tairnityaḥ saṃyogo nāṅgīkriyate | saṃyogasya nityatvaṃ ca
saṃyoginorubhayornityatve satyeva saṃbhavati | ghaṭapaṭasaṃyogasya ghaṭākāśasaṃyogasya
vā nityatvokterayuktatvāt | nityayorapi saṃyoginorubhayoḥ paricchinnatve saṃyo-
gasyānityatvaṃ dṛśyate | yathā paramāṇudvayasaṃyogasya | anyatarasya vibhutvepi tattatpra-
deśabhedena saṃyogasya navanavotpannatayā kāryatvameva | yathātmamanasoḥ saṃyogasya |
ubhayorvibhutve tu tatsaṃyogasya nityatvaṃ vaktuṃ śakyate | paraṃ tu kiṃ tena saṃyogena
kāryaṃ niṣpadyeta | kiṃcitsyāccetsaṃyogasya sadātanatvena tatkāryamapi tathaiva syāt |
sahakāryapekṣayā kāryasya kvācitkatvopapattau tu sahakāryeva kāryaṃ karotu kṛtaṃ saṃyo-
gena | tathā coktaṃ vākyavṛttau — saṃyogaḥ sarvopyanitya eva | ajasaṃyogānaṅgīkārā-
diti | ata eva naiyāyikā yutasiddhayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃyoga ityabhyupagacchanti |
kecana | pāṇinīyāḥ | tatrasthasyāpīti | saṃyogo yoga ityukta iti pūrvokta-
yājñavalkyavacanasya jīvātmaparamātmanoryaḥ saṃyogaḥ samyagyogaḥ sāmyāvasthā-
rūpaḥ sa yoga ityucyate samādhirityucyata ityarthaḥ | buddhyādyupādhisaṃbandhamūla-
kānkalpitāndharmānparityajya svābhāvikenāsaṅgarūpeṇa jīvasya yatparamātmana
ivāvasthānaṃ sā sāmyāvasthā | iyameva muktirnirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaiti
(mu. 3 | 1 | 3) ityādiśrutiṣu pratipādyate |

samādhirūpaṃ yogaśabdārthamākṣipati — nanvevamiti | ayamāśayaḥ — yogaścitta-
vṛttinirodha iti pūrvamuktam (da. 15 pa. 147) | adhunā tu yogaśabdasya saṃyogārtha-
katvaṃ nirākurvatā yogaḥ samādhirityucyate | yadi cātra samādhiśabdārthaścittavṛ-
ttinirodhādanyaḥ kaścana syāttarhi pūrvāparavirodhaḥ | atha cittavṛttinirodha eva
samādhistarhi yamaniyama (pā. yo. sū. 2 | 29) iti sūtravirodhaḥ | tatra hi
yogāṅgeṣu samādhiḥ paṭhitaḥ | na tu yoga eva samādhiriti tatrocyate | samādhi-
ryogāṅgatvādyogasyopakārakaḥ | yogaścāṅgī tadupakāryaḥ | upakāryatvamupakārakatvaṃ ca
na svasyaiva svaṃ prati saṃbhavati | kiṃ tu tayorbhinna evāśrayaḥ | yathā darśapūrṇamāsa-
saṃjñako yāgoṅgitvādupakāryatvāśrayaḥ | prayājādīni tadaṅgāni tūpakārakatvāśra-
yāṇi | tathā copakāryādaṅgino yogātsakāśādupakārakoṅgabhūtaḥ samādhiratyanta-
bhinna evāvaśyaka iti kathaṃ yogaḥ samādhirityucyata iti | bhinnāyatanatvena |
bhinnāśrayatvena | vyutpattimātreti | vyutpattiḥ prakṛtipratyayādyavayavārthaḥ | yogaśa-
bdasyāvayavārthaḥ kaścana nirūpaṇīya ityetāvataiva vyāsabhāṣye samādhyarthakaṃ
yujadhātuṃ gṛhītvā yogaḥ samādhiriti vyapadiṣṭam | samādheryogāṅgatvenāṅgino
yogādbhedepyaṅgāṅginorabhedavivakṣāmātreṇa kathaṃcittadyojanīyam | na tu tatrāmini-
veṣṭavyam | samādhirhyaṣṭasu yogāṅgeṣu caramamaṅgam | tadeva tadevārthamātra0
(pā. yo. sū. 3 | 3) iti sūtreṇa lakṣyate | sūtrasyāyamarthaḥ — tacchabdena tatpratya-
yaikatānatā dhyānam (pā. yo. sū. 3 | 2) iti pūrvasūtroktaṃ dhyānarūpaṃ
saptamaṃ yogāṅgaṃ parāmṛśyate | sūtrasthamātrapadasya vivaraṇaṃ sūtrakāraiḥ svayameva
svarūpaśūnyamiveti vadadbhiḥ saṃpāditam | tadeva dhyānameva yadā dhyeyāveśavaśāddhyā-
nadhyātṛdṛṣṭiśūnyaṃ dhyeyārthamātragrāhi bhavati tadā sadapi dhyānaṃ dhyātṛdhyānadhye-
yādivibhāgāgrahaṇātsvarūpaśūnyamiva bhavati sa samādhirucyate | ayaṃ ca yogā-
ṅgabhūtaḥ samādhiḥ sūtrakārairlakṣitaḥ | nātra vṛttinirodhaḥ | nanu yogaśabdasyāvaya-
vārthānusāreṇa yogāṅgabhūte samādhirūperthe pravṛttirastviti bhāṣyāśaya iti cetta-
trāha — na ceti | yaugikaśabdasthale hyavayavārthānusāreṇa pravṛttirastu | tatrāvaya-
vārthasyaiva pravṛttinimittatvāt | na tu sarvatra | yogarūḍhasthale rūḍhasthale cāvayavā-
rthātiriktameva pravṛttinimittamiti tadanusāreṇaiva śabdasya pravṛttirvācyā | yathā
gośabdasya gotvaṃ pravṛttinimittamiti tadanusāreṇaiva gośabdasya pravṛttirna tu gama-
nakriyāśrayatvānusāreṇa | anyathā gamanābhāvakāle gavi gośabdaprayogo na
syāt | gamanakriyāśraye devadattādau manuṣye ca gośabdaprayogaḥ syāt | tathā ca
cittavṛttinirodharūpapravṛttinimittānusāreṇa na yogaśabdaḥ samādhirūpe yogāṅge
pravartata iti yogaḥ samādhiriti bhāṣyaṃ pūrvoktarītyā gauṇatayaiva neyam |

atra vadanti — astyayaṃ samādhiśabdonekārthaḥ | yogasya yaccaramamaṅgaṃ tadvācako-
ṅgibhūtayogavācakaśca | yamaniyama (pā. yo. sū. 2 | 27) iti sūtre yogāṅgeṣu
samādhernirdeśāt | tā eva sabījaḥ samādhiḥ (pā. yo. sū. 1 | 46) tasyāpi
nirodhe sarvanirodhānnirbījaḥ samādhiḥ (pā. yo. sū. 1 | 51) iti sūtradvayeṅgi-
bhūtasya saṃprajñātāsaṃprajñātabhedena dvividhasya yogasya samādhiśabdena vyapadeśācca |
vyāsabhāṣye ca samādhiśabdaprayogorthadvayepyasakṛddṛśyate | tathā cāṅgivācakatvena
yogaḥ samādhiriti bhāṣyaṃ suyojameveti |

nanu vṛttīnāmiti | pramāṇaviparyayavikalpanidrāsmṛtayaḥ (pā. yo. sū.
1 | 6) iti sūtre pramāṇādyāḥ pañca vṛttaya uktāḥ | tatrānadhigatārthaniścayākārā
vṛttiḥ pramāṇam | mithyājñānaṃ viparyayaḥ | arthaśūnyaḥ kevalakalpanāmayo yaḥ
pratyaya āhāryajñānarūpaḥ sa vikalpaḥ | yathā sūryoyaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ śaśaśṛṅgamityādiḥ |
nidrāsmṛtī prasiddhe | āsāṃ vṛttīnāṃ nirodho hi yogaḥ | nirodho nāma vināśaḥ |
sa ca yadadhikaraṇamāśritya vṛttayastiṣṭhanti tatraivāvaśyaṃbhāvī | vṛttayaśca jñānarūpā
ātmaniṣṭhā iti tadvināśopyātmaniṣṭha eva | sa cāyaṃ jāyamāno vināśaḥ svāśraya
ātmani kamapi vikāraṃ janayedeva | na hi kathamapyavikṛte dharmiṇi dharmavinā-
śasaṃbhavaḥ | tathā ca vṛttivināśakāla ātmano vikārāpattyā kūṭastha ātmeti
siddhānto bhajyeta | kūṭena mūlasvarūpeṇa sadā tiṣṭhati kathamapi vikāraṃ na labhata
iti kūṭasthaḥ | prāgabhāveti | ghaṭaprāgabhāvo ghaṭāśrayībhūtāyāṃ mṛdyeva |
tathā ghaṭadhvaṃsopi ghaṭāśrayībhūteṣu ghaṭāvayaveṣu śakaleṣveva | upayanniti |
ayaṃ nyāyaḥ siddhāntabinduṭīkāyāṃ nyāyaratnāvalyāmuktaḥ | upayan — jāya-
mānaḥ | apayan — vinaśyan | vikaroti — utpattivināśabhājaṃ karoti (si. bi.
pṛ. 75) | kiṃ ca sūtasaṃhitāyāṃ śivamāhātmyakhaṇḍārambhe vidyāraṇya-
kṛtaṭīkāyāmapyayaṃ nyāya uktaḥ | antaḥkaraṇeti | antaḥkaraṇaṃ
cittaṃ buddhiriti paryāyāḥ | jñānaṃ hi tasya pariṇāmaḥ | buddhivṛttau viṣayā-
kārasamarpaṇameva viṣayasya jñātatvam | viṣayākāroparaktabuddhivṛttiśca cicchaktau
pratibimbate | puruṣe pratibimbanasāmarthyaṃ ca vṛttimaccittasyaiva phalabalātkalpyate |
yathā jalādau pratibimbanasāmarthyaṃ rūpavatsthūladravyasyaiva taddvat | tadānīṃ ca buddhi-
vṛtterbhedenāgrahāttādṛśabuddhivṛttyavibhāgāpannā cicchaktirarthamanubhavatīti vyavahāraḥ |
tathā ca jñānaṃ vastuto buddhereva nātmana iti jñānaviśeṣarūpāḥ pramāṇādivṛttayopi
nātmana ityātmanaḥ kūṭasthatvaṃ siddham | nanu jñānaṃ vastuta evātmadharma iti naiyā-
yikādibhiruktamiti cettatrāha — kūṭasthanityeti | jñānaṃ hi viṣayākārasadṛśā-
kāreṇa pariṇāmaḥ | sa ca nāpariṇāmina ātmanaḥ saṃbhavati | citiśaktiriti |
cicchakterviṣayo vṛttimaccittam | cittasya tu viṣayā ghaṭādayaḥ | na tu ghaṭādayaḥ
sākṣāccicchakterviṣayāḥ | te cendriyasaṃyogaprakāśādisādhanasattve jñātā bhavanti |
sādhanābhāve tu vidyamānā apyajñātā evāvatiṣṭhante | naivaṃ cittavṛttirvidyamānā
satī kadāpyajñātā tiṣṭhati | ajñātasattāyā vṛttāvabhāvāt | anyathā vidyamā-
nāyā api cittavṛtteḥ kadācidajñāne ahaṃ sukhī na vā duḥkhī na vā icchāmi
na vetyādiḥ saṃśayo durvāraḥ syāt | tathā ca cittavṛtteḥ sadā jñātatvopapattaye
cicchakteścittavṛttisākṣitvakālepyapariṇāmitvamavaśyamabhyupeyam | cittasyeva
cicchakterapi pariṇāmābhyupagame tu pariṇāmasya kāryatvena kādācitkatvāccittavṛtteḥ
sadā jñātatvaṃ nopapadyeta | tathā ca viṣayasya jñātatvaṃ buddhivṛttau svākārasamarpa-
ṇam | buddhivṛtterjñātatvaṃ tu cicchaktau pratibimbanamātrameva | tacca buddhivṛttervidya-
mānatvevaśyaṃbhāvyeva | cicchaktirūpasya puruṣasya sadaivādhiṣṭhātṛtvenāvasthitatvāt |
tasya ca yadantaraṅgaṃ nirmalaṃ sattvaṃ tasyāpi sadaivāvasthitatvācca | evaṃ ca cittavṛtteḥ
sadā jñātatve cicchakterapi sadā jñātṛtvamarthādeva sidhyatīti tena liṅgena ciccha-
kterapariṇāmitvamanumīyate | anvayavyāptau dṛṣṭāntābhāvādvyatirekavyāptiṃ darśa-
yati — na yadevamiti | na yadapariṇāmi na tatsadā jñātṛ yathā cittamiti
vyatirekidṛṣṭāntaḥ | niḥsaṅgatvamiti | etena puruṣasya jñātṛtvena viṣayasaṃba-
ndhāvaśyaṃbhāvāttasya niḥsaṅgatvaṃ na saṃbhavatītyapāstam | jñātṛtvasya cittavṛttiprati-
bimbanarūpatvāt | evaṃ cittavṛtterapi pariṇāmitvaṃ prasādhya cittasya pariṇāmitvaṃ
sādhayati — cittaṃ punariti | yaduparaktamiti | yena vastunoparaktaṃ cittaṃ na
bhavati tadvastvajñātamityarthaḥ | yathāyaskāntamaṇirakriyopyayasa ākarṣako bhavati
tathā akriyā api viṣayā ayovatkriyāśīlaṃ cittaṃ svamahimnendriyadvārā ākṛṣya
tatra svākārasadṛśākāraṃ samarpayanti | etadākārasamarpaṇamevoparañjanamityuparāga
iti cocyate | uparāge sati viṣayo jñāta ityucyate | anyathā tvajñāta iti |
uparāgaśca cittasya pariṇāmitve satyeva saṃbhavatīti cittasya pariṇāmitvaṃ siddham |

nanu cittasyeti | cittaṃ hi nāṇuparimāṇaṃ saṃbhavati | aṇutve yugapadane-
kaviṣayasaṃbandhāsaṃbhavenaikāgratāyāḥ siddhatvādekāgratopadeśavaiyarthyāpatteḥ | kiṃ
cośīrādivāsitajalapānādau dīrghaśaṣkulībhakṣaṇādau caikadaivānekendriyavṛttyanu-
bhavo na syāt | kiṃ ca yogināṃ sarvāvacchedenaikadākhilasākṣātkāro bhavati sa na
syāt | na ca sa yogināṃ sākṣātkāro na laukikasaṃnikarṣajanyaḥ kiṃ tu yogajadha-
rmajanya eveti vācyam | manaso vibhutvāṅgīkāreṇa laukikasaṃnikarṣeṇaivopapattau
saṃnikarṣāntarakalpane mānābhāvāt | gauravācca | kiṃ ca laukikasaṃnikarṣakāryatāva-
cchedikā sākṣātkāraniṣṭhāvāntarajātiḥ kalpyā | tathā yogajadharmakāryatāvacche-
dikā cānyā sākṣātkāraniṣṭhāvāntarajātiḥ kalpyetyatigauravam | tathā ca
yogajanyasākṣātkārepi laukikasaṃnikarṣa eva kāraṇam | sarvārthagrahaṇasamarthasya
cittasya tamaākhyāvaraṇabhaṅga eva kevalaṃ yogena kriyate | tathā atidūrātsā-
mīpyāt (sāṃ. kā. 7) ityatroktānyupalabdhipratibandhakāni kāraṇāni
(da. 5 paṃ. 40) yogena nirasyante | ata evendriyāṇāmapi vibhutvaṃ vācyam |
anyathā yogināṃ deśāntarasthavastusākṣātkārānupapatteḥ | indriyāṇāṃ vṛttilā-
bhastu tattatsthāna evetyanyat | indriyāṇāmaṇutvavyapadeśastu tattatsthānakṛta
aupādhikaḥ | evamāvaśyakasyendriyavibhutvasyānupapattistu na śaṅkanīyā | indri-
yāṇāṃ sāttvikāhaṃkārajanyatvāt | ahaṃkārasya ca vyāpakatvāt | na ca manaso
vibhutve tadgatiśrutirvirudhyata iti vācyam | prāṇādyupādhinā tadupapatteḥ | nāpi
madhyamaparimāṇaṃ manaḥ | madhyamaparimāṇasya manasaḥ pralaye vināśāvaśyaṃbhāve-
nādṛṣṭādhāratānupapatteḥ | tathā ca manasa indriyāṇāṃ ca vibhutvātsarvaviṣayasaṃni-
karṣasya sadā sattvādyogināmayogināṃ ca sarvadā jñānaprasaktirityāśayaḥ | vṛtti-
mat | viṣayākāreṇa pariṇāmi | ata eva | cittasya pariṇāmaḥ śarīra eva
nānyatretyaṅgīkārādeva | ityuktamiti | taduparāgāpekṣitvāt (pā. yo. sū.
4 | 17) iti sūtre vyāsabhāṣya iti śeṣaḥ | upasaṃharati — tasmāditi | kāma
iti | kāmo viṣayābhilāṣaḥ | saṃkalpa idaṃ nīlamityādikalpanā | vicikitsā
saṃśayaḥ | śraddhāstikyabuddhiḥ | tadviparītā buddhiraśraddhā | dhṛtirdhairyam | adhṛtista-
dviparyayaḥ | hrīrlajjā | dhīrjñānam | bhīrbhayam | etatsarvaṃ mana eva | vṛttivṛttima-
torabhedāt | atra dhīrmana evetyuktatvānna jñānarūpeṇa pariṇāma ātmana ityātmano-
'pariṇāmitvaṃ siddham | atrārthe pañcaśikhācāryoktiṃ pramāṇayati — cicchakteriti |
apariṇāminīti | iyaṃ pañcaśikhācāryoktirdraṣṭā dṛśimātraḥ (pā. yo. sū.
2 | 20) iti sūtre bhāṣyakārairuddhṛtā | bhoktṛśaktirātmā | sadā jñātā iti |
cicchakterviṣayabhūtāścittavṛttayo vidyamānāvasthāyāṃ sadā jñātā eva bhavanti na
tu cittaviṣayabhūtā ghaṭādaya iva jñātājñātāḥ | yatastāsāṃ vṛttīnāṃ prabhorbhoktuḥ
puruṣasya viṣayākāragrahaṇādyaśeṣapariṇāmaśūnyatvāditi sūtrārthaḥ | etattattvamanupa-
damevoktam (da0 15 paṃ0 188) |

dharmalakṣaṇeti | dharmiṇo dharmapariṇāmo dharmasya lakṣaṇapariṇāmo lakṣaṇasya
cāvasthāpariṇāmaḥ | tatra dharmapariṇāmo nāmāvasthitadharmiṇaḥ pūrvadharmatirobhāve
dharmāntaraprādurbhāvaḥ | yathā cittasya tattadviṣayākārā anekā vṛttayo dharmāḥ |
tatraikasyā nīlālocanarūpāyā nīlākārāyāścittavṛttestirobhāve viṣayānta-
rālocanarūpāyāstasyāḥ prādurbhāvaḥ | kanakasya kaṭakadharmatirobhāve mukuṭa-
dharmaprādurbhāvaḥ | mṛttikāyāśca piṇḍadharmatirobhāve ghaṭadharmaprādurbhāvaḥ | dravya-
syāpi dharmaśabdena vyapadeśaḥ | bādhakābhāvāt | na ca pūrvadharmasya nāśa eva |
kathaṃ tirobhāva ucyate | tathā dharmāntarasyotpattireva | kathamāvirbhāva ucyata iti
vācyam | satkāryavādapakṣāṅgīkāreṇa sarvadharmāṇāṃ sadā sattvāt | tathā cātra
darśana āvirbhāvatirobhāvāvevotpattivināśau na tvasata utpattiḥ sato vā
nāśaḥ | tathā ca yathā dharmī svarūpeṇa sadā vidyamāna eva tattaddharmabhāgbhavati
tathā dharmopi pratyekaṃ sadā vidyamāna eva krameṇānāgatatvavartamānatvātītatvarūpa-
bhinnabhinnalakṣaṇabhāgbhavati | eṣa dharmasya lakṣaṇapariṇāmaḥ | lakṣaṇapariṇāmo
nāmāvasthitasyaiva dharmasyaikaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vihāya lakṣaṇāntareṇa pariṇāmaḥ | anāgata-
tvavartamānatvātītatvarūpaṃ trayamatra tantre lakṣaṇaśabdenādhvaśabdena cocyate | dharmā
iva lakṣaṇānyapi vidyamānānyeva kevalamāvirbhavanti tirobhavanti ceti na
satkāryavādahāniḥ | lakṣaṇānāṃ ca trayāṇāmapi pratikṣaṇaṃ tāratamyaṃ bhavati | lakṣa-
ṇasya tāratamyaṃ ca tattallakṣaṇāpanneṣu dharmeṣvavalokanīyam | yathā nīlālocanasya
cittadharmasya vartamānatvalakṣaṇe vidyamāna evāsphuṭataratvāsphuṭatvasphuṭatvasphuṭatara-
tvarūpānekāvasthābhistāratamyamanubhūyate | yathā ca kanakadharmasya kaṭakādermṛddharmasya
piṇḍādervā navatvapurāṇatvādyavasthābhedonubhūyate | sa ca sattvādiguṇānāṃ cañcalasva-
bhāvatvātpratikṣaṇaṃ jāyata ityanumīyate | eṣa lakṣaṇasyāvasthāpariṇāmaḥ | ava-
sthāpariṇāmo nāmāvasthitasyaiva lakṣaṇasyaikāmavasthāṃ vihāyāvasthāntareṇa pari-
ṇāmaḥ | ayaṃ cāvasthāpariṇāmo vartamānatvalakṣaṇāpanne dharme sphuṭaḥ | anāgatā-
tītatvayostu taddṛṣṭāntenānumeyaḥ | idaṃ ca sarvaṃ dharmiṇo dharmalakṣaṇāvasthānāṃ ca
kālpanikaṃ bhedamāśrityoktam | paramārthatastu sarva eva pariṇāmo dharmiṇa eva |
dharmalakṣaṇāvasthānāṃ dharmimātrasvarūpatvāt | dharmādipariṇāmadvārā ca dharmipariṇā-
masyaiva prapañcanāt | tatra dharmiṇastrividhepi pariṇāme saṃsthānānyathātvameva na dravyā-
nyathātvam | tathā ca dharmadharmiṇornātyantaṃ bhedo nāpyatyantamabheda iti bodhyam |

vṛttinirodhasya yogatvamasahamānaḥ śaṅkate — nanviti | vṛttinirodhaśca yatkiṃ-
cidvṛttinirodha eva tvadabhimataḥ | na tu sakalavṛttinirodhaḥ | anyathā tavaiva
yogatvenābhimate saṃprajñātasamādhāvavyāpteḥ | tatra sāttvikyā ātmaviṣayiṇyā
vṛtteranirodhāt | cittaṃ hi kadācitkṣiptaṃ kadācinmūḍhaṃ kadācidvikṣiptaṃ kadācide-
kāgraṃ kadācinniruddhaṃ ceti pañcavṛttikam | tatra suṣuptau kṣiptavikṣiptavṛttyorabhāvaḥ |
jāgṛtau ca mūḍhavṛtterabhāvaḥ | ekāgraniruddhavṛttyorabhāvastu prāyo baddhajīvasya
sadaiva | tathā cedṛśavṛttinirodhasya yogatvāpattiḥ | iṣṭāpattistu na | sūtrakāraiścaturtha-
pādaśeṣe yogaphalatvenoktāyāḥ kleśānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca nivṛtterniḥ śreyasaprāpteścātrādarśa-
nāt | pratyutāyaṃ vṛttinirodho mokṣavirodhī | suṣuptyādāvityādipadena jāgṛtiḥ |
kṣiptamūḍhādītyādipadena vikṣiptaikāgraniruddhasaṃgrahaḥ | niḥśreyasaṃ mokṣaḥ | paripanthi
śatrubhūtam | kṣiptaṃ nāmeti | rajoguṇodrekādasthiraṃ bahirmukhatayā viṣayeṣu
preritamityarthaḥ | īdṛśaṃ cittaṃ prāyo daityadānavānāṃ sadaiva | tamoguṇodrekātkṛtyā-
kṛtyavicāraśūnyaṃ krodhādyupahataṃ nidrāvṛttimadvā mūḍham | īdṛśaṃ cittaṃ prāyaḥ sadaiva
rakṣaḥpiśācādīnām | sattvaguṇodrekādduḥkhasādhanaṃ parihṛtya sukhasādhaneṣveva
śabdādiṣu pravṛttaṃ vikṣiptam | īdṛśaṃ cittaṃ prāyaḥ sadaiva devānām | tacca viṣaya-
viśeṣānusāreṇa kadācitkiṃcitkālaparyantaṃ sthiramapi bhavati | cañcalamiti |
cañcalamatyarthaṃ sadā calanasvabhāvam | pramāthi śarīrendriyakṣobhakam | balavadabhi-
pretādviṣayātkenāpyupāyena nivārayitumaśakyam | dṛḍhaṃ viṣayavāsanādurgapraviṣṭa-
tayā bhettumaśakyam | anuśayaḥ | anubandhaḥ | vyādhistyāneti | vyādhyā-
dayo nava cittasya vikṣepā asthiratvāpādakā ata eva te yogasyāntarāyā
virodhina iti sūtrārthaḥ | doṣatrayaṃ vātapittakapharūpam | akarmaṇyatvaṃ yogānu-
ṣṭhānākṣamatvam | abhāvanaṃ prayatnābhāvaḥ | tena samādhisādhanībhūtaśamādiprāptirna
bhavati | śarīreti | śarīrasya gurutvaṃ kaphādinā | vāco gurutvaṃ tāmasapadārthase-
vanena | cittasya gurutvaṃ ca tamoguṇodrekeṇa | samādhibhūmeriti | madhumatyādi-
ṣvanyatamāyā api bhūmerityarthaḥ | madhumatyādibhūmisvarūpamagre anupadameva
vakṣyate | tasmāditi | kṣiptādyavasthāsu vṛttinirodhasattvepi yogaphalībhūtāyāḥ
kleśahānerniḥśreyasaprāpteścābhāvādvṛttinirodho yogasvarūpatāṃ nārhatītyāśayaḥ |
yogatvasaṃbhavāditi | tathā ca cittavṛttinirodha iti yogalakṣaṇaṃ yuktameva |
kṣiptādyavasthāsu yatkiṃcidvṛttinirodhasattvena tatra yogalakṣaṇasyātivyāptistu na
śaṅkanīyā | draṣṭurātyantikasvarūpāvasthitihetucittavṛttinirodhasya kleśakarmādipari-
panthicittavṛttinirodhasya vā yogalakṣaṇatvenābhipretatvāt | pralaye suṣuptau ca
vidyamānasya nirodhasya vyāvṛttaya ātyantiketi | kṣiptamūḍhavikṣiptāvasthāsu tu
vidyamānopi yatkiṃcidvṛttinirodho na svarūpāvasthitiheturnāpi kleśādiparipanthīti
nātivyāptiḥ | saṃprajñātasya cāsaṃprajñātadvārā svarūpāvasthitihetutvaṃ bodhyam |

sa ca samādhiriti | aṅgibhūto yogapadavācyaḥ samādhirityarthaḥ | bāhya-
viṣayāṇāmiti | ātmaviṣayā sāttvikī pramāṇavṛttistu tadānīmastyeva |
viviktatayā | bhinnatayā | savitarkādīti | ādipadena savicārasānanda-
sāsmitasaṃgrahaḥ | bhāvyasya | bhāvanīyasya | puruṣa iti | atra puruṣapadena jī-
vātmano grahaṇam | īśvarastattvāni cetyevaṃ bhāvyamadhya īśvarasya pṛthaggaṇanāt |
pṛthivyādīni | jīveśvarayorupādhibhūtāni śarīrendriyāṇi virāṭśarīraṃ catu-
rbhujādikaṃ veśvarasahitaṃ tathā svaśarīraṃ ca jīvasahitamadhikṛtya bhāvanā pravartate |
tatra śarīra indriyeṣu ca ye ca tatra guṇadoṣaviśeṣāḥ pūrvaṃ śrutāsteṣvādau sāmānyaṃ
tato viśeṣastathādau dharmī tato dharma ityevaṃ pūrvāparānusaṃdhānena bhāvanayā sākṣā-
tkāro jāyate | tathā tattacchabdollekhapūrvakaṃ tattadarthabhāvanayā ca | ye ca pūrvamaśru-
tā viśeṣāsteṣāṃ bhāvanāyā asaṃbhavepi tāṃ vinaiva yogabalena sākṣātkāro bhavati |
ayaṃ ca sthūlaviṣayakaḥ sākṣātkāro vitarka ityucyate | viśeṣeṇa tarkaṇaṃ śabdā-
rthajñānavikalparūpaṃ yatreti vyutpatteḥ | tena sahitaḥ savitarkaḥ | tataḥ sthūlasākṣā-
tkārānantaraṃ tatrānityatvādidoṣajñānena tāṃ sthūlākāradṛṣṭiṃ tyaktvā sthūlayorbhūte-
ndriyayoḥ kāraṇatvena tatrānugatā ye prakṛtimahadahaṃkārarūpāḥ sūkṣmā arthāsteṣāṃ
tadgataviśeṣāṇāṃ cāśrutānāmapi deśakāladharmānusāreṇa bhāvanayā yaḥ sākṣātkāro
jāyate sa vicāra ityucyate | viśeṣeṇa cāraḥ sūkṣmavastuparyantaḥ saṃcāro
yatreti vyutpatteḥ | tena sahitaḥ savicāraḥ | sthūleṣvapyartheṣu sūkṣmadṛṣṭiryathārthā
jāyata eva | kāryakāraṇayorabhedāt | tatastāmapi sūkṣmaviṣayāṃ dṛṣṭimanityatvā-
didoṣadarśanena tyaktvā caturviṃśatitattvānugataṃ sattvaguṇakāryaṃ yatsukhaṃ tasya
rajastamoleśābhibhūtasattvāśrayeṇa citiśakternyagbhāvātpravartamānayā bhāvanayā
manorājyādāviva kalpyamāno vaiṣayikasukhasākṣātkāra ānanda ityucyate | tena
sahitaḥ samādhiḥ sānandaḥ | yadyapi sukhavadduḥkhamohāvapi sarvatrānugatau tathāpi
tayoḥ svabhāvata eva heyatvāttadbhāvanāyā nāvaśyakatvam | tataḥ sukhepi kṣaṇikatvā-
nityatvādidoṣadṛṣṭyā tasmādvirajya jīvasvarūpasyeśvarasvarūpasya ca jaḍebhyo vivekena
ya ātmākāraḥ sākṣātkāraḥ so'smitā | atra rajastamoleśenāpyanabhibhūtaṃ śuddhaṃ
sattvamiti tasya nyagbhāvaḥ | citiśakteścodrekaḥ | atrāsmītyevāstītyeva cākāraḥ |
tatra pūrvaṃ jīvātmaviṣayā asmitā | tatastatopi sūkṣmā paramātmaviṣayā | tada-
nugataḥ samādhiḥ sāsmitaḥ | eṣā cittasya caramā bhūmiḥ | tataḥ paraṃ jñātavyā-
bhāvāt | asminsaṃprajñātasamādhibhedacatuṣṭaye krameṇa cittabhūmayo madhumatī madhu-
pratīkā viśokā saṃskāraśeṣā ityucyante | 15|252 — tasya for tasyām c.

kleśakarmavipākāśayānāṃ caturṇāṃ svarūpaṃ nirūpayiṣyannādau kleśānnirūpayati —
kleśā iti | avidyeti | eṣāṃ svarūpaṃ mūla eva vistareṇa vakṣyate | saṃkṣepeṇa tu
pradarśyate | atasmiṃstadbuddhiravidyā | tanmūlakā evāsmitādayaścatvāraḥ | cittapuru-
ṣayoraikyābhimāno'smitā | viṣayābhilāṣo rāgaḥ | krodho dveṣaḥ | śarīrādibhiḥ
kadāpi viyogo mā bhūdityākārako mānaso bhāvobhiniveśaḥ |

nanvavidyeti | abhāvārthakasya nañityavyayasya vidyāśabdena sahāvyayaṃ vibhakti
(pāṇi. sū. 2 | 1 | 6) iti pāṇinisūtreṇāvyayībhāvasamāse vidyāyā abhāva
ityarthaḥ pratīyate | avyayībhāvasamāse pūrvapadārthaprādhānyasyautsargikatvāt | yathā
amakṣikamityatra makṣikāṇāmabhāva ityarthaḥ | nañtatpuruṣasamāsāṅgīkāre tu yasya
kasyacidabhāvena viśiṣṭā vidyetyarthaḥ syāt | tatpuruṣasamāsa uttarapadārthaprādhānya-
syautsargikatvāt | yathā rājapuruṣa ityatra rājasaṃbandhaviśiṣṭaḥ puruṣa ityarthaḥ | arā-
japuruṣa ityatra cāropito rājapuruṣa ityarthaḥ | bahuvrīhisamāse tvavidyamānā vidyā
yasyāstādṛśī buddhirityarthaḥ syāt | bahuvrīhisamāsenyapadārthaprādhānyasyautsargi-
katvāt | na makṣikā yasminnamakṣiko deśa itivat | prasajyapratiṣedheti |
prāptipūrvako niṣedho hi prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ | tathā cāvidyāśabdādvidyāyāḥ prasakti-
pūrvakaṃ tadabhāvamātraṃ pratīyate na tu tatsahakṛtaṃ bhāvarūpamanyatkiṃcit | vidyāyā
abhāvaśca na kleśādīñjanayati | kiṃ tu vidyāviparītaṃ jñānameva tajjanakam | tādṛ-
śajñānarūporthaścāvyayībhāvasamāse sati nāvidyāśabdātpratīyate | strīliṅgatvā-
bhāveti | avyayībhāvaśca (pāṇi. sū. 2 | 4 | 18) iti sūtreṇāvyayībhāvasya
klībatvavidhānāt | kasyaciditi | rāgadveṣaśokamohādiṣvanyatamasya kasyaci-
dabhāvena yuktā vidyā kleśādīnvināśayenna tu janayet | nanu nābhāvapratiyogi-
tvena rāgādayo vivakṣyante kiṃ tvātmasākṣātkāraḥ | tathā cātmasākṣātkārasyā-
bhāvena yuktāyā vidyāyāḥ kleśādibījatvamupapadyata iti cenna | tādṛśavidyāyā
vidyātvasyaivābhāvāt | tatpuruṣe hi prādhānyamuttarapadārthasya | tathā cāpradhānena
pūrvapadārthenābhāvena tathaiva svapratiyogina ākṣepaḥ syādyathottarapadārthatvena svaṃ prati
pradhānībhūtāyā vidyāyāḥ svarūpaṃ na vihanyeta | tathā ca vidyāviruddhānāṃ rāgā-
dīnāmevābhāvo grāhya iti | nañostyarthānāmiti | nañaḥ pareṣāmastyarthavā-
cināṃ padāntareṇa saha bahuvrīhirbhavati pūrvapadaghaṭakānāmuttarapadabhūtānāmastyarthānāṃ
lopaśca vikalpena bhavatīti vṛttikāravacanārthaḥ | tathā cāvidyāśabde bahuvrīhau
vidyārahitā buddhiḥ samāsārthaḥ syāt | asyāśca buddhervidyāyā abhāvamātreṇa
kleśādihetutvaṃ na ghaṭate | vidyāyā abhāvepi yāvanna viparītā buddhistāvanna
kathamapi kleśādisaṃbhavaḥ | nanu vidyāyā abhāvasyaiva kleśādihetutvamastu ko doṣa
iti cettatrāha — vivekakhyātīti | vidyā ca jñānaviśeṣaḥ | asaṃprajñātasamādhau
ca prakṛtipuruṣabhedasākṣātkārapūrvako buddheḥ sakalavṛttinirodha iti jñānasāmānya-
syaivābhāve jñānaviśeṣarūpāyā vidyāyā abhāva eveti tadānīṃ buddheḥ kleśādihe-
tutvaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ | nanvavidyāyāḥ kleśādihetutvābhāve kā hāniriti cettatrāha —
uktaṃ ceti | sūtrakāreṇeti śeṣaḥ | avidyānidānatvam | avidyāmūlakatvam |
avidyā kṣetramiti | avidyāsmitā (pā. yo. sū. 2 | 3) iti pūrvasūtrokta-
kleśapañcakamadhya uttareṣāmasmitārāgadveṣābhiniveśānāṃ caturṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prasuptatanu-
vicchinnodārarūpeṇa pratyekaṃ caturvidhānāmapyavidyā kṣetraṃ prasavabhūmiriti sūtrārthaḥ |
tatreti | ye kleśāścittabhūmau sthitāḥ prabodhakābhāvātsvakāryaṃ nārabhante te
prasuptāḥ | yathā bālānāṃ prakṛtilayānāṃ ca | sādhikāre acaritārthe eva
cetasyupāsanayā prakṛtau līne sati brahmāṇḍādbahiḥ prakṛtyākhyāvaraṇe liṅgadehena
saha yedhikāravaśāccittasya punarāvṛttiparyantaṃ kaivalyapadamivānubhavanti te prakṛti-
layāḥ | śithilīkaraṇamiti | yathā yogināṃ cetasi vāsanāvaśeṣatayāvasthi-
tānām | abhibhava iti | yathā dveṣāvasthāyāṃ rāgasya rāgāvasthāyāṃ vā dveṣasya |
mitho viruddhayoranayoryaugapadyaṃ na saṃbhavati | kāryakāritvamiti | yathā
baddhānāṃ jīvānām | taduktamiti | avidyā kṣetram (pā. yo sū. 2 | 4) iti
sūtra iti śeṣaḥ | pakṣatraye | avyayībhāvatatpuruṣabahuvrīhirūpe |

paryudāseti | paryudāso bhedaḥ | tatra ca kvacitprayogopādhitayā virodhārthopi
gamyate | yathā adharmaśabdasya dharmabhinno dharmavirodhī pāparūporthaḥ | tathā avi-
dyāśabdasya vidyābhinnaṃ vidyāviruddhaṃ mithyājñānamarthaḥ | nāmadhātvartheti | vidhya-
rthakā ye liṅādipratyayāstadarthayoge naño niṣedhārthakatvam | nāmārthayoge dhātvartha-
yoge ca na niṣedhārthaḥ | kiṃ tu paryudāsaṃ vadati | yato'brāhmaṇaśabde brāhmaṇānya-
mātramarthaṃ nañ vadati | adharmaśabde ca dharmavirodhyarthaṃ nañ vadati | uktamiti |
anityāśuci (pā. yo. sū. 2 | 5) iti sūtrabhāṣyavyākhyāyāmiti śeṣaḥ |
yadyapi tatpuruṣa uttarapadārthasya prādhānyaṃ tathāpi nañtatpuruṣe nañottarapadārtha
upamṛdyate paryudasyate | tathā tatrottarapadārthaviruddhārthako nañupalabhyate | tadvada-
vidyāśabdepītyarthaḥ | 15|286 — vadanti for vadati c.

etāvatā granthasaṃdarbheṇāvidyāśabde samāsārthaṃ nirūpya sāṃpratamavidyāsvarūpaṃ pra-
darśayati — etadeveti | etadeva paryudāsārthakatvameva | anityāśucīti | ata-
smiṃstaditi pratibhāso'vidyetyavidyāsāmānyalakṣaṇamagre (da. 15 paṃ. 308) vakṣyate |
tasyā evāvāntarabhedacatuṣṭayamanena sūtreṇocyate | anitye nityatvapratītiraśucau
śucitvapratītirduḥkhe sukhatvapratītiranātmanyātmatvapratītiśceti | upalakṣaṇametat |
nitye'nityaṃtvapratītiḥ śucāvaśucitvapratītiḥ sukhe duḥkhatvapratītirātmanyanātma-
tvapratītirapyavidyaiva | pāpādau puṇyādibuddhirapyavidyaiva | śarīrasyāśucitvamupa-
pādayati — sthānāditi | sthānaṃ śarīrasyotpattisthānaṃ māturudaraṃ mūtrādyupahatam |
bījaṃ śarīrasyopādānakāraṇaṃ śukraṃ śoṇitaṃ ca | upaṣṭambhaḥ poṣako'śitapītānnā-
dirasaḥ | niṣyandaḥ prasvedādiḥ | nidhanaṃ maraṇam | taddhi śrotriyaśarīramapyapavi-
trayati | snānādibhirādheyaṃ śaucaṃ yasya | ataḥ svayamaśucyeva śarīraṃ paṇḍitā
jānantītyarthaḥ | pariṇāmeti | srakcandanavanitādyupabhogajaṃ vaiṣayikaṃ sarvameva
sukhaṃ vivekino duḥkhameva | viṣasaṃpṛktasvādvannavat | yatastatsukhaṃ pariṇāmaduḥkhasya
tāpaduḥkhasya saṃskāraduḥkhasya ca kāraṇaṃ bhavati | sukhasādhanasaṃpattau sukhopabhoga-
kāle vā hiṃsādernāntarīyakatayā tajjanyaṃ bhāvi duḥkhaṃ pariṇāmaduḥkham | tathā
sukhopabhogakāle svāpekṣayānyasya sukhādhikyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tadasahanena jāyamānaṃ tāpa-
duḥkham | tathā sukhopabhogakāle jāyamānātsaṃskārātpunaḥ punastatsmaraṇe tena ca
tatsādhanaprāptaye pravṛttau kadācittatsādhanālābhe jāyamānaṃ saṃskāraduḥkham | kiṃ ca
sattvādiguṇatrayavṛttayaḥ sarvasya triguṇātmakatvena sarvatrāvirodhena mithaḥ saṃyuktā
eva vartante | tathā ca sukhasādhanībhūtatvenābhimatepyarthe rajoguṇakāryasya duḥkha-
syāntato'varjanīyatvameva | tathā ca vivekinaḥ parijñātakleśādivivekasya sakala-
meva bhogasādhanaṃ pratikūlavedanīyaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ | anātmanīti | vastuta
ātmabhinne dehādau dehināṃ yātmabuddhiḥ sā avidyā | tatkṛta evāyaṃ saṃsārabandhaḥ |
tasyā avidyāyā nāśa eva mokṣa ityucyata ityarthaḥ | catuṣpadeti | catvāri
padāni sthānāni yasyā iti catuṣpadā | eṣā catuṣpadā avidyāsya saṃsārasya
mūlamiti sūtrakāreṇa nirdiṣṭā | tena śuktirajatādyavidyānāmagaṇanepi na nyūnatā |

evamavidyārūpaṃ prathamaṃ kleśaṃ nirūpya tanmūlakaṃ dvitīyamasmitārūpaṃ kleśaṃ
nirūpayati — sattvapuruṣayoriti | sattvaṃ cittam | buddhiriti yāvat | dṛgdarśa-
neti | dṛkca darśanaṃ ca te eva śaktī | dṛkśaktirdraṣṭā puruṣaḥ | darśanaśāktiḥ karaṇaṃ
buddhiḥ | tayorātmānātmanoryaukatmatevaikākāratārūpaikasvarūpāpattiriva sā a-
smitā kleśa ityarthaḥ | anātmani buddhāvātmabuddhirūpā yā avidyā tayeyamasmitā
saṃpāditā | tatrāvidyāvasthāyāṃ yadyapi buddhyādau sāmānyatohaṃbuddhirasti tathāpi
sā bhedābhedaviṣayā | tadānīmatyantābhedāgrahaṇāt | taduttaraṃ puruṣe buddhyādini-
ṣṭhaguṇaṃdoṣāropajanaka īśvarohamahaṃ bhogītyādirūpo yotyantamekatābhramaḥ so-
'smitā | ekatābhramaṃ vinānyonyasminnanyonyadharmādhyāsenaiva bhoga iti tu na
saṃbhavati | puruṣasyāpariṇāmitvena buddheśca pariṇāmitvenātyantabhinnadharmatvenātyanta-
vibhaktayorbhoktṛbhogyaśaktyoḥ puruṣabuddhyoravibhāgarūpaikatvapratyaye satyeva paraspa-
radharmādhyāsena bhogasaṃbhavo nānyathā |

asmitākleśamūlakaṃ tṛtīyakleśaṃ rāgaṃ tanmūlakaṃ dveṣaṃ ca nirūpayati — sukhābhi-
jñasyetyādinā |

prasaṅgādanuśayiśabdasya sādhutvamupapādayati — kimatreti | sukhamanuśete
tacchīlaḥ sukhānuśayī | sukhopapadādanupūrvācchīdhātorṇinipratyayaḥ | atha vā
sukhasyānuśayaḥ saṃbandhaviśeṣaḥ | sosyāstīti sukhānuśayī | sukhānuśayaśabdānma-
tvarthe ata iniṭhanau (pāṇi. sū. 5 | 2 | 115) iti sūtreṇenipratyaya iti bhāvaḥ |
supyajātāviti | jātibhinnavācini subanta upapade tācchīlye dyotye dhātoḥ
kartrarthe ṇinipratyayo bhavatīti sūtrārthaḥ | uṣṇabhojī | uṣṇabhojanaśīla eva-
mucyate | na tu kadācidya uṣṇaṃ bhuṅkte | atra vṛttikārāḥ — supi sthaḥ (pāṇi. sū.
3 | 2 | 4) iti sūtrātsupīti padaṃ yadyapyanuvartate tathāpi tanmadhye satsūdviṣa
(pāṇi. sū. 3 | 2 | 61) iti sūtra upasargepītyanena saṃbaddham | tannivṛttaye punaratra
supītyucyate | tathā copasarge ṇinipratyayo na bhavatīti | paraṃ tvetanmahābhāṣyavi-
ruddham | tatra hi supīti vartamāne punaḥ subgrahaṇaṃ kimartham | anupasarga ityevaṃ
tadabhūt | idaṃ tu subūmātre yathā syādityuktam | ayamāśayaḥ — supi sthaḥ
(pāṇi. sū. 3 | 2 | 4) ityatra supītyupasargetaraparam | satsūdviṣa (pāṇi. sū.
3 | 2 | 61) iti sūtra upasargepītyukteḥ | tathā ca tadanuvṛttāvanu yāyītyādau
ṇinipratyayo na syāt | atotra supītyuktamiti | prasiddhaścopasargepi ṇinipratyayaḥ-
anuyāyivargaḥ (raghu. 2 | 4) parito visāriṇā (raghu. 3 | 15) visāri
sarvataḥ (māgha. 1 | 2) prabhavonujīvibhiḥ (kirāta 1 | 4) iti | tadanusāre-
pyāha — yathākathaṃciditi | aco ñṇitīti | ñakāretsaṃjñake ṇakāretsaṃjñake
vā pratyaye pare ajantāṅgasya vṛddhiḥ syāditi tatsūtrārthaḥ | ekākṣarāditi | ata 15|313 — nindā for nivṛttiḥ A.
iniṭhanau (pāṇi. sū. 5 | 2 | 115) iti sūtreṇa hrasvākārāntācchabdānmatvartha
iniṭhanau pratyayau vidhīyete | tasya niṣedhakametadvacanam | ekākṣarācchabdādiniṭhanau
na bhavataḥ | svavān | kṛtpratyayāntānna bhavataḥ | kārakavān | jātivācakācca na
bhavataḥ | vyāghravān | tathā saptamyarthe na bhavataḥ | daṇḍā asyāṃ santi daṇḍavatī
śālā | anuśayaśabdastu kṛtpratyayāntaḥ | anupūrvācchīdhātorerac (pāṇi. sū.
3 | 3 | 56) iti sūtreṇa bhāve acpratyayavidhānāt | tathā ca kṛdantatvādini-
pratyayasya niṣedhenuśayavāniti bhavitavyaṃ na tvanuśayīti | prāyiketi | ekā-
kṣarāditi vacanaṃ prāyikaṃ na tu sārvatrikam | itikaraṇa iti | itikaraṇa
itiśabdaḥ | sa ca tadasyāstyasminniti matup (pāṇi. sū. 5 | 2 | 94) iti sūtre
pāṇininā nirdiṣṭaḥ | sa cetiśabdo laukikīṃ vivakṣāmanusārayati laukikaprayo-
gānusāreṇa pratyayavidhānamiti | sa cottaratra matva rthīyaprakaraṇe sarvatra saṃbadhyate |
tathā cāta iniṭhanau (pāṇi. sū. 5 | 2 | 115) ityatrāpi tatsaṃbandha itīniṭhanau
pratyayāvapi laukikaprayogānusāreṇaiva kartavyāviti svavānityādau na bhavataḥ |
tanmūlakamekākṣarāditi vacanaṃ nāpūrvam | loke tu kvacitkṛdantādapīniṭhanau
dṛśyete | yathā kāryī kāryikaḥ | tathā jātivācakācchabdādapi dṛśyete yathā taṇḍulī
taṇḍulika iti | tadvadanuśayaśabdasya kṛdantatvepīnipratyayopapattiriti bhāvaḥ |

athābhiniveśākhyaṃ pañcamaṃ kleśaṃ nirūpayati — pūrvajanmeti | mā na bhūvamiti |
ahaṃ kadāpi mā na bhūvamiti na kiṃ tu sarvadā bhūyāsameveti prārthanā prāṇimātra- 15|332 — bhavarūpaḥ for bhayarūpaḥ D.
syānubhavasiddhā | svaraseti | svasya rasena saṃskāramātreṇa vahatīti svarasavāhī
svābhāvikaḥ | na tvāgantukaḥ | tādṛśaśca bhayaviśeṣarūpaḥ kleśaḥ — ahaṃ kadāpi
mā bhūvamiti na kiṃ tu sadā bhūyāsameva — ityākārako'viduṣa iva viduṣopi
rūḍhaḥ prasiddhaḥ | sobhiniveśa iti sūtrārthaḥ | upahāraḥ | prāptiḥ |

kleśakarmavipākāśayaparipanthicittavṛttinirodho yoga iti prāguktam (da.
15 paṃ. 258) | taddhaṭakapadārtheṣu nirūpaṇīyeṣu kleśā avāntaravibhāgapūrvakaṃ
nirūpitāḥ | idānīṃ karmādīnnirūpayati — karmāṇīti | vipākā iti |
vipacyate sādhyate karmabhiriti vipākaḥ karmaphalam | tacca jātyāyurbhogarūpeṇa
trividham | jātirjanma | āyurjīvanakālaḥ | bhogaḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakaśabdā-
divṛttiḥ | atra bhogo mukhyaṃ karmaphalam | tannāntarīyake ca janmāyuṣī | tatpa-
ripanthīti | tacchabdena kleśakarmavipākāśayarūpaṃ pūrvoktaṃ catuṣṭayaṃ parāmṛśyate |
tucchatveneti | tucchatvaṃ niḥsvarūpatvam | vṛttinirodhasya vṛttyabhāvamātratve tasya
svarūparahitatvena tasmāddhyeyasākṣātkāro na saṃbhavati | abhāvādbhāvotpattyayo-
gāt | na hi svarūparahitācchaśaśṛṅgādeḥ sakāśātkasyāpi kāryasyotpattirjāyate |
kiṃ tu tadāśraya iti | saṃprajñātasamādheravāntarabhedāḥ savitarkādayaścatvāraḥ
prāguktāḥ (da. 15 paṃ. 242) | tatra savitarke samādhau jāyamānā cittasyāvasthā
madhumatītyucyate | savicāre madhupratīkā | sānande viśokā | sāsmite saṃskāra-
śeṣā | avasthānāṃ ca bhāvarūpatvāttasmāddhyeyasākṣātkāra upapadyate | nanveṣāṃ
caturvidhānāmavasthāviśeṣāṇāṃ nirodhaśabdavācyatvaṃ kathamupapadyata ityata āha —
nirudhyanta iti | nītyupasargapūrvādrudhadhātoradhikaraṇe ghañpratyayaḥ |

atha cittavṛttinirodhopāyamāha — abhyāseti | taduktaṃ patañjalinā — abhyā-
savairāgyābhyāṃ tannirodhaḥ (pā. yo. sū. 1 | 12) iti | abhyāsavairāgyābhyāṃ
militābhyāṃ cittavṛttinirodho bhavatītyarthaḥ | cittanadyāḥ pravāhaḥ svabhāvato
viṣayamārgagāmī | sa viṣayadoṣadarśanajena vairāgyeṇa pratibadhyate | pratibaddhaśca sa
