vivekadarśanābhyāsena vivekamārgagāmī bhavati | tena ca dhyeyākāravṛttipravāhasya
balavattvaṃ dārḍhyaṃ cetyabhyāsavairāgyobhayādhīnaścittavṛttinirodha iti tātparyam |
abhyāsaṃ nirūpayansūtramāha — tatreti | tatrābhyāsavairāgyamadhye | vṛttirahita-
syeti | rājasatāmasavṛttirahitasyetyarthaḥ | taṃ nimittīkṛtyeti | taṃ pariṇāmavi-
śeṣaṃ nimittīkṛtyetyarthaḥ | tādṛśasthitiprāptaya iti yāvat | nanu sūtre sthitāviti
saptamyantaṃ padaṃ dṛśyate | tasyāyamarthaḥ kathamityata āha — carmaṇīti | carmani-
mittamityarthaḥ | carmaprāptaya iti yāvat | dṛṣṭeti | dṛṣṭo viṣaya ihaloka upala-
bhyamānaḥ stryannapānādiḥ | anuśrūyate gurumukhādityanuśravo vedaḥ | tata āgata-
stadekasamadhigamyaḥ svargādirviṣaya ānuśravikaḥ | dvividhepi viṣaye pariṇāmavi-
rasatvadoṣadarśanena nivṛttābhilāṣasya yā vaśīkārasaṃjñā tadvairāgyam | mamaite viṣayā
vaśyā nāhameteṣāṃ viṣayāṇāṃ vaśya iti vicāro vaśīkārasaṃjñeti vyapadiśyate |

evaṃ cittavṛttinirodhopāyabhūte abhyāsavairāgye pradarśya tādṛśābhyāsavairāgya-
sādhanāya kriyāyogamāha — samādhīti | samādhiścittavṛttinirodhaḥ | tacchatru-
bhūtā ye avidyādayaḥ kleśāsteṣāṃ tanūkaraṇaṃ svakāryakaraṇapratibandhastadarthamityarthaḥ | 15|350 — na vaśyāḥ for vaśyāḥ D.
ārurukṣoriti | yogaṃ cittavṛttinirodhamārurukṣorāroḍhumicchorna tvārūḍhasya
muneḥ | bhāvyavasthābhiprāyeṇa munipadoktiḥ | tādṛśasya yogārohaṇasādhanaṃ karmo-
cyate | niṣkāmakarmaṇā hi cittaśuddhistato vairāgyaṃ tato vṛttinirodha iti |
yogārūḍhasya tu tasya śamaḥ sarvakarmasaṃnyāsa eva jñānaparipākasādhanamucyata
ityarthaḥ | yogārūḍhaśca gītāyāṃ lakṣitaḥ —

yadā hi nendriyārtheṣu na karmasvanuṣajjate |
sarvasaṃkalpasaṃnyāsī yogārūḍhastadocyate || (bha. gī. 6 | 4) iti |

tapa iti | tapaḥ svādhyāya īśvaraprāṇidhānaṃ cetyetāni kriyāyoga ityucyate |
kriyārūpo yogaḥ kriyāyogaḥ | yogasādhanatvātta paḥprabhṛtikriyāyā yogatvamaupa-
cārikam | vidhineti |

tryahaṃ prātastryahaṃ sāyaṃ tryahamadyādayācitam |
paraṃ tryahaṃ ca nāśnīyātprājāpatyaṃ careddvijaḥ || (manu. 11 | 211)
ityevaṃ dvādaśadinasādhyaṃ prājāpatyakṛcchram | anyepi kṛcchrabhedāstatroktāstata
eva jñeyāḥ | cāndrāyaṇamucyate — śuklapratipadi mayūrāṇḍasamāna eka eva grāso
bhakṣaṇīyaḥ | dvitīyāyāṃ dvau | evamekaikavṛddhyā pūrṇimāyāṃ pañcadaśa grāsāḥ | tataḥ
kṛṣṇapratipadi caturdaśa | dvitīyāyāṃ trayodaśa | evamekaikahrāsena kṛṣṇacaturdaśyā-
mekaḥ | amāyāṃ tūpavāsaḥ | etadyavamadhyacāndrāyaṇamucyate | atrāntyadina upa-
vāsaḥ | yadā ca kṛṣṇapratipadamārabhya pūrṇimāntaṃ kriyate tadā madhya upavāsaḥ |
etatpipīlikāmadhyacāndrāyaṇamucyate | kṛcchracāndrāyaṇādīnāṃ yathāvidhyanuṣṭhānena
yaccharīraśoṣaṇaṃ tattapasāṃ madhya uttamaṃ tapaḥ prāhurityarthaḥ | tapaśca yathā cittapra-
sādo na vihanyate tathaiva kāryam | svādhyāyaṃ nirūpayati — praṇaveti | praṇava
oṃkāraḥ | prabhṛtiśabdena puruṣasūktarudrādisaṃgrahaḥ | mantraśabdavyutpattistu —

mananāntrāyate yasmāttasmānmantraḥ prakīrtitaḥ |
iti bodhyā | mantrāṇāmacintyaśaktiteti kalpasūtram |

svādhyāyaprasaṅgena mantrasvarūpaṃ vibhāgapūrvakaṃ pradarśayati — te ceti | teṣā-
miti | teṣāṃ mantrāṇāṃ madhye yatra vākyerthavaśena cchandoviśeṣavaśena ca pādavya-
vasthā sā ṛgityarthaḥ | gītiṣviti | gānaprakārāṇāṃ bahutvādbahuvacanam |
tatraiva mantre gāne sati sāmetyākhyā bhavati | gāyanoktaprakāreṇa paṭhitā mantrāḥ
sāmetyucyata ityarthaḥ | śeṣa iti | yatra mantre na pādavyavasthā nāpi gītistatra
yajuḥśabda ityarthaḥ | tantreṣviti | kāmikaprabhṛtīnāmāgamānāṃ tantreti saṃjñā |
tantraṃ śāstram | āgamaśabdākṣarārtho yathā —

āgataṃ pañcavaktrāttu gataṃ ca girijānane |
mataṃ ca vāsudevasya tasmādāgamamucyate || iti |
āgamalakṣaṇaṃ tu —

ṣaṭkarmasādhanaṃ caiva dhyānayogaścaturvidhaḥ |
saptabhirlakṣaṇairyuktamāgamaṃ tadvidurbudhāḥ ||
iti bodhyam | ṣaṭkarmāṇi tu —

śāntivaśyastambhanāni vidveṣoccāṭane tataḥ |
māraṇāntāni śaṃsanti ṣaṭkarmāṇi manīṣiṇaḥ ||
iti śāradoktāni bodhyāni | evaṃvidhāgameṣu ye mantrā uktāste tāntrikāḥ |
vahnijāyāntāḥ | svāhāśabdāntāḥ | svāhā ca hutabhukpriyā (amarakośa
2 | 7 | 21) ityamaraḥ | brahmavaivarte coktam —

grīṣmamadhyāhnamārtaṇḍaprabhācchādanakāriṇī |
tvamagnerdāhikā śaktirbhava patnī ca sundarī || (bra. vai. pra. a. 37) iti |
nirasteti | mantradoṣā ruddhakīlitādyā anupadameva vakṣyante (da. 15 paṃ. 399) |
te sarve svabhāvata eva nirastā yeṣāṃ tādṛśatvenetyarthaḥ | nirdoṣatāmiti |

karmaṇyatijaḍā mantrā mantriṇā yojitā api |
tasmāttaddoṣanāśāya kartavyāḥ saṃskriyā daśa ||
ityuktatvāt | mātṛkāyantrāditi | mātṛkāyantraṃ ca caturasraṃ caturdvāraṃ śakti-
mantrasyoddhāre kāśamīreṇa viṣṇumantrasyoddhāre candanena śivamantrasyoddhāre bhasmanā
ca svarṇādipātre vilekhanīyam | tatra

kādimāntāḥ pañca vargā dikṣu pūrvādito nyaset |
yādivāntāḥ śādihāntā lakṣamīśe pravinyaset ||
nyasedvilikhet | lakṣaṃ la kṣa-iti varṇadvayam | īśa īśānyām | tasmādyantrā-
nmantrākṣarāṇāṃ bhāvanamuddhāraḥ | praṇaveti | mantrasyādau praṇavaḥ | tataḥ prathama-
makṣaram | tataḥ punaḥ praṇavaḥ | tato dvitīyamakṣaram | tataḥ punaḥ praṇava ityevaṃ
caramākṣarānte praṇavaṃ prakalpya tādṛśamantrasya japaḥ kāryaḥ | sa ca mantrā- 15|380 vargāt for yantrāt C.
kṣarāṇāṃ yā saṃkhyā tatsaṃkhyākaḥ | arṇaśabdo varṇavācī | vāyubījaṃ yamiti |
malatrayamiti | māyikaṃ kārmaṇamānavyaṃ ceti malatrayam |

māyikaṃ nāma yoṣotthaṃ pauruṣaṃ kārmaṇaṃ malam |
ānavyamanavīnatvaṃ niṣiddhaṃ tanmalatrayam ||
na navamanavam | tasya bhāva ānavyaṃ vṛddhatvamityarthaḥ | jyotirbhantraṃ nirūpayati-
tāreti | tāraṃ praṇavaḥ | vyoma hakāraḥ | agnī rephaḥ | manuraukāraḥ | anusvāra-
ścāntenuktopi grāhyaḥ |

tāravyomāgnimanuyugdaṇḍī jyotirmanurmataḥ |
ityanyatroktatvāt | daṇḍyanusvāraḥ | pratyarṇaṃ prativarṇam | manormantrasya | vāri-
bījaṃ vamiti | tāreti | tāraṃ praṇavaḥ | māyāśabdena māyābījaṃ hrīmityu-
cyate | ramāśabdena śrīmiti | manormantrasyaitantritayena yo yogastaddīpanamityarthaḥ |
ruddheti |

ādimadhyāvasāneṣu bhūbījadvaṃdvalāñchitaḥ |
ruddhamantraḥ sa vijñeyo bhuktimuktivivarjitaḥ ||
bhūbījaṃ lamiti |

lg.l: māyā namāmi ca padaṃ nāsti yasminsa kīlitaḥ |
saṃyuktaṃ vā viyuktaṃ vā svarākrāntaṃ tridhā punaḥ |

div.p:
trivarṇo haṃsahīno yaḥ suṣuptaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ |
śaptaḥ kenāpi hṛtavīryaḥ |

evaṃ svādhyāyaṃ nirūpya kramaprāptamīśvarapraṇidhānaṃ nirūpayati — īśvareti |
abhihitā vihitāḥ | tattulyanyāyenātra kriyamāṇā aniṣiddhā anabhihitāḥ |
atha vā abhihitā vaidikyaḥ | anabhihitā laukikyaḥ | yatra samarpaṇaviṣaye |
kāmata iti | spaṣṭam | kaurmepyuktam —

nāhaṃ kartā sarvametadbrahmaiva kurute tathā |
etadbrahmārpaṇaṃ proktamṛṣibhistattvadarśibhiḥ || iti |

karmaṇyeveti | karmaṇyeva terjunasyādhikāro na karmaphale | karmaphaledhikāro
nāma mayedaṃ phalaṃ bhoktavyamityabhilāṣaḥ | phalakāmanayā karma kurvan phalaheturu-
cyate | tādṛśastvaṃ mā bhūḥ | karmākaraṇe ca te prītirmā bhūdityarthaḥ | śvalīḍham |
śunāsvāditam | śuddhasāropeti | yathāyurghṛtamityatrāyuḥpadenāyuḥsādhanaṃ
lakṣyate tathā tapaḥsvādhyāya (pāta. yo. sū. 2 | 1) iti sūtre yogapadena
yogasādhanaṃ lakṣyate |

atra śuddhasāropalakṣaṇāmupapādayallaṃṃkṣaṇāyāḥ svarūpaṃ vibhāgaṃ ca pradarśayati —
śuddhetyādinā | atra ca lakṣaṇā śuddhā | na tu gauṇī | sādṛśyasaṃbandhamūlikā
lakṣaṇā ca gauṇītyucyate | yathā siṃho māṇavaka iti | atra krauryādiguṇaiḥ siṃha-
sadṛśe māṇavake siṃhaśabdaḥ prayujyate | sādṛśyetarasaṃbandhamūlikā lakṣaṇā śuddhā |
yogaśabdasya yogasādhanerthe lakṣaṇāyāḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasaṃbandhamūlakatveneyaṃ śuddhā |
sāropā ceyaṃ lakṣaṇā | āropo hi viṣayaviṣayiṇorbhedenopanyāsaḥ | atrāropya-
māṇo yogo viṣayī | viṣayaścāropasya kriyā | tayordvayoḥ kriyāyogayoratropa-
nyāsāt | yathā siṃho māṇavaka ityatra siṃhamāṇavakayorupanyāse sāropā | yadā
tu māṇavakapadamanuccāryāyaṃ siṃha ityeva viṣayimātraṃ nirdiśyate tadā na sāropā |
kiṃ tu sādhyavasānā | adhyavasānaṃ nāma viṣayivācakapadena viṣayanigaraṇam |
mukhyārthabādheti | yathā gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gaṅgāpadasya mukhyortho jalaviśeṣaḥ |
sa ca bādhitaḥ | tasya ghoṣādhāratvāsaṃbhavāt | tadyogastena mukhyārthena jalena
yogaḥ saṃbandhastīre | ato bādhitena gaṅgāśabdasya mukhyārthena jalena yatsvasaṃyu-
ktasyārthāntarasya tīrasya bodhanaṃ sā lakṣaṇā | lakṣaṇā ca na mukhyā vṛttiḥ | tathā-
pīyaṃ prayojanavaśādāśrīyate | yathā gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatraiva yadi lakṣaṇāṃ vihāya
mukhyārthastīraśabda eva prayujyate gaṅgātīre ghoṣa iti tadā gaṅgāsamīpasthe ghoṣe
gaṅgāsāmīpyena śaityaṃ pāvanatvaṃ ca sāmānyataḥ pratīyate na tu tadatiśayaḥ | gaṅgā-
yāmityuktau tu tīrasya gaṅgātvena bodhāddhoṣe gaṅgāstha iva śaityātiśayaḥ pāvanatvāti-
śayaśca pratīyate | tathā ceyaṃ lakṣaṇā prayojanamūletyucyate | kvacittu prayojanamanuddiśya
loke tādṛśaprayogaprasiddhiṃ dṛṣṭvaiva kevalaṃ lakṣaṇāśrīyate tatra lakṣaṇā rūḍhimūletyu-
cyate | rūḍhiḥ prasiddhiḥ | yathā karmaṇi kuśala iti | atra hi kuśāndarbhāllāṃṃtyā-
datta iti kuśala iti vyutpattyā darbhagrahaṇakartā kuśalaśabdasya mukhyorthaḥ | sa ca
sarvatra karmaṇi bādhita iti lakṣaṇayā tasya nipuṇārthabodhakatvam | kuśagrahaṇakartu-
rnipuṇasya ca sādhvasādhuvivecakatvena sādṛśyasaṃbandhasattvāt | atra ca karmaṇi
nipuṇa ityapekṣayā karmaṇi kuśala ityasmānna kaścidadhikorthaḥ pratīyata itīyaṃ
rūḍhimūlā | iyaṃ cābhidhātulyaiva | mukhyārtheti | bādhaścānvayāsaṃbhavaḥ | kriyā
vyāpāraḥ | mukhyārthasya bādhe tena mukhyārthena svasaṃyuktasyārthasya rūḍhitaḥ prayojanādvā
yatpratipādanaṃ sā lakṣaṇā | tathā cāyamanyārthapratipādanarūpo lakṣaṇāsaṃjñako
vyāpāro mukhyārthasya jalādereva na tu gaṅgāśabdasya | śabde tvarthadvārāyaṃ vyāpāra
āropitaḥ | tathā ca loke prayujyate gaṅgāśabdo lakṣaṇayā tīraṃ bodhayatīti | yaccha-
bdeneti | pācakādipadeṣviva pacati pacyata iti kriyāpadeṣvapi pratyayārthasyaiva
prādhānyam | dhātvarthastu tadviśeṣaṇamiti naiyāyikamatam | tathā ca lakṣyata iti
kriyāpade lakṣadhātoḥ pratipādanarūporthaḥ pratyayārthasya viśeṣaṇībhūtopi yadityanena
parāmṛśyate na tu tadviśiṣṭaḥ pratyayārthaḥ | yataḥ pratipādanameva lakṣaṇā na tu prati-
pāditorthaḥ | vaiyākaraṇamate tu kriyāpade prakṛtyarthasyaiva prādhānyamiti na pratipāda-
nasya guṇībhūtatvamityanyat | nanu yattacchabdārthayoḥ samānārthakatvaniyamāttacchabde-
nāpi pratipādanasyaiva parāmarśāttallakṣaṇeti vaktavyaṃ na tu seti strīliṅganirdeśa iti
cettatrāha — sā lakṣaṇetīti | taduktaṃ kaiyaṭairiti | pātañjale mahābhāṣye paspa-
śāhnike śabdasvarūpavivecane prastute kiṃ yattatsāsnālāṅgūlakakudakhuraviṣāṇyartharūpaṃ
sa śabda ityuktam | tatra vidheyabhūtaśabdānusāreṇa sa iti puṃstvena nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ |
tadupapattiṃ pradarśayadbhiḥ kaiyaṭopādhyāyairetaduktam | nirdiśyamānamuddeśyam | pratini-
rdiśyamānaṃ vidheyam | yadyapyuddeśyaparāmarśī tacchabdastathāpi tasyoddeśyavidheyayoraikya-
pradarśakatvenoddeśyaliṅgenaiva nirdeśaḥ kārya ityatra pramāṇābhāvādvidheyaliṅgena nirdeśepi
na kiṃcidbādhakamiti kaiyaṭāśayaḥ | tathā ca prayujyate — yosau putraḥ sa ratnamiti
yosau putrastadratnamiti ca | abhidhānavat | śaktivat | tadāheti | tantravā-
rtikakāraḥ kumārilabhaṭṭa iti śeṣaḥ | tena hyaruṇādhikaraṇa etaduktam | sāmarthyā-
t | prasiddheḥ | yadyapīti | anupadamevopapāditam | svasiddhaya iti | svasya
mukhyārthasyānvayapraveśasiddhaye parasyānyārthasyākṣepo grahaṇam | etadevopādānamu-
cyate | svārthāparityāgena parārthagrahaṇamupādānamiti yāvat | yathā kuntāḥ pravi-
śantītyatra kuntānāṃ śastraviśeṣāṇāmacetanānāṃ praveśanakriyākartṛtvāsaṃbhavenānva-
yāyogāttatsiddhyarthaṃ svaviśiṣṭāḥ puruṣāstairlakṣyante | kuntaviśiṣṭānāmeva praveśasya
vivakṣitatvāt | ata iyamupādānalakṣaṇā | evaṃ parārthaṃ parasyānvayapraveśasiddhya-
rthaṃ svasya mukhyārthasya samarpaṇaṃ parityāgaḥ | etadeva lakṣaṇamityucyate | svārthapari-
tyāgena parārthalakṣaṇaṃ lakṣaṇamiti yāvat | yathā mañcāḥ krośantītyatra mañcaiḥ svapa-
rityāgapūrvakaṃ svaniṣṭhāḥ puruṣā eva kevalamākṣipyante | mañcaviśiṣṭānāṃ krośanaka-
rtṛtvāsaṃbhavāt | ata iyaṃ lakṣaṇalakṣaṇā | etādṛśaprakāradvayavatī śuddhaiva na tu
gauṇī | gauṇyāḥ sādṛśyasaṃbandhamūlakatvaniyamena tatropādānalakṣaṇāyā asaṃbha-
vāt | sāropeti | anyā tu gauṇī tu prakārāntareṇa bhidyate | yatra viṣayī
viṣayaścetyubhāvuktau śabdapratipādyau bhavatastatra sāropā | viṣayaviyaṣiṇorabhede-
nopanyāsa āropaḥ | yathā gaurbāhīka ityatra | atra hi gavā buddhimāndyādisādṛ-
śyājjaḍa ityartho lakṣyate | ato gauṇī | āropyamāṇo viṣayī gaurgośabdena ni-
rdiṣṭaḥ | āropasya viṣayo bāhīkaśca bāhīkaśabdena nirdiṣṭaḥ | ataḥ sāropā |
evamiyaṃ gauṇasāropetyucyate | tathā viṣayiṇāropyamāṇenānyasminviṣayentaḥkṛte
nigīrṇe sati sādhyavasānikā bhavati | viṣayiṇā viṣayasya tirobhāvo hyadhyava-
sānam | yathā gaurayamiti | atra hi bāhīkortho gavā svasminnigīryate na tu tasya
śabdāntareṇopasthitiḥ | bāhīkapadānuccāraṇāt | ata iyaṃ gauṇasādhyavasānā |
bhedāviti | imau sāropasādhyavasānarūpau bhedau yadā sādṛśyasaṃbandhādbhavatastadā
gauṇau vijñeyau | tau codāhṛtau | yadā tu saṃbandhāntarādbhavatastadā śuddhau vijñeyau |
yathā āyurghṛtamiti | atra hi nāyurghṛtayoḥ sādṛśyasaṃbandhaḥ | kiṃ tu kāryakāraṇa-
bhāvaḥ | ata iyaṃ śuddhā | ghṛtāyuṣorviṣayaviṣayiṇoḥ padadvayena pṛthagupanyāsātsāropā
ca | āyurevedamityatra tu ghṛtasya padāntareṇānupasthānātsādhyavasānā | evaṃ lakṣaṇā
ṣaḍvidhetyarthaḥ |

yamādibhedeti | ādipadena niyamāsanaprāṇāyāmapratyāhāradhāraṇādhyānasa-
mādhisaṃgrahaḥ | ahiṃseti | ahiṃsādīnāṃ yamānāṃ śaucādīnāṃ niyamānāṃ ca
svarūpaṃ prāguktam (pṛ. 332 paṃ. 12) | yogyatāmiti | svaṃ svakīyaṃ mana
ātmavicārayogyatāṃ prāpayannityarthaḥ | phalābhisaṃdhirahitenāhiṃsādiyamānuṣṭhāne-
nātmavicārayogyaṃ mano bhavatīti tātparyam | svādhyāyeti | niyatātmavānni-
gṛhītamanāḥ sansvādhyāyādīnseveta | tathā ca parasminbrahmaṇi pravaṇamāsaktaṃ manaḥ
kurvīta | aneneśvarapraṇidhānarūpaḥ pañcamo niyamaḥ pradarśitaḥ | sthireti | prāgupa-
pāditam (pṛ. 332 paṃ. 19) | padmāsaneti | padmāsanasvarūpaṃ mūla evo-
ktam | anyānyucyante —

lg.l: gulphau ca vṛṣaṇasyādhaḥ sīvanyāḥ pārśvayoḥ kṣipet |
pārśvapādau ca pāṇibhyāṃ dṛḍhaṃ badhvā suniścalaḥ |

div.p:
jānūrvorantare samyakkṛtvā pādatale ubhe |
ṛjukāyaḥ sukhāsīnaḥ svastikaṃ tatpracakṣate ||
śliṣṭāṅgulikau śliṣṭagulphau bhūmiśliṣṭajaṅghorupādau prasāryopaveśanaṃ daṇḍakāsa-
nam | yogapaṭṭayogenopaveśanaṃ sopāśrayam | jānuprasāritabāhoḥ śayanaṃ paryaṅkaḥ |
niṣaṇṇakrauñcavadavasthānaṃ krauñcaniṣadanam | niṣaṇṇoṣṭravadavasthānamuṣṭraniṣadanam |
jānvorupari hastau kṛtvā kāyaśirogrīvāṇāmavakrabhāvenāvasthānaṃ samasaṃsthānam | 15|470 — ucchvāsa for śvāsa D.
tadanugateriti | tasya gativicchedarūpasya prāṇāyāmasāmānyalakṣaṇasya kumbhake-
nugatāvapi recakapūrakayostadasaṃbhavaḥ | recake bahirniḥsaraṇarūpāyāḥ pūrakentaḥprave-
śarūpāyāśca gateḥ sattvāditi śaṅkāśayaḥ | śvāsapraśvāsadvayeti | ekasattvepi
dvayaṃ nāstīti nyāyenobhayābhāvasya pūrake recake ca sattvāt | kiṃ ca prāṇāyāma-
sāmānyalakṣaṇe gativiccheda ityasya svābhāvikyā gaterviccheda ityarthaḥ | recake
pūrake ca na vāyoḥ svābhāvikī gatiḥ | kiṃ tu deśataḥ kālataścādhikā | tathā
ca svābhāvikagativicchedasattvānna doṣaḥ | vastutastu praśvāsena recanena yo gatya-
bhāvaḥ sa recakaḥ | tathāntarā pūraṇena yo gatyabhāvaḥ sa pūrakaḥ | praścāsapūrvako
gatyabhāvo recakaḥ | śvāsapūrvako gatyabhāvaḥ pūraka iti yāvat | kumbhake tu yathā
tapta upale nyastaṃ jalaṃ sarvataḥ saṃkocamāpadyate tathā bāhyābhyantarayordvayorapi
yugapadgatyabhāvena saṃkocarūpaḥ stambho bhavatīti viśeṣaḥ |

atha prāṇāyāmaprasaṅgena vāyorvahanasthānādikaṃ nirūpayati — sa ca
vāyuriti | prāṇināṃ dakṣiṇā nāḍī piṅgalā | vāmā tviḍā | madhye
suṣumnā | vāyoḥ saṃcāraśca sārdhaghaṭikādvayaparyantaṃ piṅgalayā bhavati |
tataḥ sārdhaghaṭikādvayaparyantamiḍayā bhavati | tataḥ punastāvatkālaparyantameva
piṅgalayā tataḥ punariḍayetyevamaharniśaṃ ghaṭīyantrasthitaghaṭabhramaṇavannāḍīdvayena
vāyurvahati | ekaikasyā ghaṭikāyāśca palāni ṣaṣṭiḥ | ekaikasminpale śvāsa-
praśvāsāḥ ṣaḍbhavanti | tathā caikasyāṃ ghaṭikāyāṃ ṣaṣṭyadhikaṃ śatatrayam | sārdha-
ghaṭikādvaye nava śatāni | sūryodayamārabhya punaḥ sūryodayaparyantaṃ śvāsapraśvāsāḥ 15|476 — caramaḥ for pūrakaḥ A.
ṣaṭśatādhikaikaviṃśatisahasrasaṃkhyākāḥ saṃpadyante | ajapāmantreti | svabhā-
vasiddha evāyaṃ śvāsapraśvāsarūpo'japāmantraḥ | svabhāvasiddhatvānnāyamitaramantra-
vajjapyate | tenājapetyucyate | tatra hi śvāsapraśvāsayorhaṃsa iti mantrabhā-
vanā kriyate | śvāsapraśvāsarūpatvādayaṃ mantraḥ pratyaharniśaṃ ṣaṭśatādhikaikaviṃśa-
tisahasrasaṃkhyākaḥ saṃpadyate | sa ca vibhajya gaṇapatyādidevatābhyaḥ samarpyate |
tatheti | yathā vāyoḥ svābhāvikagatyā pratiśvāsapraśvāsaṃ haṃsa iti mantra-
bhāvanayā ajapājapaḥ sādhitastathā vāyusaṃcāreṇa saṃcarantyāṃ nāḍyāṃ tadantaḥ-
sthāni saṃcaranti pṛthivyādīni tattvānyāntaradṛṣṭyāvalokitaiḥ pītādivarṇaviśeṣa-
viśiṣṭairbindubhiravagamya puruṣārthaḥ sādhanīyaḥ | etadevopapādayati — taduktamiti |
sārdhamiti | iḍāpiṅgalayornāḍyormadhya ekaikayā nāḍyā sārdhaghaṭīdvayaparyantaṃ
prāṇavāyurvahati | yadā ca yayā nāḍyā vāyurvahati tadānīṃ vāyusaṃcāreṇa tasyā
nāḍyāḥ saṃcalanātsā nāḍī vahatītyucyate | sūryodayamārabhya caite nāḍyāvara-
ghaṭṭaghaṭībhramaṇavatkrameṇa vahataḥ | śatānīti | tatra sārdhaghaṭīdvayaparimite kāle
navaśatasaṃkhyākāḥ śvāsocchvāsā bhavanti | militvā sakalehorātre ṣaṭśatādhi-
kaikaviṃśatisahasrasaṃkhyā saṃpadyate | khaśabda ākāśavācyākāśasya śūnyasvarūpa-
tvācchūnyadyotakatvena jyotiḥśāstre paribhāṣitaḥ | aṅkānāṃ vāmato gatiriti nyā-
yena khakhetyanena dyotitaṃ śūnyadvayamante niveśanīyam | tasmātpūrvaṃ ṣaṭ | tasmātpūrvaṃ
kavarṇasūcita ekoṅkaḥ | tasmātpūrvaṃ dvyaṅko niveśanīya ityuktā saṃkhyā (21600)
bhavati | tatra hetumāha — ṣaṭtriṃśaditi | ṣaṭtriṃśatsaṃkhyākaguruvarṇoccāraṇasya
yāvān kālastāvatyeva kāle nāḍīmadhye saṃcarato vāyoḥ śvāsocchvāsau bhavataḥ |
tāvataḥ kālasya prāṇa iti saṃjñā | ṣaṭ prāṇā ekaṃ palam | palāni ṣaṣṭirekā
ghaṭikā | tathā caikasyāṃ ghaṭikāyāṃ śvāsocchvāsānāṃ ṣaṣṭyadhikaṃ śatatrayam (360) |
ṣaṣṭirghaṭikāścaikohorātraḥ | tathā ca ṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatrayasaṃkhyāyāḥ ṣaṣṭyā guṇane
satyuktā saṃkhyā (21600) saṃpadyate | pratyekamiti | vāyusaṃcaraṇena saṃcalantī
dvividhāpi nāḍī svāntaḥsthitasūkṣmapṛthivyādipañcatattvānyatamāṃśena saṃcalati |
yadā yattattvaṃ vahati tadā tena nāḍī saṃcalatītyucyate | etacca yogabalenāvagantuṃ
śakyaṃ nānyathā | nāḍyoḥ pravahatāṃ pañcatattvānāṃ sthānānyāha — ūrdhvamiti |
pravāhe kramamāha — vāyoriti | saṃcalituṃ pravṛttāyāṃ nāḍyāmādau viṃśatipala-
paryantaṃ vāyutattvaṃ vahati | tatastriṃśatpalaparyantaṃ tejastattvaṃ vahati | tataścatvāriṃśa-
tpalaparyantaṃ vāritattvaṃ vahati | tataḥ pañcāśatpalaparyantaṃ pṛthivītattvaṃ vahati |
tato daśapalaparyantamākāśatattvaṃ vahati | militānāṃ palānāṃ pañcāśadadhikaśata-
saṃkhyā bhavatīti sārdhaghaṭīdvayaṃ saṃpadyate | gandho rasa iti | eta eva gandhara-
hitāścatvārastoyasya guṇāḥ | tathā teṣvapi rasarahitāstrayastejasaḥ | sparśaḥ
śabdaśceti dvayaṃ vāyoḥ | śabda eka ākāśasyeti bhāvaḥ | tattvābhyāmiti |
bhūtattve vahati cetasaḥ śāntiḥ syāt | jalatattve vahati satyārabdhe kārye phalā-
dhikyam | balonnatiriti pāṭhe balādhikyapratītirityarthaḥ | tejastattve vahati
dīptā cittavṛttiḥ | vāyutattve vahatyāsthirā cittavṛttiḥ | ākāśatattve vahatyavyūhā
cittavṛttiḥ | avyūho viyogaḥ | pañcama iti | adharmavāsaneti cchedaḥ | vahata-
stattvaviśeṣasya jñānārthaṃ tadupāyabhūtamāntarabindvavalokanakramamāha — śrutyoriti |
śrutyoḥ karṇayoḥ | sṛkkiṇyoḥ oṣṭhaprāntayoḥ | prāntyakāṅgulī kaniṣṭhike |
upāntyaṅgulī anāmike | śeṣe tarjanyau | mukhasya dakṣiṇe bhāge dakṣiṇakarāṅgulīnāṃ
tattatsthāneṣu vinyāsaḥ | evaṃ mukhasya vāmabhāge vāmakarāṅgulīnāṃ vinyāsaḥ |
tatra karṇeṅguṣṭhaḥ | netraprānte tarjanī | nāsāpuṭe madhyamā | ūrdhvoṣṭhasya prāntenā-
mikā | adharoṣṭhasya prānte kaniṣṭhikā | evamubhayakarāṅgulīrvinyasyāntardṛṣṭyāvalo-
kite bindurdṛśyate | pītavarṇe bindau dṛṣṭe pṛthivītattvaṃ vahatīti jñeyam | śvetabi-
ndudarśane jalatattvam | aruṇabindudarśane tejastattvam | śyāmabindudarśane vāyu-
tattvam | pītādivarṇarahitapariveṣamātradarśana ākāśatattvamiti | upādhiśabdena
pītādayo varṇā gṛhyante | khamākāśam | yathāvaditi | uktarītyā śvāsocchvā-
satattvaṃ vijñāya prāṇāyāmena vāyornirodhe kṛte vivekajñānācchādakaṃ karma kṣīyate |
karmaśabdena karmajanyamapuṇyaṃ karmakāraṇībhūtā avidyādayaḥ kleśāśca lakṣyante |
te hi mahāmohapracuraśabdādiviṣayajālasahāyena vivekajñānaśīlaṃ buddhisattva-
mācchādayanti | na kevalametāvadeva pratyuta tadeva buddhisattvamakārye saṃsārahetubhūte
vyāpāre niyojayati | prāṇāyāmābhyāsāttu te kleśā durbalāḥ svakāryakaraṇākṣamā
bhavanti | pratikṣaṇaṃ kṣīyante ca | ata eva karmakṣayakāritvātprāṇāyāmasya
tapastvam | kiṃ ca kṛcchracāndrāyaṇāditapasā kevalaṃ pāpakarma kṣīyate | prāṇāyā-
mena tu tanmūlabhūtā avidyādayaḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyante | tadevāha — tapo na paramiti |
prāṇāyāmāpekṣayā śreṣṭhamanyattapo nāstītyarthaḥ | dahyanta iti | dhmāyamānānāma-
gnisaṃyuktānām | dhātūnāṃ suvarṇādīnām |

athāṣṭasu yamādiṣu yogāṅgeṣu pañcamaṃ pratyāhāraṃ nirūpayati — tadevamiti |
aṣṭasu yogāṅgeṣvantimaṃ dhāraṇādhyānasamādhirūpamantaraṅgaṃ sādhanatrayaṃ saṃyamaśabde-
nocyate | tatpratyāhāraṃ vinā na sidhyati | atastadarthaṃ pratyāhāraḥ sādhanīyaḥ |
cakṣurādīnāmiti | śabdādiviṣayeṣu kecitkasyacidrañjanīyā rāgaprayojakāḥ |
kecitkopanīyā dveṣaprayojakāḥ | kecinmohanīyā vaicittyaprayojakāḥ | tādṛśa-
viṣayapravaṇatvaṃ tatrendriyāṇāmāsaktiḥ | sā cānādikālamārabhya pravṛttatvātprati-
niyatā | tatprahāṇena tattyāgapūrvakamindriyāṇāṃ yo nirvikārātmasvarūpāsaktaci-
ttasyānukāraścittānurodhitvaṃ sa pratyāhāraḥ | baddhajīvānāṃ svabhāvataścittamindri-
yānurodhi | pratyāhāre tvindriyāṇi cittānurodhīni bhavanti | citte nirodho-
nmukhe prayatnāntaraṃ vinaiva ya indriyāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ sa cittānukāra iti tātpa-
ryam | etadeva śaṅkāsamādhānābhyāṃ viśadayati — nanviti | abhiniviśata iti |
nirvikārātmasvarūpa iti śeṣaḥ | addheti | aṅgīkārārthakametadavyayam | śaṅkā-
kṛtoktamaṅgīkṛtamityarthaḥ | tasya | cittānukārasya | svaviṣayeti | indriyāṇāṃ
svasvaviṣayāsaṃprayogakāle cittasvarūpānukāriteva yā bhavati sa pratyāhāra
iti sūtrārthaḥ | ajitendriyasya baddhasyāpi jīvasyendriyāṇi viṣayopabhogakāle
cittānukārīṇi bhavanti | tatrātivyāptinivṛttaye svaviṣayāsaṃprayoga ityuktam |
anuvartanta iti | utpatati madhukararāje makṣikā utpatanti niviśamāne ca
tasminnetā api tatra niviśanti | śabdādiṣviti | akṣāṇīndriyāṇi |
cittānukārīṇi cittasya yo viṣayastadatiriktaviṣayarahitāni | pratyāhārasyo-
payogaprakāramāha — vaśyateti | tena pratyāhāreṇendriyāṇāmaticañcalasvarūpāṇā-
mapi vaśyatā jāyate | avaśyairityādinā vyatirekaḥ pradarśitaḥ | yāvannendriyāṇi
vaśyāni tāvattairyogī na yogasādhako bhavatītyarthaḥ |

atha ṣaṣṭhaṃ yogāṅgaṃ dhāraṇāṃ nirūpayati — nābhicakreti | ādipadena bhrūmadhya-
mūrdhādisaṃgrahaḥ | ādhyātmikaḥ śarīrāntargataḥ | hiraṇyagarbhādiśabdaistatpratimā
ucyante | prabhṛtipadena parvataśikharādisaṃgrahaḥ | deśe | dhyānādhārabhūte deśa-
viśeṣe | atraiva paścāddhyeyasya cintanaṃ bhavati | deśabandha iti | bandho dṛḍhaḥ
saṃbandhaḥ | tadekāgrateti yāvat | yatra nābhicakrādideśe dhyeyaṃ cintanīyaṃ tatra
deśe cittasya bandhaḥ sthirīkaraṇaṃ dhāraṇeti sūtrārthaḥ | taduktam —

hṛtpuṇḍarīke nābhyāṃ vā mūrdhni parvatamastake |
evamādipradeśeṣu dhāraṇā cittabandhanam || iti |
ukte deśe cittasya sthirīkaraṇaṃ ca vṛttimātreṇa na tu dhyeyakalpanayā | tasyā
agrimeṅge vakṣyamāṇatvāt | prāṇāyāmeneti | cittasthānaṃ cittāvasthitiḥ |
nāmicakrādideśaḥ śubhāśraya ityucyate | tatra cittāvasthitiṃ kuryādityarthaḥ |
sthānaśabde bhāve lyuṭ pratyayaḥ | śubhāśrayamitipāṭhe tvadhikaraṇe lyuṭpratyayaḥ |
nābhyādideśaṃ cittāvasthityadhikaraṇaṃ kuryādityarthaḥ |

saptamaṃ yogāṅgaṃ dhyānaṃ nirūpayati — tasminniti | dhyeyāvalambanasya |
prasannavadanacaturbhujādidhyeyākārasya | tadrūpeti | tadrūpasya prasannavadanādidhyeya-
rūpasya yaḥ pratyayo jñānaṃ tadaikāgryā tadekaprakārā tathānyanispṛhā viṣayāntaravya-
vadhānaśūnyā ca yā saṃtatiḥ pravāhastaddhyānamityucyate | tacca dhyānaṃ prathamaiḥ pūrvaṃ
saṃpāditairyamādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiraṅgairniṣpādyate sādhyate | nṛpeti khāṇḍikyasaṃbodhanam |
prasaṅgāditi | etaddarśanārambhe yogānuśāsanaśabdāntargatayogaśabdārthanirvaca-
naprasaṅgena samādhirūpamaṣṭamaṃ yogāṅgaṃ pūrvameva pratipāditamityarthaḥ |

ādareti | taduktaṃ patañjalinā prathame samādhipāde — sa tu dīrghakālanairantarya-
satkārāsevito dṛḍhabhūmiḥ (pāta. yo. sū. 1 | 14) iti | tapobrahmacaryādipūrvakaṃ
yadyogāṅgānuṣṭhānasya saṃpādanaṃ tattasyādareṇa sevanamucyate | dīrghakālāseviteneti
pāṭhe āseviteneti cchedaḥ | madhumatyādīti | ādipadena madhupratīkāviśo-
kāsaṃskāraśeṣānāmakasiddhisaṃgrahaḥ |

idamaśrutapūrvamajñātārthakaṃ madhumatyādiśabdaṃ śrutvā pṛcchati — atheti | vi-
kaṭā vikarālāḥ | bhayotpādikā iti yāvat | madhumatyādiśabdā aprasiddha-
tvādanyabhāṣāsthā iti prakalpya karṇāṭetyādyuktam | karṇāṭādayo deśaviśeṣavā-
cakāḥ śabdāstatra tatra pracalitāyāṃ bhāṣāyāṃ lākṣaṇikāḥ | uttarayati —
na hīti | abhyāseti | abhyāsavairāgye prāgukte (da. 15 paṃ. 337) |
tābhyāmapāsto nirasto rajoguṇasya tamoguṇasya ca leśo yasya | leśatopi raja-
stamaḥsaṃbandhābhāvavata ityarthaḥ | etādṛśasya sukhaprakāśamayasya buddhisattvasya
bhāvanayā yadanavadyavaiśāradyaṃ buddhisattvasya svacchaḥ sthitipravāhaḥ sa vidyotate |
etadvidyotanarūpā ṛtaṃbharaprajñānāmikā yā samādhijanyā siddhiḥ sā madhuma-
tītyucyate | kadācidapi neti | rajastamaḥsaṃbandhābhāvānna kadāpi viparīta-
jñānamajñānaṃ vetyarthaḥ | sūtrārthamāha — tatreti | tatretyasyārthaḥ sthitau dārḍhye
satīti | yadā cittaṃ kleśavāsanārahitaṃ sthitipravāhayogyaṃ bhavati tadetyarthaḥ |
sā prajñā bhavatīti | iyameva madhumatīsiddhiḥ | pravṛttamātreti | pravṛtta-
mātraṃ na tu niṣpannaṃ jyotirjñānaṃ yasya tādṛśaḥ | avaśīkṛtajñāna ityarthaḥ |
tenāsya paracittaviṣayakaṃ jñānaṃ na bhavati | dvitīyaḥ | madhubhūmikaḥ | asyaiva
madhumatīsaṃjñakasiddhiruktā | anena ca bhūtānīndriyāṇi ca na jitāni | kiṃ tu
tāni jetumicchatyayam | tṛtīyaḥ | prajñājyotiḥ | caturthaḥ | atikrāntabhāva-
nīyaḥ | anena sarvaṃ bhāvitameva | nāsya bhāvanīyaṃ kiṃcidasti | jīvanmukto-
yam | anuttama iti | nottamo yasmāt | atyuttama ityarthaḥ | kāyanirape-
kṣāṇāmiti | tena deśāntarasthasya kālāntarasthasya ca vastuno jñānaṃ jāyate |
vaśitvamiti | mahattattvādayaḥ sarve vikārā etadadhīnāḥ | vyaktibhedenāna-
ntānbhūtendriyaprakṛtibhūtānsattvādiguṇāṃstadvikārāṃśca svecchayāyamanuvidhatte | kara-
ṇapañcakarūpeti | karaṇapañcakasya jñānendriyapañcakasya yāni grahaṇādīni
pañca rūpāṇi tajjayādityarthaḥ | karaṇapañcakasvarūpajayāditi pāṭhe karaṇapañcakasya
yatsvarūpaṃ grahaṇādirūpapañcakayutaṃ tajjayādityarthaḥ | indriyarūpāṇāṃ jayādevendri-
yakāraṇānāṃ pradhānādīnāṃ jayo bhavati | pradhānādīnāmindriyarūpāntargatatvāt |
kevalendriyajaye tu tatkāraṇībhūtapradhānādijayo na syāt | grahaṇādīni pañca
rūpāṇi tu grahaṇaṃ svarūpamasmitānvayorthavattvaṃ ceti | grahaṇaṃ nāma niścayābhi-
mānasaṃkalpadarśanaśravaṇādyā vṛttayaḥ | svarūpamekādaśendriyāṇi | asmitā buddhya-
haṃkārau | anvayaḥ kāraṇānugamaḥ | yathā ghaṭe mṛdaḥ | arthavattvamindriyaprakṛtibhū-
teṣu guṇeṣvanugataṃ puruṣārthavattvam | manojavitvādisiddhīnāṃ madhupratīketi saṃjñāyāṃ
hetumāha — yatheti | viśokāṃ siddhiṃ darśayati — sarvabhāveti | sattvapuru-
ṣeti | sattvapuruṣayoryānyatākhyātirbhedasākṣātkārastanmātrapratiṣṭhasya sarvabhāvādhi-
ṣṭhātṛtvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ ca bhavatītyarthaḥ | adhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ yathecchaviniyoktṛtvam | vyava-
sāyeti | vyavasāyaḥ prakāśaḥ | tadātmakā bhāvā indriyāṇi | indriyaviṣayāḥ
śabdasparśādayastadāśrayāḥ pṛthivyādayaśca bhāvā avyavasāyātmakāḥ | jaḍā iti
yāvat | bhāvāḥ padārthāḥ | sarve caite sattvādiguṇatrayapariṇāmabhūtā eva | teṣā-
meveti | teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ śāntādidharmādhārabhūtānāṃ dharmataḥ sakāśādbhe-
dena yajjñānaṃ tatsarvajñātṛtvam | dharmāśca kecicchāntāḥ kṛtasvavyāpārā atīte-
dhvanyanupraviṣṭāḥ | svaṃ vyāpāraṃ kuṃrvanta uditā vartamānedhvanyanupraviṣṭāḥ | kari-
ṣyamāṇavyāpārāḥ sāṃprataṃ śaktirūpeṇāvasthitā ata eva vyapadeṣṭumaśakyā avya- 15|582 — avyavaseya for avyavasāya D.
padeśyāḥ | evaṃ trividhā bhūtā vartamānā bhaviṣyantaśca ye dharmāsteṣu trividheṣva-
pyanvayitvena sadā vartamānāstadādhārabhūtā ata eva dharmebhyo bhinnā bhāvā
iti yajjñānaṃ tadvivekajñānamiti bhāvaḥ | viśoketi | yogajasākṣātkārarū-
pāntaḥkaraṇavṛttirjyotiṣmatītyucyate | saiva śokanāśakatvādviśokā | iyaṃ vṛtti-
rmanasaḥ sthairyahetutvena viśoketi sūtra uktā | atra tu saiva siddhitvenokteti
bodhyam | eṣā siddhiragrimā ca caturthasya yoginaḥ | saṃskāraśeṣāṃ siddhiṃ darśa-
yati — sarvavṛttīti | virāmeti | tattvajñānarūpāpi vṛttirviramatvityetādṛśī
yā jñānepyalaṃbuddhiḥ sā virāmapratyayaḥ | tadabhyāsājjāyamāno yaḥ saṃskāramā-
trāvaśeṣo vṛttinirodhaḥ sa pūrvoktātsaṃprajñātasamādheḥ sakāśādanyo'saṃprajñāta
ityarthaḥ | saṃskāramātraśeṣa ityanena mokṣakālikanirodhavyāvṛttiḥ | asaṃprajñā-
te hi punarutthānārthaṃ vṛttisaṃskāramātraṃ tiṣṭhati na tu vṛttiḥ | mokṣe tu citta-
syātyantaṃ vilayātsaṃskāropi na tiṣṭhatīti viśeṣaḥ |

tadeteṣviti | kleśabījeṣu karmāśayeṣu svakāraṇe vilīneṣu nirbādhā
yā vivekakhyātiḥ prakṛtipuruṣayorbhedasākṣātkārastatparipākavaśāccharīrendriyāṇāṃ
svakāraṇe pradhāne layo bhavati | etatprakṛteḥ kaivalyam | kaivalyamekākitvam |
prakṛtikāryasya vilayātprakṛteḥ puruṣeṇa sahātyantaṃ viyogācca prakṛterekākitvaṃ
siddham | puruṣasya kaivalyamāha — citiśaktiriti | citiśaktirātmā | tasyaupā-
dhikarūpaṃ parityajya mūlasvarūpeṇa yadavasthānaṃ tatpuruṣasya kaivalyam | tadanantaraṃ na
kadāpi punastasya buddhisattvābhisaṃbandho bhavatīti bhāvaḥ | dvayī | dvividhā |
puruṣārtheti | guṇānāṃ mahattattvaprabhṛtisūkṣmabhūtaparyantānāṃ liṅgaśarīrādyātma-
kānāṃ puruṣopakaraṇānāṃ kṛtakartavyatayā puruṣārthaśūnyānāṃ yaḥ pratiprasavaḥ svakā-
raṇetyantaṃ laya etatprakṛteḥ kaivalyam | yā tu punarbuddhitattvāsaṃbandhātkevalaciti-
śaktirūpā puruṣasya svarūpapratiṣṭhā buddhisattvaupādhikarūpaśūnyatārūpā japāyo-
gāpāye sphaṭikasya svarūpapratiṣṭhāvat tādṛśaṃ ca yatsarvadāvasthānaṃ tatpuruṣasya
kaivalyamiti sūtrārthaḥ | na ceti | kaivalye satyapi prāṇināṃ kutaḥ punarjanma na
bhavatīti na vaditavyamityarthaḥ | kāraṇeti | kleśabījānāṃ dagdhatvādabhāvena
tatkāryasya janmamaraṇāderabhāvaḥ | niyogeneti | niyogo vidhiḥ | vidhiścā-
pūrvabodhanātmakaḥ | yaścābālavṛddhaṃ pramāṇasiddhorthastatra na vidhiḥ saṃbhavati |
nāpyanuyogaḥ | anuyogaśca praśnaḥ | sa cājñāterthe sati saṃbhavati nānyathā |
bhaveyuriti | avalokanakāraṇasya cakṣurindriyasyābhāvepyavalokanasaṃbhave maṇi-
vedhaḥ syāt | sūcyādinā maṇerantaścichadrakaraṇaṃ maṇivedhaḥ | tathā ceti |
arthasyāsaṃbhavitvapradarśanārthaṃ lokeyamābhāṇaka upādīyate | sa saṃbhavyarthaprati-
pādakaḥ syāt | andho maṇimiti | loke hi puruṣaścakṣuṣā maṇiṃ dṛṣṭvā tama-
ṅgulibhirādāya grīvāyāṃ pratimucya jihvayā praśaṃsati | cidrūpa ātmā tu cakṣu-
raṅguligrīvājihvāvarjita eva sannacintyaśaktitvāttānsarvānvyāpārānkarotīti
śrutyarthaḥ | cidātmanaḥ praśaṃseyaṃ yadasaṃbhāvyamānamapi kāryamayaṃ karotīti | kāra-
ṇābhāvepi kāryasaṃbhave tvetacchrutau praśaṃsā na syāt | tadā sarvāvaraṇa0 (pāta.
yo. sū. 4 | 31) iti pātañjalasūtre vyāsabhāṣye tvavindadityasya sthāne avi-
dhyaditi pāṭhaḥ | caturthacaraṇe ca tamajihvobhyapūjayaditi | avidhyatsacchidraṃ
kṛtavān | āvayadgrathitavān | pratyamuñcatpinaddhavān | abhyapūjayat stutavāni-
tyarthaḥ | evaṃ ceti | cikitsāśāsnaṃ vaidyakam | catvāro vyūhāḥ saṃkṣiptāva-
yavaracanā yasya taccaturvyūham | pradhāneti | pradhānaśabdenātra pradhānapariṇāmabhūtā
buddhirucyate | avidyāyā buddhipuruṣasaṃyogadvāraiva saṃsārahetutvāt | samyagdarśana-
miti | prakṛtipuruṣavivekasākṣātkārarūpamityarthaḥ ||
div.note:
15|609 — sarvamavadātam — ityasyānataram ‘itaḥ paraṃ sarvadarśanaśiromaṇimūtaṃ śāṃka-
radarśanamanyatra likhitamityatropekṣitamiti’ iyaṃ paṅktiḥ ḍ pustake vartate |

div.p:
soyamiti | sāṃkhyayogābhimata ityarthaḥ | pūrvaṃ (da. 14 paṃ. 94)
sāṃkhyadarśanenumānamuktam | tatra yatsukhaduḥkhamohātmakakāraṇakatvaṃ sādhyaṃ tatra
kāraṇaṃ cetanādhiṣṭhitamanadhiṣṭhitaṃ vā | ādye sāṃkhyasiddhāntavirodhaḥ | acetanaṃ
pradhānaṃ hi svatantraṃ jagatkāraṇamiti teṣāṃ siddhāntāt | dvitīye tu viruddho
heturityāha — na hyacetanamiti | dṛṣṭānte rucakādau suvarṇādeścetanānadhiṣṭhitatva-
viruddhacetanādhiṣṭhitatvadarśanena sukhaduḥkhamohānvitatvahetoḥ sādhyābhāvavyāpta-
tvāt | sādhyaviparyayeti | cetanānadhiṣṭhitasukhaduḥkhamohātmakakāraṇakatva-
rūpaṃ yatsādhyaṃ tasya viparyayaścetanādhiṣṭhitasukhaduḥkhamohātmakakāraṇakatvaṃ tadvyāptaṃ
sukhaduḥkhamohānvitatvamityarthaḥ | bāhyānāṃ candanādiviṣayāṇāṃ sukhaduḥkhamo-
hātmakatvamabhyupetyedamuktam | vastutastu tadeva nāstītyāha — svarūpāsiddha-
tvācceti | yathā śabdo guṇaścākṣuṣatvādityatra cākṣuṣatvaṃ hetuḥ pakṣe śabde
nāstīti svarūpāsiddho bhavati | heturhi pakṣavṛttitvena svarūpeṇa tatra sādhyasya
jñāpako bhavati | tacca svarūpamatrāsiddham | ataścākṣuṣatvahetuḥ svarūpāsiddhaḥ |
tathā pakṣabhūteṣu candanādipadārtheṣu sukhaduḥkhamohānvitatvaṃ nāsti | sukhādayo
hyāntarā mānasapratyayavedanīyāḥ | candanādayastu bāhyacākṣuṣādipratyayaveda-
nīyāḥ | yadi candanādayaḥ sukhādisvabhāvāstarhyekapratyayavedanīyatvameva tayoḥ
syāt | na tu tathopalabhyate | evaṃ sukhaviṣayayorbhinnapratyayavedyatvena bhedaṃ prasādhya
sāṃprataṃ tayoraikye bādhakamāha — yadyamī iti | sukhaḥ syāditi | na hi vastu
svabhāvataḥ kadācidapi pracyavata iti bhāvaḥ | kramelakasyeti | kramelaka
uṣṭraḥ | sa hi kaṇṭakānbhakṣayatīti tasya kaṇṭakaḥ sukhakārako nānyeṣāmiti
bhāvaḥ | na tu sukhādisvabhāvā iti | nanu sukhādihetutvādeva sukhādi-
rūpatvamanumeyam | sukhādirūpatvābhāve taddhetutvāsaṃbhavāditi cenna | candanaka-
ṇṭakādīnāmicchādveṣahetutvepi tatsvarūpatvābhāvasya sāṃkhyānāmapi saṃmatatvena yo
yaddhetuḥ sa tadrūpa iti vyāptervyabhicārāt | yadi candanakaṇṭakādīnāmicchādveṣa-
hetutvaṃ kādācitkatvādaniyatamityucyate tadā sukhādihetutvamapi teṣāṃ kāla-
viśeṣādyapekṣatvenāniyatameveti kuto na vibhāvyate |

nāpi śrutiriti | ajāmekām (śve. 4 | 5) iti prāguktā (da. 14
paṃ. 108) | yadagneriti | yadagnestrivṛtkṛtasya rohitaṃ lohitaṃ rūpaṃ tadatrivṛtkṛ-
tasya tejaso rūpam | tathā tasyaivāgneryacchuklaṃ rūpaṃ tadatrivṛtkṛtānāmapāṃ rūpam |
tathā tasyaivāgneryatkṛṣṇaṃ rūpaṃ tadannasyātrivṛtkṛtāyāḥ pṛthivyā rūpamiti cchāndo-
gyaśrutyarthaḥ | tānyevātreti | ajāmekāmiti śrutāvityarthaḥ | tatreti |
yadyapi lohitādiśabdāḥ sattvādiguṇatrayapratipādakā iti sāṃkhyairuktaṃ tathāpyatra
śrutau teṣāṃ śabdānāṃ varṇavācitvameva nyāyyam | śrutāvevānyatra yadagne rohitaṃ
rūpamityevaṃ rohitādiśabdānāṃ varṇavācitvena nirdeśadarśanāt | sarvaśākhāpratya-
yānurodhāt | asaṃdigdhena ca saṃdigdhasya nigamanaṃ nyāyyaṃ manyanta iti jyoti-
rupakramā (bra. sū. 1 | 4 | 9) iti sūtre bhāṣye śrīśaṃkarācāryairuktam | mukhyā-
rtheti | sāṃkhyaistu na mukhyorthaḥ parigṛhītaḥ | kiṃ tu rañjakatvādisādharmyādrohitā-
diśabdānāṃ guṇatraye lakṣaṇā svīkṛteti prāguktameva (da. 14 paṃ. 112) |
evaṃ ca bhūtatrayalakṣaṇaiveyamajā na guṇatrayalakṣaṇā prakṛtiriti siddham | jarā-
yujeti | manuṣyapaśvādayo jarāyujāḥ | garbhāśayo jarāyuḥ | tasmājjātā
jarāyujāḥ | pakṣisarpamatsyādayoṇḍajāḥ | svedaśabdena taddhetubhūta ūṣmā lakṣyate |
tato jātāḥ kṛmimatkuṇamaśakādayaḥ svedajāḥ | bhuvamudbhidya jātāstarugulmādyā
udbhijjāḥ | prakṛteriti | pañcamyantam | mūlakāraṇātpradhānātsakāśādityarthaḥ |
rūḍhivṛttyeti | ajāśabdo hi rūḍhyā paśuviśeṣabhūtāyāṃ chāgāyāṃ vartate |
sā ca kevalā rūḍhiḥ | na tu yogarūḍhiḥ | paśuviśeṣe yogārthasyotpattirāhitya-
syāsaṃbhavāt | tacca paśuviśeṣaniṣṭhamajātvaṃ tejobannalakṣaṇāyāṃ bhūtaprakṛtau prakalpya
rūpakeṇa tatrārthe ajāśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ | rūpakakalpanā ca sukhenārthāvabodhāya
kriyate | yathā sūryoyaṃ brāhmaṇa iti | atra brāhmaṇaniṣṭhastejasvitātiśayaḥ prati-
pipādayiṣitaḥ | sa ca sūrye prasiddha iti sūryarūpakeṇa sotiśayo jhagiti
buddhimārohati | tathātra paśuviśeṣabhūtājā bahūni sarūpāṇi cāpatyāni jana-
yatīti prasiddhamiti tadrūpakeṇa bahusarūpavikārajātajanayitṛtvaṃ tejobannalakṣa-
ṇāyāṃ bhūtaprakṛtau śīghraṃ jñāyata iti bhāvaḥ | asau veti | madhuni moha-
hetutvaṃ prasiddhamiti tadrūpakeṇāditye devānāṃ mohahetutvaṃ jñāpyate |

agnau prāstāhutiḥ samyagādityamupatiṣṭhate |
ityuktarītyā yajñakarmaṇyagnau prakṣiptā somājyapayaḥprabhṛtidravyāhutī raśmidvārā
rasarūpeṇādityamupatiṣṭhate | tatra ca yathā madhukarāḥ puṣpebhyo rasamānīya madhu
saṃcinvanti tathā mantrarūpamadhukarā vedoktakarmarūpapuṣpebhyaḥ sakāśātsomājya-
payaḥprabhṛtidravyaniṣpannānyamṛtāni raśmidvārā sūryamaṇḍalamānayanti | tādṛśā-
mṛtadarśanena ca devānāṃ tṛptirbhavatīti bodhyam |

pūrvavādineti | sāṃkhyena hi prāgudāharaṇaṃ pradarśitametat (da. 14
paṃ. 118) | prāguktavikalpeti | sa kiṃ sṛṣṭeḥ prāk (da. 14 paṃ. 125)
ityādiḥ prāgukto vikalpaḥ | anādheyātiśayasyeti | sukhaprāptiduḥkhapari-
hārādyatiśayaśūnyasyetyarthaḥ | na mokṣamiti | mokṣeṇa pradhānasyāpravartitatvā-
diti bhāvaḥ | ciddhātoriti | citeḥ sadā viśuddhatvānna tasyāṃ karmānubhava-
vāsanāḥ santi | pradhānaṃ tu tāsāmanādīnāmādhāraḥ | tathā ca pradhānapravṛtteḥ
pūrvaṃ citirmuktaiva | mukteḥ svarūpāvasthānarūpatvāt | prāguktadūṣaṇeti | anā-
dheyātiśayasya puruṣasya tāttvikabhogāsaṃbhavātpradhānapravṛtteḥ prāgapi citermukta-
tvācca nobhayārthā pradhānapravṛttiḥ saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ | atrāhurvācaspatimiśrāḥ — na
tāvadapavargaḥ sādhyaḥ | tasya pradhānāpravṛttimātreṇa siddhatvāt | bhogārthaṃ tu
pravarteta | bhogasya ca sakṛcchabdādyupalabdhimātrādeva samāptatvānna tadarthaṃ punaḥ
pradhānaṃ pravartetetyayatnasādhyo mokṣaḥ syāt | niḥśeṣaśabdādyupabhogasya cānantyena
samāpteranupapatteranirmokṣaprasaṅga iti | pravṛttisvabhāvāyā iti | pravṛttiḥ
kāryarūpeṇa pariṇāmaḥ | calaṃ guṇavṛttamiti tadabhyupagamāccāñcalyādeva ca
pariṇāmābhyupagamāttriguṇātmakaprakṛteḥ pravṛttisvabhāvatvaṃ siddham | tathā ca
mokṣānupapattiriti bhāvaḥ | atrāpīti | sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātau jātāyāma- 16|40 — kādācitkatva for audāsīnya D.
pītyarthaḥ | ucchede sarvasyeti | pradhānaṃ hi na pratijīvaṃ bhinnam | kiṃ tu
sarvajīvasādhāraṇamekameva | tathā ca tasyocchede sarva eva puruṣā muktāḥ syuriti
bhāvaḥ | tasmāditi | vastunaḥ pūrvāvasthātyāgapuraḥsaramavasthāntaraprāptiḥ pari-
ṇāmaḥ | yathā mṛdo ghaṭaḥ | pradhānasya ca jāyamānaḥ pariṇāmaḥ sarvairjīvaireka eva
jñāyata iti prāguktocchedānucchedavikalpāsahatvaṃ tadavasthaṃ syāt | vivartastu na
tathā | kiṃ tu vastunaḥ pūrvāvasthāyā aparityāgenāvasthāntarabhānam | yathā
śuktau rajatabhānam | tacca pratijīvaṃ tattatsādhanabhedena bhinnameveti na prāgukta-
vikalpāvasaraḥ | kāmāderiti | tīvrābhilāṣarūpaścetasonavasthitatvāpādako
vṛttiviśeṣaḥ kāmaḥ | tatra nididhyāsātiśayena kāntāliṅganādibhramaḥ svapnenu-
bhūyate | jāgṛtāvapi kadācidbhāvanayā tathopanīyate | kāmādeśca rūpameva nāsti
kutaḥ sārūpyam | atha sārūpyaṃ kathaṃcitsāmyamātraṃ cejjīvajaḍayorapi tadvibhā-
vayituṃ śakyam | dṛśyate ca nīrūpe nabhasi talamalinatādibhramo bālānām | 16|58 — asadrūpāt for asarūpāt A.

caturlakṣaṇam | adhyāyacatuṣṭayātmakam | adhyāyacatuṣṭayaṃ ca pratipādya-
viṣayabhedena tattannāmnā prasiddham | samanvayādhyāyaḥ prathamaḥ | avirodhādhyāyo
dvitīyaḥ | sādhanādhyāyastṛtīyaḥ | phalādhyāyaścaturthaḥ | eṣā caturadhyāyī
śārīrakamīmāṃsā athāto brahmajijñāsā (bra. sū. 1 | 1 | 1) ityādiḥ anāvṛttiḥ
śabdāt (bra. sū. 4 | 4 | 22) ityantā jīvabrahmaikatvasākṣātkāraheturmananākhya-
vicāropayogino nyāyānupadarśayantī bhagavatā bādarāyaṇena praṇītā | pratya-
giti | prati pratiśarīramañcati sphuratīti pratyagjīvaḥ | tasya brahmaṇā sahaikyaṃ
vedāntaśāstrapratipādyamityarthaḥ | tatra prathama iti | saṃśayitārthānāmupaniṣadvā-
kyānāṃ sākṣātparaṃparayā vā pratyagabhinnādvitīye brahmaṇi tātparyamityeṣa samanvayaḥ
prathamādhyāyena pradarśitaḥ | dvitīya iti | vedāntavākyānāmadvitīye brahmaṇi
samanvaye prathamādhyāyena pratipādite tatra saṃbhāvitasmṛtitarkādivirodhamāśaṅkya
tatparihāro dvitīyedhyāye kriyata ityayamadhyāyo'virodhanāmnā prasiddhaḥ |
tādṛśam | aspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgam | saṃdigdhamiti | sāṃkhyābhimatapradhānaprati-
pādakaṃ bhavati na vetyevaṃ saṃdigdhamityarthaḥ | yathā mahataḥ paramavyaktam (kā.
1 | 3 | 11) ityatrāvyaktapadam | yathā ca ajāmekām (śve. 4 | 5) ityatrājā-
padam | duṣṭatvamiti | duṣṭatvapratipādanaṃ cāvaśyakam | vicārasya svapakṣasthā-
panaparapakṣanirākaraṇarūpaparvadvayātmakatvāt | liṅgaśarīreti | jñānendriyapañcakaṃ
karmendriyapañcakaṃ prāṇapañcakaṃ mano buddhiścetyevaṃ saptadaśapadārthānāṃ saṃghāto liṅga- 16|64 — bhagavadbādarāyaṇaprāṇāyitasya for bhagavatā bādarāyaṇena praṇītasya D.
śarīramityucyate | guṇopasaṃhāra iti | anyatra pratipāditānāmupāsyaguṇānā-
manyatra saṃgraho guṇopasaṃhāraḥ | āśrameti | brahmacaryādyāśramakarmayajñādīni
bahiraṅgasādhanāni | śamadamanididhyāsanādīni cāntaraṅgasādhanāni | muktiḥ |
jīvanmuktiḥ | caturtha iti | nirguṇabrahmavido videhamuktiḥ saguṇabrahmavido
brahmalokāvasthānaṃ pratipāditamityarthaḥ | idameva sarvaśāstrāṇāṃ mūrdhanyam | śāstrā-
ntaraṃ sarvamasyaiva śeṣabhūtam | ato mumukṣubhiridamevādaraṇīyaṃ śrīśaṃkarabhagava-
tpādoditaprakāreṇeti rahasyam | taditthamiti | śāstrapratipādyamadhyāyapratipādyaṃ
pādapratipādyaṃ ca pradarśitam |
athādhikaraṇapratipādyaṃ pradarśyate — a. 1 pā. 1

(1) athāto brahmajijñāsā (2) brahmaṇo lakṣaṇaṃ tataḥ |
(3) tatra pramāṇaṃ śāstraṃ syā (4) ttatra śāstrasamanvayaḥ || 1 ||
(5) pradhānaṃ na jagaddhetu (6) rānandamaya īśvaraḥ |
(7) akṣyādityāntaḥstha ātmā (8) sa evākāśaśabdabhāk || 2 ||
(9) chāndogyasthaprāṇaśabdo (10) jyotiḥśabdaśca tādṛśaḥ |
(11) kauṣītakigataprāṇaśabdastadvadrasārasā || 3 || a. 1 pā. 2

(1) sa eva sarvatropāsyaḥ (2) sa evāttā kaṭhaśrutau |
(3) guhāṃ praviṣṭau jīveśā (4) vīśa evāntarokṣaṇi || 4 ||
(5) antaryāmīśvaro jñeyo (6) bhūtayonirapīśvaraḥ |
(7) vaiśvānaropi tādṛksyācchāndogya iti saptakam || 5 ||
div.label: a. 1 pā. 3
div.p:
(1) svargādyupaghna īśaḥ syā (2) datha bhūmā pareśvaraḥ |
(3) akṣaraṃ syātparaṃ brahma (4) tadeva dhyeyamucyate || 6 ||
(5) īśvaro daharākāśo (6) rūpāvirbhāvavānparaḥ |
(7) prakāśakaḥ sa sūryādeḥ (8) sa evāṅguṣṭhamātrakaḥ || 7 ||
(9) vidyādhikāriṇo devāḥ (10) śūdrasyādhikṛtirna ca |
(11) sarvaṃ prakampayannīśo (12) jyotirbrahmaiva kathyate || 8 ||
(13) sa evākāśaśabdārtho (14) vājyuktātmā paro vṛṣā |
div.label: a. 1 pā. 4
div.p:
(1) avyaktaṃ tu śarīraṃ syā (2) dajā bhūtatrayātmikā || 9 ||
(3) prāṇādayaḥ pañcajanā (4) jagatkāraṇamīśvaraḥ |
(5) kauṣītakijñeya īśa (6) ātmā vājyuditaḥ paraḥ || 10 ||
(7) sa eva viśvopādānaṃ (8) sarvaṃ vyākhyātamaṣṭakam |
div.label: a. 2 pā. 1
div.p:
(1) na doṣaḥ smṛtivaiyarthyaṃ (2) yogopyetena niḥsṛtaḥ || 11 ||
(3) apyaciccita utpannaṃ (4) śiṣṭāsvīkṛtamīdṛśam |
(5) bhoktrāpattirna bhogyasya (6) nānyatkāryaṃ svakāraṇāt || 12 ||
(7) ādhikyānna hitākṛttvaṃ (8) śakto nānyadapekṣate |
(9) niṣkalopyadhikaḥ sṛṣṭeḥ (10) sarvaśaktiyutaḥ prabhuḥ || 13 ||
(11) tasya pravṛttirlīlaiva (12) vaiṣamyaṃ karmamūlakam |
(13) sarvadharmopapattiḥ syātparameśe trayodaśa || 14 ||
div.label: a. 2 pā. 2
div.p:
(1) svātantryaṃ na pradhānasya (2) mahadvadacito janiḥ |
(3) nāṇubhyo jagadutpattiḥ (4) kṣaṇikatvaṃ na vastunaḥ || 15 ||
(5) jñānātmatā na jagato (6) na yuktaṃ jainadarśanam |
(7) na kevalanimittosau (8) na bhāgavatamaṣṭakam || 16 ||
div.label: a. 2 pā. 3
div.p:
(1) utpattirviyatostyeva (2) tathā vāyorapi smṛtā |
(3) ātmanastu janirnaiva (4) vāyoragneḥ samudbhavaḥ || 17 ||
(5) agnerāpaḥ prajāyante (6) bhūmirevānnamabbhavam |
(7) tattadrūpo heturātmai (8) vāpītiḥ syādviparyayāt || 18 ||
(9) indriyādyā bhautikāḥ syu (10) rna jīvo janimṛtyubhāk |
(11) na kadāpi janistasya (12) nityajñānasvarūpatā || 19 ||
(13) nāṇurjīvo vibhurasau (14) kartā syātpuṇyapāpayoḥ |
(15) aupādhikaṃ tatkartṛtvaṃ (16) parādhīnaṃ ca nānyathā || 20 ||
(17) īśāṃśa iva jīvosau vijñeyo daśa sapta ca |
div.label: a. 2 pā. 4
div.p:
(1) utpattirindriyāṇāṃ syā (2) ttānyekādaśa santi hi || 21 ||
(3) tāni sūkṣmatarāṇyāhuḥ (4) prāṇasyāpi janiḥ smṛtā |
(5) prāṇo vāyuviśeṣaḥ syā (6) tsopi sūkṣmataraḥ smṛtaḥ || 22 ||
(7) indriyaprerakā devāḥ (8) prāṇānyānīndriyāṇi tu |
(9) nāmarūpakṛdīśānastrivṛtkartā smṛto nava || 23 ||
div.label: a. 3 pā. 1
div.p:
(1) bhūtasūkṣmayuto jīvo gacche (2) tsānuśayaḥ patet |
(3) pāpināṃ candraloko na (4) patankhādinibhaḥ kṛtī || 24 ||
(5) khādisāmyaṃ nāticiraṃ (6) vrīhisthaḥ sukṛtī na ṣaṭ |
div.label: a. 3 pā. 2
div.p:
(1) māyaiva kevalaṃ svapnaḥ (2) suptaḥ syāllīna ātmani || 25 ||
(3) sa eva syātpunarbuddho (4) rdhasupto mūrchito bhavet |
(5) pareśo nirguṇaḥ prokto (6) niṣedhyastu śrutau na saḥ || 26 ||
(7) neśātparaṃ tattvamanya (8) tsa eva phaladoṣṭakam |
div.label: a. 3 pā. 3
div.p:
(1) sarvatra dhīrekarūpā (2) vidyaikye guṇasaṃgrahaḥ || 27 ||
(3) udgīthavidyā bhinnā syā (4) dudgīthetyomviśeṣaṇam |
(5) ekaiva prāṇavidyā (6) sarvatrānandādayo matāḥ || 28 ||
(7) parokhilānmataḥ śrutyā (8) mātmaśabdastadarthakaḥ |
(9) ācāme'nagnatā prāṇe (10) vidyaikā śāṇḍilī matā || 29 ||
(11) ekaikayornāma satye (12) bhinnā chandogaśāṇḍilī |
(13) bhinnā puruṣavidyā syā (14) dbahirmantrā na saṃvidi || 30 ||
(15) karmānyatra jñānimuktaṃ (16) karmatyāgastanukṣaye |
(17) devayānena saguṇā eva (18) te cākhilāstathā || 31 ||
(19) api jñānyadhikārī syā (20) nniṣedhāḥ sarvadhīṣu hi |
(21) iyadukterekavidyā (22) tathoṣastakaholayoḥ || 32 ||
(23) jīveśayormitho buddhiḥ (24) satyavidyā na vai pṛthak |
(25) kāmādisaṃgraho bhūtyai (26) klṛptāvevāgnihotradhīḥ || 33 ||
(27) karmāṅgopāstayaḥ kāme (28) prāṇavāyvoḥ pṛthagdhiyau |
(29) klṛptāgnayo na yajñāṅgā (30) ātmā bhinnaḥ śarīrataḥ || 34 ||
(31) sarvaśākhāsvekagā (32) pi vyaṣṭirvaiśvānare na dhīḥ |
(33) śabdādibhedādbhinnā dhīḥ (34) sākṣātkṛtyai na dhīdvayam || 35 ||
(35) vidyā yatheṣṭaṃ kāmyāstu (36) karmāṅgā api ṣaṭtrayaḥ |
div.label: a. 3 pā. 4
div.p:
(1) jñānādeva tu kaivalyaṃ (2) sarvāśramaparigrahaḥ || 36 ||
(3) śrutāvupāstividhaya (4) ākhyānāttu prarocanam |
(5) na vidyā karmasāpekṣā (6) vidyotpattistu karmaṇā || 37 ||
(7) prāṇātyaye sarvamannaṃ (8) karmyakāmopi mocane |
(9) vidhurādyā adhikṛtā (10) utsṛṣṭo nāśramaḥ punaḥ || 38 ||
(11) prāyaścittyavakīrṇī syā (12) ttathāpyavyavahāryatā |
(13) ṛtvikkarmopāsanāstu (14) jñānādhikyavidhiḥ śrutau || 39 ||
(15) mumukṣurdambharahitaḥ (16) phalaṃ nātraiva janmani |
(17) muktirekavidhaiva syānnānyathā daśa sapta ca || 40 ||
div.label: a. 4 pā. 1
div.p:
(1) āvṛttirā phalaprāpte (2) rahamātmeti bhāvanā |
(3) pratīke nātmabuddhiḥ syā (4) dbrahmadhīraryamādiṣu || 41 ||
(5) sūryādidṛṣṭiḥ karmāṅge (6) ṣvāsīno dhyānamācaret |
(7) ekāgratā sādhanīyā (8) maraṇāntamupāsanā || 42 ||
(9) brahmavidyā pātakāni (10) puṇyāni ca vināśayet |
(11) prārabdhānāṃ na nāśaḥ syā (12) nnityānāṃ karmaṇāṃ tathā || 43 ||
(13) phalādhikyaṃ jñānayutā (14) tprārabdhānte tu mocanam |
div.label: a. 4 pā. 2
div.p:
(1) līnā manasi vāgvṛtti (2) stathā prāṇe tu mānasī || 44 ||
(3) jīvātmani prāṇavṛtti (4) rjñāninopīdṛśī gatiḥ |
(5) āmokṣaṃ sūkṣmabhūtāni (6) jñānidehāttu notkramaḥ || 45 ||
(7) jñānīndriyāṇyātmalīnā (8) nyavaśeṣo na kaścana |
(9) jñānijīvo madhyanāḍyā (10) rātrāvapyarkamāviśet || 46 ||
(11) ayane dakṣiṇepyevaṃ muktirekādhikā daśa |
div.label: a. 4 pā. 3
div.p:
(1) arcirādirmārga eka (2) ūrdhvamabdātsamīraṇaḥ || 47 ||
(3) varuṇastaḍitaḥ paścā (4) ddevatā ātivāhikāḥ |
(5) mārgo hiraṇyagarbhānta (6) ścihnopāstāvayaṃ na ṣaṭ || 48 ||
div.label: a. 4 pā. 4
div.p:
(1) muktau svarūpāvirbhāvaḥ (2) sthitirbrahmāvibhāgataḥ |
(3) upādhidharmāścidrūpe (4) saṃkalpātsveṣṭakṛdvidan || 49 ||
(5) dehādi syānna vā kāmā (6) danekatrāpi cāviśet |
(7) jagadvyāpārarahitā śaktirmuktasya saptakam || 50 || iti |

viṣayādaya iti | ādipadena saṃśayapūrvapakṣasiddhāntasaṃgatigrahaṇam |
lakṣaṇāni prāguktāni (pṛ0 261 pa0 17) | jijñāsyatveti | yatra jijñā-
syatvaṃ tatra saṃdehaprayojanarūpaṃ dvayamāvaśyakameva | yo hyartho na saṃdigdhaḥ
kiṃ tu niścita eva tatra prayojanasattvepi na sa jijñāsyo bhavati | jñātatvāt |
tathā yatra phalaṃ nāsti sorthaḥ saṃdigdhopi na jijñāsyo bhavati | jñānasya nairartha-
kyāt | tathā ca yatra dvayamapi na saṃbhavati tatra sutarāṃ jijñāsyatvābhāva eva |

tatra saṃdehaprayojanayorasaṃbhavaṃ manvānaḥ śaṅkate — tatreti | sarvajanīne-
neti | ahamityevamanubhavo hi prāṇimātrasya prasiddhaḥ | tādṛśānubhavavi-
ṣayībhūto jīvātmā dehādibhyo bhinnaḥ spaṣṭamevāvabhāsata iti na tasya jijñāsā
saṃbhavati | niścite vastuni jijñāsāyā anupapatteḥ | nanviti | sthūlatvādayo
hi dehadharmā nātmanaḥ | tādṛśadharmaviśiṣṭo deha evāhaṃpratyayaviṣayībhūtaḥ |
jaḍepi deha ātmasaṃbandhenātmatvāropāttasyāhamityanubhavaviṣayatvamupapadyate | tathā
ca dehātirikta ātmā nāhamityanubhūyata iti tajjijñāsā saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ |
bālyādīti | ahaṃ bālye krīḍārasamanvabhūvamahaṃ tāruṇye viṣayasukhamanva-
bhūvamityevaṃ pratyabhijñā prasiddhaiva | dehasyāhaṃpratyayaviṣayatve tviyaṃ pratyabhijñā
nopapadyate | bālyādyavasthāsu parimāṇabhedena dehabhedasyāvarjanīyatvāt | tathā
ca dehātirikto jīvātmaivāhaṃpratyayaviṣayaḥ | sthūlohamityādipratītistu lākṣa-
ṇikītyanupadameva vakṣyate | pīlupāketi | etatpakṣadvayaṃ prāguktam (pṛ0 225
pa0 9) | tathaikasminniti | tathā ca parimāṇabhedepyeka eva deha iti
sa evāhaṃpratyayaviṣaya ityāśayaḥ | laukikāḥ | cārvākāḥ | maṇīti |
eka eva caitrādirmaṇimantrādisahāyena kṣaṇaṃ vyāghraḥ kṣaṇaṃ hastī kṣaṇamanyo
bhūtvā punaḥ pūrvavanmanuṣyo bhavati | tatra caika eva jīvātmā naṭa ivānekā
bhūmikā ādhatte | tathā ca tatra dehabhedaḥ spaṣṭa eveti tadatirikto
jīvātmaivāhaṃpratyayaviṣaya iti siddham | ata eveti | śarīrādivendriyāda-
pyātmano bhedena pratibhāsamānatvādevetyarthaḥ | ayameveti | yadityavyayam |
yo viruddhadharmādhyāsoyameva bhedaḥ | tathā yaḥ kāraṇabhedoyameva bhedaheturiti
nyāyārthaḥ | jñānavaidharmyamevānyonyābhāva iti matena viruddhadharmādhyāsa eva bheda
ityuktam | prakṛte ca kartātmā | karaṇaṃ cāntaḥkaraṇam | tayośca viruddha-
dharmākrāntayorbheda eva | takṣavāsivat | takṣā rathakāraḥ | vāsistakṣaṇasādhanam
(vākasa iti pra.) | saṃbhedastādātmyam | yadyabheda eveti | saṃkhyānaṃ
samyagjñānam | saṃkathā saṃlāpaḥ | ātmaśarīrayorbhede sthūlohamityādivyavahāro
luptaprāyaḥ syāditi tātparyam | ubhayatheti | mukhyavṛttyā gauṇavṛttyā cetyarthaḥ |
mañcā iti | atra krośanasya cetanadharmasyācetaneṣu mañceṣvasaṃbhavānmañcapadena
mañcasthāḥ puruṣā lakṣyante | lakṣaṇāvṛttiśca gauṇyeva | tadvadatrāhaṃpratyayagamye
jīvātmani sthūlatvādyasaṃbhavātsthūlādiśabdaiḥ sthūlatvādidharmayuktaśarīraviśiṣṭā
arthā lakṣyante | tathā ca na tādṛśavyavahārānupapattiriti bhāvaḥ | ahaṃpratya-
yagamyasyaiva bodhyata iti | na cāhaṃpratyayagamyaḥ sāṃsārikasukhaduḥkha-
bhāgjīva eva brahma cenniṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntam (śve. 6 | 19) aprāṇo hyamanāḥ
(mu. 2 | 1 | 2) sadeva saumyedamagra āsīt (chā. 6 | 1 | 1) ityādiśrutivirodha
iti vācyam | yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ (tai. brā. 3 | 3 | 9) ityādivattāsāmartha-
vādatvena jīvapraśaṃsāmātraparatvādityāśayaḥ |

evaṃ saṃdehāsaṃbhavaṃ nirūpya prayojanāsaṃbhavaṃ nirūpayati — tathā phala-
miti | idaṃ phalam — iti yattairucyate tasya phalatvameva nāstītyarthaḥ | taiḥ
pradarśitaṃ phalaṃ prathamatonuvadati — puruṣairityādinā bandha udāhṛta
ityantena | sarveṣu puruṣeṣvagresarā vidvāṃso hi niratiśayaṃ nirupamaṃ ca
puruṣārthamicchanti | aihikaṃ pāralaukikaṃ vā dvividhamapi sāṃsārikaṃ sukhaṃ tu na
kadāpi prekṣāvadbhiḥ puruṣārthatveneṣyate | nānāvidhaṃ sāṃsārikaṃ sukhaṃ tāratamye-
nānubhūyate | na tatra kiṃcidapi sarvottamam | rājyasukhamapi svargasukhādapa-
kṛṣṭameva | taddṛṣṭāntena ca svargasukhamapi kiṃcidapekṣayāpakṛṣṭaṃ syāt | kiṃci-
dvailakṣaṇyenaihikasukhasadṛśameva ca syāt | itthamanumānena niścitya tadapi
prekṣāvadbhiḥ puruṣārthatvena neṣyate | yacca niratiśayaṃ sarvato vilakṣaṇatvādanupamaṃ
ca tadeva puruṣārthatvena vidvadbhiriṣyate | leśatopi yatra na duḥkhasaṃbhāvanā tādṛśaṃ
hi tat | ataḥ puruṣārthavirodhitvādduḥkhajātaṃ hātavyaṃ bhavati | duḥkhamūlaṃ ca
vidvaddṛṣṭyā duḥkhamevetyādau taddhātavyam | tacca mūlājñānamavidyāśabdavācyam |
avidyaiva hi sakalānanarthāñjanayati | yaścāyamavidyāśabdārthaḥ sa eva saṃsāra
ityucyate | saṃsarati puruṣo yena sa saṃsāraḥ | karaṇe ghañpratyayaḥ | saṃbheda-
saṃgamādiśabdeṣvivātra saṃsāraśabde samityupasargasyaikīkaraṇamarthaḥ | saṃbhedasaṃgama-
śabdau paryāyāveva | etāvatā ajñānāvidyāsaṃsārādiśabdavācyasya duḥkhasya hānameva
brahmajijñāsāyāḥ prayojanamiti siddham |

tacca prayojanaṃ na saṃbhavatītyāha — tacceti | kāśakuśau tṛṇaviśeṣatvāddu-
rbalau | yathā jale nimajjataḥ kāśādyavalambanaṃ vṛthā bhavati tathā brahmajijñāsāyāḥ
saṃsāranivṛttirūpaprayojanapradarśanaṃ vṛthaivetyarthaḥ | ātmayāthātmyeti | yathā
saṃsāre saṃcarata eva prāṇina āntarasukhāderjñānaṃ tathaiva svasyāpītyavirodhena na
tatsaṃsāranivartakaṃ bhavatītyāśayaḥ | nanviti | ahamityevaṃ yadātmajñānaṃ
tatsaṃsāranivartakaṃ mā bhūnnāma | yacca śuddhādvitīyātmasvarūpajñānaṃ tatsaṃsāra-
nivartakaṃ bhavedeveti śaṅkākṛto bhāvaḥ | nanvanya iti | ahamitya-
nubhavādanyaḥ sadeva saumya (chā0 6 | 1 | 1) ityādivākyajanyaḥ śuddhā-
dvitīyātmasvarūpānubhavo yadyapi mūrkhāṇāṃ nāsti tathāpi viduṣāmastyeveti
tena dvaitapratibhāsanātmakasya saṃsārasya virodhānnivṛttirbhavedeveti bhāvaḥ |
abādhiteti | ahamidamityevaṃ yaddvaitapratyakṣaṃ jāyate tasya bādho na dṛśyata iti
tatpramāṇameva | tadvirodhātsadeva (chā0 6 | 1 | 1) ityādyā advitīyātmapratipā-
dikāḥ śrutayo na pramāṇam | grāvāṇaḥ plavante — ityādivākyavat | grāvaplavanaṃ na
saṃbhavatītyata etādṛśānāmanubhavaviruddhārthabodhakavākyānāmaprāmāṇyamevāṅgīkā-
ryam | āgamānāmapyasaṃbhavyarthapraṇayanāsāmarthyāt | śataṃ sahasraṃ vā tatopyadhikā
vā āgamāḥ saṃbhūyāpi ghaṭasya paṭarūpatāmāpādayituṃ na prabhavanti | na ceti |
adhyayanasya hyarthajñānadvārā karmaṇyupayogaḥ | asaṃbhavyarthapratipādakavākyānāṃ tu
tādṛśopayogābhāvādadhyayanaṃ niṣphalam | tathā ca svādhyāyāntargatatādṛśavā-
kyaviṣaye svādhyāyodhyetavya ityadhyayanavidhipravṛttirvirudhyata iti bhāvaḥ | guruma-
teti | etanmate svādhyāyodhyetavyaḥ (tai. ā. 2 | 15) ityayaṃ nāpūrvo vidhiḥ |
kiṃ tvadhyāpanavidhisiddhasyānuvādaḥ (prāgdṛśyam da. 12 pa. 102) | adhyāpana-
vidhistu pāṭhamātramākṣipati nārthāvabodham | tathā cārthajñānasya na vidhyanusāreṇa
sarvatrāvaśyakatvam | atorthaḥ saṃbhavī cedgṛhyatāmasaṃbhavī cettyajyatām | teṣāmupa-
yogastu huṃphaḍādivaidikaśabdavajjapamātreṇa bhaviṣyati | ācāryamate tvarthajñānarūpa-
dṛṣṭaphaloddeśenādhyayanavidheḥ pravṛttiḥ | yatra ca vācyortho na saṃbhavati tatra yaja-
mānaḥ prastaraḥ (tai. brā. 3 | 3 | 9) ityādivākyavadarthavādatvāṅgīkāreṇa lakṣaṇayā
prāśastye tātparyaṃ parikalpyopayogo bhaviṣyati | tathā ca tādṛśasthale nāprāmā-
ṇyamapi svīkṛtaṃ bhavati | evaṃ ca brahmapratipādakavedāntavākyānāṃ jīvaprā-
śastyabodhane tātparyam | sa ca jīvo yajñādau kartopāsyadevatā vetyāśayaḥ |
kākadantavaditi | tathā cābhāṇakaḥ —

kākasya kati vā dantā meṣasyāṇḍaṃ kiyatpalam |
kā vārtā sindhusauvīreṣveṣā mūrkhavicāraṇā || iti |
na ca bhedeneti | advitīye brahmaṇi bhinnarūpeṇāropitaṃ dehādivastujātaṃ
yatpratibhāsate tasyādvitīyabrahmavicāreṇa nivṛttirbhavati | tathā coktānumāne
aphalatvaheturasiddha iti bhāvaḥ | bhedagraho hīti | yathā vyāpakanivṛttyā
vyāpyanivṛttiriti nyāyena dhūmognimapekṣate | vyāpakasyāgnerabhāve vyāpyasya
dhūmasyānudayaprasaṅgāt | tathā bhedādhyāso bhedasaṃskāramapekṣate | bhedasaṃskāra-
mantareṇa bhedādhyāsānudayāt | bhedasaṃskāro hi bhedāgrahaṃ vināśayanbhedādhyāsaṃ
janayati | yathedṛśaṃ rajatamityevaṃ jāyamāno rajatasaṃskāro rajatajñānaṃ vināśa-
yannidaṃ rajatamityevaṃ yathārthāmayathārthāṃ vā rajatapratītiṃ janayati | anutpannara-
jatasaṃskārasya tādṛśapratītyadarśanāt | saṃskāraśca yathārthānubhavaṃ vinā notpa-
dyate | yadyapyayathārthānubhavenāpi saṃskārotpattisaṃbhavastathāpi tādṛśāyathārthānu-
bhavasyāpi saṃskārapūrvakatvenādau yathārthānubhavaḥ kvacidāvaśyaka eva | tathā
cātra bhedasaṃskārajanakaḥ prāthamiko yathārtho bhedānubhavovaśyaṃ svīkāryaḥ |
tasya ca yathārthatvādbrahmavicāreṇāpi nivṛttirna saṃbhavatīti brahmavicārasyāphalatvaṃ
siddhamiti noktānumāne heturasiddha ityāśayaḥ | anātmeti | pariśeṣoṅgabhūta-
statsvarūpastatra līna iti yāvat | avaśeṣo vā | ātmānātmanorabhedāyogya-
tvamasiddhamiti vadanvādītthaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ — yadi tayorabhedayogyatāsti tarhi tayorabheda
ekasyānyatra layena varṇanīyaḥ | jale saindhavasya yathā | sa ca kimātmanya-
nātmanotha vānātmanyātmana iti vikalpaḥ | atha vā vastuta ātmaivaikovaśiṣya-
tenātmaiva vetyarthaḥ | ādye | ātmana evāvaśeṣe | dvitīye | anātmanaḥ
paraprakāśasya jaḍavargamātrasyaivāvaśeṣe | tataśceti | ātmānātmanorabhedāyo-
gyatvānnātmani prapañcarūpasyārthasyādhyāsaḥ | prapañcasya vāstavikatve tadviṣayaka-
mātmano jāyamānaṃ laukikaṃ jñānamapi vāstavikabheveti nātmani jñānasyāpya-
dhyāsaḥ saṃbhavati | evamadhyāsāsaṃbhave brahmavicārasyādhyastadehādinivṛttiḥ phalam —
iti vaktuṃ na śakyata ityaphalatvahetunā brahmaṇo vicāryatvābhāvaḥ sidhyatīti
pūrvapakṣāśayaḥ |

nirasteti | ahaṃpratyayagamyo jīvātmā hi nopādhirahitaḥ | ata evāhamiti
bhāsate | ahaṃbhāvādisakaladharmāṇāmaupādhikatvāt | tathā ca nirupādhikaṃ sadeve-
tyādiśrutiprasiddhaṃ yadbrahmaśabdavācyamātmatattvaṃ tanniścayārthaṃ brahmavicāra āvaśyaka
iti bhāvaḥ | na ca teṣāmiti | sadevetyādivedāntavākyānāṃ gauṇārthakatvaṃ
svīkṛtya jīvātmapraśaṃsāparatvena kathaṃcidyojanaṃ tu na nyāyyamityarthaḥ | tattvam |
nirupādhikamadvitīyaṃ śuddhaṃ brahma | upakrameti | prakaraṇapratipādyasyārthasya prakaraṇā-
dau prakaraṇānte ca pratipādanamupakramopasaṃhārau | tau ca saṃbhūyaikaṃ liṅgam | prakaraṇa-
pratipādyasya vastunaḥ prakaraṇamadhye punaḥpunaḥ pratipādanamabhyāsaḥ | prakaraṇapratipādya-
sya vastunaḥ pramāṇāntareṇāviṣayīkaraṇamapūrvatā | prakaraṇe tatra tatra śrūyamāṇaṃ pra-
yojanaṃ phalam | prakaraṇapratipādyasya vastunaḥ praśaṃsanamarthavādaḥ | prakaraṇapratipādyā-
rthasādhikā tatra tatra śrūyamāṇā yuktirupapattiḥ | ebhiḥ ṣaḍbhirliṅgaiḥ prakaraṇatātparyaṃ
nirṇetavyaṃ bhavati | tatra sadeveti | chāndogyopaniṣadi ṣaṣṭhe prapāṭhake prakaraṇādau
sadeva saumyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam (chā. 6 | 1 | 1) ityevaṃ prakaraṇādau
nirupādhikaṃ sanmātrarūpamadvitīyaṃ brahmopakramya prakaraṇānta aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvam
(chā. 6 | 8 — 16) ityevamupasaṃhṛtam | tattvamasi (chā. 6 | 8 — 16) ityevaṃ navavāra-
madvitīyātmapratipādanamabhyāsaḥ | advitīyātmanaḥ pramāṇāntaragamyatvasya tatrāprada-
rśanamapūrvatvam | taṃ tvaupaniṣadaṃ puruṣaṃ pṛcchāmi (bṛ. 3 | 9 | 26) ityādiśrutyantaraṃ
tatropodbalakam | yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavati (chā. 6 | 1 | 3) ityevamekavijñānena
sarvavijñānamucyamānaṃ phalam | tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti tattejo'sūjata
(chā. 6 | 2 | 3) ityadvitīyabrahmaṇaḥ sakāśātsṛṣṭiruktā | sanmūlāḥ saumyemāḥ sarvāḥ
prajāḥ sadāyatanāḥ satpratiṣṭhāḥ (chā. 6 | 8 | 4) iti sthitirniyamanaṃ coktam |
tejaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyām (chā. 6 | 8 | 6) iti pralayaḥ | imāstisro devatā
anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi (chā. 6 | 3 | 2) iti praveśaḥ |
evaṃ śrutipratipāditaiḥ sṛṣṭyādibhirbrahmapraśaṃsanamarthavādaḥ | yathā saumyaikena
mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syādvācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva
satyam (chā. 6 | 1 | 4) ityevamadvitīyavastusādhane procyamānā yuktirupapattiḥ |
evaṃ bṛhadāraṇyake taitirīyake muṇḍake ca liṅgaṣaṭkaṃ vedāntasāraṭīkāyāṃ rāmatīrtha-
praṇītāyāṃ vidvanmanorañjanyāṃ pradarśitaṃ tata eva draṣṭavyam | adhyastātmaviṣa-
yatvamiti | āropitātmatvaviśiṣṭadehādiviṣayakatvamityarthaḥ | āropaścāyamanā-
hāryo bhramamūlakaḥ | rajatarūpeṇa śuktirivātmarūpeṇāvabhāsamāno yo dehastadvi-
ṣayohamanubhava iti bhāvaḥ | nanvahamanubhave nirviśeṣabrahmaṇovabhāsābhāvepi jī-
vātmanovabhāsaḥ syāt | brahmaṇaḥ sakāśādbhinnasya pratiśarīraṃ bhinnasya saviśeṣasya
dehino jīvātmano vaiśeṣikādibhiḥ svīkṛtatvāt | tathā ca kathamahamanubhavasyā-
dhyastātmatvaviśiṣṭadehādiviṣayakatvamucyata iti cenna | brahmaṇaḥ sakāśādbhinne
jīvātmani pramāṇābhāvāt |

abhyupetyāpyāha — kaṇabhakṣeti | kaṇabhakṣaḥ kaṇādaṛṣirvaiśeṣikaśāstrapravartakaḥ |
akṣapādo gautamo nyāyaśāstrapravartakaḥ | kaṇabhakṣādibhiśca yathā jīvātmā svīkṛ-
tastathā nāhamanubhave pratibhāsata iti tasyādhyastaviṣayakatvameva svīkāryam |
tameva pratibhāsābhāvaṃ nirūpayati — na tāvaditi | sarvagatatvaṃ vibhutvam |
vaiśeṣikādibhirhi jīvātmanāṃ pratyekaṃ vibhutvaṃ svīkṛtam | ahamiheti |
pradeśe kasmiṃścidbhāge vidyamānaḥ prādeśikaḥ | deśataḥ paricchinna iti yāvat |
tathāvidhatvaṃ ca sadana ityalpādhāroktyā pratīyate | tacca vibhorjīvasya na saṃbha-
vatīti bhāvaḥ | etaduktaṃ bhavati — ahamihāsmi sadane jānāna ityatrāhaṃśabdenā-
tmatvaṃ sadane ityanena prādeśikatvaṃ jānāna ityanena jñātṛtvaṃ caikasya pratīyata iti
tanmatam | tacca na dehasya | ātmatvābhāvāt | jñātṛtvābhāvācca | nāpyātmanaḥ |
prādeśikatvābhāvāt | atha sadane vibhorātmano'saṃbhavepyātmaikadeśasya sadane
saṃbhavādekadeśāvacchedeneyaṃ pratītiriti cenna | anyatrāpyātmaikadeśānāṃ sattvena
gṛhe sthitasyāpi vanesmīti pratītyāpatteḥ | tathā cādhyāsenaivoktā pratī-
tirupapādanīyā bhavatīti | syādetat | āhāryāropeṇāpyuktapratītirupapadyate |
bādhajñāne satyapi ya āropaḥ kriyate sa āhāryāropaḥ | yathā siṃho māṇavaka
iti | atrāropakāle nāyaṃ siṃha iti bādhajñānamastyeva | āropaścātra dvividhaḥ
saṃbhavati | ātmadharmasya dehe dehadharmasyātmani ceti | tatrādyaṃ pakṣaṃ gṛhītvā śaṅkate —
nanu yatheti | āropitātmatvaviśiṣṭo deho hyahaṃpratyayaviṣayībhūtaḥ | āropaścā-
yamāhāryaḥ | deha ātmā na — iti bādhajñāne vidyamāna eva kriyamāṇatvāt |
yathā bhadrasena ātmā na — iti bādhajñāne satyapi bhadrasenasya sarvakāryanirvā-
hakatvādbhadraseno mamātmeti lakṣaṇayā prayujyate tadvaditi śaṅkakāśayaḥ | upaca-
riteti | śilāputrakaḥ pāṣāṇamayī śilāpratimā | pratimāyāśca citrasyevāceta-
natvānna jñātṛtvam | tathā cāhamihāsmi sadane jānāna ityuktapratītau jānāna
iti nopapadyata iti bhāvaḥ | jñātṛtvamapīti | yathātmatvaṃ dehe kalpitaṃ tathā
tatraiva jñātṛtvamapi kalpitamityāśayaḥ | prayokturiti | pratipattirjñānam |
jñātā hi svajñānaprakāśanāya jñānānusāreṇa mukhyayā gauṇyā vā vṛttyā vākyaṃ
prayuṅkte | sa eva ca gauṇavṛttyā prayogaṃ cikīrṣuḥ kaṃciddharmaṃ kvacidavidyamānamapi
kalpayati | tathā ca jñātā kalpakaḥ prayoktā caika eva | sa eva cātrāhaṃśabdārthaḥ |
sa ca yadi kalpitajñātṛtvaviśiṣṭo dehastarhi sa svāntargatasya jñātṛtvasya kalpakaḥ
kathaṃ bhavet | kiṃ ca kalpitajñātṛtvaviśiṣṭe dehe vastuto jñātṛtvābhāvena kathaṃ
prayoktṛtvam | kalpitasya paramārthakāryakāritvāsaṃbhavāt | na hi kalpitāgnibhāvo
māṇavako dahati | dvitīyapakṣe vakṣyamāṇamuttaraṃ cātrāpi pakṣe saṃbhavatyeva | dehadha-
rmasyātmanyāropa iti dvitīyapakṣābhiprāyeṇa śaṅkāmanūdya dūṣayati — athetyādinā |
buddhipuraḥsaraṃ hi yatrānyadharmasyānyatrāropastatra pūrvaṃ tayorbhinnatvena jñānamāvaśya-
kam | yathā siṃhatvena jñāyamānātsiṃhātsakāśādbhedaḥ prasiddho yatra tādṛśe māṇavake
krauryādiguṇān dṛṣṭvā siṃhatvamāropya siṃhaśabdaḥ prayujyate siṃhoyaṃ māṇavaka iti |
atra ca gauṇatvaṃ sāṃpratikaṃ na tu nirūḍham | uktarītyā māṇavake siṃhaśabdaprayo-
gasya kvācitkatvāt | yatra gauṇopi śabdastathā prayogaprasiddhibāhulyādrūḍhaśabda
iva sarvadā prayujyate tatra nirūḍhaṃ gauṇatvam | yathā yogabalena tilarasavācakastai-
laśabdaḥ sarṣapādirasepi tayo rasayorvidyamānasyāpi bhedasya tirodhānena gauṇyā
vṛttyā prayujyate | atra cāyaṃ tailaśabdo gauṇa iti pratītirapi bhedajñānavatāṃ keṣāṃci-
deva na sarveṣāṃ rūḍhitulyatvādityanyat | sarvathāpyāhāryāropasthala āropyamāṇā-
ropaviṣayayorbhedena jñānamāvaśyakam | tathā ca yatra gauṇatvaṃ tatra bhedabhānamiti
vyāptiḥ siddhā bhavati | ātmā tu dehādbhedena na pratīta iti nātrāhāryāropeṇa
gauṇī vṛttirāśrayaṇīyā bhavati | aparatheti | dehādibhyaḥ pārthakyenātmanaḥ
svāsādhāraṇadharmavattayānubhavaḥ syāccetkathaṃ tādṛśānubhavaviruddhaṃ deha evātmā iti
mataṃ cārvākā aṅgīkuryurityarthaḥ | aupacārikīti | satyapyabhedajñāne kathaṃci-
dbhedaṃ parikalpya mama śarīramityuktirnirvāhyeti bhāvaḥ | abhedajñāne sādhakamāha —
mama śarīramiti bruvāṇeneti | ekaikasya paśoḥ śṛṅgaṃ gṛhītvāyamīdvaśa iti ta-
ttadviśeṣo yatpradarśyate soyaṃ śṛṅgagrāhikānyāyaḥ | tadvatsvahṛdaye hastaṃ vinyasyāya-
mahamāgacchāmītyevaṃ bruvāṇo dehātmabhramavānapi bhrāntoyamiti janairna gṛhyate |
pratyuta tadvacanaṃ bhramāntarābhāve pramāṇatvena pratyeti janaḥ | dehātmeti | ā
ātmaniścayāditi padacchedaḥ | ātmasākṣātkāraparyantamityarthaḥ |

nanvabhijñayeti | yadyapi sthūlohamityādipratītiviruddhatvānmama śarīramitya-
bhijñayā jīvātmaśarīrayorbhedo na sidhyati tathāpi sohamiti pratyabhijñayā
bhedaḥ sidhyet | sa iti paramātmocyate | ahamiti ca jīvātmā | tayoraikyaṃ ca
jīvātmano dehādbhede satyeva saṃbhavati nānyathā | deha eva jīvātmā cenna sa kathamapi
paramātmā bhavitumarhati | tathā ca dehātmanorbhedasya siddhatvādahaṃpratyayasya gauṇatvaṃ
vaktuṃ śakyata ityāśayaḥ | pāmarāṇām | asaṃskṛtāntaḥkaraṇānāmajñāni-
nāmajāvipālānām | deheti | dehavyatiriktasya jīvātmanaḥ paramātmanā
sahaikyaṃ hi pratyabhijñāyāṃ bhāsate | sā ca pratyabhijñā pāmarāṇāṃ na saṃbhavati | teṣāṃ
dehādbhedena jīvātmanaḥ pratītyabhāvāt | pratyuteti | pūrvāvasthāviruddhamapi kāryaṃ
kāraṇaviśeṣātkvacidutpadyata iti loke dṛśyate | yathā pūrvaṃ śyāmo ghaṭastejaḥ-
saṃyogena pakvaḥ saṃllohito jāyate | yathā vālpasyāpi bījasya mṛjjalasaṃyogena
mahānvṛkṣo bhavati | tathā deharūpo jīvātmāpi kāraṇaviśeṣātparamātmarūpaḥ syā-
diti saṃbhāvanayā sohamiti pratyabhijñāyāḥ saṃbhavostīti na tadarthaṃ dehātmano-
rbhedajñānamāvaśyakaṃ bhavati | vyavahāreti | parīkṣakā hyanutpannatattvasākṣātkārāḥ
kevalaṃ śravaṇamananakuśalāḥ parokṣajñānino jānantu nāmāgamopapattibhyāṃ dehendri-
yādibhyo bhinnaṃ jīvātmānam | pramāṇaprameyavyavahāre tu prāṇabhṛnmātradharmānnāti-
vartante | tathā ca yathā dehātmabhrameṇāhaṃbhāvapūrvakaḥ pāmarāṇāṃ vyavahāro loke
dṛśyate tathaivaiteṣāmapi dṛśyate | pratyabhijñāsattve tu tadviruddhatvāditaravyavahāra-
sadṛśasteṣāṃ vyavahāro na syāt | utpannatattvasākṣātkārāśca ye pratipattārastaddṛṣṭyā
jñātṛjñeyajñānarūpā tripuṭyeva nodayamāsādayati kutastatra pratyabhijñāsaṃbhavaḥ |
kutastarāṃ ca tanmūlikā bhedasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ | aparokṣeti | yathā nātra deśe
sarpāṇāṃ saṃbhavaḥ — ityādivākyātparokṣajñāne vidyamānepi tena rajjau jāyamānaḥ
pratyakṣaḥ sarpabhramo na nivartate | āptavākyena hi bhramasya bhramāvena jñānaṃ bhavatī-
tyeva | na tu bhramanivṛttiḥ | bhramanivṛttistviyaṃ rajjuriti pratyakṣānubhavenaiva tadva-
diti bhāvaḥ | paśvādibhiriti | śārīrabhāṣye prathamata evādhyāsanirūpaṇāvasare
śrīmacchaṃkarācāryāṇāmuktiriyam | śāstracintakānāṃ mananakuśalānāmapyanutpanna-
brahmasākṣātkārāṇāṃ vyavahāre paśvādisāmyameva | yathā paśurdaṇḍodyatakaraṃ puruṣa-
mabhimukhamupalabhya tato nivartate haritatṛṇapāṇimupalabhyābhimukhībhavati tathā
śāstracintakā api puruṣā dehavināśodyataṃ śastradhāriṇaṃ balinaṃ puruṣamabhimukha-
māgatamupalabhya palāyante viparītaṃ puruṣaṃ prati tu pravartanta iti pramāṇaprameya-
vyavahārasteṣāṃ paśutulya iti tadarthaḥ | śāstracintakāḥ | anutpannātmasākṣā-
tkārāḥ kevalaṃ śravaṇamananādikuśalāḥ | pratipattāraḥ | ātmasākṣātkāra-
yuktāḥ |

na ceti | ārhatā jaināḥ | taddarśanaṃ prāguktam (pṛ. 48) | taddarśane hi na
jīvo vibhuḥ kiṃ tu dehatulyaparimāṇaḥ | tathā cāhamihāsmi sadane jānāna ityahaṃ-
pratyaye jīvasya prādeśikatvagrahaṇaṃ yuktameveti tādṛśapratyayasya prāmāṇyaṃ sidhyati |
kṛtahāneti | idaṃ prāgupapāditam (pṛ. 53 paṃ. 9) | aikamatyābhāveneti |
anekeṣāṃ sāmarthyasāmye svabhāvavailakṣaṇyena mitho vaimatyamanivāryameva | tataścaika-
sminneva śarīra eko jīvātmā pūrvasyāṃ diśi gantumicchati paraḥ paścimāyāṃ cedekena
śarīreṇa yugapadubhayatra gamanamaśakyamityubhābhyāṃ śarīrasyākarṣaṇāccharīraṃ vidīrṇaṃ
syāt | ubhābhyāmapi mithaḥ pratibandhādanākarṣaṇe vā kvāpi gamanaṃ na syāditi
kriyārahitameva śarīraṃ syāt | dvitīya iti | avayavānāṃ samudāyo hi jīvaḥ |
samudāyabhāvaśca viśliṣṭānāmanekeṣāmavayavānāṃ mithaḥ saṃśleṣaviśeṣeṇāvasthitiḥ |
sa ca saṃśleṣaḥ kiṃ siddhe śarīre tadanurodhājjāyata uta svabhāvata eva jāyatetha vā
yadṛcchayā jāyata iti vikalpaḥ | ekasminniti | haste pādeṅgulau tatopi sūkṣme
vā kasmiṃściccharīrāvayave chinne tāvato jīvāvayavasya cchede jīvavināśaprasaṅgaḥ
syāt | saṃśleṣasya svābhāvikatve yādṛcchikatve vā nāyaṃ doṣaḥ | śarīrāvayava-
cchedasya jīvāvayavacchedāprayojakatvāt | anekeṣāmiti | svābhāvikaḥ
saṃśleṣaviśeṣaścedvastuno na kadāpi svabhāvātpracyavo bhavatīti svalpasyāpyavayavasya
kadāpi viśleṣo na syāt | niyamena mitha ekaprakāreṇaiva saṃśliṣṭairavayavaiḥ sadā
bhavitavyam | paraṃ na tathā tairabhyupagamyate | bālyādyavasthābhedena janmāntareṇa bā
śarīrabhede tāvāneva jīvo bhavatīti jainairaṅgīkārāt | 16|217 — sukheneva satām for sukhena vasatām A.

atha jīvasyāṇuparimāṇāṅgīkāreṇa prādeśikatvagrahaṇopapattirityabhiprāyeṇāśaṅka-
te — na ceti | sthūlohamiti | aṇutvāṅgīkāreṇa prādeśikatvagrahaṇopapattāvapi
sthaulyādipratītyupapattirna syāditi bhāvaḥ |

na ca vijñāneti | ayamāśayaḥ — bauddhamate vijñānamevātmā | sa cādhyātmikade-
hādyākārohamiti pratīyate | jñānasya sākāratvāt | tathā ca jīvātmanaḥ prādeśi-
katvasthūlatvādi pratīyamānaṃ sarvamupapadyata iti na pratītyanupapattirdoṣaḥ | nāpi
śarīrāvayavacchedādinā tasya cchedaprasaṅgaḥ | vijñānaṃ hi pratikṣaṇaṃ bhidyate | yadā
yathā śarīrasaṃsthānaṃ tadā tādṛśākāraṃ vijñānaṃ bhavati | śarīrādyavayavasadṛśāścaite
vijñānasyāvayavā na viśuddhāḥ | śarīrādikaṃ hi mūrtānāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ saṃghātaḥ |
vijñānādikamāntaraṃ tu skandhānāṃ saṃghātaḥ | sa ca kalpanāmayasvāpnādivastu-
kalpaḥ | ato na tadavayavā mithaḥ pṛthak siddhā bhavanti | viśuddhatvaṃ nāmāvayavā-
ntarānadhīnotpattyādimattvam | etanmatepyahamiti pratyayo na mukhyatvenopapadyata
ityāha — yaḥ suṣupta iti | asthire sthiratvabhrāntisattvādadhyāso'varjanīya
iti bhāvaḥ | yadyapi vijñānasaṃtāna ātmeti tairucyate tathāpi na tadyuktam |
saṃtānasya saṃtāninaḥ sakāśādabhedo bhedo veti vikalpāsahatvāt | tadaneneti |
vijñānavādino bauddhaviśeṣā vijñānavyatiriktaṃ nānyatkiṃcittattvaṃ manyante | buddhi-
reva grāhyagrāhakākārā svasadṛśākārānbāhyānghaṭādīnsvāpekṣayā bhinnānkalpayati |

avibhāgopi buddhyātmā viparyāsitadarśanaiḥ |
grāhyagrāhakasaṃvittibhedavāniva lakṣyate ||
iti tadukteḥ | tathā ca sthūlohamityādyahaṃpratyaya aupacārika iti tadāśayaḥ |
tadapyetena nirastam | aupacārikasthale bhedabhānāvaśyakatvasyānupadamevoktatvāt
(da. 16 paṃ. 181) | tasya cātrāsaṃbhavāt | vāstavikasya vijñānātiriktapadārthasya
vijñānavādibhiranaṅgīkārāt | etāvatā granthasaṃdarbheṇāhaṃpratyayasyādhyastātmaviṣa-
yatvaṃ siddhamiti tādṛśādhyāsanivṛttiprayojanakatvādātmarūpasaṃdigdhaviṣayasattvācca
vedāntaśāstramārambhaṇīyamityupasaṃharati — tathā ceti | āvidyaketi | anādya-
vidyāmūlako yaḥ saṃsārabandhastannivartakatvācchāstrasyetyarthaḥ | dṛṣṭāntaṃ viśadayati —
yatheti | yoṣā strī | aphalatvāditīti | pūrvapakṣiṇā hyanena hetunā brahma
vicāryapadaṃ na bhavatīti sādhitaṃ prāk (da. 16 paṃ. 138) | śrutigamyeti |
śrutyekasamadhigamyamātmatattvaṃ nāhamiti pratyayenāvabudhyate | ahamiti pratyayastvahaṃ-
kārātmanostādātmyādhyāsamūlakaḥ | ātmano'pratyakṣatvepyākāśa iva yadṛcchayā
tatra mohaḥ saṃbhavatyeva | mithyājñānarahita ātmani na kathamapi mohaḥ padaṃ dhatta
ityarthaḥ | asaṃdigdhatvāditi | ayaṃ hetuḥ pūrvaṃ (da. 16 paṃ. 114) vima-
tamajijñāsyamityādyanumāne pūrvapakṣiṇā pradarśitaḥ |

ātmaviṣayakaṃ saṃdehaṃ nirūpayati — yadyapīti | indriyāṇīti | indriyā-
tmavādinontaḥkaraṇātmavādinaśca lokāyataviśeṣā eva | mīmāṃsakaikadeśināṃ 16|228 — na viṣayaḥ for viṣayaḥ D.
bhaṭṭācāryāṇāṃ mataṃ pradarśayati — dravyeti | dravyasvabhāvo bodhasvabhāvaścātmetyarthaḥ |
jñānājñānasvarūpa iti yāvat | ayaṃ hi teṣāmāśayaḥ — ātmānandamayaḥ (tai. 2 | 5 | 1)
iti śrutau prācuryārthe mayaṭpratyayo virodhyaṃśasya leśatostitvaṃ gamayati | virodhyaṃ-
śaśca dravyāṃśaḥ | suptotthitasya hi sukhamahamasvāpsaṃ na kiṃcidavediṣam — iti
parāmarśo dṛśyate | suṣuptau prakāśābhāve suṣuptirasākṣiketi parāmarśo na syāt |
tena suṣuptau prakāśāṃśaḥ siddhaḥ | na kiṃcidavediṣamiti paramarśādaprakāśarūpo
dravyāṃśaśca siddha iti | janmādyasyeti | asya puro dṛśyamānasya jagata utpatti-
sthitilayā yato bhavanti tadbrahmeti sūtrārthaḥ | sarveṣāṃ vedāntavākyānāṃ brahmaṇi
tātparyaṃ samanvayākhyaprathamādhyāyapratipādyam | tathā ca brahmavicārārambhabodhaka-
mathāto brahmajijñāsā (bra. sū. 1 | 1 | 1) iti prathamamadhikaraṇaṃ prathamādhyāyasaṃ-
gataṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ |

vyāptasyeti | agnivyāptasya dhūmasyeva brahmavyāptasya kasyāpi liṅgasyādarśanāt
vidhatta iti | taṃ tvaupaniṣadaṃ puruṣaṃ pṛcchāmi (bṛ. 3 | 9 | 26) iti śrutāvaupaniṣada-
miti padena paramātmana upaniṣatpratipādyatā bodhyate | ānando brahma (tai. 3 | 6 | 1)
yaḥ sarvajñaḥ (mu. 1 | 1 | 9) ityādiśrutayaśca paramātmānaṃ pratipādayantīti bhāvaḥ |
pratipādanīyamiti | ekavākyatayā yojanīyamityarthaḥ | tāmevaikavākyatāṃ
pradarśayati — viṣayatveti | yadā ghaṭādijñānaṃ jāyate tadāntaḥkaraṇaviśeṣo buddhi-
rūpaḥ svāntargatacidābhāsasahito ghaṭādiviṣayaṃ vyāpnoti | tatra buddhivyāptyā
ajñānarūpamāvaraṇaṃ vinaśyati | cidābhāsavyāptyā ghaṭaḥ sphurati | jaḍasya ghaṭasya
svayaṃ prakāśābhāvāt | tathā coktam —

buddhitatsthacidābhāsau dvāvapi vyāpnuto ghaṭam |
tatrājñānaṃ dhiyā naśyedābhāsena ghaṭaḥ sphuret || (paṃ. da. 7 | 91) iti |
sphuraṇaṃ ca jñāne svākārasamarpaṇam | evaṃ cāvaraṇabhaṅgaḥ sphuraṇaṃ ceti phaladvayam |
yatra ca tattvamasi (chā0 6 | 8 | 7) ityādivākyairātmajñānaṃ jāyate tatra buddhivṛtti-
vyāptyāvaraṇabhaṅgarūpaṃ phalaṃ jāyate | āvaraṇabhaṅge sati sadyaḥ svayaṃprakāśa ātmā
svayameva sphurati | tathā ca tatra sphuraṇasya svayaṃ siddhatvānna vākyajanyajñānasya
tatphalaṃ bhavitumarhati | tadabhiprāyeṇātmani jñānaviṣayatvasya niṣedhaḥ | āvaraṇa-
bhaṅgarūpaṃ tu phalaṃ tatra saṃbhavatyeveti tadabhiprāyeṇa jñānaviṣayatvamuktamiti | anā-
dheyeti | brahma śrutergocaro na bhavati | yataḥ śrutiḥ svayaṃ sphuraṇarūpe brahmaṇi
sphuraṇarūpaṃ phalamutpādayituṃ na prabhavati | prameyatvaṃ tu tasya jñāne svākārasama-
rpaṇādbhavatītyarthaḥ | na prakāśyamiti | yato brahmaṇaḥ svayaṃprakāśotastatpramāṇena
prakāśyaṃ na bhavati | kiṃ tvāvaraṇabhaṅgaḥ pramāṇena jāyata ityatastadbrahma prameya-
mityucyata ityarthaḥ |

śabdānāṃ kāryārtha eva śaktigraha iti mīmāṃsakamatānurodhenāśaṅkate — nanviti |
kartavyamiti buddhiviṣayībhūtaṃ kāryamityucyate | saṃgatiḥ śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ |
bālānāṃ prāthamikaḥ śaktigraho vṛddhavyavahārādeva bhavati | vyavahāraśca gāmānaye-
tyādividhivākyaśravaṇasamanantarabhāvī gavānayanādirūpaḥ | atra gavānayanaṃ kārya-
tvena pratīyate | vidhipratyayaśravaṇena tasya kartavyatvena buddhyārūḍhatvāt | tathā ca
kāryabhūtānayane nīdhātoḥ saṃgatiṃ bālo gṛhṇāti | rāmo rāvaṇamājaghānetyādi
siddhavākyaṃ tu na kasyacidvyavahārasya prayojakamiti na tādṛśavākyādbālasya
śaktigrahaḥ | tathā cākāryabhūte siddherthe śabdasya śaktigraha eva nāstīti kutastatrārthe
prayujyamānaḥ śabdaḥ pramāṇabhūtaḥ syāt | evaṃ ca satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma (tai. 2 | 1 | 1)
ityādīnāṃ siddhabrahmabodhakavākyānāṃ na prāmāṇyamityāśayaḥ | na hyastīti |
śabdasya siddhārthapratipādakatvaṃ tasminnarthe tasya prāmāṇyaṃ ca śabdasya kāryārthe śakti-
graheṇa virodhānna saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ | atha kvacitsiddhavākyādapi śaktigraho jāyata
ityāśayenāśaṅkate — nanu mukheti | caitra putraste jāta iti siddhārthapratipādakaṃ caitramu-
ddiśya devadattenoccāritaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā caitrasya mukhaṃ prasannaṃ bhavati | tena ca liṅgena
putraste jāta iti vākyasyārthaṃ putrajanmarūpaṃ vyutpitsurdevadatto niścinoti | na ca
mukhaprasādasya dravyaprāptyāderapi saṃbhavena tena liṅgena putrajanmana eva kathaṃ niścaya
iti vācyam | āsannaprasavāṃ caitrabhāryāṃ jñātavato devadattasya putrajanmaniścaya-
saṃbhavāt | tathā ca siddhavākyādapi śaktigrahasaṃbhavānnāprāmāṇyaṃ siddhavākyā-
nāmiti bhāvaḥ | putrajanmavaditi | itarakāraṇāsaṃbhave hi pariśeṣātputrajanmaiva
harṣakāraṇamiti niścayaḥ syāt | asaṃbhavastu na kāraṇāntarāṇāṃ dṛśyate | kanyāyāṃ
jātāyāmapi sukhakārakaprasūterharṣahetutvāt | ādiśabdena sulagnaprasavasaṃgrahaḥ |
kiṃ ca putraste jāta iti na siddhavākyam | vaktṛtātparyānurodhena tvaṃ jānīhīti
vidhibodhakaśabdādhyāhārāt | tathā ca kāryavākyamevaitaditi na siddhavākyā-
cchaktigraha ityabhiprāyeṇāha — putrasta iti | yathā dvāramityukte pidhehīti vidhi-
bodhakaṃ kriyāpadamadhyāhriyate tadvat | etena vākye vidhermukhyatvena tadbodhaka-
padādhyāhāronucita ityapāstam | sati tātparye vidhibodhakapadādhyāhārasyāpyā-
vaśyakatvāt | pravṛttirveti | nityena vedena kṛtakenānityena sūtrādinā vā
yena śabdaviśeṣeṇa puruṣāṇāṃ kasmādapi pravṛttiḥ kasmādapi nivṛttirvopadiśyeta
tacchāstramityucyata ityarthaḥ | śāstyaneneti śāstraṃ śāsanakaraṇam | śāsanaṃ cāmu-
kaṃ kurvamukaṃ mā kārṣīriti prakāradvayenaiva saṃbhavati | siddhabrahmabodhakātsatyaṃ jñānam
(tai. 2 | 1 | 1) ityādivākyāttu na vidhirnāpi pratiṣedhaḥ pratīyata iti tasya
śāstratvābhāvaprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ | na caiteṣāmiti | satyaṃ jñānam (tai.
2 | 1 | 1) ityādīnāṃ siddhabrahmabodhakavedāntavākyānāṃ kathamapi vidhisaṃbandhā-
bhāve svarūpabodhanasya na kaścidupayogo dṛśyata ityāśayaḥ |

putrapadeti | putrapadena cihnitaṃ vastraṃ pradarśayan vārtāhāraścaitramuṃddiśya putraste
jāta iti bravīti cettatra putrajanmaiva harṣātiśayakāraṇaṃ niścitaṃ bhavati | tathā
ca siddhavākyādapi śaktigrahaḥ saṃbhavatyeveti bhāvaḥ | etaduktaṃ bhavati — caitrasya
putrotpattiryena pratyakṣatonubhūtā sa devadattādistādṛśaputrapadaliptakuṅkumāṅkitapa-
ṭapradarśakena vārtāhāreṇa saha caitrasakāśaṃ gataḥ | tato diṣṭyā vardhase caitra
putraste jāta iti vārtāhāroktiśravaṇasamanantaraṃ pulakitaśarīramutphullagaṇḍayuga-
lamullasitanayanayugalaṃ caitramavalokayaṃstatpramodaliṅgena sa eva nūnaṃ madavalokitaḥ
putrasaṃbhavosya pramodaheturiti niścinoti | yadyapi sukhaprasavastatra vidyate
tathāpi vidyata ityetāvanmātreṇa na sa harṣahetutvena niścīyate | gāmānayetyādā-
vapi gavānayanārthaṃ pravṛttasya chatropānaddhāraṇādi vidyata iti gāmānayetyādi-
vākyasya cchatradhāraṇādyarthe śaktigrahāpatteriti | dṛṣṭeti | vijñātaputrajanma vihā-
yāvijñātaharṣahetukalpanamayuktamiti pradarśayituṃ dṛṣṭetyādiviśeṣaṇam | vijñātādapi
priyāsukhaprasavādviśeṣadarśanārthaṃ tatpadāṅkiteti viśeṣaṇam | mukhyārtheti |
siddhārthaparavākyepi mukhyārthavācakatvena prayogopapattau satyāmadhyāhāronucita
ityarthaḥ | na cātreti | brahmapratipādakavedāntavākye vidhirna saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ |
viditeti | yena śabdārthasaṃbandho jñātastathā vyākaraṇaśāstraṃ mīmāṃsāśāstraṃ 16|305 — pravṛttiparāṇāmeva śāstratvam for śāstratvaprasiddhyā ca na svarūpaparatvam D.
ca yenādhītaṃ tasya śrutācchabdācchābdaṃ jñānamavaśyaṃbhāvīti tadarthaṃ na
vidhyapekṣetyarthaḥ | nyāyapadena jaiminīyanyāyagrahaṇam | bhāvanāyā iti |
yathāgnisaṃnikarṣe śaityapīḍānivṛttistadasaṃnikarṣe śaityapīḍāyā anivṛttirityanva-
yavyatirekābhyāmagnisaṃnikarṣasya śaityavināśakāraṇatvamavagamyata iti na tadarthaṃ
śaityāpanodārthamagniḥ sevya iti vidhyapekṣā dṛśyate tathā nididhyāsane
jñānātiśayo dṛśyata iti na tadarthaṃ vidhyapekṣā | vidhiṃ vināpi bhāvanāyāḥ
prāptatvāt | paunaḥpunyena cintanaṃ bhāvanā | nididhyāsanamiti yāvat |
tasya nityatveneti | yatkartuṃ yogyaṃ tadeva vidheyaṃ bhavati | yacca na kadāpi
sadyathā śaśaśṛṅgaṃ yacca nityaṃ sadeva yathā brahmasvarūpaṃ tadubhayaṃ na kathamapi
kartuṃ yogyaṃ bhavati | ādye kārakavyāpāreṇāpi sattvāyogāt | antye kāraka-
vyāpārātprāgeva sattvasya siddhatvāt | phalatveneti | phalamuddiśya tadupāyo
vidhīyate | yathā svargādyuddeśena yāgādikam | na tu phalameva svayaṃ vidheyaṃ
bhavati | arhe kṛtyeti | kṛtyasaṃjñakāstavyādayaḥ pratyayāstṛcpratyayaścārhārthe bhava-
tīti sūtrārthaḥ | tathā ca jñātavya ityasya jñātumarha ityarthaḥ | draṣṭavya ityasya
dgaṣṭumarha ityarthaḥ |

evaṃ śāstrasya saccidānandaikarasaṃ pratyagātmabhūtaṃ brahma viṣaya iti prasādhyā-
dhunā śāstrasyādhyāsanivṛttiḥ prayojanam (da. 16 paṃ 232) iti prāguktaṃ
prayojanaṃ viśadayati — niṣpradeśa iti | pradeśovayavaḥ | yadyapi paramāṇusaṃyo-
gāddvyaṇukamutpadyate dvyaṇukasaṃyogāttryaṇukamutpadyata evaṃ krameṇa pṛthivyaptejovāyū-
nāmutpattirityayaṃ dṛśyamānaḥ prapañcaḥ satya eva na tvadhyastaḥ | pūrvamasanneva ghaṭā-
diravayavī padārthovayavairārabhyata ityārambhavādasya naiyāyikairvaiśeṣikaiścāṅgīkṛta-
tvāt | tataścādhyāsa eva na sidhyati | tannivṛttiḥ prayojanaṃ tu dūra eva |
tathāpi nāyamārambhavādo yuktaḥ | paramāṇūnāṃ niravayavatvena saṃyogāsaṃbhavāt |
saṃyogo hyavyāpyavṛttiḥ | sa ca sāvayavasyaiva vastunaḥ saṃbhavati | tathā
sāṃkhyābhyupagataḥ pariṇāmavādopi na yuktaḥ | acetanāyā mūlaprakṛteścetana-
saṃbandhamantareṇa pariṇāmāsaṃbhavāt | puruṣasya tvaudāsīnyameva sarvathā sāṃkhyai-
raṅgīkṛtam | na cārambhavādasya pariṇāmavādasya cāyuktatve prapañcoyamasanne-
vāstviti vācyam | tasya pratītatvāt | na caivaṃ prapañcasya pratītatvā-
dagatyārambhavādaṃ pariṇāmavādaṃ vā kathaṃcidāśritya prapañcaḥ satya evāstviti
vācyam | jñānidṛṣṭyā tasya bādhopalambhāt | satyasya ca bādhāyogāt |
tathā ca khyāterbādhasya copapattaye vivartavāda evāśrayaṇīyo bhavatīti prapañca-
syādhyastatvaṃ siddham | anirvacanīyo jñānabādhyaḥ | cidvivarto brahmaṇi
kalpitaḥ | svarūpeti | yathā vastutaḥ śuktau satyāṃ tatredaṃ rajatamiti pratīti-
rbhavati | tatra śukteḥ svarūpāparityāgenaiva rajatarūpāpattirdṛśyate | satyami-
thyeti | ātmā satyaḥ | ahaṃkārādiprapañcaśca mithyā | ahaṃkārādāvanātmani
nātmanaḥ svarūpamadhyasyate | kiṃ tvātmasaṃsargaḥ | ātmani tvahaṃkārādīnāmanātmanāṃ
mithyābhūtānāṃ svarūpamapyadhyasyate | ayameva satyamithyākhyāvabhāsa ityucyate |
śuktyādau rajatādyadhyāsepyevamūhyam | arthādhyāsa iti | śuktau mithyābhū-
tasya rajatasyādhyāsorthādhyāsaḥ | mithyābhūtasya jñānasyātmanyadhyāso jñānā-
dhyāsaḥ | pramāṇeti | pramāṇaṃ doṣaḥ saṃskāraścetyetantritayājjanma yasyāstādṛśī
yānyasyānyātmatā vastvantarasvarūpatvaṃ tat tādṛśavastujñānaṃ ceti dvayaṃ sudhīmi-
radhyāsa itīṣṭamityarthaḥ | pramāṇaṃ cakṣurādikam | doṣo dūratvādiḥ | saṃskāraśca
pūrvaṃ rajatānubhavādātmanyutpannaḥ | etantritayasattva eva śuktāvidaṃ rajatamiti
bhramo jāyata iti prasiddhameva | doṣeṇeti | ātmanyahaṃkārādhyāso nirupā-
dhikabhramaḥ | yathānupahita idamaṃśe rajatasaṃskārasahitāvidyayā rajatādhyāso
bhavati tathā pūrvapūrvāhaṃkārādinā karmaṇā vā kṣobhitayā avidyayā cidrūpa
ātmanyanupahitehaṃkārādhyāso bhavati | ekasminneva brahmaṇyupahite jīveśvararūpeṇa
bhedāvabhāsaḥ sopādhikabhramaḥ | bhāṣyakāra iti | śrīmacchaṃkarācāryaiḥ śārī-
rabhāṣyārambhedhyāsabhāṣye etaddṛṣṭāntadvayamudāhṛtya lokānubhavaḥ pradarśitaḥ |

athādhyāsamasahamānasyākhyātivādino mīmāṃsakasya matamutthāpayati —
