atra prabhākara — ityādinā iti siddham — ityantena | sa hi śuktau jāya-
mānamidaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ na bhramaḥ | kiṃ tu yathārthameva | tacca naikaṃ jñānam |
idamiti pratyakṣajñānam | rajatamiti tu pūrvadṛṣṭarajatasmṛtyākārapradarśanam | tatre-
damiti pratyakṣe purovarti dravyamātraṃ gṛhyate | doṣavaśāttadgataśuktitvasya na
grahaṇam | tacca gṛhītaṃ rajatasadṛśatayā rajatasaṃskārodbodhakrameṇa rajatasmṛtiṃ
janayati | sā ca tadgṛhītamityevaṃ gṛhītagrahaṇasvabhāvāpi doṣavaśādgṛhītatvāṃśa-
pramoṣādgrahaṇamātramavatiṣṭhate | ayameva tattāṃśapramoṣaḥ | tathā ca pratyakṣaṃ smaraṇaṃ
ceti jñānadvayasya mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhedāgrahādvastuto bhinnamapi jñāna-
dvayamidaṃ rajatam — ityabhedavyavahāraṃ pravartayati | rajatārthinastatra pravṛttistu
purovartipadārthe nedaṃ rajatamityevaṃ rajatabhedasyājñānādbhavatīti manyate | rajata-
pratyayasyeti | rajatajñānasya śuktikāviṣayakatvaṃ na saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ | na hi
ghaṭajñānaṃ kadācidapi paṭaviṣayakaṃ bhavitumarhati | ālambanatvam | viṣayatvam |
śukte rajatapratītikāraṇatvena tādṛśapratītiviṣayatvamiti dvitīyaṃ pakṣamutthāpa-
yati — atha kaladhauteti | kaladhautaṃ rajatam | tasya bodhaḥ smaraṇātmakaṃ
jñānam | tatkāraṇībhūto yaḥ saṃskārastadudbodhakāraṇatvaṃ śukteḥ | tena rajatajñāna-
viṣayatvaṃ śukteriti manyasa ityarthaḥ | aśliṣṭam | ayuktam | virudhyata
iti | śuktikāyā viṣayatve hi śuktikaivānubhūyeta na rajatamiti bhāvaḥ |
śālikanātha iti | śālikanāthena prabhākaramatānusāriṇā prakaraṇapañcikā-
khyo grantho viracitaḥ | tatra nyāyavīthīnāmakaṃ caturthaṃ prakaraṇam |

atha bhramātmakajñānotpattau kāraṇābhāvādapi na tādṛgjñānaṃ svīkartuṃ śakyata
ityāha — kiṃ ceti | na samasti | na saṃbhavati | doṣāṇāmiti | doṣā
hi svāśraye svabhāvato vidyamānasya kāryotpādanasāmarthyasya pratibandhaṃ kuryurnā-
pūrvaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tatrotpādayeyuḥ | kuṭajaḥ | vatsakaḥ (kuḍā iti pra.) |
dāveti | dāvāgnidagdhādvetrabījātkadalīkāṇḍotpattiriti vanauṣadhijñāḥ | kadalī
rambhā | na sthāne | na yuktam | dagdhasyeti | vetrotpādanasāmarthye vidyamāna
eva yadi tasmātkadalyutpattirjāyeta tarhi viparītakāryakaraṇe tadudāharaṇaṃ
saṃbhavennānyathā | na ceti | bhasmako rogaviśeṣaḥ | tena dūṣito jāṭharāgniśce-
dāhārādhikyepi kṣaṇamapi nāpacanaṃ bhavati | kaukṣeyako jāṭharaḥ | āśuśu-
kṣaṇiragniḥ | aśiteti | jātavedā agniḥ | āhāraparipāke tasmādrudhirā-
dirasotpādane ca svābhāvikameva jāṭharāgneḥ sāmarthyam | kevalamāhārādhikyā-
dyattatrāgnau māndyaṃ samutpadyate tasya bhasmakarogeṇa pratibandhaḥ kriyate | tathā
rudhirādirasotpādane ca pratibandhaḥ kriyate | ayatheti | arthasya śuktyāderyo-
nyathā rajatādirūpeṇa bodhastādṛśasyāyathārthasya bodhasyotpattau na kimapi kāra-
ṇamasti | doṣāstatra kāraṇamiti cettanna saṃbhavati | yato doṣāṇāṃ kāryotpā-
danaśaktipratibandhakatvameva na tvapūrvaśattayutpādakatvam | bhasmakādīnāṃ
yaddoṣatvaṃ tadrudhirotpādanarūpakāryapratibandhakatvādeva | yato jāṭharāgne rudhirā-
dyutpādanaṃ svābhāvikaṃ kāryamityarthaḥ |

api ceti | avidyamānepi rajate yadi rajatajñānamutpadyata iti svīkriyate
tarhi jñānaṃ viṣayābhāvepi jāyamānatvādviṣayavyabhicāri bhavati | tathā ca
rajatamastītyāptenoktepi tadāptajñānaṃ viṣayābhāvepi jāyamānaṃ kadācitsyāditi
śaṅkāsaṃbhavena rajataniścayābhāvādrajatārthinaḥ pravṛttirna syāt | evaṃ sarvameva
jñānaṃ śaṅkākalaṅkitamiti vyavahāralopaprasaṅgaḥ | loke vyavahārastu niścitajñāna-
pūrvako'pratihato dṛśyata iti bhāvaḥ | yadi ceti | rajatādyarthaṃ vināpi yadi
tajjñānaṃ syāccettādṛśaṃ vyabhicārijñānaṃ kathaṃ svaviṣayībhūtapadārthāstitvaviṣayakaṃ
viśvāsaṃ janayedityarthaḥ | tathā ca na tatrāvidyamānasya rajatasya pratyakṣajñānavi-
ṣayatvamiti vastumātrapratyakṣaṃ rajatasmaraṇaṃ ceti jñānadvayamevāṅgīkaraṇīyaṃ na
tu rajataviṣayakamekaṃ viśiṣṭajñānamityāśayaḥ |

nanviti | viparyayo mithyājñānam | taccātra rajataviṣayakamekaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ
pratyakṣajñānam | tanmūlaka evedaṃ rajatamityādiśabdaprayogarūpo viśiṣṭavyavahāro
jāyate | uktamithyājñānānaṅgīkāre tu sa vyavahāro na sidhyatītyarthaḥ |
yadyevamiti | yatra vastuta eva jñānadvayaṃ sarvasaṃmataṃ yathā śuktikāyāḥ
śuktikātvena jñānaṃ tatastanmūlakaṃ rajatasmaraṇaṃ ca tatredaṃ rajatamiti viśiṣṭavya-
vahāro na dṛśyate | jñānadvayasya tādṛśavyavahārakāraṇatvāṅgīkāre tu tatrāpi
tathā vyavahāraḥ syādityarthaḥ | tatredamitīti | mātrapadena śuktikāyāḥ
śuktikātvena jñānaṃ vyāvartyate | cakṣurindriyasya doṣadūṣitatvena tena śukti-
kāyāḥ śuktikātvenāgrahaṇāt | tathā ca śuktikāyā idamiti sāmānyarūpeṇaiva
grahaṇam | rajatajñānaṃ tu na pratyakṣam | tadviṣayībhūtasya rajatasyāsaṃnihitatvena
saṃprayogābhāvāt | saṃprayogo viṣayendriyasaṃnikarṣaḥ | nāpyanumitiḥ | rajatavyā-
ptaliṅgasya tatrādarśanāt | upamityādikaṃ tu tattannimittāsaṃbhavāddūrāpetameva |
evaṃ ca rajatajñānaṃ saṃprayogāderanubhavahetoḥ sakāśādanutpannatayā na pratyakṣādyanu-
bhavarūpaṃ saṃbhavatīti pariśeṣātsmaraṇarūpaṃ tadityāstheyam | saṃbhavati ca tatra
smaraṇalakṣaṇam | rajatasadṛśavastudarśanodbuddharajatasaṃskāramātrajanyatvāt | tatra
smaraṇe tattāṃśo doṣavaśānna gṛhyate | nanvatreti | rajatasyāsattvātkathaṃ rajatā-
bhāso yujyata iti śaṅkā | ucyata ityādyuttaram | viṣayīkṛtyeti | vyava-
sthāpitamityadhyāhṛtya ktvāpratyayopapattirdraṣṭavyā | smṛtyeti | pūrvānvayi |
śukteḥ sakāśādvivecitaṃ rajataṃ smṛtyā na viṣayīkṛtamityarthaḥ | vivecitaṃ
pṛthakvṛtam |

deśabhedeneti | idamiti pratyakṣātpravṛttistādṛśapadārthābhimukhī | smaraṇā-
jjāyamānā tu na niyamena tādṛśyeva jāyeta | kiṃ caikaikasmādapi pravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ |
prayatneti | prayatnāyaugapadyājjñānāyaugapadyāccaikam — iti kaṇādasūtram (3 | 2 | 3) |
anena sūtreṇaikasmiñcharīre manasa ekatvamucyate | yadyekaikasminnapi śarīre bahūni
manāṃsi syustadā prayatnānāṃ jñānānāṃ ca yaugapadyaṃ syāt | dvābhyāmavayavābhyāṃ
mitho viruddhaṃ prayatnadvayaṃ yugapadutpadyeta | tathā dvābhyāmindriyābhyāṃ jñānadvayaṃ
yugapadutpadyeta | tadadarśanādekasmiñcharīra ekaṃ manaḥ sidhyatītyarthaḥ | tathā
cātra jñānadvayasya sahāvasthānābhāvena saṃbhūya kāraṇatvaṃ na saṃbhavati | niranta-
rotpannayoriti | avyavadhānenotpannayorityarthaḥ | yadyekaṃ jñānaṃ prathamakṣaṇa
utpannamaparaṃ ca dvitīyakṣaṇavyavadhānena tṛtīyakṣaṇe taduttarakṣaṇe votpannaṃ tadā
tayoḥ sahāvasthānaṃ kathamapi na saṃbhavati | paraṃ tvavyavadhānenotpannayostṛtīya-
kṣaṇe sahāvasthānaṃ saṃbhavati | jñānaṃ hi prathamakṣaṇa utpadyate dvitīyakṣaṇe sthīyate
tṛtīyakṣaṇe vinaśyati | idaṃ rajatamityatra grahaṇasmaraṇātmakajñānadvayamadhya ekaṃ
prathamakṣaṇa utpannamaparaṃ dvitīyakṣaṇa utpannam | tayoḥ saṃbhūya kāryakāritvaṃ
tṛtīyakṣaṇe vaktuṃ śakyam | tatra prathamakṣaṇotpannaṃ vinaśyadavasthaṃ dvitīyakṣaṇotpannama-
vinaśyadavasthamiti bodhyam | nanu rajateti | rajatasmaraṇena pravṛttaścettādṛśa-
smaraṇaviṣayībhūte gṛhagatamañjūṣādigate rajate pravṛttiḥ syānna tu purovartivastva-
bhimukhī pravṛttiḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ | svarūpata iti | saṃnihitarajatagocarajñānaṃ
cakṣuḥsaṃnikṛṣṭasatyarajataviṣayakaṃ yathārthaṃ pratyakṣajñānam | tadyathedaṃ rajatamiti raja-
tatvedaṃtayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyavahāraṃ taddvārā pravṛttiṃ ca janayati tathā
tatsārūpyeṇaitajjñānadvayamapi tādṛśavyavahāraṃ pravṛttiṃ ca janayati | jñānadvayasya
tatsārūpyaṃ ca bhedāgrahaṇāt | iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ | satyarajatapratyakṣe hi rajatatvedaṃ-
tayorvastuto mithaḥ saṃsṛṣṭatvena tayorasaṃsargo nāsti | atastajjñānamasaṃsargā-
viṣayakam | tathā tatpratyakṣaṃ vastuta ekaṃ na tu nānetyavāntarabhedo nāstyeva |
atastatra bhedasyāgrahaṇam | jñānadvayasthale tu vastutastayordvayorjñānayorasaṃsarga eka-
tvābhāvādavāntarabhedaśca yadyapi vartate tathāpi doṣavaśāttadagrahaṇam | tathā hi —
asaṃsargasya bhedasya ca grahaṇaṃ virodhasphuraṇādbhavati | virodhaśca tattedaṃtayostathā
śuktitvarajatatvayośca | tatra pratyakṣe yadyapīdaṃtā bhāsate tathāpi tadviruddhā tattā
doṣavaśātsmaraṇe na bhāsate | tathā smaraṇe yadyapi rajatatvaṃ viṣayībhavati tathāpi
tadviruddhaṃ śuktitvaṃ doṣavaśātpratyakṣe na viṣayībhavati | tathā ca virodhānava-
bhāsena svarūpato viṣayataśca vidyamānasyāpi bhedasyāgrahaṇam | tatra svarūpato
vidyamānasya bhedasyāgrahaṇaṃ tattārūpaparokṣāṃśasya doṣavaśena smaraṇenavabhāsāt |
viṣayato vidyamānasya bhedasyāgrahaṇaṃ tu doṣavaśena śuktyaṃśasya pratyakṣenavabhāsā-
diti | grahaṇasmaraṇe iti | yayormitho vidyamānopi bhedo nāvabhāsate tādṛśa-
midaṃ grahaṇasmaraṇātmakaṃ jñānadvayaṃ rajatayathārthajñānādbhinnamapi bhedāgrahaṇasārū-
pyādabhinnamiva tatkāryakāri bhavatītyarthaḥ | agṛhīteti | na gṛhīto viveko
mitho bhedo yenāta evāpannaṃ prāptaṃ saṃnihitarūpyajñānena rajatayathārthapratyakṣeṇa saha
sārūpya yena tādṛśamityarthaḥ | tayorabhāvāditi | grahaṇasattvepi smaraṇābhā-
vāt | na hi tatra pītatvāṃśaḥ smaraṇaviṣayo bhavati | saṃskārodbodhakābhāvāt |
tathā ca tatra pītaḥ śaṅkha iti vyavahāro na syāditi śaṅkakāśayaḥ | agṛhīta-
vivekayoriti | yadyapyatra grahaṇasmaraṇātmakaṃ jñānadvayaṃ nāsti tathāpi vyavahāra-
prayojakaṃ jñānadvayaṃ grahaṇātmakamevātra vartate | pīta ityeka pratyakṣam | śaṅkha
ityaparaṃ pratyakṣam | grahaṇātmakajñānadvaye cāsminvastuto vidyamānasya mitho'saṃ-
sargasya bhedasya ca doṣavaśādanavabhāsaḥ | pītaḥ śaṅkha iti dhīśca pittadoṣeṇa
jāyate | pittaṃ ca pītarūpaviśiṣṭa sūkṣmaṃ dravyaṃ nayanaraśminiṣṭham | raśmayaśca
śaṅkhena saṃbaddhāḥ | tatra ca doṣavaśena pittasya dravyasya na grahaṇam | tadgataṃ pītarūpaṃ
kevalaṃ gṛhyate | śaṅkhapratyakṣe ca doṣavaśena śvetarūpasya na grahaṇam | tadāśrayaḥ
śaṅkhaḥ kevalaṃ gṛhyate | ataśca samīcīnasaṃsargajñānena sarūpametajjñānadvayaṃ bhavati |
suvarṇādau vastuto vidyamānasya pītaguṇasaṃbandhasya jñānaṃ samīcīnasaṃsargajñānam |
tena sahāsya pratyakṣajñānadvayasyāsaṃsargānavabhāsarūpasādharmyācca tatrevātrāpi pīta
iti vyavahāra iti bhāvaḥ | tapanīyaṃ suvarṇam | availakṣaṇyaṃ sārūpyam |
prathate | avabhāsate | guṇa iti | guṇasya svāśrayadravyāpekṣā | dravyasya
svāśritaguṇāpekṣā | tathā ca yatra dravyaṃ guṇaścetyetadubhayamavabhāsate tatra tadu-
bhayasya vastuto mitho'saṃbandhepi tamasaṃbandhaṃ tadubhayabuddhirna viṣayīkarotītyarthaḥ |
satyeti | satyasya pītasyāvabhāsaḥ suvarṇādau draṣṭavyaḥ |

kathamiti | niṣedhasya prāptipūrvakatvaniyamādityāśayaḥ | kaladhautaṃ rajatam |
bhedāgraheti | tathā ca nedaṃ rajatavyavahārārhamityabhiprāyeṇa nedaṃ rajatamiti
vyapadiśyate | rajataniṣedhāṅgīkārepi tanmūlako rajatavyavahāraniṣedho bhavatyeva |
tathā cātrobhayābhyupeto rajatavyavahāraniṣedha eva nedaṃ rajatamityasyārtho lāgha-
vātsvīkāryaḥ | kimatrātiriktarajataniṣedhakalpanayeti | mithyābhāva iti |
mithyābhāvo mithyātvam | bhrama iti yāvat | ayaṃ bhāvaḥ — idamityanubhavarūpaṃ
vijñānaṃ pramāṇameva | bhrāntirūpatā cātra smaraṇarūpasyaiva | anubhavajanyavyavahāra-
tulyavyavahārapravartakatvepi vyavahārakāle visaṃvādakatvāt | tajjanyapravṛtterniṣpha-
latvācca | yepi caikamidaṃ vijñānaṃ mithyābhūtamiti manyante tepi bādhakapratyayā-
dhīnaṃ mithyātvamabhyupagacchanto nedamaṃśasya mithyābhāvaṃ vaditumīśate | tatra
bādhakābhāvāt | bādhakapratyayadaśāyāmapīdamaṃśasyānuvṛtteriti |

bhāvavyatirekeṇeti | prāgupapāditametadrāmānujadarśane (da. 4 paṃ. 57) |
evam | abhāvānaṅgīkāre | aparathā | ālambanaṃ vinaiva pratyayo jāyata
ityaṅgīkāre | māhābhāniko mādhyamiko bauddhaḥ | sa hi śūnyavādī kṛtsnaṃ vyava-
hāraṃ nirālambanamevāṅgīkaroti | abhāvasyeti | bhūtale ghaṭo nāstīti
ghaṭābhāvajñānaṃ bhūtalasya dharmiṇo ghaṭasya pratiyoginaśca jñāne satyeva bhavati |
ato'bhāvanāmakasvatantrapadārthāṅgīkārepi dharmipratiyoginorjñānamāvaśyakameva
bhavati | tathā ca dharmikalpanāto varaṃ dharmakalpaneti nyāyānusāreṇābhāvo nāma
kaścanādhikaraṇasya dharmaviśeṣa ityāsthīyate | sa ca kevalabhūtalatvarūpaḥ | tanaiva
ca ghaṭo nāstīti vyavahāra upapadyata iti bhāvaḥ | kevalabhūtalajñānaṃ ca ghaṭādeḥ
pratiyogino'darśanādbhavati | tacca pratiyogino'darśanaṃ pratiyogismaraṇena saha-
kṛtamityanyadetat | amṛteti | śālikanāthamiśraviracitāyāṃ prakaraṇapañcikāyāṃ
ṣaṣṭhaṃ prakaraṇamamṛtakalānāmakam | atrocyata iti | bhūtalādina iti vastuna
ityasya viśeṣaṇam | ikoci vibhaktau (pā. sū. 7 | 1 | 73) iti sūtreṇa numā-
gamaḥ | tṛtīyādiṣu0 (pā. sū. 7 | 1 | 74) iti puṃvadbhāvastu na kṛtaḥ | vaika-
lpikatvāt | bhūtalādivastuno jñānaṃ dviprakārakam | ekaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaviṣayakaṃ ghaṭava-
dbhūtalamiti | aparaṃ ca tadaviṣayakaṃ bhūtalamātrajñānam | tadapi dvividhaṃ ghaṭādya-
darśanasahakṛtaṃ taddarśanakālikaṃ ca | tatrādyaṃ ghaṭādismaraṇasahakṛtaṃ yadā jāyate
tadā tādṛśabhūtalasvarūpa evābhāva ityarthaḥ | ata eveti | śālikanāthamiśra-
viracitāyāṃ prakaraṇapañcikāyāṃ pramāṇapārāyaṇanāmakaṃ pañcamaṃ prakaraṇam | tatra
pratyakṣānumānopamānaśabdārthāpattirūpāṇi pañcaiva pramāṇānyuktāni | ṣaṣṭhamanupala-
bdhināmakaṃ pramāṇaṃ mīmāṃsakaikadeśibhirbhāṭṭaiḥ svīkṛtamapi prābhākaramatānusāri-
bhirasvīkṛtatvānnoktam | taddhyabhāvamātraṃ gṛhṇāti na kadāpi bhāvam | yadi ca
bhāvādatirikto'bhāvo nāma padārtha eva nāsti tarhi kimarthaṃ tadgrahaṇārthaṃ pramāṇā-
pekṣeti bhāvaḥ | nanvevamiti | evakāraścakāra itivannaśabdātkārapratyayaḥ |
na — ityavyayasya vācyārthābhāvādvaiyarthyam | nañityavyayaṃ svarādigaṇe pāṇininā
paṭhyate | nañ (pā. sū. 2 | 2 | 6) ityanuśāsanena tasyottarapadena saha tatpuruṣo
vidhīyate | sa ca virudhyate | tasyānarthakatvenottarapadārthena saha tasyānvayāsaṃbha-
vāt | vārtam | phalgu | ekonapañcāśaditi | svarāḥ ṣoḍaśa | kakārādayo
makāraparyantāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ | yakārādayaścāṣṭau | saṃkalitā ekonapañcāśat |
abhāvārthatvādarśanenetyanena vyāptiḥ sūcitā | tathā ca prayogaḥ — navarṇo nābhāvā-
rthako varṇatvādakārādivarṇavaditi | uktayā rītyeti | idaṃ rajatamiti grahaṇa-
smaraṇātmakasya jñānadvayasya satyatvepi visaṃvādipravṛttijanakatvena bhramatvaprasiddhiḥ |
rajatavyavahāraniṣedhābhiprāyeṇa nedaṃ rajatamiti bādhasya ca prasiddhiḥ | vivādā-
dhyāsitā iti | yathārthā ayathārthā vetyevaṃ vādagrastā idaṃ rajatamityādayaḥ
pratyayā ityarthaḥ | anena saṃdigdhasādhyavattvarūpapakṣalakṣaṇamatrānugatamiti sūcitam |

athāyathārthajñānaṃ nāstyevetyevaṃ mīmāṃsakamataṃ dūṣayati — tadapara iti | na
ca rajatamiti | vastuto rajatasyāsattve vidyamānaṃ śuktikāśakalamidaṃtvena
jñātamapi rajatārthinaḥ samīhitavastusvarūpaṃ tatsādhanasvarūpaṃ vānubhāvayituṃ na
śaknotītyarthaḥ | tasyānubhaveti | smaraṇaṃ hyanubhavānusāri | tathā cāyaṃ yasmi-
ndeśe pūrvaṃ rajatamanvabhūttaddeśābhimukhameva tādṛśānubhavajanyasmaraṇenāyaṃ pravarteta
na tu purovartiśuktikābhimukhameveti bhāvaḥ | grahaṇeti | grahaṇamūlako hi
cetanasya vyavahāraḥ kathamagrahaṇamātrādbhavediti bhāvaḥ | na vayamiti | kevala-
syedamiti grahaṇasya kevalasya rajatasmaraṇasya vā na vyavahārakāraṇatvamucyate kiṃ
tu tādṛśajñānadvayasya prāptayathārtharajatajñānasādṛśyasyeti na doṣa ityāśayaḥ |
samīcīnarajateti | jñānadvayasya satyarajatajñānasādṛśyaṃ pravṛttikāraṇamiti
yanmīmāṃsakairuktaṃ tajjñāyamānameva pravṛtteḥ kāraṇamatha vā vastutaḥ saditi vikalpaḥ |
jñāyamānameva sādṛśyaṃ kāraṇamiti pakṣopi punarvikalpyate | jñānasya dvaividhyāt |
yena dharmeṇa sādṛśyamabhimataṃ taddharmāpekṣayā sādṛśyaṃ nātiriktaṃ kiṃ tu tādṛśa-
dharmāparaparyāyameveti vaiśeṣikādayaḥ | sa ca dharmomukasyopameyasyāmukenopa-
mānena sahāmukaḥ samāna iti kadācidviśeṣākāreṇa jñāyate | kadācittu sāmā-
nyarūpeṇāmukaniṣṭhoyaṃ dharma iti | atra ca bhedāgrahaḥ samāno dharmaḥ | tathā ca
yathā satyarajatajñāne bhedo na gṛhyate tathā jñānadvaye bhedo na gṛhyata — ityākārakaṃ
bhedāgrahajñānaṃ pravṛtterjanakamatha vā avayordvayorjñānayormitho bhedo na gṛhyate — ityā-
kārakamiti vikalpaḥ phalitaḥ | vyāhatatvāditi | idamuttaramādyapakṣepi
saṃbhavati | sattāmātreṇeti | yathendriyaṃ svayamajñātamapi jñānakāraṇaṃ bhavati
yathā vā saṃnihitogniḥ svayamajñātopi dāhakāraṇaṃ bhavati tathānayordvayorgrahaṇa-
smaraṇātmakajñānayorvastuto vidyamāno bhedāgrahaḥ svayamajñātopi vyavahāra-
kāraṇaṃ pravṛttikāraṇaṃ ca bhavati | evameva ca mīmāṃsakairaṅgīkṛtam | tadāha —
evameveti | kimayamiti | bhedāgraho hi śuktau rajatasvarūpāropasya kāraṇam |
sa cāropo vyavahārādikāraṇam | tathā cāropadvārā bhedāgraho vyavahārādikāra-
ṇamiti svīkriyate | atha vā rajatasvarūpamanāropya bhedāgrahaḥ svayameva vyava-
hārādikāraṇamiti svīkriyata iti vikalpaḥ | viśiṣṭeti | yathā puruṣe daṇḍa-
vaiśiṣṭyaṃ jñātvaivāyaṃ daṇḍīti vyavahāro bhavati na tvanyathā tathā purovartipadārthe
rajatatvavaiśiṣṭyaṃ jñātvaivedaṃ rajatamiti vyavahāraḥ syānna tvajñānena | ajñānaṃ cātra
bhedajñānābhāvaḥ | yadi sa eva kāraṇaṃ syāttarhi purovartipadārthasaṃnikarṣātprāgapi
tasya sulabhatvātkuto na tādṛśavyavahāro na vā pravṛttiḥ | tasmājjñānaviśeṣasyaiva
cetanavyavahārakāraṇatvamaṅgīkāryam |

atha śuktau rajatavyavahāro nāropapūrvakaḥ kiṃ tu jñānadvayasya mitho bhinnatvena
yadagrahaṇaṃ tadrūpājñānapūrvakaḥ — iti mīmāṃsakasiddhāntasiddhārthānusāreṇāśaṅkate —
nanvayamiti | ayaṃ vyavahāro nājñānapūrvaka iti — ityetadabhisaṃdhāvanveti |
śaṅkakaścāyamanākalitaparābhisaṃdhiḥ | āropāvaśyakatvasādhakonupadameva vakṣya-
māṇo vedāntināṃ gūḍhābhiprāyonena na jñāyate | anyathā śaṅkaiva nodayamāsādayet |
idamartheti | idamarthenābhisaṃbhinno yo graha idamityaparokṣānubhavastasmādviviktaṃ
bhinnamapi rajatasmaraṇameva pravṛttikāraṇamiti vaktavyam | iṣṭavastujñāne pravṛttistada-
bhāve netyanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ rajatajñānamevātra pravṛttikāraṇamityarthasyāvaśyamaṅgīka-
rtavyatvāt | paraṃ tu smaraṇātmakaṃ rajatajñānamatra pravṛttikāraṇamiti vaktuṃ na śakyate |
jñānecchayoḥ samānaviṣayatvepīcchāpravṛttyoḥ samānaviṣayatvabhaṅgāpatteḥ | icchā-
viṣayībhūtaṃ hi rajatam | na tatpravṛttiviṣayībhūtam | pravṛtteridamarthābhimukhatvāt |
tathā cātra yadamimukhapravṛttistadeva jñāna icchāyāṃ ca viṣayībhūtamiti kenāpi
prakāreṇopapādanīyameva | tacca pravṛttiviṣayībhūta idamartha icchāviṣayībhūtaraja-
tāropamantareṇa na sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ | tadiccheti | tacchabdenedaṃkā-
rāspadaṃ vastu parāmṛśyate | yadīti | purovarti vastu rajatabhinnamiti na gṛhyate
ataḥ pravṛttiḥ — iti yadi mīmāṃsakairucyate tarhi teṣāmeva matānusāreṇa puro-
vartti vastu rajatamiti na gṛhyate ato na pravṛttiḥ — ityapi vaktuṃ śakyate | pravṛ-
ttyabhāva evopekṣā | tathā ca purovartivastuni rajatabhedasyājñānaṃ rajatābheda-
syājñānaṃ ceti dvayaṃ yugapadvartamānaṃ svasvakāryaṃ kuryāccedyugapadeva kuryāt | paraṃ tu
pravṛttistadabhāvaśceti kāryadvayaṃ yugapanna saṃbhavatīti dolāyamānatā syānna tu
niyamena tadupādānārthaṃ dṛśyamānā pravṛttiḥ kathamapyupapadyate atastadupapattaye
purovartini rajatāropovaśyaṃ svīkāryo bhavati | tadanumāyeti | tathā ca
prayogaḥ — purovartipadārtha upakārahetū rajatatvātpūrvānubhūtarajatavat | pakṣe hetoḥ
sattvaṃ cātrāropaṃ vinā durlabhamiti bhedāgrahaḥ samāropotpādanakrameṇa vyavahāra-
hetuḥ — ityevaṃ pūrvoktaḥ (da. 16 paṃ. 510) prathamaḥ pakṣa eva yuktaḥ |

taṭastheti | pūrvānubhūtamanāropitaṃ rajataṃ taṭastham | tasya smaraṇenāropaṃ
vināpi hetorjñānamastyevetyanumānaṃ sulabhamiti śaṅkakāśayaḥ | pakṣadharmatvā-
bhāvāditi | śaṅkakenāropānaṅgīkārādrajatatvasya hetoḥ pakṣabhūtedamarthāvṛtti-
tvāt | jñāteti | liṅgaṃ sādhanaṃ dhūmādikam | tajjñāpakamasyāstīti liṅgi
sādhyamagnyādikam | dhūmāgnyorvyāptirgṛhītā yena tādṛśasya puruṣasya dhūmaviśi-
ṣṭaparvataikadeśabhūtadhūmadarśanādagniviśiṣṭaparvataikadeśabhūtasyāgneryajjñānaṃ jāyate tada-
numānamityarthaḥ | sa eṣa iti | gamyo jñāpyaḥ sādhyabhūtorthaḥ | gamako jñā-
pako hetuḥ | parvatagategnau sādhye yo dhūmādistajjñāpaka iṣyate sa eṣa ubhayātmā
vyāptiviśiṣṭaḥ pakṣaniṣṭhaścetyevaṃ svarūpadvayākrānto bhavati | yadi vyāptiviśi-
ṣṭopi na pakṣaniṣṭho yadi vā pakṣaniṣṭhopi na vyāptiviśiṣṭa ityevamekamapi
svarūpamasiddhaṃ cettena jñāpyaṃ na sidhyatītyataḥ sa hetutvenābhimato dhūmādirna
bodhako bhavatītyarthaḥ | bhavatpakṣepi | śuktau rajatatvāropa iti pakṣepi | yakṣeti |
purovasthita idamarthe sādhyamupakārahetutvaṃ na vastuto vidyate kiṃ tu kiṃcitkāla-
paryantamavabhāsata ityapāramārthikam | tādṛśāpāramārthikasādhyasyānumāpakaṃ
liṅgaṃ rajatatvamapāramārthikaṃ cetkā hāniriti bhāvaḥ | purovartiviṣayamiti |
bahuvrīhiḥ | anenānumānena rajataviṣayakajñānasya purovartiviṣayakatve sādhite-
rthādeva rajatapurovartinostādātmyaṃ siddham | evaṃ dvitīyenānumānena śuktiśaka-
lasya rajataviṣayakajñānaviṣayatve sādhiterthādeva śuktiśakalarajatayostādātmyaṃ
siddham | dvividhamapyetattādātmyamāropeṇaivopapādanīyaṃ bhavatītyāropaḥ sidhyati |
rajatapadeti | idaṃ rajatamityatra rajatapadasamānādhikaraṇaṃ yatpadāntaramidamiti
tadvācyatvaṃ śuktiśakalasyetyarthaḥ |

tatra kimiti | purovartipadārthamavalambya rajatamiti pratītirbhavatīti
nikhilaprekṣāvadanubhavasiddham | evaṃ satyapi anubhavavirodha iti vadato yadī-
tthamāśayaḥ — purovartipadārthaḥ śuktikātvena rajatapratīteravalambanaṃ bhavatīti matvā-
nubhavavirodha ucyate iti tarhi naivedṛśonubhavavirodho vaktavyaḥ | purovarti-
padārthaḥ śuktikātvena rajatapratīteravalambanamityasyārthasyāsmābhiranaṅgīkārāt |
atha purovartipadārtha idaṃtvena rajatapratīteravalambanaṃ bhavatīti matvānubhavavirodha
ucyate — ityāśayastarhyeṣā anubhavavirodha — iti tvaduktirevānubhavaviruddhā | īdṛśo
hi prekṣāvatāmanubhavaḥ — dūṣitalocanasya purovartidravyasaṃyogādidamākārā cāka-
cikyākārā cāntaḥkaraṇavṛttirudeti | śuktitvaprakārikā tu naivāntaḥkaraṇavṛ-
ttirudeti | tathā ca śuktitvaprakārakāntaḥkaraṇavṛttyabhāvarūpā yā cāvidyā saiva
cākacikyādisādṛśyasaṃdarśanasamudbodhitarajatasaṃskārasahitā doṣasamavahitā ca
rajatarūpārthākāreṇa rajatajñānābhāsākāreṇa ca pariṇamate | ayameva krameṇā-
rthādhyāso jñānādhyāsaścocyata iti | tatra jñānādhyāsorthādhyāsāvinābhūtatvānna
pṛthak sādhanīyo bhavatītyanyat | idaṃteti | idaṃtāniyataḥ purovartī | tādṛśo
deśodhikaraṇaṃ yasyetyarthaḥ |

dāvadagdheti | prāguktam (da. 16 paṃ. 368) | nivṛttiprasaṅgāditi |
tathā ca pariṇāmaviśeṣeṇa svābhāvikadharmasya na hāniriti vetrabījasya viparīta-
kāryakāritvaṃ siddham | anuvṛttayoriti | pākena rakte ghaṭe pūrvavadeva ghaṭavi-
ṣayakaṃ jñānamanuvartate ghaṭoyamiti prayogaśca pūrvavadbhavati | mandeti | bhuktamannaṃ
hi jāṭharāgninā śanaiḥ pacyate naikapade | tathā bahu bhuktamannaṃ na pacyate kiṃ tu
parimitam | sarveṣāmiti | bhasmakarogarahitānāmapītyarthaḥ | mīmāṃsakasya
svamatavirodhaṃ darśayati — kiṃ ceti | purovartivastupratyakṣaṃ rajatasmaraṇaṃ ceti
jñānadvayaṃ satyameva | tatra doṣavaśādekajñānajanya iva jāyamāna idaṃ rajatamiti
vyavahārastvasatya — iti hi tava matam | tathā ca yathārthavyavahāraviparītā-
yathārthavyavahārarūpakāryakāritvaṃ doṣasya tavāvarjanīyaṃ bhavati | anumānasyeti |
vivādādhyāsitāḥ pratyayā yathārthāḥ pratyayatvāddaṇḍīti pratyayavadityevaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇā
prāk pradarśitasyetyarthaḥ (da. 16 paṃ. 488) | kālātyayāpadiṣṭatā |
bādhitatvam (prāgdṛśyam pṛ. 240 paṃ. 11) | kṛṣṇavartmeti | kṛṣṇava-
rtmāgniḥ | barhiḥ śuṣmā kṛṣṇavartmā (ama. ko. 1 | 1 | 57) ityamaraḥ | kṛṣṇaṃ
kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ vartma mārgo yasya | sūkṣmarūpeṇa dhūmābhyantaragāmitvāt | agniranuṣṇo
dravyatvājjalavadityanumānaṃ yathā pratyakṣabādhitaṃ bhavati tathā tvaduktamanumānameta-
dityarthaḥ |

saṃvidāmiti | viṣayasyāyathārthatvepi tajjñānamaṅgīkurvadbhirasmābhirjñāne viṣa-
yavyabhicāraḥ svīkṛtaḥ | tvayā tu vyavahārasyāyathārthatvepi tatprayojakatvaṃ jñāna-
syāṅgīkurvatā jñāne vyavahāravyabhicāraḥ svīkṛtaḥ | tathā cāviśvāsaprasaṅgarūpo
doṣo mameva tavāpi | yadi tu kaścitpūgīphalabhakṣaṇena sadyo mṛta iti na sarvaiḥ
pūgīphalaṃ parihriyate | ataḥ kvācitkaṃ vyabhicāraṃ dṛṣṭvā tacchaṅkayā na sarvatra pravṛ-
ttirucchidyate — iti brūṣe cettulyaṃ mamāpi | tautātiteti | vedavihitāyāṃ
putrakāmeṣṭau kṛtāyāmapi kvacitputrānutpattidarśanena phalavyabhicārāttadbodhakavidhera-
prāmāṇyamiti cārvākamatānusāreṇāśaṅkyāpūrvārthabodhakatvena vidheḥ svataḥ prāmāṇyaṃ
na phalavyabhicāreṇeti hi tatra pratipāditam |

nanviti | mādhyamikāḥ śūnyavādino bauddhāḥ | teṣāṃ mataṃ prāguktam (da. 2
paṃ. 159) | teṣāṃ mate hi sarvaṃ śūnyameveti śuktirapi vastutotra nāstyeva |
tathā cāsadeva rajatabhramasyālambanamityāśayaḥ | nanu vijñānamiti | śūnya-
vādināṃ mādhyamikānāmayamāśayaḥ — asatprakāśanaśaktimatī vāsanā svayama-
satyapi satīva prakāśitā bhavati | prakāśaścāyamanādiḥ | tathāvidhā ca sā
asadeva vijñānaṃ sadiva prakāśayati | tatra svasadṛśīmasatprakāśanaśaktiṃ ca prakā-
śayati | vijñānasyāsatprakāśanasvabhāvaśca svapnadṛṣṭāntena siddho bhavati | vāsa-
nādisvakāraṇasāmarthyāsādito dṛṣṭāntasiddhaśca svabhāvaviśeṣo yasyeti vigrahaḥ |
asatprakāśanaśaktirevāvidyāśabdena saṃvṛtiśabdena cocyate | śakyasyeti |
asatprakāśanaśaktimadvijñānaṃ śaktam | tena svaśaktyā prakāśitaṃ ghaṭādyarthajātaṃ
śakyam | tacca kiṃ vijñānasya kāryaṃ jñāpyaṃ vā | kāryaṃ janyam | yathā daṇḍā-
derghaṭādi | jñāpyaṃ janyajñānaviṣayam | yathā dīpāderghaṭādi | asata iti |
sarvaśūnyavādino mādhyamikasya mate vijñānasyāpyasattvena tasya ghaṭādikāraṇa-
tvānupapatteḥ | śakyasyeti | śakyasya ghaṭāderarthajātasya jñāpyatve hi tajjñā-
pakatvaṃ vijñānasyārthādeva samāyātam | jñāpakasya ca jñāpyena saha saṃbandho
na sākṣāt | kiṃ tu svajanyajñānadvāraiva | yathā jñāpakaṃ dīpādikaṃ ghaṭādijñāna-
janakaṃ bhavati | tadvadatra jñāpakaṃ vijñānaṃ ghaṭādijñānajanakamiti vaktavyam |
tādṛśavijñānajanyaṃ vijñānādanyaddhaṭādiviṣayakaṃ dvitīyaṃ jñānaṃ nopalabhyate |
upalabhyata iti vaiyātyena brūṣe cettādṛśadvitīyajñānasya śakyaṃ ghaṭādyarthajātaṃ na
kāryam | uktanyāyāt | kiṃ tu jñāpyameveti tādṛśasya svīkṛtasya dvitīyajñānasya
ghaṭādijñāpakatvamarthādeva samāyātam | jñāpakaṃ ca jñānajanakameveti punaranyaddvi-
tīyajñānajanyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ jñānamaṅgīkāryaṃ syāt | tasyāpi punaḥ pūrvoktarītyā jñāpaka-
tvāttajjanyaṃ caturthaṃ jñānaṃ svīkāryaṃ syādityevamanavasthāprasaṅga ityāśayaḥ | śaṅkate —
atheti | asato ghaṭāderupādānakāraṇatvenāmimataṃ vijñānameva ca ghaṭāderjñā-
pakamāsthīyata iti nānavasthādoṣa iti śaṅkakāśayaḥ | śaṅkakaścāyaṃ na sarvathā
sarvaśūnyavādimādhyamikamatānurodhī | vijñānasya sadrūpatvāṅgīkārāt | nāpi
vijñānavādiyogācāramatānurodhī | bāhyasya ghaṭāderjñānasvarūpatvānaṅgīkārāt |
atosyārdhajaratīyatvam | ata eva devānāṃpriya ityuktam | sadasatoḥ |
vijñānaghaṭādyoḥ | tatrādau tāvatsadasatorvijñānaghaṭādyorupādānopādeyabhāva
eva na saṃbhavati | kvāpyadarśanāt | jñāpyajñāpakabhāvopi na tayoḥ saṃbhavati |
tathā hi — vijñānaṃ kiṃ ghaṭādinirūpakatvāddhaṭāderjñāpakaṃ bhavatyatha vā ghaṭādyavinābhā-
vitvāt | nirūpakatvācceddhaṭādervijñānanirūpyatvaṃ vaktavyam | nirūpyaṃ ca nirūpake-
ṇopakṛtameva nirūpyaṃ bhavati | nirūpakeṇa yatra kaścidatiśaya ādhīyate tādṛśa-
miti yāvat | atiśayādhānaṃ cāsadvastuni na saṃbhavati | asata āśrayatvāyo-
gāt | tathā vijñānaṃ vyāptibalādapi na ghaṭādijñāpakaṃ bhavati | vyāptigrāhaka-
pramāṇābhāvāt | anukūlatarkabalāddhi vyāptirniścīyate | anukūlatarkaśca kārya-
kāraṇabhāvamūlakaḥ sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvamūlakaśca | dvividhopyatra na saṃbhavatīti
bhāvaḥ | tadutpattilakṣaṇasyeti | idaṃ prāgupapāditam (da. 2 paṃ. 2) |
āropyamāṇaṃ nāsaditi | sadeva hyanyatrāropyate nāsat | śaśe śṛṅgasyāropo
bhavet | śṛṅgasyānyatra sattvāt | na tu śaśaśṛṅgasyānyatrāropaḥ | tasya kvāpi sattvā-
bhāvāt |

anyathātvaṃ tviti | yathā jalenubhūyamānopyuṣṇasparśo na jalasya kiṃ tva-
gnerityāsthīyate | anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ jale śaityasyāgnāvuṣṇatvasya ca siddhatvāt |
yatra ca naitādṛśaṃ kiṃcidbādhakaṃ tatrānubhavānusāreṇaiva vastu niścetavyaṃ bhavati |
nedaṃ rajatamityatra nañarthasya niṣedhasya saṃnihitedamarthena saṃbandho na rajatena |
rajatamuddiśyedaṃtā niṣidhyata ityarthaḥ | rajatamastyeva paraṃ tu tannedamityukte bahi-
rdṛśyamānatve niṣiddherthādeva rajatasyāntaratvaṃ sidhyatīti śaṅkakasyābhimānaḥ |
na cedaṃtayeti | idaṃtayā niṣedhe hyanidaṃtayā rajatasya sthitiḥ sidhyatīti
satyam | anidaṃtā ca saṃnihitasyābahirbhūtasyeva bahirbhūtasyāsaṃnihitasyāpi
saṃbhavati | tādṛśaṃ ca gṛhāntargatamañjūṣādisthamastyeveti kathaṃ tadrajatamāntara-
meveti niścīyata ityarthaḥ | vyavahiteti | vyavahitamasaṃnihitam | aparo-
kṣatvaṃ pratyakṣatvam | nedaṃ rajatamityatredaṃtaiva niṣidhyate na tu pratyakṣatvamapi |
tathā ca niṣedhabalādanyatra satyatayā kalpyamānaṃ pratyakṣayogyameva svīkāryam |
tādṛśaṃ cāntarameva tatra sidhyati | āntarasya ca sukhādivatpratyakṣatvaṃ na hīyate |
ayamapyabhimāna eva | saṃprayogamiti | saṃprayogo bahirindriyasaṃnikarṣaḥ |
nedamiti | nedaṃ rajatamiti bādhakajñānaṃ bādhakovabodhaḥ | tacca rajatabheda-
mātraviṣayakaṃ na tu rajatasya jñānasvarūpatvaviṣayakam | tathaivānubhavāt |
dvitīyamāśaṅkate — nedamiti | vārtam | phalgu | prasakteti | nedaṃ rajatami-
ti bādhakajñānaṃ hi prasaktaṃ pratiṣedhati na tvaprasaktaṃ vidhatte | prasaktaṃ cātra doṣa-
parikalpitamavabhāsamānaṃ rajatam | tasya ca pratiṣedhasya purovartipradeśa eva
sattvātpratiṣedha upapadyate | tathā ca nāsmātpratiṣedhādārthikatvenāpyāntarasya
rajatasya siddhirnāpyasaṃnihitasyeti bhāvaḥ | vijñānākāratveti | yatpūrvaṃ
rajatasya bahirindriyasaṃnikarṣaṃ vināpi pratyakṣatvarūpaṃ hetuṃ puraskṛtya vijñānā-
kāratvaṃ sādhitaṃ tanna yuktam | bhāvarūpājñāne vyabhicāreṇa vyāpterabhāvāt |
jagato mūlakāraṇaṃ bhāvarūpamanādyajñānamagre (da. 16 paṃ. 693) vakṣyate |
tacca na vijñānākāram | jaganmūlakāraṇatvena bahiravasthitatvāt | tathā bahi-
rindriyasaṃnikarṣaṃ vināpyahamajña ityevaṃ pratyakṣaṃ ca tasya bhavati | tathā ca
vijñānākāratvarūpasādhyābhāvavati tatrājñāne bahirindriyasaṃnikarṣaṃ vināpi
pratyakṣatvasya hetoḥ sattvena vyabhicāraḥ sidhyati |

atha nedaṃ rajatamiti pratiṣedhādārthikatvenāntarasya vijñānākārasya rajatasya
siddhirmā bhūnnāma | asaṃnihitasya tu gṛhādau vartamānasya rajatasyāsmātpratiṣedhā-
dārthikatvena siddhirbhavatyevetyāśayenāśaṅkate — nanvanyatheti | naiyāyikā hyanyathā
khyātiṃ vadanti | anyathā khyātirnāmānyasyānyarūpeṇa pratītiḥ | anyarūpeṇa
pratītiścānyasya kvacitsattva eva nātyantāsattve | atyantāsataḥ pratītiviṣayatvā-
nupapatteḥ | tataścāsaṃnihitasya rajatasyānyatra sattvaṃ sidhyatīti tadāśayaḥ |
vyāvartyeti | vyāvartyaḥ pratiyogī | bhāvikī pāramārthikī | viraho'bhāvaḥ |
vastuśabdena pāramārthikaḥ padārtha ucyate | atyantāsataḥ śaśaśṛṅgāderābhāsa-
pratipannasya śuktirajatādeśca tucchatvaṃ na tu vastutvamiti prasiddhameva | tucchasya
ca na viśeṣyatvaṃ nāpi pratiyogitvamityanena ślokena pratipādyate | ayaṃ bhāvaḥ —
saṃbandhasya saṃbandhinau dvau pratiyogyanuyoginau | etāveva krameṇa viśeṣaṇa-
viśeṣyaśabdābhyāmucyete | ghaṭavadbhūtalamityatra ghaṭo viśeṣaṇam | bhūtalaṃ viśe-
ṣyam | ghaṭavadityanena ca bhūtale ghaṭābhāvo vyāvartyate | vyāvartyavirodhyeva hi
vyāvartako bhavati | ghaṭābhāvasya vyāvartako ghaṭābhāvābhāvaḥ | tatpratītiścātra
ghaṭapadeneti ghaṭasya ghaṭābhāvābhāvasvarūpatvaṃ siddham | tathā ca vyāvartyasya ghaṭā-
bhāvasya yo'bhāvastadvattvaṃ yadbhūtale pāramārthikaṃ saiva tatra viśeṣyatā | tathā ghaṭā-
bhāvasya yo viraho'bhāvastatsvarūpatvaṃ yatpāramārthikasya vastunaḥ saiva tatra prati-
yogiteti | evaṃ ca nedaṃ rajatamityatra pratiṣedhapratiyogitvaṃ pāramārthikasyaiva
rajatasya na tvābhāsapratipannasyeti tasya deśāntare sattvaṃ sidhyati | asata
iti | yathā rūpaṃ na rasasaṃyuktam — ityatra rasarūpayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyabalātka-
lpita eva saṃyogo niṣidhyate | anyatra rūpasaṃyogasya kvāpyadarśanāt | tathātra
kalpanāmātrajīvitaṃ rajataṃ niṣidhyata iti bhāvaḥ |

apasiddhānteti | advaitavedāntibhiḥ siddhānte jñānadvayasyāṅgīkārāt |
taccānupadameva (da. 16 paṃ. 643) sphuṭībhaviṣyati | śuktīdamiti |
vastutaḥ śuktirūpo ya idamaṃśastasyendriyasaṃbaddhatvenendriyadvārā tatra gatasyāntaḥ-
karaṇasyedamākāraḥ pariṇāmo jāyate | ayaṃ pariṇāma eva vṛttiriti jñānamiti
cocyate | tādṛśajñāne ca na rajataṃ viṣayo bhavati | tatra vastuto rajatasyābhā-
venendriyāsaṃnikarṣāt | asaṃnikṛṣṭasyāpi jñānaviṣayatvāṅgīkāre tu sarvajñatva-
prasaṅgaḥ | na ceti | cakṣuḥsaṃnikarṣātprāgidaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ na jāyate | 16|626 — rūpātmakam for rūpamekam D. 16|629 — tadapekṣāyāḥ for tadupakṣaya D.
tatsaṃnikarṣottaraṃ ca jāyata ityetāvatā rajatajñānasya cakṣurindriyajanyatvamiti tu
na vaktavyam | idamaṃśasya tatra viṣayībhāve cakṣurindriyasyopayogāt | tatka-
raṇatvam | idamaṃśaviṣayakapratyakṣānubhave gṛhagatamañjūṣāsthasya rajatasya viṣayī-
kārakaraṇatvam | svātantryeṇeti | devadattaniṣṭho vyasanādidoṣo hi devadatta-
dvāraiva tatsaṃsṛṣṭaṃ yajñadattādikaṃ dūṣayati na tu svātantryeṇa tadasaṃsṛṣṭamapi | tathā-
trendriyadoṣasyendriyadvāraiva kiṃcitkāryaṃ prati hetutvaṃ vācyaṃ nānyatheti bhāvaḥ |
na hi grahaṇeti | grahaṇātmakaṃ jñānamindriyajanyam | smaraṇātmakaṃ jñānaṃ
saṃskārajanyam | tābhyāṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ tṛtīyaṃ doṣajanyamatra kiṃcijjñānaṃ nopala-
bhyate | tasmāt | idamaṃśaviṣayake pratyakṣe rajatasya viṣayatayā kathamapyapraveśāt |

prathamiti | doṣavaśātpurovartivastunaḥ śuktitvenāgrahaṇādantaḥkaraṇavṛtti-
ridamākāraiva jāyate | sā ca vṛttiridaṃtvāvacchinnacaitanyābhivyaktipratibandhakaṃ
caitanyāvaraṇaṃ dūrīkaroti | tata idaṃtāyāṃ tadgrāhakavṛttau ca caitanyaṃ pratibimbitaṃ
sattattadrūpeṇābhivyaktaṃ bhavati | śuktyaṃśena tu caitanyasya nābhivyaktiḥ | doṣavaśena
taccaitanyāvaraṇasyānabhibhavāt | ayaṃ cedamaṃśāvacchinnacaitanyasya śuktirūpeṇā-
navabhāsastata eva tadākāravṛttirūpeṇānavabhāsaścāvidyā | tasyāśca krameṇedamaṃ-
śāvacchinnaṃ caitanyamidamākāravṛttyavacchinnaṃ caitanyaṃ cāśrayaḥ | dvividhāpīyamavidyā
doṣavaśātsaṃkṣubhnāti | tatredamaṃśāvacchinnacaitanyaniṣṭhā avidyā saṃkṣubhitā
satī cākacikyādisādṛśyasaṃdarśanasamudbodhitarajatasaṃskārasahāyena rajatākāreṇa
pariṇamate | vṛttyavacchinnacaitanyasthā avidyā tu rajatagrāhivṛttisaṃskārasahakṛtā
vṛttirūpeṇa pariṇamate | etacca pariṇāmadvayaṃ svasvādhiṣṭhānabhūtena sākṣicaitanye-
nāvabhāsate | etadeva krameṇārthādhyāsa iti jñānādhyāsa iti cocyate | na ca
yathā viṣayākārāntaḥkaraṇavṛttyā viṣayāvabhāsastathā tadvṛtteravabhāsastadvṛttyākā-
reṇāntaḥkaraṇavṛttyantareṇetyanavastheti vācyam | vṛttervṛttyantarāviṣayatvepi
svaviṣayatvābhyupagamenādoṣāt | tathā cātrāvidyā savṛttikā sākṣibhāsyā
bhavati | avidyāyā api sākṣibhāsyatvāt | atra cedamākārā vṛttirantaḥ-
karaṇasya | rajatākārā vṛttistvavidyāyāḥ | vṛttireva ca jñānamiti vastuto
jñānadvayaṃ vartata eva | idaṃ rajatamityekaṃ jñānamiti vyavahārastu phalaikyādaupacā-
rikaḥ | jñānaṃ hi vṛttirūpam | tatphalaṃ ca viṣayāvabhāsaḥ | sa ca yathāviṣayaṃ
jāyata iti viṣayādhīnaḥ | viṣayaścātra satyānṛtayoridaṃrajatayoranyonyātmaka-
tayaikatvamāpanna iti tadavabhāsarūpaṃ phalamekamevedṛśasthale nirūḍhaṃ pratīyate | vijṛ-
mbhate | pariṇamate | idamākāreti | aktamavacchinnam | idamākāravṛttyava-
cchinnacaitanyaniṣṭhetyarthaḥ | pañcapādikāyāmiti | śrīmacchaṃkarācāryapraṇīta-
brahmasūtrabhāṣyasya vyākhyā śrīmatpadmapādācāryaviracitā catuḥsūtrīparyantā pañca-
pādikā nāma prasiddhaiva | uktastadabhiprāyaśca tadvyākhyānabhūte śrīprakāśātmayati-
viracite vivaraṇe spaṣṭīkṛtaḥ |

satyatvābhyupagama iti | śuktikāsthala evāvidyāpariṇāmabhūtasya rajata-
syāṅgīkārātsatyatvaṃ durvāramiti bhāvaḥ | pratipannopādhāviti | sopādhika
ityarthaḥ | śuktikāpradeśa eva nedaṃ rajatamiti niṣedhaḥ pratīyate | yadyapi tādṛ-
śaniṣedhapratiyogitvaṃ tatra rajatasya na saṃbhavati | avidyāpariṇāmabhūtasya raja-
tasya kiṃcitkālaparyantamavasthitatvāt | niṣedhastu nedaṃ kadāpi rajatamityevaṃ
kālānavacchinna eva pratīyate tathāpi vyāvahārikatvopādhiviśiṣṭasya rajatasya
tatra kadāpyasattvena tādṛśarajatasya niṣedhapratiyogitvaṃ saṃbhavati | arthakriyeti |
arthakriyākāritvamityarthaḥ | etadeva vyāvahārikaṃ sattvamityucyate | māyopā-
dhikamiti | māyāyā avidyāyāśca svarūpamagrenupadameva vakṣyate | jñātṛkāle |
vyavahāradaśāyām | laukikevadhau | vyavahārakāle | vyavahāradaśāyāmeva
pratyakṣādipramāṇena nedaṃ rajatamityevaṃ rajataṃ bādhyate | pramātā devadattādistvau-
pādhikopi na tadānīṃ bādhyate | vaidikeneti | ākāśādiprapañcasya sattvaṃ vyāva-
hārikam | yatastadvyavahāradaśāyāṃ na bādhyate | kiṃ tu tattvamasyādyāgamenātmai-
kyasākṣātkārakāle bādhyate | tadānīṃ ca leśatopi na dvaitāvabhāsaḥ | pramātuḥ
pramātṛtvamapi tadānīṃ na pratīyate iti pramātāpi bādhito bhavati | pratītya-
bhāva evātra bādho na tu niṣedhyatvena pratītiḥ | tataḥ khyātīti | śuktau
pratīyamānaṃ rajataṃ nāsat | pratītyanupapatteḥ | nāpi sat | nedaṃ rajatamiti
bādhānupapatteḥ | khyātiviṣayatvabādhaviṣayatvayorubhayorekatra samāveśaśca tasyā-
nirvacanīyatvāṅgīkāra eva saṃpadyate | anirvacanīyatvaṃ ca sadasadvilakṣaṇatvam |
tādṛśaṃ ca māyāpariṇāmabhūtameveti tasya māyāmayatvaṃ siddham | pañcapādikā-
yām (pañcapā. pṛ. 31 pa. 1) apyasya māyāmayatvamuktam | pratyekamiti |
sattvenāsattvena ca vicārāsahatve sati sadasattvena ca yadvicāraṃ na sahate tada-
nirvācyamityarthaḥ |

atha tatra rajataṃ na māyāmayaṃ kiṃ tvavidyāmayamityāśayenāśaṅkate — nanviti |
āśrayamavyāmohayantī karturicchāmanusarantī māyā | tadviparitā tvavidyā |
śuktirajatādau rajatopādānabhūtā tvavidyaiva | rajatadraṣṭurbhrāntatvena vyāmohasa-
ttvāt | tadicchānuvidhāyitvābhāvācca | draṣṭuranicchāyāmapi vijṛmbhaṇāttasyāḥ |
avidyā na māyāto bhinnetyāśayenottarayati — anirvacanīyatveti | ani-
rvacanīyatvaṃ tattvapratītipratibandhakatvaṃ ca māyāyāmavidyāyāṃ ca samānam | ādi-
padena viparyayāvabhāsakatvaṃ saṃgṛhyate | kiṃ ceti | māyāpariṇāmabhūtānhastya-
śvādīnyaḥ prekṣate sa māyāśraya uta yo māyāṃ sṛjati sa māyāśraya iti
vikalpaḥ | mantreti | māntrikajāṅgalikādayo mattrauṣadhādiyogena māyāṃ
prayojayanti | tādṛśamāyāpariṇāmabhūtānhastyaśvādīndṛṣṭavatāṃ prekṣakajanānāṃ
vyāmoho jāyate | tathā cāśrayaśabdena draṣṭurgrahaṇe māyā svāśrayasya vyāmoha-
heturna bhavati — ityuktirvirudhyate | tatra | svāśrayavyāmohābhāve | ayaṃ bhāvaḥ —
avidyāyā iva māyāyā api vyāmohakāritvaṃ svabhāva eva | svabhāvaśca
draṣṭāraṃ pratīva prayoktāraṃ pratyapyaviśiṣṭa eva | tataścāvidyāyā māyāyā vā
draṣṭā vā prayoktā vā yo bādhaṃ niścinoti yo vā mantrādipratīkāraṃ jānāti sa
na muhyati | anīdṛśaśceddraṣṭeva prayoktāpi muhyatyeva | tatraitāvānviśeṣaḥ |
vyāmohābhāvakāraṇaṃ draṣṭari kvaciddṛśyate | prayoktari tu bāhulyeneti | rāmāvatāre
pratīkārānanusaṃdhānādvyāmoha upapadyate | yathā paṅgorandhasya vāṅgavaikalyena na
tattatkāryaṃ tathā pratīkārarūpāṅgavaikalyānna vyāmohābhāvaḥ | kiṃ cāvidyāsthalepi
na niyamenāśrayavyāmoho dṛśyate | jalamadhyedhomukhatvena vṛkṣeṣvadhyasteṣvapi tadū-
rdhvamukhatāyāṃ draṣṭuravyāmohāt | athātra tīrasthavṛkṣadarśanajanyavivekavaśādavyā-
mohostu nāma | avidyāyāḥ svabhāvastu vyāmohakāritvamastyeveti cettarhi
māyāpi svabhāvādvyāmohikaiva | māyāprayokturaindrajālikasya pratīkārajñānānna vyā-
moha iti samānam | evamavidyāśrayā api pratīkārajñāne sati na muhyantyeva |
tathā cāvidyā na māyāto bhinneti siddham | na ceccheti | māyā hi kartu-
ricchāmanusarati | avidyā tu karturanicchāyāmapi svātantryeṇa pariṇāmādi kāryaṃ
janayatītyevaṃ māyāvidyayorbheda ityāśayaḥ | māyāsthala iti | yathā māyā-
sthala aindrajālikādiḥ svecchayaiva maṇimantrādisahāyena māyāṃ pravartayatyupasaṃharati
ca tathā avidyāsthalepi prayoktā svātantryeṇa netreṅgulyavaṣṭambhādinā yāvadicchaṃ
candradvayādikaṃ paśyati | śrutīti | bhūyaścānte viśvamāyānivṛttiḥ (śve. 1 | 10)
iti śrutau samyagjñānanivartyā avidyā māyāśabdena vyavahṛtā |

taratyavidyāṃ vitatāṃ hṛdi yasminniveśite |
yogī māyāmameyāya tasmai vidyātmane namaḥ ||
iti smṛtau māyāvidyayorekatvena nirdeśaḥ spaṣṭa eva | avidyā māyā avi-
dyātmikā māyāśaktiriti bhāṣye nirdiśyate | ādiśabdena ṭīkākṛtāṃ grahaṇam |
tathā ca māyāvidyayoraikyaṃ siddham | lokaprasiddhistvekasminnapi vastunyupādhi-
bhedādupapadyate | tadāha — kvaciditi | ajñānasya hi śaktidvayamāvaraṇaśakti-
rvikṣepaśaktiśceti | yathā śuktirajatapratibhāsasthala ādyayā śaktyā śuktirūpaṃ
sadapyāvriyate | antyayā rajatamasadapi pradarśyate | evamanādyajñānena brahmasvarūpa-
māvriyate jagacca tatra pradarśyate | tatrāvaraṇaśaktiprādhānye avidyeti vyavahāraḥ |
vikṣepaśaktiprādhānye tu māyāśabdeneti | māyeti | vikṣepaśaktimadīśecchādhīnaṃ
vā yadajñānaṃ tanmāyeti vyapadiśyate | tathā āvaraṇaśaktimatsvatantraṃ vā yadajñānaṃ
tadavidyeti vyapadiśyate | tathā ca vivakṣābhedena tathā tathā śabdaprayogepi na
vastuto māyāvidyayorbheda iti bhāvaḥ |

ahamajña iti | ahamajña ityevamajñānaviṣayakaḥ pratyakṣānubhava evāvidyāyāṃ
pramāṇam | atra hyātmānamāśritya bāhyādhyātmikeṣu vyāptā jaḍātmikā avidyā-
śaktiranubhūyate | etaccājñānaṃ na jñānābhāvasvarūpam | kiṃ tu tadapekṣayānya-
deva | bhāvarūpaṃ caitat | bhāvakāryopādānakāraṇatvāt | nanviti | ahamajñā
ityevamavabhāsamāno jñānābhāva eva na tu tadapekṣayātiriktamajñānaṃ kiṃcit |
jagato mūlakāraṇaṃ tu pradhānaparamāṇvādikamanyadeveti tadāśayaḥ | anupala-
bdhīti | anupalabdhināmakamabhāvagrāhakamatiriktaṃ pramāṇamiti bhāṭṭā advai-
tavādinaśca | bhūtale ghaṭo nāstītyevaṃ jāyamānaṃ ghaṭābhāvajñānamanupalabdhipra-
māṇajanyaṃ parokṣameva na pratyakṣam | anumānādipramāṇāntareṇāpyabhāvajñānaṃ
bhavatīti tu sarvasaṃmatamevetyanyat | sarvathā na kadāpyabhāvasya pratyakṣajñānaṃ
tanmata ityahamajña iti pratyakṣe na jñānābhāvo viṣayībhavitumarhatīti bhāvaḥ |
ayamapīti | ahamajña iti jñānaṃ na pratyakṣaṃ kiṃ tu parokṣamevāṅgīkriyata
ityāśayaḥ | na tāvalliṅgeti | ahamajña iti jñānaṃ parokṣaṃ cedanumānādya-
nyatamapramāṇena janyata iti vaktavyam | tatra nānumānena na śabdena nāvya-
rthāpattyāyamartho jñāyate | yatastatra liṅgaṃ śabdonupapadyamānorthaśca jñāta evārthā-
ntaraṃ bodhayituṃ prabhavati | na hi vastuto vidyamānopi dhūmo'jñātaścedagnimanu-
māpayituṃ prabhavati | evaṃ śabdopi | yato badhirasya na śābdabodho bhavati |
tathārthāpattisthalepi divā abhojino devadattasya pīnatvaṃ jñātameva rātribhoja-
narūpamarthaṃ bodhayati | ahamajña ityatra tu na liṅgādijñānasaṃbhava iti bhāvaḥ |
anupalabdhyeti | yathā bhūtale ghaṭānupalabdhyā ghaṭābhāvo jñāyate tathātra
jñānānupalabdhyā jñānābhāvo jñāyata ityāśayaḥ | na tāvadiyamiti |
yato ghaṭānupalabdhirajñātā cenna tayā ghaṭābhāvo jñātuṃ śakyate | anavasthā-
nāditi | ghaṭānupalabdhirjñātaiva ghaṭābhāvajñānakāraṇamiti cet — tatredaṃ pṛcchya-
te — ghaṭānupalabdhiḥ kathaṃ jñātā | ghaṭānupalabdhirhi ghaṭopalabdhyabhāvaḥ | sa ca
punaranupalabdhipramāṇena jñāyate cet — upalabdheranupalabdhyopalabdhyabhāvo jñāyata
iti vaktavyam | sā ca punarupalabdheranupalabdhirjñātaiva kāraṇamiti punastatrānu-
palabdhiḥ pramāṇāntaraṃ vaktavyamityevamanavasthā bodhyā | na ca yatheti |
naiyāyikādayonupalabdhiṃ pramāṇāntaratvena nāṅgīkurvanti | bhūtale ghaṭābhāvastu
pratyakṣapramāṇenaiva jñāyate | yogyānupalabdhistu kevalaṃ tatra sahakāriṇī | ghaṭo-
tra syāccedavaśyamupalabhyetetyevaṃ yatra vaktuṃ śakyate tatra tadanupalabdhiryogyā bhavati |
tathā ca teṣāṃ matenupalabdhirajñātā jñātā vā sahakāriṇī bhavatītyevaṃ svīkṛ-
tyānavasthā parihṛtā | tathānupalabdhiṃ pramāṇāntaratvena svīkurvato mama matenupa-
labdherjñānakaraṇatvepyanavasthāparihāro bhavedityāśayaḥ | niyamābhāvāditi |
tathā ca sahakāriṇi jñātasyaiva sahakāritvamiti niyamo mā bhūnnāma | karaṇe
tu jñātasyaiva karaṇatvamiti niyama āvaśyaka iti bhāvaḥ | astu veti |
anupalabdhiḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ pramāṇaṃ jñānakāraṇamiti pakṣepyanupalabdhirajñātā jñātā vā
karaṇaṃ bhavatu | paraṃ tu tayā jñānavyatiriktasyābhāvo grahītuṃ śakyo na tu
jñānasyābhāva ityanupadameva vakṣyata ityarthaḥ | etāvatā granthasaṃdarbheṇānupa-
labdhivādināṃ matehamajña iti jñānābhāvānubhavasya parokṣatvābhāvaḥ samarthitaḥ |

adhunānupalabdhiṃ pramāṇāntaramasvīkurvatāmabhāvaḥ pratyakṣo bhavatītyevaṃvādināṃ
naiyāyikādīnāmahamajña iti pratyakṣasya jñānābhāvaviṣayakatvaṃ vadatāṃ mataṃ
khaṇḍayati — pratyakṣābhāveti | ahamajña ityatra kiṃ jñānasāmānyābhāvaḥ pratya-
kṣaviṣaya uta jñānaviśeṣābhāvaḥ | tatra dvitīyakalpaṃ na tāvatsmaraṇābhāvaḥ
(da. 16 pa. 712) ityādinā nirasyati | nādyaḥ | ahamityevamātmano
jñānābhāvadharmitvena jñānasya cābhāvapratiyogitvenāvagatisattvāttatsāmānyābhā-
vasya tatrāsattvena tatpratyakṣasyāsaṃbhavāt | tayorasatoriti | dharmijñānaṃ
pratiyogijñānaṃ cātra nāstītyucyate cet — ahamajña iti jñānābhāvapratyakṣam —
iti sutarāṃ vaktumaśakyam | abhāvajñāne pratiyogijñānasyādhikaraṇajñānasya
ca kāraṇatvāt | atra ca tvaduktarītyā tadabhāvāt | atopīti | yata ukta-
prakāreṇa dharmipratiyogijñānasattve tadasattve ca jñānasāmānyābhāvo grahītuṃ na
śakyatetopyatrānupalabdhyā vānumānena vā jñānasāmānyābhāvagrahaṇaṃ durlabham |
anumānasyoktisaṃbhavastu sarvatra vyavahāro jñānasya phalatvena liṅgaṃ bhavati |
tādṛśaliṅgasyātrādarśanena tādṛśādarśanarūpahetunā jñānābhāvonumātuṃ śakya iti |
paramatepīti | anupalabdhivādināṃ bhāṭṭādīnāṃ matepītyarthaḥ |

abhāvagrahaṇa iti | ahamajña ityasyāhaṃ smaraṇarūpajñānābhāvavānityartho
vācyaḥ | sa na saṃbhavati | abhāvajñāne pratiyogijñānasya kāraṇatvenātra prati-
yoginaḥ smaraṇasya jñānamāvaśyakam | tacca smaraṇātmakameveti kathaṃ tatra smara-
ṇābhāvaḥ saṃbhavet | avarjanīyatvāditi | ahamajña ityevaṃ jñānābhāvavi- 16|713 — grahaṇasya for smaraṇasya A.
ṣayakajñānasyānubhavarūpatvenānubhavasyāvaśyakatvāt | jñānaviśeṣa iti | ātma-
svarūpaviśeṣaviṣayakānubhava ityarthaḥ | lakṣaṇā ceti | yathā gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra
gaṅgāpadaśakyārthasya gaṅgātvasya lakṣyārthena tīratvena saha saṃbandha āśrayadvārā
vartate | gaṅgātīrayoḥ saṃyogasya sattvāt | jātiḥ padārtha ityabhiprāyeṇeda-
muktam | vyaktipakṣe tu mukhyārthalakṣyārthayoḥ pravāhatīrayoḥ sākṣādeva saṃyoga-
saṃbandho vartate | tathātra jñādhātuśakyārthasya jñānatvasya lakṣyārthasya viśeṣānu-
bhavatvasya sāmānādhikaraṇyasaṃbandho vartate | ghaṭapratyakṣarūpāyāmekasyāṃ vyaktau
tayorvidyamānatvāt | tathā jñānatvaṃ vyāpakaṃ tādṛśānubhavatvaṃ tu vyāpyamiti
vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasaṃbandhaśca vartate | paraṃ tu yathā gaṅgāpadaśakyārthe ghoṣasthitya-
saṃbhavena tatrānupapattirasti tathātra nānupapattirdṛśyate | nanvanubhaveti | lakṣaṇāyā
abhāvehamajña iti pratyakṣeṇa kiṃ jñāpyate | jñānasāmānyābhāvaścedasaṃbhavaḥ |
tathā cātra pratyakṣapramāṇasya sāphalyāya prameyaṃ kiṃcidavaśyaṃ pradarśanīyam |
tacca lakṣaṇāyāṃ svīkṛtāyāmanubhavaviśeṣābhāvarūpaṃ vaktuṃ śakyate | ato lakṣaṇā
svīkāryetyāśayaḥ | anyonyāśrayāditi | sāphalyamūlikā lakṣaṇā lakṣa-
ṇāmūlakaṃ ca sāphalyamityevamanyonyāśrayo bodhyaḥ | lakṣaṇābījabhūtāmanupapattiṃ
prakārāntareṇa darśayati — nanvahamajña iti | ayamāśayaḥ — nañityavyayasyārtho
hyabhāvaḥ | sa cātra na jñānasāmānyasya vaktuṃ śakyate | tadānīmahamajña ityā-
kārakasya pratyakṣasya sattvena tatra jñānasāmānyābhāvasyābhāvāt | nāpi jñāna-
viśeṣasya viśeṣānubhavasya | jñādhātorjñānaviśeṣārthānabhidhāyakatvāt | na hi
janasaṃkule grāme devadatto nāsti — ityabhiprāyeṇa amanuṣyoyaṃ grāma — iti
prayujyate kenacit | ahamajña iti vākyaṃ nirarthakamevāstvityapi na yuktam |
anunmattaprayuktatvāt | tathā cāhamajña ityatra kiṃviṣayakaṃ jñānaṃ vivakṣitaṃ tanna
nirvaktuṃ śakyate | anayaivānupapattyā lakṣaṇeti | uktalakṣaṇeti | lakṣaṇā-
bījabhūtāmanupapattiṃ nirūpayatā īdṛśaṃ jñānamiti nirvaktuṃ na śakyate — iti
vadatā tvayātrānirvacanīyatvaṃ yatpradarśyata eṣaivāvidyā | tathā ca saivātra naño-
rthostu māstu ca tādṛśānupapattyanusaṃdhānapūrvakalakṣaṇāśrayaṇakleśapuraḥsaraṃ naño'-
bhāvārthakatvamiti gūḍhāśayaḥ | saṃdeha iti | astvanupapattirevābidyā anirva-
canīyatvasvarūpā padārthāntaraṃ bhāvarūpam | tathāpi sa evātra nañartha iti
kuto niścayaḥ | uktarītyā abhāvārthakatvasyāpi saṃbhavādityāśayaḥ | asamatvā-
diti | koṭidvayasya sāmye hi saṃdeho bhavati | na tvekasyāḥ prābalyeparasyāśca
daurbalye | aghaṭaṃ bhūtalamityādāvabhāvārthakanañaḥ prayoge pratiyogino ghaṭasya
nivṛttirbodhyate | ahamajña ityatra tu na pratiyogibhūtasya jñānasya nivṛttiḥ
saṃbhavati | kiṃ tu tadvyāpyasyānubhavaviśeṣasya | tathā ca lakṣaṇāśrayaṇīyetya-
bhāvārthakatvakoṭirdurbalā | avidyārthakatvakoṭistu prabalaiva | yato ya īdṛśaṃ
saṃdehaṃ purovasthāpayati so'vidyāṃ nañastadarthakatvaṃ ca manyata iti nirvivādaṃ na
tatra saṃdehaḥ | tadarthakasya naña udāharaṇaṃ ca jānātisamabhivyāhṛtanañghaṭitaṃ
kiṃcitpradarśanīyaṃ bhavati | ahamajña ityatra ca jānātisamabhivyāhṛto nañiti
tasyāvidyārthakatvaṃ śīghraṃ buddhimārohati | abhāvārthakatvaṃ tu na tathā | kiṃ tu
tadatra luptaprāyamiva bhavati | tadevamiti | anupapattirna syāccenna lakṣaṇā |
bījābhāvāt | atha syāccettadāpi saiva nañarthatvena śīghraṃ buddhimārohati | tāva-
taiva vākyārthopapattau na sā lakṣaṇāheturbhavatīti bhāvaḥ | tathā cāhamajña iti
pratyakṣasyāvidyāviṣayakatvaṃ siddham |

prakārāntareṇāpi sādhayati — astu veti | na tata iti | idaṃ prāgupapā-
ditam (da. 16 paṃ. 467) | adhikaraṇabhāvāt | adhikaraṇasvarūpāt |
śaṅkate — mā bhūditi | ghaṭādyabhāvo nāma bhūtalāpekṣayā bhāvonyo mā bhūt |
abhāvastu tadapekṣayānyaḥ syādeva | itthamadhikaraṇādanyasyābhāvasya sattve sa
evāhamajña ityatra nañarthaḥ syāt | nanu tadapīti | nanviti vitarke | ahamajña
iti pratyakṣaṃ bhāvarūpājñānaviṣayamiti vadato bhavatodhikaraṇāpekṣayānyo'bhāva
ityetadapi viruddhameva | tādṛśapratyakṣasyābhāvaviṣayakatvenānyathopapatterityāśayaḥ |
pariharati — satyabhiti | adhikaraṇāpekṣayā abhāvasyānyatve siddhe hi tadviṣayaka-
mahamajña iti pratyakṣaṃ bhavet | paraṃ tvabhāvasyādhikaraṇāpekṣayānyatvameva na si-
dhyati | abhāvaviṣayakaṃ pratyakṣādikaṃ hyabhāve pramāṇaṃ bhavenna tu tasyādhikaraṇā-
danyatve | anyatvaṃ tu tādṛśapramāṇānna sidhyati | bhedasiddhyuttaraṃ hi pramāṇasya
bhinnābhāvaviṣayakatvaṃ tasya tadviṣayakatve ca bhedasiddhirityanyonyāśrayāt | tathā
ca parasparāśrayagrastatvānnābhāvastattvāntaraṃ sidhyati | abhāvamitirabhāva-
vyavahṛtiśca pratiyogyadhikaraṇaitaddvayaviṣayikaiveti bhāvaḥ | mā bhūtāmiti |
na bhavata ityarthaḥ | na hi sarvatra viṣayasattve tajjñānamavaśyaṃ bhāvyeveti niyamaḥ |
pratiyogisaṃsargasya tatra tādṛśamitivyavahṛtipratibandhakatvamiti gūḍhobhiprāyaḥ |
tathā ca pratiyogismaraṇakālikādhikaraṇasvarūpamevābhāvo nātirikta iti pha-
litam | ayaṃ ca mūle mā bhūt (da. 16 paṃ. 733) ityārabhya yathā pāṭho
dṛṣṭastathā yojitaḥ | samīcīnaṃ pāṭhāntaraṃ kenāpyupalabhyate cetpradarśanīyam |
upapattāviti | abhāvapramitestanmūlikāyā nāstīti vyavahṛteścopapattau satyāṃ
tayornātiriktābhāvaviṣayakatvaṃ kalpanīyamiti bhāvaḥ | saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇatvā-
diriti | ghaṭābhāvavadbhūtalamityatra cakṣuḥsaṃyukte bhūtale ghaṭābhāvasya viśe-
ṣaṇatvam | bhūtale ghaṭābhāva ityatra cakṣuḥsaṃyukte bhūtale ghaṭābhāvasya viśeṣya-
tvam | khatvābhāvavānkakāra ityatra samavetaviśeṣaṇatvam | śrotrasamavete kakāre 16|734 — tadaviruddham for tadapi viruddham D.
khatvābhāvasya viśeṣaṇatvādityādi bodhyam | uktalakṣaṇasyeti | pratiyogi-
smaraṇakālikasvarūpaviśiṣṭasyetyarthaḥ | tathā cābhāvānubhavo nāma pratiyogi-
smaraṇasahakṛtodhikaraṇānubhava iti siddham | jñātaiveti | ahamajña ityanubha-
vakāle hyavidyamānajñānaviśeṣasmaraṇapūrvakaṃ jñātānubhūyate | jñātā nāma viṣayā-
kārapariṇāmāśrayaḥ | pariṇāmaśca na kevalasyāntaḥkaraṇasya | tasya jaḍatvene-
dṛśapariṇāmāsaṃbhavāt | nāpi kevalasyātmanaḥ | apariṇāmitvāt | kiṃ ca
pariṇāmo nāma dharmāntareṇāvirbhāvaḥ | sa ca nirdharmakasyātmano na saṃbhavati |
kiṃ tvātmāntaḥkaraṇayorabhedādhyāse satyadhyastātmatādātmyasyāntaḥkaraṇasya pari-
ṇāmoyam | adhyāsaścāvidyāsvarūpa evetyahamajña iti pratyakṣeṇāvidyā sidhyati |

anumānaṃ ceti | svaprāgabhāvavyatiriktaṃ svaviṣayāvaraṇabhūtaṃ svanivartyaṃ
svadeśagataṃ ca yadvastvantaraṃ tatpūrvakatvaṃ pakṣabhūte pramāṇajñāne sādhyate | viśeṣaṇa-
catuṣṭaye svaśabdena pramāṇajñānasya parāmarśaḥ | etādṛśaṃ vastvantaraṃ cāvidyaiva |
na tu tāṃ vinānyatkimapi tathāvidhaṃ saṃbhavati | atonenānumānenāvidyā sidhyati |
tathā hi — ayaṃ ghaṭa iti pramāṇajñānasthale pramāṇajñānātpūrvamavidyā vartate |
sā ca pramāṇajñānāpekṣayā vastvantaram | pramāṇajñānāśraya ātmarūpe deśe
vartata iti svadeśagatam | pramāṇajñānena vināśyatvātsvanivartyam | pramāṇa-
jñānaviṣayasya ghaṭasyāvaraṇātsvaviṣayāvaraṇam | svaprāgabhāvavyatiriktaṃ ca tat |
avidyāyāḥ pramāṇajñānaprāgabhāvabhinnatvenāṅgīkārāt | yadyetādṛśaṃ vastvavidyāṃ
vinānyatkimapi syāttarhi tenaivāsyānumānasyopakṣīṇatvādavidyā na sidhyet | na
tu tadasti | sādhyāṃśe kasyāpi viśeṣaṇasya tyāge tu tathāvidhamavidyāpekṣayā-
rthāntaraṃ saṃdṛśyata evetyavidyāsiddhirna syāt | ato gurubhūtasādhyopādānam |
tadāha — vastupūrvakamiti | vastupūrvakamityetāvadeva sādhyamucyate cetpramāṇa
jñānāśrayībhūtamātmarūpaṃ vastu vidyata evāvidyāpekṣayārthāntaram | vastvantara-
pūrvakamityuktau tvātmā na pramāṇajñānādvastvantaram | vastvantaramityasya hi
svasmātsvāśrayāccānyadityarthaḥ | vastvantarapūrvakamityetāvadeva sādhyaṃ cetpramāṇa-
jñānaviṣayībhūtaṃ ghaṭādikaṃ vastvavidyāpekṣayārthāntaraṃ vidyata eva | ataḥ svadeśa-
gatetyuktiḥ | svasya pramāṇajñānasya deśa āśraya ātmā | na tu tadgataṃ ghaṭādi-
kam | adṛṣṭaśabdavācyau dharmādharmau sukhādikaṃ cātmagataṃ bhavatītyatastadvyāvṛttaye
svanivartyeti | dharmādikaṃ hi pramāṇajñānanivartyaṃ na bhavati | uttarajñānanivartyasya
pūrvakṣaṇikajñānasya vyāvṛttaye svaviṣayāvaraṇeti | tathāvidhaḥ pramāṇajñānasya
prāgabhāvo vartata iti tadvyāvṛttaye svaprāgabhāvavyatirikteti | evamantimaṃ
viśeṣaṇamārabhya tatpūrvapūrvaviśeṣaṇasya sāphalyaṃ pradarśitam | adhunā prathamaṃ
viśeṣaṇamārabhyottarottaraviśeṣaṇasya sāphalyaṃ pradarśayati — svaprāgabhāvavyati-
riktapūrvakamiti | tādṛśamiti | svaprāgabhāvavyatiriktaṃ svaviṣayāvaraṇaṃ
cetyarthaḥ | svanivartyetyuktau tu nāndhakārastathāvidho bhavati | andhakāro hi
prakāśena nivartate na pramāṇajñānena | ghaṭādiviṣayaniṣṭhamajñātatvaṃ yadyapi pramāṇa-
jñānena nivartyate tathāpi na tatsvadeśagatam | mithyājñānamiti | śuktau rajata-
jñānaṃ ca śuktitvaprakārakaṃ yatpramāṇajñānaṃ tatprāgabhāvavyatiriktaṃ tadviṣayībhū-
tāyāḥ śukterāvaraṇaṃ tena śuktijñānena nivartyaṃ tādṛśaśuktijñānāśrayībhūtā-
tmaniṣṭhaṃ ca yadyapi bhavati tathāpi na tadvastvantaram | tasya jñānatvena vastvantara-
tvābhāvāt | dhārāvāhiketi | aprakāśitārthaprakāśakatvāditi hetāvaprakā-
śiteti padānuktau dhārāvāhikajñānasthale vyabhicāraḥ | tatra prathamajñānasyā-
jñānapūrvakatvāttatra niruktavastvantarapūrvakatvarūpasādhyaṃ vidyate | tena ca prathamajñāne-
nājñānasya nivṛttau viṣayaprakāśe jāte dvitīyādijñānānāṃ niruktavastvantarapūrvaka-
tvābhāvena sādhyaṃ nāsti | arthaprakāśakatvarūpahetuśca vartata iti | aprakāśite-
tyukte tu dvitīyādijñānānāṃ pūrvajñānaprakāśitārthaprakāśakatve'pyaprakāśitārthaprakā-
śakatvarūpaheturnāstīti na vyabhicāraḥ | vyabhicāralakṣaṇaṃ prāguktam (pṛ. 239
pa. 22) | madhyavartīti | vaidhuryamabhāvaḥ | pratirodho nivāraṇam | prabhā ca pratikṣaṇaṃ
bhidyate | tatrāndhakāravyāpte deśe prathamakṣaṇotpannā pradīpaprabhā cātra dṛṣṭāntatvenoktā |
tatra ca tādṛśavastvantaramandhakāra iti tatpūrvakatvarūpaṃ sādhyaṃ vartate | aprakāśitā-
rthaprakāśakatvarūpahetuśca vartate | dvitīyādikṣaṇotpannā pradīpaprabhā tu madhyavartinī |
sā ca na tādṛśavastvantarapūrvikā | andhakārasya prathamakṣaṇotpannayaiva nivṛtteḥ |
nāpyaprakāśitārthaprakāśikā | prathamakṣaṇotpannayaivārthaprakāśanāt | tathā ca
tasyāṃ sādhyasādhanayorabhāvena dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ na saṃbhavati | ato dṛṣṭāntatvasaṃbhavāya
prathamotpannetyuktam | saurāloketi | divā sūryaprakāśe prathamakṣaṇotpannāyāmapi
dīpaprabhāyāṃ na sādhyaṃ nāpi heturiti tasyā dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ na saṃbhavati | atondhakāra
ityuktam | na ca jñāneti | pratyakṣajñānasādhakatvādindriyaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇam |
evamanumitisādhako liṅgaparāmarśonumānaṃ pramāṇam | śabdaśca śābdajñānasādhakaṃ
pramāṇam | tatra ca heturvartate | svaphalībhūtajñānaviṣayaprakāśakatvenāprakāśi-
tārthaprakāśakatvāt | uktavastvantarapūrvakatvarūpasādhyaṃ ca tatra nāstītyato
vyabhicāraḥ | vipratipannamiti | yaścāstitve vivadate taṃ prati pramāṇāni kevalaṃ
tatra tasya vastuno nāstitvaṃ nivārayanti | na tu tādṛśavastuprakāśakatvaṃ teṣām |
prakāśakaṃ tu pramāṇajanyaṃ jñānameveti na vyabhicāraḥ | nanviti | prabhā hi na
svayamarthaprakāśikā | kiṃ tu jñānamevārthaprakāśakam | prakāśo nāmārthasphuraṇam |
prabhā tu tamodūrīkaraṇena kevalamindriyāṇāṃ sāhāyyaṃ karoti | tathā ca prabhāyā
arthaprakāśakatvābhāvena sādhanarahitatvānna tasyā dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ saṃbhavati | yadi tu
paraṃparayāpi prakāśakatvaṃ gṛhyate tarhīndriyāṇāmapi prakāśakatvāpattiḥ | iṣṭāpattau
tu tatra sādhyābhāvāddheturvyabhicaritaḥ syādityāśayaḥ | prakāśaśabdeneti |
nātra prakāśaśabdenārthasphuraṇaṃ vivakṣitam | kiṃ tu tamonirāsakatvamātram |
antaḥkaraṇavṛttirapi hi jñānākhyā viṣayagatamāntaramāvaraṇarūpaṃ tamo nivāra-
yati | prabhā tu bāhyamandhakārarūpaṃ tamo dūrīkaroti | viṣayasphuraṇaṃ
tu buddhisthacidābhāsavyāptyaivetyupapāditam (pṛ. 415 paṃ. 15) | indri-
yāṇi tvantaḥkaraṇasya mārgapradānena sāhāyyamācaranti na tamonirasaneneti na
kaściddoṣaḥ | vyavahārahetutvamiti | prakāśayatīti vyavahāro jñāne tejasi
ca loke dṛśyate | tathā ca prakāśavyavahārahetutvaṃ jñānaprabhayoḥ pakṣadṛṣṭāntayo-
raviśiṣṭamiti bhāvaḥ | itthaṃ pratyakṣamanumānaṃ cāvidyāyāṃ pramāṇaṃ pradarśitam |

adhunā tatra śabdapramāṇaṃ pradarśayati — śruteśceti | bhūya iti | atra viśva-
māyāśabdenāvidyocyate | paramātmadhyānādinā mokṣakāle tasyā nivṛttirbhava-
tītyarthaḥ | taratīti | yogī dhyānena svahṛdi yasminparamātmani niveśite
sati vidyāviruddhāṃ vistṛtāmetāṃ māyāṃ tarati tasmai jñānasvarūpāya jñātu-
maśakyāya paramātmane nama ityarthaḥ | eteneti | bhāvarūpāyā avidyāyāḥ
pramāṇasiddhatvena tadanaṅgīkarturbhāskarasya mataṃ nirastamityarthaḥ | bhāvarūpeti |
brahmaṇa eva bhāvarūpājñānopādhikamīśvaratvaṃ jīvatvaṃ cetyadvaitāmode (pṛ. 8)
vistareṇa nirūpitam | na ceti | bhāvikaḥ satyaḥ | tantuḥ paṭasyeva
jīvaḥ paramātmano vāstavika evāvayava iti na vācyamityarthaḥ | niṣkala-
miti | nirgatāḥ kalā aṃśā yasmāttanniṣkalaṃ niravayavam | ata eva niṣkriyaṃ
kriyārahitam | tata eva śāntamapariṇāmi | śāntamityasyormiṣaṭkarahitamiti
vārthaḥ | ūrmiṣaṭkaṃ tu bubhukṣāpipāsāśokamohajarāmṛtyurūpam | niravadyaṃ rāgā-
didoṣaśūnyam | nirañjanaṃ dharmādharmādyasaṃbaddham | asyāṃ śrutau paramātmanoṃśarahi-
tatvaṃ spaṣṭamevoktam |

śaktimiti | saptaśatyāṃ prādhānike rahasye spaṣṭametat | mātuliṅgeti |
mātuliṅgaṃ phalaviśeṣaḥ (mahāḷuṃga i. pra.) | gadā āyudhaviśeṣaḥ | kheṭaścarma |
svayamiti | mahālakṣmīrbrahmā śrīścetyapatyadvayaṃ svayamutpādya kālarātriḥ sarasvatī
ceti śaktirūpaṃ svakanyādvayamapyapatyadvayotpādane prerayāmāsetyarthaḥ | tataśceti |
ādirmahālakṣmīḥ | sā ca svāpatyayorvivāhamakarot | kālarātrisarasvatyapa-
tyānāṃ vivāhamakārayaccetyarthaḥ | svarūpeti | yathā caitreṇa ahaṃ gacchāmi — ityukte
maitro vidhipratiṣedhāvakṛtvaiva taduktiśravaṇasamanantaraṃ sadyaḥ ahaṃ gacchāmi — iti
kevalamanuvadati | etacca taduktisvarūpānukaraṇaṃ pratiṣedhasūcakaṃ bhavati | tathai-
vātra bodhyamityāśayaḥ | tataśceti | uktaprakāreṇāvidyāsiddhau tanmūlakasya
sakalasyāsya prapañcasya mithyātvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati | sati prameye pramātṛtvamiti
nyāyena prameyasya prapañcasya mithyātvaṃ cettannirūpitāḥ pramātṛtvādayokhilā
dharmā api mithyābhūtā evetyātmano nirviśeṣatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati |

nanviti | āvidyakatvamavidyākalpitatvam | mithyātvamiti yāvat | nivarta-
nāyeti | mithyābhūtameva vastu jñānena nivartyate na tu satyam | brahmabhā-
vāyeti | jīvagatānāṃ pramātṛtvādidharmāṇāṃ satyatve jīvasya saviśeṣatvāvaśyaṃ-
bhāvena tasya nirviśeṣabrahmatādātmyaṃ nopapadyate | śāstreti | brahma veda brahmaiva
bhavati (mu. 3 | 2 | 9) iti śrutau brahmajñānādbrahmabhāvo bodhyate | brahmabhāvaśca
jīvasyopādhivilaye satyeva | taduktam —

ghaṭe naṣṭe yathā vyoma vyomaiva bhavati svayam |
tathaivopādhivilaye brahmaiva brahmavitsvayam || (ātmopa. 1 | 16) iti |
tathā ca jīvopādhibhūtānāṃ manaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ vastutaḥ satyatvepyuktaśrutibalātpra-
mārūpeṇa brahmajñānena teṣāṃ nivṛttirupapadyate | upādhivilayaṃ vinā jīvasya brahma-
bhāvāsaṃbhavāt | upalambhācceti | śrīrāmacandrakṛtasetudarśanaṃ viṣayadoṣadarśanaṃ
tārkṣyadhyānaṃ ca jñānaviśeṣabhūtamapi krameṇa brahmahatyādipātakasya rāgasya viṣasya
ca satyasyāpi vināśakamupalabhyate | tārkṣyo garuḍaḥ | sāvadyā | garhaṇīyā |
anavadyam | samīcīnam | satyasyeti | yathā satya ātmā jñānena na
nivartate tathā manaḥprabhṛtivastujātaṃ jīvopādhibhūtaṃ vastutaḥ satyaṃ cenna kathaṃcidapi
jñānena tannivṛttirupapadyate | upādhimithyātvābhiprāyeṇaiva śāstramupādhinivṛttiṃ
pratipādayati | bandhasyeti | ato yatra śāstrasya yuktiviruddhārthāvabhāsastatra
yuktiyukta eva śāstrasyābhiprāyo varṇanīyaḥ | tathā copādhimithyātvābhiprāyeṇaiva
śāstramupādhinivṛttiṃ bodhayatīti siddham | āditya iti | śrutirapi saṃbhava-
darthābhiprāyeṇaiva pramāṇaṃ bhavati | yūpo yajñastambhaḥ | tasyādityatādātmyamityā-
dityo yūpa iti śruteryathāśrutorthaḥ | paraṃ tu tasminnarthe śrutirna pramāṇam | loke
tattādātmyasyāsaṃbhavāt | ādityasādṛśyaṃ tu yūpasya tejasvitvādidharmeṇa saṃbhava-
tīti tadabhiprāyeṇa tasyāḥ śruteḥ prāmāṇyaṃ svīkriyate | evameva yajamānaḥ
prastara ityatrāpi | vaidikyā iti | jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajetetyā-
diśrutiṣu svargādyuddeśena yāgo vidhīyate | yāgaśca kriyārūpaḥ | kriyāyāścāśutara-
vināśitvānna tasyāḥ svargaprāptiparyantamavasthitiriti svargayāgayoḥ kāryakāraṇa-
bhāvāsaṃbhavena śrutyarthānupapattiḥ | tadarthaṃ tādṛśakriyājanyaṃ svargaprāptiparyantamava-
sthāyyapūrvamaṅgīkṛtam | asaṃbhavinyapyarthe śruteḥ prāmāṇyāṅgīkāre tvadṛṣṭāpi loke
vinaṣṭātkāraṇātsākṣātkāryotpattiḥ śrutibalātkalpanīyā syāt | tasmāllokadṛṣṭavya-
vahārānusāreṇaiva śrutitātparyaṃ kalpanīyam | tathā ca śrutyuktopādhinivṛttisiddhaye
prapañcasya mithyātvamavaśyamabhyupetavyaṃ bhavati | pratirodhabhiyeti | yatraikasmi-
npakṣe mitho viruddhasya sādhyadvayasya sādhakaṃ hetudvayaṃ dṛśyate tatra yadyapi vastuta
ekaḥ saddheturapi syādaparo duṣṭastathāpi yāvattayormadhyenyatarasya prābalyaṃ nāvagamyate
tāvaddhetudvayamapi duṣṭatvaśaṅkayā svasvasādhyaṃ sādhayitumasamarthaṃ bhavatītyāśayaḥ | maru-
marīcikādāviti | marudeśe mṛgatṛṣṇādau ca jalapratibhāsottaraṃ jalālābhena
jalābhāvaniścaye jāte tatra satyatvarūpasādhyābhāvepi āsamānatvarūpahetoḥ
sattvena bhāsamānatvaheturvyabhicarito bhavatīti sa eva duṣṭa iti bhāvaḥ | abādhi-
tatveneti | tathā ca marumarīcikājale bhāsamānatvasya sattvepyabādhitatvavi-
śiṣṭabhāsamānatvasya hetorabhāvena na vyabhicāra ityāśayaḥ | viśeṣaṇāsiddhe-
riti | pakṣabhūte bhāsamānesminprapañce abādhitatvasyābhāvena tvadukto heturvi-
śeṣaṇāsiddha iti gūḍhāśayaḥ | tameva viśadayati-tatredamiti | na prathama iti | 16|812 — ātyantikatattva for ātmatattva A.
yadi marumarīcikājalaṃ bhāsamānadaśāyāmapi nābādhitaṃ bhavati | tadānīṃ bādha-
jñānābhāvepi bādhasattvāt | paścāttanabādhajñānena bhāsamānadaśāsthabādhasyāpi
viṣayīkaraṇānnātra pūrvamapi jalamabhūditi | tathā ca yadā kadāpyabādhitaṃ tanna
bhavatīti na heturduṣṭa iti brūṣe tarhi prapañcopi tadvadeveti vibhāvaya | baddhāvasthā-
yāmapi prapañcasya jñānidṛṣṭyā bādhitatvāt | evaṃ cedṛśe prapañcasatyatvādiviṣaya
āgama eva mukhyaṃ pramāṇaṃ nānumānamiti bhāvaḥ | yatneneti | ukta evārthonayā
harikārikayā pradarśitaḥ | jñānātmanopīti | jñānasvarūpa ātmā kasyāmapya-
vasthāyāṃ na bādhyata ityevaṃ kathamasmābhirasarvajñairjñeyamityāśayaḥ | advitīyatva-
miti | sadeva saumyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam (chā. 6 | 1 | 1) iti śrutā-
vātmabhinnaṃ dvitīyaṃ sarvaṃ niṣidhyate | kathaṃ katheti | kathā nāma nānāvaktṛkaḥ
pūrvottarapakṣapratipādakavākyasaṃdarbhaḥ | sa ca vādajalpavitaṇḍārūpaḥ | tatra tattvani-
rṇayaphalaḥ kathāviśeṣo vādaḥ | paraṃ tu yatnenetyuktaharikārikānusāreṇa tarkasyāprati-
ṣṭhānādvādiprativādinorubhayorapi svasvābhimatārthasādhakānumānasya vaktuṃ śakya-
tvena na kasyāpi jayaḥ parājayo veti tattvanirṇayo na syādityāśayaḥ | evaṃ trica-
tureti | trayāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ vā jñānānāṃ janma bhavati | tadapekṣayādhikā mati-
rnāstīti nyāyārthaḥ | sādhakaṃ bādhakaṃ vā yaddhetvābhāsādilakṣaṇairayuktaṃ tattṛtīyāyāṃ
caturthyāṃ vāvasthāyāṃ viśrāntaṃ bhavati | ābhāsalakṣaṇayuktaṃ tu tarkāpratiṣṭhānādvi-
śrāntaṃ na bhavati | tacca kathāṅgaṃ na bhavati | tathā ca nirduṣṭena sādhakena bādhakena
vā kathāsamāptisaṃbhava iti bhāvaḥ | na ca bhedeti | jaghanyatā gauṇatvam |
jīveśvarabhedo jīvānāṃ mitho bhedo jaḍabhedaśca vyavahārenubhūyate | tādṛśapramāṇa-
viruddhā sadeva saumya (chā. 6 | 1 | 1) ityadvaitapratipādikā śrutirgauṇārtha-
katvena kathaṃcidyojyetyāśayaḥ | vibhinneti | yathā vyāvahārikaśuktisatyatvaṃ
prātibhāsikarajatasatyatvena na virudhyate tathā śrutipratipāditaṃ pāramārthikaṃ
brahmādvaitasatyatvaṃ lokenubhūyamānena vyāvahārikeṇa dvaitasatyatvena na virudhyata iti
bhāvaḥ | tenaiva | khaṇḍanakāreṇaiva | tadadvaiteti | tattasmādadvaitaśruteḥ pratyakṣato
bādhaḥ kṣataḥ | sakalapramāṇajyeṣṭhasya pratyakṣasyaitādṛśī gatiścettadupajīvinonumā-
nādervarākasya kaiva katheti darśayati — nānumānādīti | taṃ śrutibādhaṃ kartumanu-
mānādi tavamatepi na kṣamate | śrutyapekṣayā liṅgasya durbalatvādityarthaḥ | atra
kṣataḥ kṣato mate mata iti pādāntyayamakaṃ kavinā nirdiṣṭam | dhīdhanā iti |
dhīreva dhanaṃ yeṣāṃ te dhīdhanāḥ | saṃbodhanam | bho buddhimantaḥ puruṣā asyā advai-
taśruterbādhanāya tadā prajñāṃ prayacchatha datta yadā pāṇilabdhaṃ hastaprāptaṃ cintāmaṇiṃ
samudre kṣeptumicchathetyarthaḥ |

vihiteti | dharmeṇa pāpamapanudanti (ma. nā. 22 | 1) iti śruteḥ
pāpavināśakatvaṃ dharmasyaiva na tu jñānasya | jñānaṃ ca pramāṇādhīnaṃ viṣayādhīnaṃ
ceti na tadvidhātuṃ śakyate | yajñādikarma tu mukhyataḥ puruṣaprayatnādhīnamiti
tadvidhānaṃ saṃbhavati | tathā setuṃ dṛṣṭvetyatra setudarśanavidhau na tātparyam |
kiṃ tu setusnānapraśaṃsārthikā taddarśanoktiḥ | āpatediti | kharādīnāmatya-
ntapāpināmapi sāhajikatayaiva setudarśanasaṃbhavāt | na syācceti | andhatve-
na setudarśanāsaṃbhavāt | agniciditi | agniṃ cinotītyagnicidyajamānaḥ |
kapilā gauḥ | satī pativratā | bhikṣuḥ sarvakarmasaṃnyāsī paramahaṃsaḥ | mahodadhi-
rmahāsamudraḥ | virodhabhūteti | viṣayarāgavirodhabhūtā yā viṣayānabhiratista-
tsaṃjñakavairāgyotpattau satyāṃ viṣayarāgo na dṛśyata ityetadabhiprāyikaiva rāgadā-
hoktiriti bhāvaḥ | na śliṣyate | na yujyate | dhyānasyeti | jñānaviśeṣaḥ
pramāpadavācyo yathārthānubhavo hi śāstraprāmāṇyātsatyasyāpi vināśaka iti
tavābhimatam | tatra ca tārkṣyadhyānena viṣavināśa ityudāharaṇaṃ na yujyate |
dhyānasyāvicchinnasmṛtisaṃtānarūpatvenānubhavatvasyaivābhāvena yathārthānubhavatvābhā-
vāditi bhāvaḥ | arthavaitathyeti | arthasya pramātṛtvādinikhilaprapañcasya vaitathyaṃ
mithyātvam | tasyoktirna brahmabhāvāyetyarthaḥ | tasmāditi | sadeva (chā. 6 | 1 | 1)
iti śrutau yadadvitīyatvaṃ pratipādyate tadupapattaye pratyakṣato dṛśyamānasya bhedasyā-
vidyākalpitatvamasmābhirucyate na tvadvaitavādavyasanamevāsmākamiti mantavyam |

kiṃ tvanādīti | yathā kṣīrodake mithaḥ saṃpṛkte idaṃ kṣīramidamudakamityevaṃ
kṣīratvenodakatvena ca viśadatayā na pratīyete tathā māyātmānau vaiśadyena na
pratīyete | yata ātmā māyikaṃ buddhyādikamātmatvena pratyeti na tu tadviviktatayā
svasvarūpaṃ pratyeti | māyāmapi ca māyātvena na pratyetīti bhāvaḥ | nīcānā-
miti | vyādhavardhitarājaputravadayaṃ puruṣo jīvātmā māyākāryabhūtairmahattattvā-
haṃkārādibhiḥ sahāvivekena vasaṃstadanurūpameva janasaṃvāde svātmānaṃ mithyaiva
sukhādyākrāntaṃ manyata ityarthaḥ | dāteti | taduktaṃ vārtikakāraiḥ —

rājasūnoḥ smṛtiprāptau vyādhabhāvo nivartate |
yathaivamātmano'jñasya tattvamasyādivākyataḥ || iti |
dvayostādātmyamiti | sa ātmā yayostau tadātmānau | tayorbhāvastā-
dātmyamiti tādātmyaśabdārthaḥ | tatra tayordvayorvastuto bhede advaitahāniḥ |
vastuto bhedābhāve tu na tādātmyaśabdārtha upapadyata ityāśayaḥ |

janmādīti | asya puro dṛśyamānasya nikhilasya jagata utpattisthitilayā
yasmādbhavanti tadbrahmeti sūtrārthaḥ | athāto brahmajijñāsā (brahmasū. 1 | 1 | 1)
iti prathamasūtreṇa brahmajijñāsāyāṃ pravartitāyāṃ kīdṛśaṃ brahmetyākāṅkṣā jāyate |
tadarthaṃ brahmalakṣaṇamavaśyaṃ kathanīyam | tadanena dvitīyasūtreṇa pradarśyate |
tathā coktam —

ṛṣayopi padārthānāṃ nāntaṃ yānti pṛthaktvataḥ |
lakṣaṇena tu siddhānāmantaṃ yānti vipaścitaḥ || iti |
lakṣaṇaṃ dvividham — svarūpalakṣaṇaṃ taṭasthalakṣaṇaṃ ca | dvividhamapi lakṣaṇaṃ
vyāvartakaṃ vyavahāraprayojakaṃ ca bhavati | svarūpalakṣaṇādvastusvarūpaparicayo
bhavati | tatra tāvajjanmādikāraṇatvaṃ māyāviśiṣṭabrahmaṇaḥ svarūpalakṣaṇatvepyavi-
ruddham | śuddhabrahmaṇastu tattaṭasthalakṣaṇam | śuddhabrahmaṇaḥ svarūpalakṣaṇaṃ tu satyaṃ
jñānamanantaṃ brahma (tai. 2 | 1 | 1) iti | vivaraṇa iti | śrīprakāśātmayati-
viracite pañcapādikāvivaraṇe dvitīyasūtrārambha evaitaduktamityarthaḥ (pṛ. 204) |

śāstreti | dvitīyasūtre jagatkāraṇatvena brahmaṇaḥ sarvajñatvamarthāduktam |
tadārthikaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ pradhānādinirāsāya vedakartṛtvahetunā samarthayitumidaṃ tṛtī-
yaṃ sūtram | śāstraṃ vedaḥ |

pravṛttiśca nivṛttiśca puṃsāṃ yenopadiśyate |
taddharmāścopadiśyante śāstraṃ śāstravido viduḥ ||
iti tallakṣaṇāt | tasya yoniḥ kāraṇamiti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ | sarvajñakalpa-
vedakartṛtvādbrahmaṇaḥ sarvajñatvamityarthaḥ | idaṃ prathamaṃ varṇakam | ekaḥ prakāra
ityarthaḥ | dvitīyeti | asminprakāre śāstrayoniriti bahuvrīhiḥ | janmādya-
syeti dvitīyasūtre brahmaṇo jagajjanmādikāraṇatvakathanena kṣityaṅkurādikaṃ
sakartṛkaṃ kāryatvāddhaṭavat — ityanumānaṃ brahmaṇi pramāṇaṃ sūcitamityāśaṅkā
syāt | tannivṛttaya idaṃ sūtram | brahma na pramāṇāntaragamyam | kutaḥ |
śāstrayonitvāt | śāstraṃ vedo yoniḥ pramāṇaṃ yasya tattvādityarthaḥ | taṃ tvaupa-
niṣadaṃ puruṣaṃ pṛcchāmi (bṛ. 3 | 9 | 26) ityupaniṣadvedyatvapratīteḥ | nāveda-
vinmanute taṃ bṛhantam (tai. brā. 3 | 12 | 9 | 7) iti śrutau pramāṇāntaraniṣedhasya
spaṣṭamevoktatvācca | anumānaṃ tvatra śrutipārṣadatayaivopayujyate na tu svāta-
ntryeṇetyabhiprāyaḥ |

tattviti | samyaganvayaḥ samanvayastātparyaviṣayatvam | tatpūrvasūtroktaṃ
śāstrayonitvaṃ brahmaṇo vedāntavākyatātparyaviṣayatvātsidhyatīti sūtrārthaḥ |
dvitīyeti | vedāntavākyāni na vidheyopāsanāviṣayatvena brahma bodhayanti
kiṃ tu mukhyatvena | tathaiva teṣāṃ tātparyāvadhāraṇāditi sūtrārtha iti śam || śrīḥ ||
div.trailer:
iti śrīmadabhyaṃkaropāhva — mahāmahopādhyāyavāsudevaśāstriviracitāyāṃ sarvada-
rśanasaṃgrahavyākhyāyāṃ darśanāṅkurābhidhāyāṃ śāṅkaradarśanaṃ samāptam ||
